When Kagome realizes her relationship with Inuyasha isn't what she wants, she leaves the village in search of a purpose. On her journey, she reunites with an old friend and discovers that even broken things can be made beautiful again. (SessKag Week 2020 Day 6)

They were an unlikely set of companions; an embittered and injured earl and a clergyman's daughter suddenly struggling to navigate the high society. But the admiration harboured was mutual. SessKag Victorian AU. One Shot.
Kagome is running for her life. She can hear him crashing through the forest in his pursuit of her. Her only hope is to reach the well in time... (For SessKag Week's Day 5 Prompt-fill: Horror)
This is me working through my sequel anxieties by making an acceptable alternative with the info we have gathered so far... For SESSKAG week 2020
Kagome resolves to snap a photo of the infamous Killing Perfection, which proves more difficult than expected. Oneshot. For Sesskag Week Day 4 - Comedy.
Seeking his abducted ward, Sesshoumaru is drawn into a game of Dungeons & Dragons by Kagome. Each chapter is a prompt from SessKag Week 2020.
Kagome thought Shippo took trick-or-treating too far. She was dead wrong. My prompt fill for Day 3 of SessKag Week (Thriller).
Kagome hears something go bump in the night and urges her mate to go investigate. Oneshot. For Sesskag Week Day 3 - Thriller.

Where Rin decides it is time to let go of her ribbon wanting to look older. But the long worn ribbon has sentimental value for Rin, will it be easy for her to let go of it? Sesshomaru comes for a visit and helps Rin let go of the ribbon. (Rin is thirteen and betrothed to Sesshomaru for when she turns sixteen, nothing unusual in the feudal era).

Where Rin suffers from a nightmare before Sesshomaru's visit. He senses her tiredness and takes her to a place to nap. Jaken chaperones the visit. (Rin is fourteen here and betrothed to marry him at a more appropriate age.)

Humoring his brother, Sesshomaru yields to the legend of the timeless miko, awaiting the day her curse is lifted. Touching the statue of Lady Kagome, he never expected stone to become flesh. "You. What are you?" She asked, katana pointed at him. "I'm a man," Sesshomaru said slowly. "What are you?" She had, after all, been a statue not moments before. S/K Week 2020! #skw2020d2.
Every night, Kagome tells Shippo a bedtime story. He's not the only one who is listening. (SessKag Week 2020 Day 2 Prompt-fill)
Inspired my the song concrete angel.
Kagome's supplies go missing but the culprit isn't who she expects. (SessKagWeek 2020 Day 1 Prompt: Crime/Heist)

Kagome makes a startling discovery about Sesshoumaru's face markings. She then involves herself in his daily beauty routine. "Being so pretty should be a crime." Oneshot. For Sesskag Week Day 1 Crime.
Sesshomaru arrives on an appointed day to see Rin but comes across Rin having a conversation with Kohaku. Will his eavesdropping reveal doubts or truths? (One-shot).

In this short story Moroha wants to do something different to her hair. So, she tried different hairstyles and didn't know which ones she wanted. So, her mom aka Kagome come up with an idea of what kind of hairstyle to give for her daughter Moroha. Moroha loved her hairstyle so, much and wanted to show it to her Daddy who is Inuyasha :)

Rin is called to the village to help with a delivery. A storm approaches and Sesshomaru is left alone to care for his young daughters. This follows after 'Be Mindful of Your Claws'. Sesshomaru has trepidations and wonders what would Rin do in the same situation. Towa and Setsuna are two here. One-shot!
Inuyasha and Koga have a Rap Battle. My idea of this came from the Belle and Cinderella Rap Battle on Youtube.

From a TUMBLR prompt from Inucestlover, enjoy a RP between Inucestlover and Gayle Nightingale. The sudden rainfall forced InuYasha and Sesshomaru to seek refuge in a nearby café. Read and find out what happens
4 festivals. 3 meetings. 2 souls. 1 legend. For Sparks Fly in July.

Sesshomaru and Kagome are on the hunt for a sorceress who can provide them with a remedy to cure Rin and Shippo of a mysterious ailment. The price? A palm-reading. Doesn't sound so bad, right? But, what if that palm-reading changes everything Kagome thought she knew? And, how in the world is she supposed to tell Sesshomaru the truth of what she's learned? S/K. Told in short-shots.

Inuyasha waits for something important after something else happened to him. That's when he saw a moving car pull up next door to the house that was just been bought a few days ago. So he just had to look out his window to see something he never expected.

It was only a matter of time, Sesshomaru knew that. But, when it finally happened, when the Bone Eater's well opened and his brother's escapades started in the modern era, he was not entirely prepared. This series of one-shots follows the adventures of Inuyasha in Kagome's world, through the eyes of Sesshomaru, the one who is tasked with cleaning up the mess.

Another prompt of Rin and Sesshomaru. Sesshomaru may be a cold daiyoukai but he knows how to be sweet and endearing to Rin in his own way, such as slowing his gait down while Rin is heavily pregnant. There is a little Sango and Miroku thrown in there for you as well!
Superposition: "The combination of two distinct physical phenomena of the same type…so that they coexist as part of the same event." Two hearts, a library, and fate. InuKag. One-shot.

He didn't know why he kept the beast alive - now only a shell of the brother he spent all those years detesting. Now he simply wished he had had more time. But every time he drew his sword to end the beast's suffering, some small voice in his head stayed his hand: "Have hope, she will come." - Winner Best Angst Q3 2020 by TheFeudalConnection!

It is the night before their wedding. Sesshomaru has a tradition that he feels that he must fulfill as his father and his grandfather before him fulfilled this tradition. Rin's human customs and traditions are in contradiction to them. Will they find a balance and harmony in their demon/human union? Prompt challenge by @screamibgdodo on Tumblr.
A day in the life of new, messy beginnings. [Part 1 of "Do You Believe in Ghosts?" series]
Oneshot! A reflection on what could be Miroku's happiest day and what the reality is. MirokuxSango. Implied sex, rated T just in case. Short drabble.

This story includes the ladies of the Inuyasha fandom about being with child and their experiences around that life altering moment of realization that there is life growing inside them and/or the decision to have them. Ch. 1: InuxKag; MirxSan; SessxRin. Ch.2: KogxAya; Touga x Lady Mother; Touga x Izayoi.
Inuyasha is trapped inside his head by a yokai. Can Kagome save him or will she also be overtaken by the madness? One-shot. InuKag.
No one can escape the passage of time, not even a youkai as great as Sesshomaru. When everyone is gone, when the world is no longer what it once was, is there any rest for ones who remained behind?
The invitation came late that evening waking both Kikyo and Kagome from their sleep.

Loss. There are no fancy words to describe it. It is something that one must feel within the deepest part of their hearts and souls to understand as it howls with anguish for an untold amount of time. Your body, heart, mind, and soul beg for release—for its end.
Inuyasha and Kagome reunite after a violent battle wounds Inuyasha, leaving both of them equally worried about the other's condition.

Sesshomaru and Rin bring Setsuna and Towa on patrol when they are three. An unexpected thunderstorm has the family find shelter. Raijin's drums beat loudly and the girls are scared by Sesshomaru's story about Raijin.

As circumstances separate them physically, Sesshomaru and Rin continue to remain connected through an exchange of letters, and very occasional visits. Can an unexpected marriage proposal for Rin give release to words that have silently piled up between them? Rin is 18 years old in this story.
Inuyasha gets a Father's Day surprise. Modern AU. InuKag with family fluff. Read and review. Constructive criticism is welcome, but please not hateful comments.

Another two prompt ideas done from the Tumblr prompts by screamibgdodo. Rin is thirteen and picks fruit for Sesshomaru. Will he finally let her see him eat? In this story she is engaged to him, but that is it. These prompts are to explore their growing relationship and bond.
The kids put together something special for their mom. Modern AU. InuKag. Read and review. Constructive criticism is welcome, but please no hateful comments.

After she realizes that Inuyasha has chosen Kikyo, Kagome returns the Shikon shards to the Sengoku Jidai in the dead of night, and vows not to return. But some choices are capable of setting everything on a different and darker path. When Kagome wakes up to an entirely new future, only she, with the help of Kikyo (who's now a part of her soul) can set it right. X-posted from AO3

Tumblrs InuKag Week 2020. A whole week of different themes dedicated to a pair that were always meant to defy time and space all to prove just how strong their love really is. Rated T for Inuyasha's occasional potty mouth.

Based from a prompt off of Tumblr. This a moment where Sesshomaru and Rin values each other's gifts. Rin learns to sew and is the only one who will sew her kimonos and she gives him flowers. He keeps the flowers until the wilt and die, reminding him of Rin's own finite existence. She is eleven and it is not romance, but hints of a possible future, but only friendship in this story.
If Sesshomaru wrote a love letter...

Basically a story that started bothering me after listening to music in my car. Based on the song Itsy Bitsy Teeny Weeny Yellow Polka Dot Bikini by Brian Hyland. This is the first time I've written any fanfiction, but I did force my husband to read it, so hopefully it's not too awful
Setsuna and Towa have been suffering from terrible nightmares for days. With first-time parents and the company of Jaken, will they be able to overcome this new obstacle?
At the end of a dark, and very long night, dawn comes, and brings with it a baby girl for Inuyasha and Kagome (post canon)
We're a thousand miles from comfort. We have traveled land and sea. But as long as you are with me, there's no place I'd rather be.
OneShot, A little truth or dare never hurt anyone. Well not physically at least... let's play a game?
Waking from an impromptu nap with their twins, Sesshomaru and Rin talk for a brief moment of mindful appreciation.

The babies are only three months old and Sesshomaru worries about his claws and handling his daughters. He wants Rin to rest for the night as he decides he will handle his children physically. Are his claws a hindrance or will he manage? Subtle hints and mentions of sex. Oneshot!

Inuyasha holds their eye contact for a long moment, and Kagome feels her breath catch in her throat. She'd bet anything he was planning on bringing her back, that his decision to delay is spur-of-the-moment and on her account. "I have something to tell you," the TV program echoes in her head. :: In which Kagome thinks about love confessions.

Returning from a business trip, Kagome and her rude coworker Inuyasha get separated from the rest of their colleagues when their plane gets delayed-and delayed, and delayed, and delayed. :: a random modern AU, rated T for swears
The stakes are high. The water's rough. But this love is ours.

Set in the modern era. Towa and Setsuna have lived over five hundred years since the defeat of Ryumagatsuki hoping to see two very important people again. Friends and family wait too. Warning: Characters death mentioned. SessxRin pairing.

Once again I am writing a series of three one shots together. Setsuna, Moroha, and then Towa. They are twelve years old and is related to my other story of "We Three are the Future" when they were nine.
One Shot. Sesshomaru finds himself drawn to the Bone Eater's Well.
My own version of the nursery rhyme Mary had a little lamb, but Inuyasha style. Hope you enjoy.
Sesshomaru learned news of Sounga's usage. Assuming his father collected his human, he went to inspect the damage, but came upon disaster.

This piece is set during the anime/manga but from Tenseiga's POV about his master and the lessons that he needs to learn from him. Sesshomaru and Rin are friends only this one because she is a child, but implied future SessxRin but only implied for the future. One-shot. But if I get enough requests (if it's good), I'll do one for Tetsusaiga.

When you walk through the gate, I cannot help but gape. You are luminous, and you look free. You see me and I see you, and I know you know I am there for you. When you stride up to me, I wonder what my words to you will be. Nothing seems worthy of you, of this, but still I will myself to speak. X-posted from AO3

The Shrine was one of the few safe spaces where humans and demons could get together to simply enjoy music and each other's company. When Kagome scores Demonic Aura, the most iconic rock band around, she is beyond excited. But what happens after the contracts are signed? How will she survive the forces of bigotry trying to break it apart? X-posted from AO3

Kagome, this isn't a game," Myoga had warned his young niece. He had enough knowledge of Sesshomaru to know things would not end very well for any of them. "You play an extremely dangerous game with an Inu Prince who is wildly known for being not only cold-hearted but also the perfect assassin."
Sequel to CAVE PAINTING:: Sesshoumaru and Kagome are riding out a storm together alone in a cave.
Inuyasha tries to put an inconsolable Moroha to sleep with a night walk and finds some peace himself.

In the anime, Kagome's father is never really mentioned outside of a few brief appearances. In this one-shot, we learn who he was and what he did on the day that he died. And it really isn't something that should have been ignored or overlooked by the anime/manga. Enjoy this look into Miotosu Higurashi, the overlooked father of Kagome.
There was something lurking outside and it was going to get in by any means necessary
When one of Rin's research projects goes awry, Sesshomaru is given a bit of insight into what it means to be her and what part of her hadn't changed.

Kagome looks at all her friends having fun and getting along with each other. Miroku and Sango are playing with their kids and Kohaku and Rin are having a good time. Everything is perfect, so why does she start feeling uneasy when Kagura and Sesshomaru look at each other with dread and Kikyo and Hitomiko can't talk?

Inuyasha spent THREE years without her. How did he feel back then? Series of One-shots describing this experience. Hours, days, weeks, months, years. It gets worse everytime. So much drama and so much sadness. Inukag story.
Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha are young girls who are separated from their families. My exploration of their characters after the fire but prior to the new upcoming anime
An early morning lesson between father and daughter lends to a new understanding of duty, sacrifice, and an unconditional love.
What was the difference between how Inuyasha reacted to a similar event with both Kikyo and Kagome.
Rin has never been one to ask for much or give away what she thought. So it's odd how Sesshomaru just seems to know.
Short story. A new hunky student enrolls in kagomes class. Will she focus on her studies or get distracted?
An E Pluribus Unum expanded scene (takes place right after chapter 99 in EPU): Sesshoumaru and Kagome both struggle with the aftermath of their relationship being unfairly judged.
Be strong they say, be strong in the face of your fear and stronger in the face of your enemy. But... This was an enemy I couldn't beat I couldn't stop time and her time was running out.
No one said having two twin daughters could be that troublesome. They would definitely do their best to try and play with something very precious to Sesshoumaru. Will they be able to convince him?
After returning from a trip to Kaede's, Kagome has something to share with Inuyasha and they couldn't be happier.
Sesshomaru is going back to see Rin after several years have passed. Will someone or something get in the way of their reunion?
Due to an injury, Sesshoumaru loses his voice. Kagome takes it upon herself to teach him and those at the western stronghold sign language in order to help him communicate. Sesskag oneshot.
Kagome sneaks up on an unwitting Sesshoumaru within the chamomile. Sesskag oneshot.

Zhang Xiaoming is a classic otaku who dreams of one day building a harem. But in the harsh reality of 3D life, having a harem of lovely girls is nothing but a dream. Until one day, his whole life changes when he is inserted into the world of InuYasha, with a Galgame system that is supposedly there to help him. OC as Inuyasha. (Translation of a Chinese fanfic). Prologue completed!
Kagome is kidnapped by soldiers. Sesshoumaru takes it as a personal insult. Sesskag oneshot.
Meeting her best friend's family brings a complication Kagome didn't expect; an attraction to his sneering older brother. Sesskag modern AU oneshot.
Sesshoumaru awakes to a typical music-filled morning in the 1980's. Sesskag oneshot.

He can't stand their relationship, but least there was an upside to the bizarreness of seeing his murderous brother with his ex. And that was Sesshoumaru's signals being completely missed or misinterpreted by the ignorant miko. Inuyasha POV. Sesskag oneshot
"If you keep doing that I'm going to scream - stop smiling! I mean it!" Sesskag oneshot.
In a bid to see herself how she imagines, Towa asks her grandmother to cut her hair then seeks out her parents to show the new look.
News of his mother's death reaches Sesshoumaru, who is ill-prepared to understand or tackle grief. Luckily Kagome is there to help him reminisce about bumblebees. Oneshot Sesskag.
Just your average Zoom meet-cute. Pure fluff. Stay safe during this crazy time! One-shot.
Sometimes the well felt like an airport terminal. Sesskag oneshot
On the surface, their marriage had been a means to an end. Sesshoumaru needed a mate and Kagome...well, he never did quite understand why she'd agreed to it. Sesskag oneshot
Unwanting to rise before the morning sun, they talk in hushed voices and between lazy kisses.

AU. Inucest. Yaoi. Sesshomaru is a dance instructor at the local community center. He was once a well-known dancer that won several awards in his youth. But after he retired, he was convinced by one of his friends to teach. Inuyasha is a sensei at the dojo. Ayame is trying to prove to Ginta that women are equal to men.

The brothers are trapped in a testing center and have finally escaped their restraints. They have no recollection as to why or how they got there, but security is hot on their trail. InuYasha's worst for wear and is barely catching up to his brother. Whatever tests were conducted on them have removed their demonic powers. Sesshomaru must slow down...truncated to fit in FF summary
Inuyasha and Kagome celebrate White Day together in this one shot. I don't own the characters!

Sesshomaru was capable of many things: relieving enemies of their lives, silencing an army of humans single-handedly, and instructing those under his command. Though, what most would expect him incapable of is compassion. For her? He could make an exception.
A miko and a daiyoukai were never meant to exist side-by-side, but even nature can be defied...
Rin aches to see dawn's first light and what better way to view it than with someone at her side.
What if the Jewel had its own wish to be granted?
2019 Inukag week I did not do all of the days. But I still realized I should upload them.
With their youngest daughter unable to sleep, Miroku finds the words to reassure her that even in sleep she is loved and protected.

Flower shop AU! Credit for prompt to Inucestlover. Sesshomaru entered a small obscure flower shop at the end of town. He and his daughter Rin were out flower shopping. Prompts for SessKagu Weekend
AU He had a plan to fulfill, and she was a weakness he could not afford. What happens when the temptation is too strong to resist? Small fic in honor of the Sess/Kagu weekend challenge.

Billie, the Wind Priestess of Kizu Mountain, has never met a demon she cannot kill. Then suddenly Naraku comes to visit. Will she be able to kill the unkillable? Or will a strange connection render both of them powerless?

While Inuyasha and Kagome are out on a date, Izayoi and Toga watch their grandchildren, but it's easier said than done when Yamako pines for his mother. Modern AU. Constructive criticism is welcome, but please no hateful comments.

Kagome's two-year-old son is in hysterics after being in a car accident and he won't let the medical professionals get close enough to treat his mother for her injuries. Kagome is at her wit's end trying to console her little boy, but thankfully a handsome silver-haired EMT knows just the trick to calm him down.

Using Slogans I'm challenging myself to write daily. According to Wikipedia Flash Fiction Dribbles are 50 words and Drabbles are exactly 100 words. I'll start with the ten best slogans of all time, again according to plete (for now)

Relationships are just like seasons. At first, the timid blossoming of an emotional connection spurs a hopeful romance. Then there's heat and passion as the love burns anew, the foundation solidified. But what happens when the warmth from said heat begins to die down as the relationship begins to chill? We start to find that love is not just a feeling, but a choice.
A slice of life story of Inuaysha and Kagome's life in the village. They go for a walk and end up in a little cute shenanigans.

Post canon, canon, Episode 26 Final Act. Kagome wishes to go back to the Feudal Era and the well finally grants her wish. Inuyasha is still madly in love with her as he was three years ago. Inukag. Mirsan. M rated tidbit in the middle.
An EPU expanded scene (takes place after chapter 98): Kagome processes the recent changes in her and Sesshoumaru's relationship.

Sesskag oneshot: Kagome is resurrected by a grief-stricken husband- brought back to fill his late wife Kikyo's shoes. While the characteristics unique to Kagome are rejected by Inuyasha, there's a certain Daiyoukai who has a fascination with her blue eyes, sun kissed skin and curling hair.
Touga has an offer for Izayoi. An "Adverse Effects" companion piece.
What do you get when you mix a glass wall with the desire to live?

AU.Winter has come! With Koga struggling with fatal wounds and war with the Northern tribe on the horizon, and Kagome tying to train with guilt and Naraku weighing on her, it will take a miracle for the two to be ready for Spring. However, when things seem bleak, that's when inner strength shows exactly who they really are.(Same as others: No: Inu, Ayame, ect. Yes: Nar, Jewel, ect)
When Inuyasha becomes ill, it's up to Ichiro and his friends to save him! Full summary inside. Read and review. Constructive criticism is welcome, but please do not leave hateful comments.
Rin and Jaken argue the validity of fairytales

In the aftermath of Kikyo's death, Inuyasha and Kagome struggle to resolve their unrequited feelings. While they try to enjoy the little moments with each other where they can, Naraku devises a trap to turn the lovers against each other, removing Kagome as his only obstacle from completely defiling the Shikon Jewel. Is history doomed to repeat itself? One-shot - InuKag.

In a world in which youkai have been forced into hiding after the Great War, Captain Higurashi is known as one of the cruelest youkai-hunting pirates. After Captain Higurashi kidnaps Inuyasha, a prized hanyo, a plan is set in motion. Inuyasha will find out Captain Higurashi is nothing like the stories say, and he will discover that nothing is truly as it seems...Pirate AU, InuKag.
While enjoying a bath together, Kagome teaches Sango about some futuristic hair care. Friend fic. One-shot. Complete!
Sanka grieves the loss of a beloved furry friend. Modern AU. Contains sensitive subjects. Viewer discretion is advised. Read and review, no flames or hate please.
What if after defeating Kaou and the sadness-drenched flowers, Inuyasha had answered? "Did you want to go with her?"... INU/KAG
Starting a new relationship can be hard when you have to host all your dates via webchat because of Covid-19 quarantine regulations.
He chuckled low, the sound a whisper of promises she couldn't wait for him to keep.
Inuyasha and Kagome defeated Naraku and wished the Shikon Jewel out of existence...except this time, the well didn't close. InuKag. One-shot. Complete.
Sesshoumaru wants to protect Kagome

One moonlit night, Kagome encounters a mythical creature swimming in the ocean. Tempted beyond her understanding, she joins him for a swim and finds herself drawn into a world she never even knew existed.

To trust someone, to let them in, what an unsettling ordeal. Kagome is easy and safe, and Inuyasha is difficult and guarded. She can put him at ease with a smile, simultaneously setting him on edge. It was nothing until it was something, creating absolute chaos and uncertainty within the both of them.
Kagome finds herself in the middle of an archery competition with Kikyo and, well, Sesshomaru always did like deadly things.
This takes place after my story Days Have Passed. It is what you think it's about. I'm sorry.

A series of unrelated or quasi-related drabble one-shots written during the Corona outbreak while many of us are quarantined; goal is to write at least one each day my state is under mandated restrictions. Because we all need happiness and fluff right now.

After giving Kagome his word that he would protect her with his life, Inuyasha realizes and reflects on what that could mean for the future. An expansion within episode 18 of Inuyasha: The Final Act. One-shot. Complete.
Kagome is having what she's sure is the worst possible day of her life. Unfortunately, it's about to get much worse.

Kagome loves coffee. Inuyasha is a barista. Sounds like a match made in heaven right? Only she speaks very little Japanese, and he's just beginning to learn English and trying to make a new life for himself without the dangerous complications of his past. It'll take a little work, but love is more than words.
A little fluffy fic about Inuyasha making Kagome some homemade chocolates for White Day and her reaction.
Kagome is lost. Not literally, but lost all the same. Until he becomes involved.
Sesshomaru is overworked. Kaogme just knows he is... and she's determined to make him rest at any cost. It's for his own good.

Kagome and Sesshomaru. Both oblivious, both determined to avoid discussing their true feelings. Well, not if Rin can help it. Rin enlists the help of her husband, Jinenji, and InuYasha in a Very Big Plot to ensure two of the people she loves most finally accept their feelings and Do Something.

When, against all odds, Kagome wins a bowling match while Inuyasha loses it, it means he has to do her dishes four times. He doesn't mind. She doesn't mind. So why is it taking so long for them to get together? College AU, fluff, Inukag.
The hardening of his heart broke the gentle heart of another.

Now he must speak to the smith who created it, and the youkai who weilds it... "T" L, V

While walking back from trick or treating with Souta, Kagome notices they're being followed by a certain demon. Sesskag Halloween Oneshot, modern times.

During one of Sesshomaru's visits to the village, he finds Kagome wearing a crown of daisies—and, well, Sesshomaru was never one to let an opportunity pass him by.

Sesshoumaru has tried and failed to gain Kagome's attention for courting using demon methods. Now he will simply follow her example and replicate what affection she shows. Even the pecks on the cheek. Oneshot for the SessKag Valentine's Big Bang 2020.

Kagome is feeling a bit under the weather but refuses to rest on the eve of their plans so Sesshomaru takes it upon himself to ensure that his mate has all that she requires. A little bit of Valentine's Day fluff for you all to enjoy.

Kagome makes her living reading cards and selling herbal remedies in a tiny shop in Tokyo. On a whim, Kagura drags her boyfriend, Sesshomaru, to the shop, hoping for a romantic and fun reading. Instead, Kagome reads a quick demise of their relationship, noting that Sesshomaru's red string of fate leads elsewhere. To her horror... she realizes it leads straight back to her.
I don't own the characters. The title is based off the song: One Day, One Dream by Tackey & Tsubasa.
It's a boat. No matter how much she looks at it, it's still a boat. For Kagome, it means nothing, but for Sesshomaru, it is everything in that one moment.

After a particularly rough morning, Kagome heads home to make bento boxes for her friends. When she returns, a surprise encounter with Sesshomaru changes everything and suddenly nothing will ever be the same again. Crackfic. Oneshot.

So this is the beginning of a story of how Kagome and Inuyasha met when they were young children in feudal Japan. For now, I am posting all the parts I currently have. I currently do not plan to write more unless people seem to like it then I will continue this story.

One act of kindness turns into disaster when Kagome is betrayed, leaving her to reflect on her fate with little hope of rescue. To her surprise, Sesshomaru shows up and agrees to release her... for a price.

Every ten seconds or so, she'd glance over her shoulder. The sight of him was remarkably exciting. His long, silver hair was held back in a ponytail, flowing beautifully over his shoulder as he picked up solo cups from the floor next to the loveseat. His broad shoulders flexed beneath his button up, and as he stood up straight and turned to her, his lips quirked in a peculiar grin.
Kagome knows that she'll never be the one that Inuyasha loves, but it's hard to always keep her feelings in bay when he's gone away for another. R/R, no hate please, please enjoy!

Kagome Higurashi is having a bad day. She's been kidnapped because of a case of mistaken identity, and her abductors are convinced she knows the location of some "Sacred Jewel." To make matters worse, her fellow captive is kind of a jerk. Unfortunately for her, he may also be her only ticket to freedom. An AU inspired by the Indiana Jones film series. Oneshot, InuKag.
Set after the well closes after the Shikon Jewel is wished out of existence. Let the waiting (and the longing) begin. One-shot. Complete.

Modern AU Oneshot. Sesshomaru reads some goofy texts from his wife, and waits for his young son to get home from daycare. A mediocre spaghetti dinner is the least of his problems, especially compared with the sound of that metallic clink, that cold noise that makes Sesshomaru relive the worst day of his life every time he hears it... SessKagu Weekend 2019 Submission.

The redhead rolled his eyes. "Whatever you want, Romeo. The name is Shippo and I'm a Cupid. No, not human. A Cupid. I poof around and make you all fall in love." He said the last bit with a drawl, fingers fluttering for emphasis. "And apparently you can see me." Inuyasha was desperately in love with Kagome. This was the very least of his problems. InuKag.

The gold Inuyasha and Koga would get for retrieving the legendary Jewel of Four Souls would make them rich beyond measure. But first, they needed a priestess to locate it. Then they found Kagome. Or rather, Kagome found them. InuKag.
Kouga visits the village near the Sacred Tree. On this particular evening, he finds that a certain half-demon is more on edge than usual. Post-series oneshot.

He sees her, chatting happily while she wiped down counters and made faces at her friends. She was beautiful. Exciting. Compelling in a way that made his throat close. And so he looks away, back down at his laptop and the blinking cursor in his document. He writes instead. InuKag.
The time had come to pose the miko the question; to finally make her his. Forever. Christmas Fluff.
Ichiro doesn't seem to be in the Christmas spirit. Maybe his Grandma can help him out? OCxOC and InuKag pairing. Read and review, and no flames or hate, please!

"And if there was one thing a person could ever wish to control, it was that. Screw shutting the world down, and preventing an onslaught of more needless turmoil. What happens after you die? Where do you go, who will you meet? Will you ever be able to meet your friends from the "real world" again? Inuyasha gets to know the answers all by himself after yes, he Dies.

Displays of affection were uncommon among demons, but an innocent kiss on the cheek from Rin was the arrow that pierced the heart of he Demon Lord Sesshomaru. The love of a child changed him, and he came to learn how precious those fleeting moments in life really are. It seemed he'd inherited his father's compassion after all, a compassion that led to his selfless goodbye. 3-shot!

To live with himself, he must find a way of sabotaging Roderich's plans and get away with it.

On the 4th of July, thousands of chickens flood an Austrian Autobahn, closing the road for hours. America makes some new feathered friends. Germany's brain overheats with nonsense. Austria is mocked for looking rather chickenish himself, and Prussia swoops in to save the day! Based on true events.

A sneak peek on how the "small" Nordic nations celebrating the Father's Day with their father figure. Featuring Faroe Islands and Greenland celebrating it with Denmark and Åland Islands, Sealand and Ladonia celebrating it with Sweden and Finland.

It's the 1990's. The wall has fallen, the iron curtain is coming down, and the Ivan is becoming Russia again. He is having some trouble adjusting to all the sudden changes, and America tries to encourage him in moving forward. A songfic parodying "Welcome to the 60's" from Hairspray, interspersed with Russia being awkward and worrying and America being supportive through it.

Russia is at England's country estate for a government mandated diplomatic visit and is chafing under the micromanaging control of his boss. Can England help him feel free, even for a night? Short Drabble for a story prompt: "Thunderstorm"
The Nordic meeting was a failure yet again, but this time they are determined to get at least one thing solved: what on earth are Sweden and Iceland up to?

"Itiss not like I can change 'ow I feel! You are my—what you say—karma; one I've long-accepted." Basch's sister had died recently – yet her presence seemed to fill his house, haunting him, clinging to his skin. He heard her footsteps on the stairs, heard the sound of her laughter ring in his ears. Her absence was deafening, and he had to drown it out. That was why, a few weeks later, he let Gilbert move in.

“when the party's over” by Billie Eilish. Germany X Reader - Angst Fake dating someone can be difficult especially when there's a certain person who's jealous. He only wanted to fake date her to get her off his mind but no matter how hard he tried, she just wouldn't go away but one day, he decided that enough was enough and decided to confess to her but he never did.

Ever since merfolk and humans started co-existing there have been ups and downs. Merfolk are like humans in the way that they can cause just as much mischief with their friends, both human and other merfolk. Here are some short tales about a day in the life of a modern mermaid.
Italy and Germany go to a flower shop to pick out some flowers.
Denmark always thought that his family hates him, though it's never been true. For Denmark's birthday, Happy Birthday!

Growing up, Ludwig's three most important relationships were with Erzsébet, Roderich, and Gilbert. Each provided them with their own lessons and quirks that went on to shape him. This explores their strange family dynamic and what he gained from each.

Alfred owes the scary Russian drug lord some money and has no way of paying it off, but Ivan proposed an outrageous request that the American had no choice but to accept. Disguised as a exciting family road trip to Mexico, Alfred is contrabanding for Ivan while putting his family at risk without them knowing. All sorts of shenanigans awaits them on their fun, unexpected road trip.

America knows Canada can't keep a secret, but America can. America has something he must keep secret from Canada no matter what. Canada knows America can't keeps a secret, but Canada can. Canada knows what America is hiding.

America receives a ransom note for his brother, stating he's been kidnapped, and comes flying in a panic to England for help. England can't help but notice that Australia and Hong-Kong are acting strangely, and don't seem to be concerned at all...

When America has to attend an unexpected conference in London, his two best friends have to find a temporary replacement for their group. They do. Germany has issues with this. Please note, slight Alternate History in which the Nazis never amounted to much.

A year after his brother Matthew heads to the Klondike during the gold rush Alfred sets out, much to his parents misgivings to follow his brother and find out what happened and strike it rich for the family himself. Matthew loved it. Loved watching it all, the kids and their fun, the parents and their coaxing. He love the paper witch they always hung on their door, the smell of the carved jack-o'-lantern beside him, waiting as his first trick-or-treater approached.

A quick little Germany/Canada thing a wrote when i was bored. Can be read as Platonic or Romantic, though I may add more if this is well recieved. Has very Brief Angst, but other then that is Pretty Fluffy. Nothing Tooth-rooting, but still nice I think.

In late 2012, Austria finds the old musical doodles of Croatia, and returns them to their rightful owner. Meanwhile, both Croatia and Serbia deal with the still-fresh memories from lifetimes ago.

For five years now Tino has been hiding from his past in the far North, scraping up a living and keeping himself sane through painting. But his peace and quiet is disturbed, when quiet but menacing Swede Berwald arrives and slowly brings Tino back to life and pulls him out from the night the Finn had cast himself into. But eventually Tino's past catches up with him...
Antonio and Lovino have been a couple for a long time. Maybe it's about time that one of them proposes. Spamano. One-shot. Sequel to "A child's first love" and "A teen's first kiss".

So far, Finland is having a less-than-perfect Christmas. He is tired from delivering presents all night, and above all, he has to attend another tedious World Meeting. Bleh. But when he gets there, he discovers that it isn't a normal meeting... (Oneshot)
Belarus thoughts on Poland and it's deeds in the past.

The Jones-Williams' had one heir to their dynasty. To protect him, they commissioned the creation of a clone. They'll never admit which one of their "sons" is a clone, but everyone thinks they know. What they think about that is their business. What they do about it is Mathew's.
What Yao wanted, he got. Why would the hot Russian be an exception? (Completed!)
Typical ‘America as a colony’, except England is the main character. TW for mentions of past child abuse, child abuse, and just general trauma. Please keep yourself safe.
In a world were the sun is blocked out, Countries and poeple try to survive alone. Canada has to learn how ti take care of his brother amd other broken nation he finds.
It's some more Cardverse B.S.! Queen-to-be Arthur plots to kill his King. You know, casual Queenly stuff, but Alfred has other plans.

When his older brother is diagnosed with a devastating disease, fifteen-year-old Feliciano must come to terms with Lovino's rapid deterioration and the new timescale imposed on their life. With only a few years left together, he soon realises the depth of his love for Lovino, and the strength of a brotherly bond that can never be broken.

Ever since the events of WW2, Ivan Braginski is constantly seeing the images of a certain Prussian in his dreams, his love interest turned enemy, Gilbert Beilschmidt. After the war ended, Ivan goes through a long period of sorrow, but is forced to put it all into hindsight as the head of the Soviet Union. Little did he know he would soon be reunited with his Gilbert...
All that lives must die, but that is not the end. Some live on. A young boy wonders away from the English Colony of Roanoke. Something else returns. -Cover image was painted by me.

Iceland is no stranger to death. Why, then, does it terrify him so? If his family truly loves him, why does he feel like an outcast? Worry plagues his thoughts, keeps him from sleep, a constant presence in his life. It's normal, they say, they've all been there. Why, then, is it so hard for him to open up to them?

Bella is the eldest of the daughters of King Berwald and his queen. But after their death, her uncle raised her and her siblings. Now the girl is 18 and wonders about the surface world. But her uncle forbids her from going up. This causes the girl to strike a deal with a sorcerer to finally see the land above. Somewhat based off The little Mermaid.

Everything that Camille did was for her. Every tight shirt and short skirt she wore was for her— every wink, every flirty smile, it was all to protect her (based on a Harry Potter tumblr post, featuring Monaco in the place of Fleur Delacour and Seychelles as her younger sister Gabrielle).
Prussia learn something new about his old enemy WARNING this is not Historically accurate
Arthur sails across the Atlantic to give a young Alfred a gift. Alfred finds a new fascination, which will bring the whole world to places no one—let alone Arthur Kirkland—ever dreamed possible.
Arthur and Francis are used to little Alfred and Matthew's strange requests. Still, they are caught unprepared when the kids asked for a little sister. Well, they could still adopt another child.

Roderich and Vash are young and spirited and maybe more than a little in love. Neither care about what this truly means for them, but as the days get longer and the wars they fight get tougher both are forced to face their futures in the worst way possible. Apart. A collection of instances where Aus/Swiss still share a bed, and are, indeed, too close for outside comfort.
So, some Vikings walk into a bar. And also Emil is there.

Inspired by aluox on Tumblr. For as long as he could remember, Alfred could see ghosts. It wasn't really a gift - the ghosts looked how they died, gunshot wounds with pouring blood, charred black bodies, every kind of graphic gore imaginable. And he had to go to a haunted school. Yay.
Many strange people come and go through Romano's little dress shop. Some get on his nerves, others he could even tolerate

"Come now, it's only a closet!" France said, putting a hand on the knob, "Besides, mon précieux Canada won't have anything strange-" France opened the closet and screamed. Most nations have figurative skeletons in their closet, really, who doesn't? But apparently, France's 'précieux Canada' had a literal skeleton in his closet.
Hisana meets a little white haired boy while looking for Rukia and takes pity on him.

Gin and Rangiku sure knew what suffering meant, but what they didn't expect was that author forcing them to suffer even more. Yeah, that author is me. With a few AUs and scenarios, like the title says, about GinRan and Shiro-chan being a family... I know this is not a good summary -it's not even a summary-, but somehow I have to catch attention, don't I? Enjoy my madness :)

Months after Aizen's defeat, & the gang is back to resuming their normal lives while also forming a unique friendship with the remaining Espada. As Orihime tries to move on from the ordeal while figuring out her relationship with her previous jailer, a mysterious figure falls from the sky and begins to hunt her down. But why? [UlquiHime] [COMPLETE!]

Ichigo Despite living a normal life can not help feeling that something is happening, for his bad luck doesn't know how right it is. A guy with armor and a bastard sword is the encounter with a new empire. Alternative canon post-Aizen. I hope you enjoy it. (I suck with the summary) Rating T: Blood
After a long and very irritating day, Aizen is just happy to go home. AiGin cuddly fluff. Standalone story. Set after Aizen makes the fake sun in Huecco Mundo.

There's quiet, stillness. Some is her doing - the anchor of her keeping him from drifting - while the other is his - his measured breathes, his thoughts beginning to slow, until his mouth moves, and he wonders aloud, "You've done this before."

It's a realization that comes as he's standing in the grocery store. It doesn't hit him until they get home. Rukia, as usual, doesn't begrudge him his ineptitude.

Things fall into chaos soon enough, suddenly Qunicy aren't as extinct as they've been led to believe, Ichigo learns a startling truth about just who his zanpakutō spirit really is, and Gin is staring at him with newly dull icy blue eyes as the man lays dying once more. for GinIchi Day 2019. Time Travel AU.
When Ichigo's phone buzzes, he assumes it's a reminder to buy milk on the way home, instead the text reads: "I'm pregnant." And Ichigo. Did not see this coming.

The thing about rumors is that there's always some kind of truth to them. It might not be the obvious thing that happens to be true, the thing that has everyone's attention, because that would be too easy. What's true is usually the thing buried beneath it. But sometimes. Sometimes, the whole rumor is true, and sometimes, they're true because the rumor made it that way.
This is a history Ichigo x Soi fon, they are interesting for me. It is my first fic, I hope you enjoy it.
Good memories aren't supposed to haunt you as much as the bad memories do.

He can tell that she's guilt-ridden; the death of Isshin has taken its toll on everyone, and it's been especially harsh on Ichigo and her. But she cannot continue to live like this (or: Rukia comes back to Karakura months after the war). Written for Ichiruki Month 2019. Canon Divergence.

Awaiting judgment on charges of desertion for going to Hueco Mundo, Rukia and Renji have been detailed to the Onmitsukidou for an undercover mission in the World of the Living. Now, they're chasing down incorporeal monsters, pretending to be humans, managing restless zanpakutou spirits, and trying to live together under the same roof. Sequel to "See You on the Other Side"

With Las Noches being rebuilt and the wounds left by the Blood War slowly mending, Grimmjow ventures into the Living World to demand the rematch he had been promised. Upon arriving, he finds that not only is Kurosaki not there, but he has disappeared entirely; an imposter wearing his human skin in his stead. Grimmjow goes to seek answers, but finds more than he'd bargained for...

When Toshiro received a message from one of the twins, he couldn't help but wonder. Why would she confess to someone like him? Even so, he decided to reply back with a question. Asking her if she would like to go on a date with him the day before his birthday. How will this date turn out? Read and find out! Genre: Slice of Life, Romance, ONE-SHOT. Rated T (just in case)
He wills, and she obeys. Aizen/Rukia
Rukia is stuck in a hospital waiting room with her old pal Renji, except that it turns out he's a little tired of waiting.

Gin takes care of a nuisance for Aizen and kills their third seat for asking too many questions in the hopes of impressing him. The murder was planned. His reaction however was not. AiGin. Hurt/comfort with emphasis on the comfort. Mild blood and gore mentions. Heirverse but Can definitely be read as a standalone story. Collab with Timewaster123456789.

HITSUHINA ONESHOT. Toshiro and Momo are engaged! And it won't be long before the bells ring and the wedding march begins! But before that awaited union, let's see how they spend their days together as they anticipate the best of things to come!

'Will you give my love to Spring when you see him' 'What are you talking about, Summer? I wake Winter.' Winter. He had heard that word. Humans uttered it with dread, 'It will be a harsh winter. We'll never make it through.' Humans uttered it with fear, 'Last winter we lost almost the whole herd to starving wolves. They'll come to hunt us this winter, it's the season of death.'

Six years ago, Kisuke was given a choice: sacrifice one boy to a power he didn't fully understand or lose a war and damn the millions of lives that depended on him. So, really, no choice at all. The courts didn't see it the same way.

The version of Aizen Sousuke he once knew decimated, Gin struggles to cope without his other half beside him. Heirverse phase 4. Sequel to my piece 'Decimated' and Catsafari's piece 'Nine Tenths'. Recommend reading those two first for a better understanding of this piece.
