"Actually, I'm meeting someone here." Rukia doesn't know what possesses her to say those words, doesn't even know why she does, but there's no taking it back now. Rukia may be a liar, but she is not a quitter. [complete]

THE Ichihime one-shot. Based on Kubo's side novel (re Rukia's wedding) and the last chapter of Bleach manga. A short transition piece between the two events written with a lot of heart. Warning: We are canon.
Yumichika gets a surprise gift.
Yoruichi and Soi Fon take a moment of each other's time.
Revised for a second time. Expect Hitsukarin development.
The rest of the world really does.

Every year, on the first day of flower viewing season, Byakuya would always find himself seated under his favorite cherry blossom tree. That was, until today. Soifon swayed the foot she dangled off the branch, looking down on the sixth division captain from under her nose. "I'm not leaving this spot Kuchiki." It was the beginning of a rivalry. ByakuyaXSoifon

(Re-uploaded due to some changes) A couple of weeks after Aizen left Soul Society, Rukia notices that her lieutenant seems tired and wonders when he last had a day off. When she finds out, she decides to take him to the world of the living for a day to just relax after all hard work
Hinamori has been coming around the office a few times, giving gifts to Hitsugaya. He wonders, why is she doing that?
Aizen and Gin arrive in Huecco Mundo. And Aizen realises he is afraid. Fluffy-ish Heirverse piece but can be read as a standalone if you prefer.

Ichigo is a protector. When Urahara is helping him reclaim his powers, Ichigo dismisses an illusion and finds his true powers. Then things change. (A brief retelling of Bleach through the end of the Soul Society Arc - massively AU).

This is from the Reset Then Restart AU but it can be read without reading it, this is Shiro's perspective of the events that happened. This one is far less depressing than the one about Byakuya. I am going to tell it in two parts, the first is from cannon events (Up until the fight with Aizen above Karakura town.). The second is the RTR extended winter war.

The war with the Quincies is over but when Ichigo and his friends returns to the Seireitei, they are meet by their Soul Reaper friends mourning the death of the 13th division captain. Wanting to be of help, Orihime offers to try and use her powers to save him. Will it work?

A recollection of all the holidays that were spent between two childhood best friends and their journey to where they are now, as lovers. There was never a time that was better than their holidays. ShiroIchi

Prequel to 'The Heist' - Many hated the cold, but not Toshiro. He never had either, not even before he had learned of his icy Zanpakuto spirit. Rangiku, on the hand, was a spirit of ash and fire and had the personality to match. She was his polar opposite in every way, and she was his everything. Not that she knew that. Bleach Big Bang - Bing 3: Holidays.
A blue-haired Arrancar falls down from the sky and gives Ichigo the chance to get some payback on one of Soul Society's three traitors...that is, if the two can resist beating on each other!

AU. Heiress!verse. In which the gang gathers at the Kuchiki family's mountain cabin for Christmas, and Orihime surprises her husband, as well as everyone else, with a gift money can't buy. Part of the Holiday Crack and Mistletoe 2018 updating event.
That wall was not going to prevent their meeting forever. / ¡TRANSLATION!
One-Shot - She thanked the night, the sky and the moon for carrying her love to him. Please review.

The Kurosaki family has always been a happy one during the holidays, but when the death of Masaki Kurosaki takes their Christmas joy away, it takes the family on the other side - literally, in Soul Society - to bring that Christmas magic back. One-shot. Takes place within the SWA/NSWA universe but reading either is not required.

Aizen plays chess with Urahara, and realises he is bored with his current situation. And his choice of partner. For Salazar Marvolo. Heirverse because the Kraken ate it. Mentioned Aizen/Urahara. Some bad language.
Future fic. "Shall I compare thee to winter's frost? Thou art more lovely and winter-y — what? What is this, Karin?"
Ichigo spends his final mortal moments contemplating perfect snowflakes and imperfect Christmas gifts.
It's time to celebrate Christmas as a year filled with wonderful memories draws to a close. Sequel to A Happy Autumn Day. Gift for Fanofthisfiction.

HITSUHINA ONESHOT. After the war with the Quincy, Momo and Toshiro meet again. With new blossoming feelings, is there a possibility that their friendship will turn into something more? Or will it be too much of a risk to take that leap into the unknown?

Toshiro is at a point in his life after achieving his mature bankai where woman just baffle him. Everything they say or do and for some reason his Lieutenant has been the worst… what's all this nonsense about a Christmas dance and why is she being so hormonal? She's not due her period for at least another week…
Shirosaki decides to stay with Ichigo for the duration of the holiday. Hanahaki AU. ShiroIchi

Ok, I kind of updated a chapter 2 to this One-Shot... - Inspired of Kubo-sensei's Q/A in the last "Jet Artbook" and the final chapter of the Bleach light novel "We do knot always love you"/He stared at the smartphone in his hands, spellbound. Again and again his thumb brushed over the name "Orihime Inoue" as it suddenly tapped on "call".

Renji and Rukia are living happily with their daughter and Byakuya is not against it. What if Ichika is not biologically Rukia's daughter and instead happens to be someone else's child? Implied ByaRen, RenRuki. Implied mpreg
AU. Student!verse. Finding the perfect gift for a woman that literally has everything is never the easiest thing to do. Part of the Holiday Crack and Mistletoe 2018 updating event.
AiGin. Part of the Heirverse series. Late phase 1. Aizen plays Gin a song, while contemplating the impermanence of their relationship.

Orihime shifts next to him, her breath catching in her throat, as Ichigo finally registers the Garganta opening across town. He holds his breath as well, hope surging forward. It could be either of them, was there any reason to hope— [GrimmIchi, UlquiHime, IchiHime Friendhsip] Time Travel Drabble
He loves her in various ways, during different stages of his life. It's after the war when he realizes that he's in the third stage, otherwise known as the beginning. Post-war, Ichihime.

"There was a new student, he had bright orange hair, the kind that looked like captured fire. Ichigo. Who knows, a lot can change in a year." Ichigo's arrival at the academy brings a change to Jushiro's life, his relationship with Shunsui and the world around him. He just doesn't realise it yet.

Sousuke spends eighteen thousand years locked up and it changes his perspective on several things. He's stuck in the lowest level of Muken without any interaction long enough that he's gone past insane. He doesn't talk to himself, doesn't mutter replies to hallucinations, just sits there, his eyes closed. All he does is think. Aizen Sousuke-centric AiIchi Time Travel Two-shot
K. Rukia is Kurosaki Ichigo's secretary.

One year after the defeat of Yhwach, Ichigo is left directionless and discontented, but all that changes when Rukia appears on his doorstep, on leave from the Seireitei. The lines of their friendship begin to blur as their souls are drawn together; setting sinister plots in motion, and tugging at the strings of fate that threaten to tear them away from each other. IchigoxRukia

In which Kisuke meets a humble candy shop owner who helps him at a time of need. At the same time, it seems like Kisuke is who this man needs as well. Set long before Kisuke becomes who he becomes, but after Ichigo becomes who he becomes. Timetravel. Uraichi build up.

With depression gripping Ichigo's soul, life slowly starts to lose meaning as the days go on. Haunted by his past failures, Ichigo will soon learn that all is not what it seems. Especially when he finds out that it is his parent's wedding anniversary. A date just as symbolic as the day his mother was murdered.

Coalescence - 1. to grow together 2. to unite into a whole : fuse 3. to unite for a common end : join forces 4 : to arise from the combination of distinct elements; the process by which two or more droplets, bubbles or particles merge during contact to form a single daughter droplet, bubble or particle. Ulquihime Week Day 2: Role Reversal in which Orihime dies and Ulquiorra lives.
Seven lifetimes, two souls. Drabbles for UlquiHime week 2018 based around seven themes.
Trees, bugs, people. No matter what I slashed, it felt the same. Like swinging my sword in the dark...
With the weather turning even colder, it's time to enjoy autumnal delights. Sequel to A Happy Volunteer Day.

"Seventeen months of pure silence. A total of a year and five months without hearing your voice, Zangetsu. How have you been? Tonight, let's talk and reminisce together. Plenty has happened since with Aizen. Allow me to share my heart with you."
Ichigo and Orihime has been married for about three years and she has something to tell him T just to be safe

ON HIATUS. After a battle with the Espada, Ichigo is captured and dragged in front of Aizen where he is offered the chance to join them. Half dead he turns it down only to find out his agreement isn't necessary as far as Aizen is concerned. Can he be saved?

"Y-you—" Ichigo sputtered, standing up rigidly, pointing at Aizen as he blustered, "You kissed me!" Aizen rolls his eyes and turns, strolling away from the scene like he hadn't just committed some type of crime against humanity. Another Aizen&Ichigo Time Travel one-shot

Ichigo knew he had just begun the most difficult part of his life, even more so with his lover and daughter so utterly out of reach. Between university, work, and some spiritual extracurriculars, he didn't even have time to find some sleep, much less figure out this fatherhood thing. Still, his universe had shifted to revolve around the new star at its center: his son. -Part II- IR

[Kisuke's POV of Meet me on the battlefield] There is a war brewing, and it is all Kisuke's fault. And he regrets it, but it is also his choice, and he's learned to live with it. Unfortunately, he also has to bring some other people into it with him.

Ichigo wanted to feel bad, wanted to feel the need to explain himself, to apologize, but he couldn't quite collect the urgency to do any of that. He'd lived so long, lived so many lives, that he'd long since stopped apologizing for his actions, let alone explaining them to the confused individuals around him. Implied Aizen/Ichigo; Time Loop/Time Travel AU
Shunsui tries to win the bet made between him and Jushiro but things don't work out as he expected it to. Will he be able to impress his lover and win this bet? Read and find out!

Ichigo continued to frown, confusion making the lines cut deeper into his face. "I thought Urahara said we would be returned to our younger bodies?" Sousuke hummed, his stance relaxed as he watched the fight continue in front of them. "To be fair, I didn't have an actual body. I imagine since we went through together, it spit us out at the same place." Sousuke/Ichigo; Time Travel
The Eleventh is rocked by the loss of one of their own and some unlikely friends put their bodies on the line to help.

He would take it. Would take this opportunity to save them from a damaged, crumbling world resting on the shoulders of someone too young – too naïve. Even if in the end all his efforts would be for naught. Even if in the end the world would depend on him again. Godlike! Ichigo; Time travel

The shinigami women's association finds out that SoiFon has never been kissed before. So once they ask SoiFon to describe the type of men that she likes, They are surprised to find out that her type sounds a lot like captain Hitsugaya. Now with that in mind they are planning to make him Soifon her first kiss...
"Let's play a game," Unohana said... "It'll be fun," Unohana said…
It's Halloween. And Toshiro is on vacation. Not of his own will of course. But he meets a young girl and helps her win a costume contest and protect her from...monsters?

What if Hiyori never woke up after being cut into two by Gin? Follows along flashbacks of Hiyori and the Vizards, her time in the Academy and the aftermath of her death. Takes place after the War and during the reinstatement of the Vizards as captains. Very slight ShiYori fluff, and friendships/flashbacks with the Vizards and other characters.
Bedtime story time.
The weather is turning cold so it's time to spread some warmth and cheer. Sequel to A Happy Birthday Again.
"Renji meet Ichigo Kurosaki,the man who is going to marry me", ichiruki

Kisuke is an idiot and really should just listen to Zangetsu. T for swearing. If I have rated this wrong please tell me and I will correct it as I am not entirely sure how I am meant to rate things on here.

The title pretty much says it all, except... once Ichigo Kurosaki sees Toshiro Hitsugaya wearing the costume, maybe Toshiro decides that letting Rangiku pick his costume wasn't the worst decision he'd ever made. / soft IchiHitsu, first time I've ever written something with this pairing, Happy Halloween!
After so many centuries of being best friends, what others might think was definitely something to look forward to.

After the events of Hueco Mundo, Orihime attempted to go back to a normal life. Just as she begins to feel normal once more, a new student throws her for a loop, bringing back all of the memories of her captivity. With one assignment, Orihime's carefully constructed outer shell is shattered.
Grimmjow and Neliel visit the human world again - and this time, they have a surprise for Ichigo! Sequel to A Love Story in Three Acts.

One is a hero that everyone sees and everyone knows his name, but his counterpart is the reason that hero wins…a banished genius whose quiet mind has outthought every wicked enemy, yet he remains shadowy, while the other basks in the sunlight. What happens when one reaches across the distance?...Urahara/Ichigo
One shot of IchiUra.
Having defeated Aizen, Ichigo finds himself confronting a far more insidious opponent - a philosophical dilemma.

Rukia needs to write a romance story for the literature class that she's taking with Ichigo, but she's got a serious case of author's block and can't finish it. Since she has to handle it the day after, she asks Ichigo to help her figure out the ending of her story.
Ichigo has never had the most normal life, and this latest chapter of it is no different. "I'm not a god!" Hints of uraichi, mostly gen, mostly crack.
After the Thousand Year Blood War, Ichigo faces two spirits who are entirely displeased with his choices. He resolves to get on their good side once and for all.

COMPLETE Tina and her two friends are normal young women shinigami, who happen to have crushes on their captains. Their experience would be typical if not for the unexpected horrors an unhealthy obsession leads to... Please R&R.

'There had always been coldness in your midnight eyes when I dared to let my gaze stray from the ground at your feet. It had terrified me. The distance between us, not just palpable through status alone, but the rift between our hearts - our minds - had been too great for me to even grasp.' RenBya.

Heirverse. RenBya with a small side of AiGin. A Sun&Monkey prequel. After hiding their relationship for so long, Renji finally asks Byakuya to kiss him in public. Oneshot but possibility of continuation.

From Orihime Inoue's point of view she should be the happiest girl in Karakura: Ichigo Kurosaki is her boyfriend, who is no longer a shinigami and Rukia Kuchiki has never seen them again. The sun should shine on them, in their golden days, but it's not like that ... it's still raining incessantly on Ichigo, and there's only one shinigami that can stop it. IchiRuki with a lot ANGST
Her smile subdued when she noticed something was wrong. It was time for Ulquiorra to make an important decision.
A different spin on what could have happened if Gin and Rangiku were Hitsugaya Toshiro's parents. Having a baby really does change everything.
Running. She was always running. —Rukia/Hitsugaya
Toshiro and Momo are making snow angels together.
Rukia's never seen lightning bugs before so Ichigo decides to take matters into his own hands.
The darkness of Muken is said to eat you alive, a darkness so black it can blind your eyes. Brown eyes that held: No regret, no remorse, no guilt. Shinji hadn't expected differently. Aizen x Shinji.
What everyone really thinks about Ichigo's supposedly schoolboy infatuation towards Rukia. Written for the week's @deathberryprompts - Infatuation. Rated T for language. Post FB arc.
How terrible it is to be nostalgic. (V: And the Burning Sun Fell to the Frigid Blade)

Jyuushiro wasn't certain what he expected when he pushed his way through the crowd and into the 5th Division's courtyard, but seeing three strangers wearing a Captain's haori for the 5th and Aizen being pinned to the ground was certainly not it.
Rukia may be the dead one but Orihime feels like the ghost.
So her husband never knows about the tiny notebook where Orihime writes things that remind her of heartbreak and regret. [Orihime/Ishida]
Sometimes it was the tiniest grain of sand that made all the difference. AU —Hitsugaya/Rukia
Senna wakes up in the middle of the night.
Friends and family are gained in the soul society. Will Toshiro and Renka find where they belong?

Once upon a time, a young man must leave his love to seek his fortune on the high seas while the lover becomes embroiled in kingdom politics. It's going to take some adventures to see if they can reunite. Or, The Princess Bride AU.
Bar AU: Ichigo attends the bachelor party only out of obligation, but meeting the bartender makes the night a little better.
Reincarnation AU: When two lovers are involved in a fatal accident, their fates take opposite and unexpected turns. But they are always meant to be together in the end, somehow.
A simple and random idea I decided to write in my free time. Hope you like it!
Something stirred between them as soon as he entered the meeting room... Two-shot. Based five years after the Quincy Blood War.
What does Ichigo want on the rooftop of Karakura High, Rukia wonders. - Ichiruki proposal.

There's nothing like having a big picnic with friends and family to celebrate perfect weather. But in the end, we learn that nothing is ever as perfect as it seems. Warning: Onesided IchiHime and RenRuki.
"We're not in love, but I can make love to you." —Hitsugaya/Rukia

"Ichigo you said his name was?" Kisuke asked turning from where his eyes had been glued to the baby to glance at Masaki. She nodded with a half smile, her eyes falling to the crib and the small lifeform tucked inside. One that had the potential to defeat Aizen. The Queen of the philosophical chess board. Instinctively Kisuke knew that his plans wouldn't survive this child.
Summary: My take on the meme started by Prettysketch, Dance With Snow White.
Your not so ordinary coffee shop AU, written for ichirukimonth '18.
Someone's birthday is coming up and plans are underway to make it a memorable one. Sequel to A Happy Awa Odori Day.
It was always odd seeing the world through her eyes, and yet Tōshirō still found himself looking forward to falling asleep every night. (Soulmate AU)
Shunsui knew better than to follow Mayuri to his lab but this time, following the scientist to his lab led to a discovery he didn't expect.
AiGin. Heirverse. Aizen and Gin realise that home is truly where the heart is. A slightly fluffier story. Follows directly on from Cold Feet and Sanctuary so recommend you read those two first.
After her recent discoveries regarding the relationship between Rukia and her older brother, Yuzu finally decides to ask the black haired girl about something that has been bothering her.
Juushiro and Shunsui had always been each others Home. After all they had been always together, never to be parted. Mpreg. JuushiroxShunsui
Shinji confesses his feelings for Ichigo after his training with Hiyori. Takes place during the Hueco Mundo arc after Ichigo finds out a way to stabilize his hollow.

[IchiRuki Month! Day 20: Eye contact] He looked up, and their eyes finally met, after so much time, but Rukia noticed that something was missing. His amber eyes didn't shine when he saw her, they didn't open as wide as usual, his pupil didn't expand, nor did his breathing fail him for an instant. He looked at her as if she was a stranger as if he had never seen her in his life.

While out on a mission with the other lieutenants, Katsurou is informed that his father has gotten very sick. Worried by the news, he hurries back to the Soul Society to see his father. But what awaits him back home is something he didn't expect.
Rukia arrives at Ichigo's house for the night. Is she making a Mistake?
Kyouraku travels to Mimihagi's realm to reclaim Ukitake.

DISCONTINUED! A year after his mother's death, Ichigo finds himself in a world that he knows doesn't exist and met four spirits. Deciding to know what they truly are, he goes to his father who takes him to a shop. Take a different road IchiHime fans. Dual Wield Zanpakuto! Resurreccion! Quincy powers! OOC. New chapters every week or two. ADOPTED BY SOUNGA12!
An accident leads to the teens being transformed into kittens, and now Kisuke needs to figure out how to undo whatever it is that's been done to them.
A different outcome on Soukyoku Hill. COMPLETE
"there's no happy endings, not here and not now; this tale is all sorrows and woes." then why don't we change it?

Post- Diamond Dust Rebellion. The ex-taicho of the 10th division never expected comfort to come from such an unlikely source, though nor did he expect the harm to be inflicted by those whom he trusted with his everything. Guess after life is as much as a sneaky snake as 'life'. Betrayal Angst and Comfort

"I like you Rukia. I mean it." "No you don't. You only think that you like me. You're young. It's all just teenage hormones—you'll get over it soon." — In which Rukia dodges Ichigo's feelings (as well as her own).

20 years goes by way too quickly. Yhwach's threats for the future have left Ichigo and Rukia's Fate shattered. Is there any way to repair their bond or will it fade away in the fear of Yhwach's futures?

All her life, the zanpakuto spirit was lonely, never called upon by her master. For over 150 years, she remained in the inner world of her master, abandoned and forgotten. During the zanpakuto rebellion, the lonely spirit is manifested. With no memory of her master or name, she wanders around searching for a purpose.
August brings the famous Awa Odori, dance festival supreme! Sequel to A Happy Birthday.
Starrk, a local florist, receives a client that wants to anonymously send flowers to a woman to express his feelings. Naturally, he unwittingly gets caught in the middle.
Starrk gets mugged. What follows is the conversation with his savior. A tad bit OoC. Enjoy!

Kuchiki, Rukia has just started Business at Seireitei University. She had her whole life planned out until the day she meets Kurosaki, Ichigo. She had asked a single room...So why was she rooming with a spiky, orange haired giant? Can one fated meeting change the path laid out for her or will the Kuchiki name be too much to bear?
HITSUHINA ONESHOT. What will you do if you cannot sleep? Read a book? Get some fresh air? Or go stargazing with a friend? Hmm, maybe all of it?

Yhwach had seen every future, every path, and every moment they could take and he vowed to slaughter them in every single one when they were at their happiest. Rukia fights back and realizes: the future is never set in stone and even Yhwach cannot see everything. She will fight and she will win. Even if it kills her.

Yasutora's never been afraid of the dark or the things that might lurk therein, even as a child. In his experience, those are the kindest of things, honest in their intentions and willing to give way before his bared teeth and clenched fists.

Ichigo's powers never returned after using the Final Getsuga Tenshō. Everyone has left Soul Society, ether willing or forced. Ichigo, now 81, had died. What happened when he arrives at Soul Society? Will he be able to tear the heavens asunder or will heaven tear Ichigo apart? "Death is never an end, but always a beginning."-Neale Donald Walsch Abandoned and up for adoption.

A retelling of the end of the Winter War arc. What would happen if our favourite shinigami was just a bit more straightforward with his feelings? Would things have been better? What would happen? Maybe not what you think, or maybe exactly what you think. Read to find out. One sided IchiHime and fullblown IchiRuki. Rated T to be safe.
Ichigo and Toshiro are dating in secret. Well. all until Ichigo gets pregnant.

Before the first Shinigami created the Soul King, there was only one world; a paradise with no death or suffering. But what exactly is the Soul King? The perfect world that Yhwach wanted to bring back, what was it like? Who were the first Shinigami, and why did they destroy Paradise? Nobody knows for sure; many legends tell the story in just as many ways. This story is one of them.

Book 1 of the Revisited Series. [OCs included] From the Arrancar Arc forward, this is a rewrite of the second half of the Bleach storyline. Ichigo finds himself unprepared for the oncoming Winter War, feeling the weight of responsibility on his shoulders. But he's not the only one this time. Obvious Disclaimer: All rights to Bleach and any canon characters belongs to Tite Kubo.
if he closes his eyes and tunes out everything but her steady voice, he can pretend everything is ok.
there's a fire in his eyes that burns the iron core left in hers (she thinks she might love him).
he winces when she gets him coffee with sugar; she gags a little when he forgets the honey.
:Grimmjow was Numero 12. He was the twelfth arrancar created by the Hogyaku and so has been in Las Noches long before others
Hisagi thinks he began seeing a certain 5th Seat often since the aftermath of the Ryoka Invasion. ShuuYumi pre-slash.

Yachiru Kusajishi is all grown up, and ready for love! Of course, there's one problem. To win the right to date the super cute Yachiru, all potential suitors must first attempt to defeat the Captain of Squad Eleven, Kenpachi Zaraki! Will Yachiru find a date to the Millennium Ball? And are there any men capable of facing Kenpachi without breaking into tears? *Everyone lives AU!*

AU: Ichigo and Rukia are just bros working in a coffee shop who enjoy a good lazy gossip about their regular clientele. The caffeine addict who plays the guitar sometimes is kinda cute but regularly leers at Ichigo. Will he ever have the nerve to ask Ichigo out? Or will Ichigo finally kick him out for being a creep?
Sometimes—only sometimes—Ichigo missed Rukia, but he wouldn't admit to something so lame out loud.
One-shot example of Ichigo in the Wandenreich. Please take what I'm depicting to heart.
One-shot example of Ichigo in Xcution. Please take what I'm depicting to heart.
It's July 15 and a certain Shinigami Substitute's birthday. Sequel to A Happy Father's Day
Every year, Ichigo skips school the same day; and every year his friends pretend that this is normal.

If you read this, it means that you made it through that long 6 years in the academy and you are now officially a Shinigami. It also means that you joined squad 4, the medical squad. Here is a helpful guide to give you a head start!

"Are you here to kill me, Shinigami-san?" Kisuke hadn't paid much attention to Ryuuken's son. He had mostly focused his attention on the Kurosaki family, trying to piece together Aizen's connection and possible plans. A stray Quincy child was minuscule in the wake of that man's schemes. And yet...
A dragon falls in love. Fairytale AU. One-shot. R&R!

Ichigo stepped into the shower, behind her petite figure, thinking to himself; he'd never hurt her, like the actual rays of the sun did, onto her pale moonlight skin. Instead, he'd add a little bit of color with his gentle kisses against her back. / Bleach belongs to T.K. troll ass. This FF plot is mine. Warning, some slight Renji bashing...
Ichigo longs for a new faithful wife. Rukia longs to escape. Neither are what the other excepted once their true colors are revealed. One shot based in Robert Browning's My Last Duchess.

Heirverse. Aizen reflects on the ways he loves Gin, in the form of all the little things Gin doesn't see. Later Game era. Related to a scene located in Love, War and Tea ch6. Story crossreferences everywhere.

Half a year has passed since the war with the Quincies and the lives of the Soul Reapers has started to return to normal. Shunsui still grieves the death of his best friend but certain news soon reaches him. What is it about?
Rukia feels betrayed that Renji has kept something so important from her for so long. Ichigo just wants her to let go of his shirt. Pineapples.
Orihime hoped for a peaceful school break, but someone else has plans for her. demons from hell attack the world of living looking for Orihime.
Captain Commander Kyoraku and Captain Ukitake are an old married couple. Or so most of Seireitei speculated. ShunUki

Just a one shot going over Kensei's feelings about Shuhei and his reinstatement into the Ninth division. Touches on Rose and Izuru as well as Shinji and Momo, but focuses on Kensei and Shuhei (Mashiro too)
Ichigo and Rukia are suddenly trapped inside Aizen's prison. Talking about the 'good old times' some remaining personl secrets are revealed. Time can be tough if you stopped fighting back.

When Ichigo learns one of his closest friends is dying, it hits him harder than he ever imagined it could. Then he realizes that it's his fault and there is absolutely nothing he can do to save him. IchiIshi

Hitsugaya Ren and Hitsugaya Ai, children of Hitsugaya Toshiro and Kurosaki Karin grew up without Toshiro by their side but they didn't mind but instead they admire him especially Ren, however, everything changed when an incident took place. 5 years after the incident, the twins finally got the chance to meet their father but during the time they spend with him, disaster took place.

So, Tōshirō knows, as she watches one of the boys push a girl with brilliant gold hair into the carmine dust with a jeering expression, she won't be a she, Tōshirō is a boy because he wants to be. The cool presence that seems to hum behind his heart seems to roar in agreement.

He was the hollow, she was his victim and then Shiba Isshin and Urahara changed everything. Five years passed with him imprisoned when a light shone brightly; but in touching that bright soul that was about to be born, the hollow was changed. Now born human, can Shiro keep his identity or will he lose it as time passes by?
It's time to celebrate Father's Day and a dinner with the Kurosakis. Sequel to A Happy Children's Day.
Uryu and Katagiri gives Ryuken a present for father's day and Ryuken thinks about both his relationship with Soken and Uryu.

She had healed him all those years ago after a hollow attacked him in his 6th year. Shuuhei has found her again. His only problem is that she's human and she can't see him. How will he reconnect with her? Will she remember him? What happens when he falls in love with her? ShuuheiXOC. Please read and review.

High school AU, modern technology, multiple pairings. Natsu thought he had his high school life totally figured out, but then the Heartfilia family moved in, and his love life just took off like a rocket! And his classmates are starting to get serious about matters of the heart, too. There's no going back now.

Will two dense people finally realize the feelings the other has for them?

Oh, the pains of growing up. What would you do if you started realizing just how much you absolutely hated it? Would you blame someone? Or deal with it like an adult? Everyone has their issues. And she wasn't facing him. Not properly, at least...

Modern GaLe Renassaince Faire AU. Levy is out taking her daughter to her very first Ren Faire. Things are going great, even with the toddler being weirdly fascinated with fire. That is until some creepy pirate decides to hit on Levy. What's a fair maid to do?
just something fun I put together. Lucy get's asked to take a job while Natsu and Gray go with her to make sure nothing happens. let me know how you all like it.
After getting kicked out of town, Natsu and Lucy have to sleep in the woods. Lucy was not prepared for this and didn't bring a sleeping bag. Luckily for her, Natsu is willing to share.
The first time she heard it, she believed it to be just some weird fluke. But after hearing it again, she knew there was something going on. Too bad Natsu was playing dumb with her. NaLu

Summary: Lucy has been forgotten. Will Fairy Tail remember before it's too late? Or will their beloved Celestial Mage disappear forever?

Blue Pegasus' youngest playboy and Raven Tail's resident wack-job. Thrown together by a chance encounter, is this the beginning of a star-crossed love story? Or is the attraction all in Eve's head, waiting to go up in smoke? [Mazeverse] Fleve (Eve x Flare)
Juvia is badly injured, and Gray suddenly has a lot of time to think about some hard subjects.

Zeref was trying to get just one night to relax, but when his adorable wife has a question for him, he knows that he won't be getting any sleep that night. Read more to find out. Too sweet. It was too sweet. All of it. From the pizza, to her smile, to...well. The cockroaches certainly weren't. Neither were half his memories. But it was a summer romance and - in fact, not even that because nothing happened that summer. Nothing at all. But that was a lie, wasn't it? Because it ended with one.
Summary: Loke and Lucy have been dancing around each other's feelings. Will the solo mission Lucy took bring them together?

After defeating Aldoron, Natsu notices Gray confess his love for Juvia in private, and it makes him think about where his own relationship with Lucy stands. So they have a little chat while she's healing his wounds.

Laxus and Hisui always knew there was more than just a spark, and, for that, they would remain by each other's side no matter the cost. Series of Laxui one-shots for Laxui week 2020. Fluff, fluff, and more fluff; all of the FLUFF.

Everyone's favorite poison dragonslayer and celestial wizard duo for CoLu Week 2020! A series of 500-1000ish word drabbles based off the prompts for this year. Mostly revolving around different AU scenarios.
Lucy finds a use for her invisibility after being trapped that way for weeks and Cobra is frustrated beyond belief. Full summary inside.
Summary: Natsu sneaks into her room. Natsu eats her food. Natsu has touched her inappropriately. But even though she has almost killed anyone who has done that, why is he an exception?

A one-shot in which Laxus and Freed have been secretly in love with each other for three years now. But then a certain fire dragon slayer notices the fact Freed has Laxus's scent all over him. PAIRINGS: Fraxus with just a touch of Gratsu. HAPPY PRIDE MONTH!

Left blind and mute from his harrowing ordeal, Gray must adapt to his new way of life as he tries to heal from the traumas, while the rest of the team is tested through the many trials that follow. Meanwhile, Gajeel's team is investigating an alledged serial killer. Part Two of the series.
Summary:Lucy is TERRIFIED of spiders. What will happen if one gets in her tub while she is in the bath?
Summary: Hibiki left Blue Pegasus and joined Fairy Tail after he met Lucy. Will a connection form, or will Lucy always believe he is a perv?

While Gray is on a special assignment for Lamia Scale, Lyon leads the rest of his team to an interesting discovery. Could there really be more to Gray’s weird habit than absentminededness? Could it be fear-based? Stress-induced? A look into the psyche of one Ice Mage.
Summary: Lucy gets badly hurt on a S-class mission with team Natsu. Natsu sees her hurt bad, what will he do?
When the weather has the group stuck indoors bored, what else are they going to do but play a drinking game. But not all games go so smoothly. Truths and dirty little secrets are to be spilled.

The empty feeling of losing her mother figure still haunts Lucy. Her efforts of finding Aquarius always turned out to be a dead end. She was desperate and opted to drink her sadness away. One night, after her usual shots of alcohol, she found herself escorted home by none other than the other blonde mage in the guild, Laxus Dreyar. (Laxus x Lucy/LaLu) I DO NOT OWN FAIRY TAIL.
Bixslow gets called over by Natsu, and a question everyone and no one wanted to know gets revealed.
Summary: Natsu, Lucy, & Happy are taking a vacation, they chose camping at a mountain sight. Lucy has told some people at the guild of her feelings for Natsu, somehow Happy hears

Not many people knew this, but hearing Lucy Heartfilia moan is like hearing an angel sing. Like hearing Apollo strum his lyre. Like the most beautiful song in the entire world. Of course, nobody had told Fairy Tail this – probably because they never asked.
All Gray wanted was a fight. How was he to challenge her though if he didn't even know her name?

As the demonic power compels over Lucy when she dares to rewrite the book of E.N.D., she refuses to succumb. Gray watches over her, transfixed; because in this moment, she is no longer the dainty princess she was when she first joined the guild. GrayLu, One-shot.
Anxiety and a challenging evening leaves Rogue at a loss with themself, unsure whether the hassle of pronouns is really worth all the stares and judgement. / TW: Misgendering, Anxiety Attacks.
Based on a Tumblr post by panravenc about how nobody would notice that Natsu and Lucy are dating because let's be real, they are already acting as couple. Now, Lucy finally realized this, too.
All Lucy wanted was an interview. What she didn't want was a guild-wide debate on whether or not she and Natsu were dating...

This is just a short happy oneshot about what happens on Lucy's birthday. Lucy feels like everyone has forgotten about her birthday or have they? Please read more inside and enjoy. Rated T for certain implications. I do not own the cover image; it's just a wallpaper I downloaded from the internet.

Natsu, the ever-energetic dragon slayer, is getting tired. Jumping from mission to mission without any rest is really starting to get to him. Thus, he gives himself what he has been yearning for the entirety of his life as a Fairy Tail mage: a break. Slight OOC. One-Shot.
If some place could be described as hell, it was definitely the shopping mall on Christmas Eve.

The dragon slayers were staying in Fiore for a mission. It was supposed to be just a night of celebrations but falling for a mysterious golden hair girl was never mentioned in his plan. (Lucy isn't mage just a normal human) Enjoy.

As she keeps thinking about her loss to Flare Corona from Raven Tail on the first day of the Grand Magic Games, Lucy gets some nice advice from a certain ice-creating teammate who hasn't been as close to her as Natsu. Will their meeting on the bridge be bridging the gap in their friendship? Emphasis on friendly & hurting / comforting GraLu. One-shot. Read & Review. :)

After their recent adventures on Edolas, Team Natsu is once again looking for new challenges. When Lucy picks up a request for protection against a guild of assassins, she doesn't know it yet but she is about to free a robin from its cage, and change its fate forever. (I definitely suck a summary...) Part 1 of my 'Tribulations of a lost robin' series

It was the biggest party of the year so she had to be there! And the only one she saw fit for accompanying her, was none other than Natsu Dragneel. Now all she had to do was convince him to go. Canon Universe. Nalu.

For years Gajeel had been abused. Beaten. Chained into submission and serving a ruthless master who one day hoped to unleash the power of the dragons. Darkness was his only companion until one day a Fairy broke through the despair threatening to overwhelm him. Levy was determined to save Gajeel from his prison, but how would she be able to teach him the true meaning of family?

He meets her in World War III where she blows him up just for fun. In 1968 she whips out her tits for equality. In 2006 she does the same thing, but this time in private and lets him squeeze. In the true time of the Galactic Cosmos, they have never met. San Junipero-inspired. Futuristic AU. Oneshot. StingxLucy (Sticy). Rated T for language.

Juvia's latest scheme to get Gray's attention results in the whole guild getting to see somethings Freed had hoped to keep to himself. But that being the case it's about time he talked to his team about it.
Happy overcomes one of his shortcomings while Carla finds out who she truly needs. (one shot)

So, the new picture Hiro Mashima drew of Natsu and Lucy was driving me crazy, like, my heart went from normal beating, to doki doki crazy beating! I was squealing so much, my fam looked like me like I was a maniac, and my uncle asked me if I needed to go to the hospital... :P But anyway, I hope you enjoy this small fic, don't forgot to leave a kudos and comment! See you all soon!
Based on Mashima's most recent NaLu twitter art. Kiss fluff! I don't own the cover art, Hiro Mashima drew it and posted it on his twitter!

At the annual flower viewing party, Natsu overhears the girls teasing Lucy about never having kissed a boy and never having a boyfriend, and since Natsu's never kissed a girl or had a girlfriend, he decides to fix that problem for both of them. (Inspired by Hiro Mashima's new art!)

Millianna is still angry about Jellal being out and about, and finally vents her frustrations and anger out to Erza when she tries to calm her down. Based on a conversation I had with a friend about how Erza can be too forgiving and Millianna has every right to be mad at Jellal and not forgive him. Hope you enjoy!
Bickslow and Lisanna have an announcement. Mirajane has an aneurysm. Laxus just has regret. - One-shot.
Maybe giving him so much to drink wasn't that great of an idea. Was it ?
Gray gets dragged into some not-official date with Juvia but he's only got one question in mind. What the hell is Laxus doing here ?

Sometimes, reaching out and taking someone's hand is the beginning of a journey. At other times, it is allowing another to take yours. Because when you promise to love, respect and support someone, you stand by them no matter what. When Lucy loses herself in a world of despair, Loke swears bring her back, no matter how many times it takes. LoLu, one-shot. Post Tartarus.
For the first time since he and Lahar saved her months ago, Mest checks in on Katja. Armada project: 56/365

Gajeel challenges Natsu to find a date. Thinking that a date is just spending time with someone Natsu asks Lucy. With misunderstandings and feelings in the mix, will Lucy and Natsu realize their love for each other? Lucy/Natsu with hints of Levy/Gajeel
Erza, Gray, and a non-conversation on love, on life and on letting go.
Laxus would never thought his life would take such a turning point. He would never thought he would become the master of the Fairy Tail guild, or fall in love with Juvia and have a child with her.
Natsu wakes up in a weird place. Natsu/Gray

Lisanna works at the guid's bar, but her two girlfriends work different missions for different teams. It leaves their schedules with very few common openings, and sometimes it weighs on Lisanna. In the end though, it's always worth it. Drabble

Lucy comforts Natsu when he has a particularly rough bout of motion sickness. Afterwords, Natsu briefly ponders the odd feelings making his heart flutter. Happy thinks the whole situation is hilarious.
You make an ass of you and me. When Cana refuses alcohol, everyone starts getting suspicious, especially with the 'stomach bug' she's had the last few weeks.
She had always been so careful. But now it was all over. He knew.

They knew each other from a young age. He had loved her and she had loved him. However, their memories had gotten lost in the clutches of time. But then...the two are reunited and irresistible feelings began to surge up inside them both. (NaWen) (One-shot)

When Jellal leaves, she suddenly feels like they'll never have a home, or the future they so wrongly dreamed together. Because in the end, the world will never recognize him for the person he is. They'll condemn him, but he'll save them. And Erza wonders why he bothered protecting them. COMPLETE.
Zeref's neo eclipse plan worked and he got his family back. One-shot.
When Lucy Heartfilia was born, the name Erza Belserion was written prettily on her skin. - (oneshot)
Even after 7 years, a father believes that his daughter is alive. Jude Heartfilia-centric. One-shot.

The third unit of E.R. has arrived. They have decided to attack Fairy Tail, but this time, Natsu and some of Fairy Tail's strongest is gone. All of them disappeared from one enemy. With them gone, is Fairy Tail done for? AN: The first book took place before the first chapter of 100YQ came out. This is all non-canon to that.
Lucy is worried about the fact that Natsu hasn't asked her to prom yet. All that changes when she gets a phone call from him.
Natsu looked at Juvia and smiled. She was sleeping peacefully in his arms. Juvia had just moved in, it was a new step for them. He gently stroked her arm and thought about their relationship.
Gray and Natsu meet as kids on a sunny August afternoon, and their lives quickly entwine in the branches of the willow tree they climb together.

And they say crime doesn't pay. Word of Gray's drunken escapade at the bar has gotten out. It's not helping that he's partnered up with Laki Olietta, who is now suspicious of his every action. Gray and Natsu's rivalry flares up again when Bora comes to Magnolia, and since he's both Juvia's ex and kidnapped Lucy to try to sell her into slavery with a bunch of other girls in the past, the two mages fight over who gets to be the one to fight him on behalf of the girls they secretly love.
All of a sudden Natsu's fire seems to have a will of its own. Why is it only happening around Lucy and what might his inner fire try to tell him about his feelings for her? Natsu/Lucy

ONE SHOT- It had all happened too fast for my eyes to keep up. The entire incident processed slowly in my head as I watched the sight play in front of me. I watched my best friend in their most distraught state and it was all my fault. My magic that I strongly believed would help me protect my friends, was the reason one was going to die.

After a mission goes horribly wrong Lucy has locked herself away to suffer in solitude. When all hope feels lost and she feels more alone than ever she is reminded that she's never really alone. NatsuXLucy (This is my first FanFiction so any feedback or thoughts help! :) Thanks!)
"I've known you for how many years now? How come you never told me that your name wasn't Cana?"

AU. She just wanted popsicles, but that part-timer gave her so much more.

For Lucy a 'normal' day just might include being kidnapped and she's fine with that, but this time her 'normal' day turns extraordinary by finding a new family and future for herself. Featuring the lovely Desna's Pradesh family.

Natsu saw Lucy naked again today. While he's cooling her off from her hot water she takes off her towel to help herself cool down and the two of them joke about the implications of seeing each other naked so often despite being "just friends". And Natsu discovers something about his feelings while worrying for his girl.

Quarantine shenanigans part two (fairy tail edition). Natsu is getting extremely bored and lonely because of the ongoing coronavirus quarantine, so he somehow manages to convince the other six slayers to join a zoom call. Chaos ensues. "A love built on commitment, understanding and long-term best interests" Based on the NaLu moment in the HERO'S omake.
Lyon loses a bet to Gray, and now has to face his punishment. Luckily for him, Juvia is there to lend a helping hand.

While returning from a mission, Gray buys Juvia a souvenir on a whim. But once its the moment to hand it over, seeing as Juvia tends to overreact, Gray reconsiders. Can he push himself out of his comfort zone and give her the present? In the process, he realizes a lot about the girl, who always greeted him with a smile. Gruvia, One-shot, Fluff.
Sometimes Laxus has to leave. But it's okay. He'll always come back. - One-shot.

Natsu disappeared to look for his dad almost a year ago, and Gray's been through hell without his best friend. Now Natsu's back and wants to make things right, but Gray's not the same, and he doesn't know if he can let Natsu back in.
This talk was so long overdue. Gray and Juvia finally air some of it.

AU. They needed a girl that was pretty enough, smart enough, and immune enough to the 23-year-old hockey superstar's charms. Juvia was anything but the latter; the benefits alongside the offer, though, were too good to pass up, especially at her current predicament. So…pretending to be Gray Fullbuster's girlfriend wasn't that hard, right? [Gruvia-centric, other pairings cited]
Goodbyes are hard. But should they be? When you've gone through them so many times before? - One-shot, set in the Remember Me series.
A prompt requested fic: "I should be happy they're gone but I'm not, they're gone and I miss them so much." Gray finally gives Juvia an answer.
What happens when Team Natsu finds out Aquarius' key is broken and how it came about. Does Lucy rage? Or does she calmly state her love for her team.
When life is not heading the way you want her to, you only need a small reminder that you must follow your heart. It will lead you to unimaginable adventures and joyful memories. AU 1930s

Lucy's bedroom door opened. She knew it was Natsu. She heard him walking towards her bed and he lay down next to her. He put his arm around her waist and hugged her tight. She felt Natsu's breath on the nape of her neck as he spoke. 'I know you aren't sleeping.'

After a sudden storm, an unknown boy washes up on the shore of the beach near Fairy Hill's. Upon being discovered and helped out by Wendy the two form a team doing jobs with one another but it isn't too long that their lives get disrupted with sudden events of time in certain area's reportedly coming to a standstill and the two getting caught up in the middle of it all.

Lucy and Natsu walks right into a trap in Fairy Tail's guild hall so a certain blue Exceed can win a bet he made but instead of being angry, they realize something that they hadn't even noticed before.
When an accident leaves Cana as an infant, Gildarts gets a chance at some of the moments he missed out on.
Natsu Dragneel has had a crush on Lucy Heartfilia for a very long time and has finally decided to let her know about it before she moves out of town to go to a different university than he does.
Like water, Juvia alluring, clear and dangerous. Though Gray wouldn't admit it yet, he was drowning. (Gruvia Week) (Day 2: Alluring) (Phantom Lord-GMG Arcs) (Hurt/Comfort)
Natsu finds himself in a rather awkward situation concerning his thoughts, his best friend and her bed.

Let me tell you a story about a boy and a girl. Two separate souls who came together to create something wonderful. Cana was very young to be becoming a mother, but she couldn't say she regretted a thing. *Rating may increase
Natsu searches for Igneel one last time. he doesn't come back and Gray doesn't know how to forget.
Only seven days to make wonders. - Atem struggles to find a way to open up to Mana, whereas Mana needs to decide what is more important: her friendship, or her own feelings?

Atemu and Akefia are two very high ranked vampires that are overwhelmed with war and finding a mate. They are in war with each other so when Atemu is kidnapped, Akefia gives him an offer. Be his mate and end the war or he gets killed. What will happen? AU.
Happy Birthday Atem (27-7-19) Fluffy ONESHOT for my favourite Pharaoh on his birthday I dont own Yugioh but I love it
Oneshot, post-series Big 5 fic. Nesbitt awakens holding his bloodied kendo bokken and finds Lector lying beaten in front of him. The only thing Nesbitt can think is that he did it himself.
"We've been tricked, we've been backstabbed, and we've been, quite possibly, bamboozled."
Yugi, Joey, Kaiba, and Emily express their feelings on what they learned on their journeys regarding the elements they represent.

One-Shot collection. Yugi grows a lot during her time with Yami. She helps him and he helps her and they just sort of fall through life together. Neither of them expected another kind of falling. They avoid acknowledging it, but that doesn't mean it isn't there, burning softly. That warm, unspoken thing, waiting for a chance to ignite. fem!Yugi, Yugi/Yami, eventual Yugi/Atem

Join Yami, Yugi, and their friends in an adventure to stop Yugi's previous stalker and kidnapper from getting to her again in this second installment of my story Heaven Sent. Brian has come back with friends in the hopes of taking Yugi away from her happy life. Female Yugi, Ryou, and Malik.

When A Lonely and young man ends up with a Magical Card which brings Dark Magician Girl to life how will he deal with his new girlfriend trying to be with him all of the time? Read to find out. Please leave a review if you like it as it will be greatly appreciated. Thanks.
The final shadow game is over and Bakura has been defeated, but is the ancient thief really gone? Not if Ryou and Marik have anything to say about it.
Dinosaur Ryuzaki and Insector Haga hate each other with a passion, so much so they can't tell passion from hate. [Shrimpshipping]

Siegfried claimed to hold the favor of the goddess of fate, but this is sadly not the case regarding matters of love. Leon, however, seems to have no such trouble, and just what is going on with this great new "rogue deck" he's hiding? A harrowing tale of romance and identity crisis. Crack! Siegfried/Isis, with a helping of Leon/Rebecca. More pairings within. One-shot.
Joey is afraid of the rain, yet here he is, stood in the middle of it
Yugi gets sick after nearly drowning during Battle City. Anzu takes care of him.
Written for techno-sorcerer on tumblr in the summer mini exchange on Discord! In the aftermath of Gozaburo's death, Seto Kaiba works to build Kaiba Corp up from the ashes.
It is, what it is. Read it to understand

From the orphanage to the Kaiba Mansion, Mokuba is beside Seto every step of the way. Mokuba still remembers the days when Seto was just his brother. He remembers when his brother was just a kid. He remembers the days before Gozaburo, and he knows that everything that follows is his fault. It's all because of him. Short introspective blurb from Mokuba's perspective.
Abandoned by his village and adopted by a creature of Darkness, a sickly child is given a second chance to 'live'.

Staring lazily over her drink, Mai looks at Vivian and wonders if she'll ever be that carefree again. A short tale wherein Mai is a quiet drunk, and Vivian tries in her own way to help her out of a bad mood. One-shot, Fataleshipping.

Sometimes sharing a body is difficult. The rules aren't written, so you have to figure them out as you go. And heaven help you if you're sharing with someone bad, because not even sharing with someone good will do anything to make the simplest parts of life easier. A sampling of things that can go very wrong—or pleasantly right—when you're not the only person inside your body.
When he thinks he has run out, Seto Kaiba finds there might yet be light in the world. One-shot.
Kaiba pays a visit to his brother and newborn niece.

Yugi and the gang are really getting into tabletop RPGs, but there's just one problem: Joey and Tristan are murder trolls! Bakura and Yugi insist the two leave the group, but Joey and Tristan fight back. When the answer to their problems shows up in the form of Kaiba, who needs testers for a new game, will the two trolls get more than they bargained for?

Pharaoh Atem's spirit was trapped for five thousand years inside the Millennium Puzzle before Yugi finally released him. What did he experience during all that time and how did he feel when the chains of darkness were finally broken by the light that set him free? My take on what his thoughts might have been. I hope you enjoy! Rating to be safe. Please review!

Summer break has finally arrived for Yugi, Ryou, Malik, and Joey. But sadly, they each got summer homework and they want to complete it early. Given a strange device from Pegasus as a birthday present for Yugi, they tested it out and used it to travel to different eras. But when they arrived in Ancient Egypt, crazy stuff will happen that will test their courage and their sanity.
Talesverse. One-shot. The gang gathers for their yearly picnic to remember their departed friend.
After witnessing his parents murder, the victim has a new family to care for. Even if he isn't feeling up to it. AU. ***May or may not add to it later***

Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. Businessmen are being taken over by a mysterious force attempting to collect all the pieces of a statue of Reshef the Dark Being. Yugi and company must collect all the pieces first, while dealing with real Duel Monsters, Rare Hunters, and the reappearance of Gansley's estranged son, on the run from the Rare Hunters.
