A glimpse into the lives of the Muto family and their daughters highlighting the beauty of their rivalry and friendship.
Ryou invites Yugi over to see his "other occult deck". Yugi is keen to develop their friendship - but he seems to have some small, furry competition...

'Yes, that's it,' the spirit thought as Ushio drew closer. 'Come to me. Come back to the place where you so violently trespassed on the soul of my Light. Come, and let me return the favor.' (Continuation of 'Submersion', Chapter 4: Reckoning, from the Puzzle spirit's perspective. HARD T.)
After the events of canon, Mai and Ishizu run into each other on accident and finally have a conversation. Based on the prompt: Visionshipping blind date mixup. Visionshipping.

Tea has just returned home from the ceremonial duel and she cant stop thinking about Atem. She loves him and tries to communicate with him through her tiredness and loneliness meanwhile Atem is in the afterlife thinking about his friends but one brown haired girl in particular is on his mind constantly.

In the competitive world of the Capsule Coliseum league, the Domino Dragons are used to kicking ass. However since the Cairo Magicians got a new leader things have changed. Now KAI takes on King in a new kind of battle...
The best things seemed to happen to Amie late at night.
Atem is a fifteen-year-old prince set to become king on his sixteenth birthday, but his court sorcerer has other plans. Atem/Yugi. COMPLETE.

Lee had to keep flying. That familiar feeling in the depth of her heart never meant good. The tracking spell she cast on Ib was getting weaker - either the girl was trying to remove it, or… No, it was impossible! The Mekk-Knights were willing to do anything to stop Lee, but to fall so low? Also posted on AO3 and FictionPad.

Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. Yugi, Seto, the Big 5, and everyone else return to New Orleans to testify in court about what happened on their last visit. But between a mysterious person threatening Johnson and the house everyone's staying at appearing to be haunted by a restless ghost, things don't seem to be any more peaceful than the last time.

Yuugi always had something of an attachment to the Dark Magician, but he had also acknowledged the spellcaster was never really his to have—so he thinks. Alliumshipping (Yuugi/Dark Magician) with a touch of Sealshipping (Atem/Mahad). Gift for kampfkewob. One-shot.
Atem is given a second chance to make a heavy choice. During a decisive conversation with an old friend, a battle between 'fate' and mind occurs. Currently a two shot. Please review!
Talesverse. Companion to Ducks. Mana learns from Impractical Jokers and uses it to pull a prank on her uncle. Will it go as well as she hopes?

In a battle to save his life, Yami Sennen is forced to kill others of his group. But, as he saves more of his kind, they group up with him. What will happen if the group is forced to go against each other? AU.

Yugi(fem) and Demi(OC) are best friends since forever. What happens when Demi and Yugi go to a ball for the Pharaoh of Egypt's birthday? What happens when they meet their sons? This is an OC centered story. Summary sucks I know. Please try, it's my first story and please review and tell me what you think thank you! DISCONTINUED!

Yami is selfish, arrogant, spiteful, and sadistic. The last thing he wants, however, is for his Hikaru to see him as the monster he thinks he is. In Yuugi's eyes, Yami is a good person who deserves that one thing that he wants most. Could be platonic or romantic, whichever you read it as. Yami POV, slight AU, season 0. Rating for language; Yami has a potty mouth.
Tea ends up agreeing to pretend to be the Pharaoh's girlfriend when he's invited to a celebration for winning a Duel Monster's tournament. One-Shot, Rated T.

It is the countdown for survival as the KaibaCorp plane plummets to the earth below. Kaiba defeats Alister in their duel but the plane is about to crash, which could be fatal to both himself and his little brother. But as the Legendary Dragons ascend to aid Kaiba land the plane, Dartz interferes with a surprise of his own.
Bakura finds a spell to give himself a body of his own, but something unexpected happens. Later, Bakura tries to trick Atem into using it. Ryou/Bakura, Atem/Yugi. COMPLETE.

Sequel to 'Seal of Power'. Joey loves the new powers afforded to him by the Orichalcos, and he's almost ready to show them to Yugi- by capturing his soul! Joey finds though that he wants an old friend back and by his side. Dartz agrees to grant this wish...
Malik's other half is sick, and it's still a bit of a strange experience to have someone who cares enough to take care of him. Post-canon, Malik and Yami Malik share a body. Light Deathshipping.

Children find peace of mind in pretending. Seto and Jou find a whole lot more. (This started as a Christmas thing, ended closer to Valentine's, and I'm just glad I got it posted before St. Patrick's!) Disclaimer: I do not own Yu-Gi-Oh or any of it's related. I am not making nor do I seek to make any financial gain from this. I just wrote a fanfic based on the sources mentioned.

Post-anime series, my Pendulum Swings verse. The manga Yami Bakura falls into the anime verse following Zorc's defeat, and confused and angry, he finds a way to trap everyone in a life-size game world. After playing parts of several games, the group is thrust into Bendy and the Ink Machine, a survival horror game where their Game Master intends to keep them unless they can win.
Kaiba's world got shattered three times that day, the day his brother got hurt. But when Mokuba didn't get better, his world was shattered again. This time, maybe forever.

People say Seto Kaiba is emotionless and uncaring, but Mokuba doesn't believe that- not for a moment. A Seto Kaiba character study through Mokuba's eyes. Inspired by the song of the same name by Meredith Andrews.

Mai sits for a portrait. Shizuka causes delays on the way to dinner. There was too much to process, and too much to avoid forgetting, since she'd opened her eyes again and found these people – this clarity of senses. Mai & Shizuka flirty friendship fic. With background transfem!Otogi/Shizuka.
A different take on the real reason why Kaiba left after his duel with Yugi in the anime. Inspired by the song of the same name by Eels.
Ryou has decided to make a big decision in his life, while weary of the consequences he wants to take that chance; all in the name of love. Commission for Autobot00001

5,000 years ago a powerful pharaoh along with his Medjay locked away the magic of the Shadow Games saving Mankind from certain destruction. Now 5,000 years later a boy named Yugi and a Girl named Abigail have unlocked the secret of the Millenium Puzzle and Bracer and with it, the Shadow Games begin anew.
A poem between the Kaiba Brothers. Because they need each other, no matter what anyone says.

Based off of the Book turned to a movie of the same name by Emma Donoghue. There is a room in the Kaiba manor that only the brothers knew existed, from their days with Gozaburo. During an interview, the room is revealed, a question is asked, and contemplations were made by Seto, culminating in an answer. Oneshot.
Inspired by the Taylor Swift song of the same name. Seto contemplates Mokuba growing up on the eve of his birthday.
Inspired by the song of the same name by Luther Vandross. Mokuba recovers a very old memory about his birth father, and goes to Seto about it. A very fluffy Kaiba Brothers Oneshot.
A conversation between the Kaiba Brothers about emotions and affection, told from Mokuba's point of view. Just a tiny drabble.

Lady Tea Gardner had married Yugi Moutu, a wealthy man with a title of his own to inherit but what happens when his brother, Atem, whom was her first love, returns from the dead after going off to war. One-shot, Rated T.
Takes place immediately after the Virtual World Arc. Mokuba asks Seto a question that has haunted him since birth, forcing his brother to confront the past, and look toward the future.
Inspired by the song by Disturbed. Seto Kaiba contemplates the different connotations silence has had to him over the years.
AU of an AU Seto's unhappy childhood through teen years in a sci-fi future. (AU of CotG)

The trouble with hard-won victories was they weren't the happily ever after you expected. Life kept going on and, still bleeding and bruised, you had to go along with it. Everything isn't magically fixed like it's supposed to be, and some things never will be. Sometimes the best you could hope for was a hand to hold and maybe someday to only be left with scars you could be proud of

The night after the Pyramid Of Light duel, Seto takes time to sort out his feelings. Who in their right mind could care about such a dark and broken man? The answer: Mokuba. Kaiba Brothers fluff all around.
"It's just as I said. You respond best to a firm hand, and mine suits you very well, doesn't it?" (No Millennium Items AU.)
Yugi, Atem, Ryou, and Bakura discover an underground vampire circle in Domino and learn how it operates. Yugi/Atem, Ryou/Bakura. COMPLETE.
Yugi looks through his grandmother's scrapbook and remembers his childhood attempts at art.
Yami is the Playboy. Yugi is part of the band. I'll allow the story to fill in the rest.

When Pharaoh Atem's best spy and diplomat returns from a mission he realises he can longer be without her, especially since they are childhood friends and are madly in love, but will their love always have to be kept hidden? and what will happen when a certain army general finds out a woman has stolen important information from right under his nose. Rated T, Now Complete!

Before the last trip to Egypt, something abruptly teleports Yugi to the duel monster world. There he confronts a new threat against the entire monster dimension. The Pharaoh is left behind, alone in the body, right as Yugi's distant father comes home. How will each face a situation where they feel their other half would have been stronger?
Valentines Day is not always as happy and romantic as people say it is. Not when the person you love is an Ancient Pharaoh who's 5000 years old.

In a world of Greek Mythos the Hikaris are three little Satyrs who are turned into females for spying on the nymphs. They are distraught and are set on finding a way to undo the curse only to find trouble in the games of three handsome Satyrs known as the Yamis. What will happen to these half goat creatures? Will there be Trouble...or Love?

happens after the yugi vs Rebecca duel. Rebecca fangirls Mokuba. Mokuba don't like it . contains Anti Mokuba x Rebecca( because i dislike this ship a lot) and hinted one sided Mokuba x Téa Gardner. I do not own yugioh. sorry for errors.
Yugi's struggles with the loss of the pharaoh. It takes time, but Yugi will realize our loved ones are never really gone. Spoilers for Dark Side of Dimensions.

Shipwrecked after his uncle tried to kill him, Yami finds himself alone on a deserted island. But he may not be as alone as he thinks, as mysterious messages appear on the beach along with gifts and food. Yami slowly falls in love with his secret admirer through the language they create together, a language of seashells and glass. Mermaid AU (Not a fusion or xover.)
Yami understands Kaiba all too well. No slash.
Seto Kaiba doesn't collect teddy bears, thank you very much! (All those dragon stuffed toys in the display cases in his bedroom totally don't count.) Kaiba brother fluff.
Gainful Employment series. Another hostile takeover attempt meets some unexpected resistance, and Seto decides ingorance is the better part of ...something. Crackfic.
Based off of Lin-Manuel Miranda's 'Burn.' Joey deals with the fall out from Kaiba's announcement. J/K

Yami is a young animal scientist and doctor. He moved himself away from his friends and family as he discovered a new animal species - Dragons. Unfortunately, society found him and are now using the animals as weapons in wars. War Dragons is what they call them now. What will happen when one of Yami's dragons dies? Will he stop this madness and save two very rare kinds of dragons?
Scenes from the first annual Duel Academy Showcase, featuring magic, music, and Pegasus trying very hard to get Kaiba a date.
(Grease-inspired highschool AU) Isis and Mai wasted away a summer playing on the beach. With the school season starting again, those sweet summer days suddenly feel very far away.
Yami contemplates his love. Slash YY/Y

Seto Kaiba is not a man who falls in love. But after a shut down of a research project will he be forced into feelings? And with who? Well, there is someone...but he blames it on the potion. Azureshipping, based off of a prompt. Rated T for a few curse words, but no f-bomb. Intended as a one-shot but I may add on.

Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. Lector is mysteriously summoned to New Orleans by his estranged father, and the rest of the Big 5 go with him. At the same time, Shadi appears and warns Atem of a great evil stirring in New Orleans, one that he and everyone else must defeat. And Seto Kaiba is "vital." As the villain starts targeting everyone, dangers and heartache abound.
Just Yugi thinking about Yami after he is gone.

Atemu West, a 17 year old girl, is about to sing to her soon-to-be ex-boyfriend, Seto Kaiba. But, after they do break up, Atemu's best friend, secret crush, and Domino's most popular student, Yami Sennen, sing his love to Atemu. Will Yami and Atemu be together? Or will Seto's jealousy flair up and break the two apart? AU.

20 year old Mokuba and 23 year old Téa Gardner have a wedding. I did not own yugioh. This is a very short fanfic. contains Mokuba x Téa Gardner, hints of Tristan x serenity , Joey x Mai and one sided yugi x Téa Gardner. sorry for errors.
Seto Kaiba hallucinates. No, for real this time.
Yugi, a human prince is betrothed to Atem, a merman prince. When the queen has other plans for Yugi, will Atem be able to stop them? COMPLETE.
Jounouchi Katsuya is addicted to cigarettes, and Kaiba, as the only person who knows about it, decides to intervene. Puppyshipping.
It's a week before Christmas and Atemu is out looking for presents for his husbands, Yami and Yugi, and his grandfather, Solomon. But, Atemu already has a present. AU.

I did not own yugioh. Mokuba and Téa Gardner duels in a snowball duel. where a player lose lifepoints, a snowball is thrown at them. who will win this duel? contains 1 made up card, sorry for errors Mokuba is 14 and Téa Gardner is 17. contains one sided Mokuba x Téa Gardner( Mokuba has the feelings)
My first Prideshipping ONESHOT, Kaiba & Atem have a bit of fun putting their Christmas decorations, very cute & fluffy ch with a bit of Angst Christmas present for SparklingDashofEgypt

Prompt from Taemanaku: Bakura is hurt while robbing a tomb, and Malik, who is skilled in magic and healing, is the only one who can help him. Citronshipping. Ancient Egypt story. Happy birthday Malik!

News of the pregnancy quickly spread across the region and people are out to grab the unborn baby. What of Yami's and Yugi's relationship? And Zorc's and Akefia's? What will happen to Atemu when he leaves his home only to come back to warn his family about the deadly blizzard that is coming? AU. (Summary sucks but I damn well try.)

Based on Richard Marx's Hazard... after everything that has happened, no one trusts Bakura. When push comes to shove, will his past define who he really is, or has he really turned over a new leaf? Warning Character dear

Mokuba loves Christmas, but Seto was always such a misery. Intent on making this year a Christmas to remember, Mokuba arranges a party and everyone is invited. Holed up in his home laboratory, Seto is working on his project, while upstairs, the party is just getting going. Seto's plan to resurrect Atem backfires, turning it into a Christmas they definitely will not forget.

After the exhibition duel between Yugi and Mokuba, the KC Phoenix Invitational moves on to the main event. Having finished his little experimentation with the powers of the Shadow Games, Mokuba is focused on just going through a normal tournament. However, he soon finds he wasn't the only one who came with a secret agenda... Sequel to A Feather of the Phoenix

AU. Fragile!verse. In which Hiyori is depressed, Marc feels bad, Yugi and family are trying to keep her preoccupied and Yuki schemes. Not to mention the huge surprise that Marc and Hiyori have for one another on Christmas Eve. Part of the Holiday Crack and Mistletoe 2018 updating event.
sorry no summary other then its a reboot of a fairy tale.
Atem and Seto celebrate their six year anniversary. Little do they know that they bought each other similar gifts... Pure fluff!

AU. Fragile!verse. In which Seto leaves a week before Christmas, his daughter is upset and Joey is wondering if he'll make it home in time for the holidays. Part of the Holiday Crack and Mistletoe 2018 updating event!

Yami Bakura takes over of Téa Gardner and forces yami yugi and Mokuba to duel. Can Mokuba win when yami yugi is defeated? Made up cards are used . I did not own yugioh. uses Duelist kingdom rules. Sorry for mistakes. Contains one sided Mokuba x Téa Gardner .
Seven-year-old Yuugi Mutou gets sick quite often. The Spirit of the Puzzle is discontent with not being able to help. Shameless fluff. Pre-series oneshot. Part of the Submersion universe.
Yami has a nightmare. Read to find out more. Warning. I think it sucks. :'(

Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. Everyone in Domino is preparing for a hopefully peaceful Christmas, including the Big Five, who are desperately trying to move on with their lives. But a revenge plot against them will end up pulling everyone in. Who is behind it? Dr. Portman? Perhaps Alister, who detests the original KaibaCorp. Or even Nesbitt, who is acting strangely...
It what the title say Is what will happen if bakura ( thief king) and yugi took in as employees in the bank sorry I suck at summary
The soft cares of a lover is equal to thousand words
Summary inside. Genderbent Atemu. Songshot.
This is trailer for my 'Ice Age' parody,which is coming soon!

On a Friday night, Ryou catches the train and rides an hour out to the wealthy suburb surrounding Versailles, where Isis and Rishid have asked him to 'housesit'. What ensues is movies, crepes, and The Game of Life. Malik/Ryou.

Seven were taken, but one was left behind. The year and a half Tristan's friends were missing brought with it a lifetime of regret, fear, and mind games. Based on Bellamy-Taft's fanfic "Glass" and will make the most sense if you read that first.

In which Mr. Crawford attempts to host another Duel Monsters tournament, this time with a distinct lack of soul and eyeball stealing. It doesn't work out as he expects. (Spoiler: Pegasus isn't overly bothered by it.) [cover art by Amlia B.]
Seto and Ryou grieve their lost siblings as the holidays near. Not in deed but in duty, their routines were the same.
25 days of Kaiba and Jonouchi being festive. [Puppyshipping/Violetshipping]

Mariku has a lot to figure out after being dumped back into the world with almost no life experiences to call his own. Eager to help, Ryou offers to take Mariku out for a day so he can start discovering the world as his own person. Sometimes in life, it's the little things that start to make you whole. (A post-cannon, pre-deathshipping, feel-good fic for the YGOME18 on A03)

A world changing event strikes the world. timelines colliding and bouncing off each other, creating a mishmash of two realms that are the same, but different. (Yu gi o classic, Pre battle city, but with zexal elements mixed in. Oneshot.)
A simple one-shot using the idea from Tumblr consisting of; What if you saw only black and white until you met/touched your soulmate? Atemu x Yugi (Blindshipping)

Its Christmas time here in Domino and Yugi is determined to make Yami's first Christmas the best one he ever had. That leads to him bringing back one of Yami's loved ones for the holiday season. But this gift comes at a cost. Yugi must admit his greatest secret to Yami or the loved one he brought back will be gone come midnight the new year. Atemu x Yami; other minor pairings

" He began reaching a hand up, as though to touch Ryou's face. "Would you like to stay in my forest with me, pretty boy?" Ryou froze, his breathe caught in his throat, his mind confused and clouded by fear and desire as he watched the deathly pale hand come closer. "

Hang in there, he says. Just hold on, he says. I never see you anymore, but I need to wait a little longer. What am I to do? Am I even a priority to him? I don't know... Puzzleshipping, Inspired by Joji - You Suck Charlie Sequel to Committed
A simple, but I hope VERY fun, Parody! Yu-Gi-Oh belongs to Kazuki Takahashi, and Harry Potter belongs to J. K. Rowling. Enjoy!

Raymond's sister is fatally sick and the only operation that can save is in America and too expensive. But when Konami's Duelist Kingdom tournament offers 3 million to first place winner, Raymond couldn't decline. But he's obviously not the only person who is gunning for that prize. Can he really win the money to cure his sister, or will he fail miserably?
[Seto x OC] Under the moonlight, Seto offers his blood. Shounen-ai.
After surviving a deadly train crash that left him paralyzed, Atemu reflects on his feelings of it by his voice. Mobium.
I hate you...Ever since you broke my heart, I haven't been myself. I lost my friends and family because of you..And now, you're gonna pay… First One-shot. Please review and like. Arigato!

Post-series, Pendulum Swings verse. Lector has been restored to his body and is immediately spirited away by a dangerous mad scientist with plans for cruelly studying Seto Kaiba and Yami Bakura. Of course, the entire gang gets pulled into the madness. And has Lector overcome his darkness enough to refuse to go along with the plan?
Yuugi and Seto wanted to keep their relationship quiet for a little while, so Yuugi breaks it slowly to all of their friends.
It's Halloween, and Yugi has a question for Anzu—one that he's willing to travel halfway around the world to ask. But it's not a big deal, just a little visit.

Tired of causal encounters, Serenity wants more from Kaiba than the occasional roll in the hay. What does Kaiba feel about that? Will Kaiba give her what she wants? Does he reciprocate the sentiment? Slientshipping heavily based on the song of the same name by Shawn James.

How exactly do you stop something from jeopardizing everything you worked for, even though no one else knows of its existence? My choice was to fight it in secret. I even forsakened our oath to stop this threat. I know it would lead to death, but I accepted that. So why? Why are you the one that is in my arms when I should be the one lying in the snow?

When I got nothing but determination from your response, I saw potential. Swear an oath to me, and I will swear an oath to you. I'll be the first lord to bend the knee, and this dagger will be the symbol of our effort to make you king.

Six years ago, you and I decided to make oaths to one another in the crispy cold. Six year now, you kneel before me a traitor and an oath breaker. Six years now, I stand before you as a king and an oath keeper in the crispy cold.

written with TheMysteriousBlanketThief... Kidnapped while on a camping trip with his best friend's brother and his two friends, Yami and the three boys are forever changed by supernatural forces. What will come of their new lives? (WARNING: Contains Gender-bending, past character death, slight Tea-bashing, age-reversal, and boy x boy crushes.) rating will go up later MON & THURS
This was inspired by PhantomBrat's 'Song Shots' chapter 5, 'Hands of Time's. I hope you all enjoy it.
Post series 2-shot. Pegasus visits Seto Kaiba on his 18th birthday, and a subject long overdue comes to the surface.
"You would allow duel spirits to accompany you so you could make your deck."..."Yeah, I don't see why not. Though I would have a few rules, and some pranking requests."

Post DSOD. Returning from the afterlife Seto is still struggling. Sensing his brother is reflective, Mokuba suggests he goes and talks to Pegasus, who is still struggling to find a purpose without Cecelia. They have a few drinks and Seto offers to take him for a reunion with his lost wife. Pegasus is excited, but does have doubts. Written as part of a writing exchange on Tumblr.

Yugi, Ryou, and Marik fall through a Rift into the Hollow World, an alternate world where monsters live. They only have two options - escape from this world and get back home, or make their new home in this world. / Horror themes, dangerous situations, eventual relationships between humans and monsters. Y/YY, RB/YB, M/YM. COMPLETE!

When Yami Bakura makes his way into Seto's virtual world, Seto is stuck, unable to find out how he got in, or how to remove him. And Bakura has his own ideas for how things in the game should play out.
Atem and Anzu have a heart to heart before he leaves forever. "No regrets." She said softly. "Not one."

Two hundred souls and mankind goes extinct, DOMA promises. Rahlin reaps for the organization to see a perfect world made reality. Then the Egyptian prince she recognizes makes an appearance. Her ancient debt to him clashes with DOMA's goal. Rahlin acts with less and less conviction. She's starting to wonder if the humans she's come to know really should die. (S4 AU) -COMPLETE!-

A continuation of Two Souls, Two Hearts, but this focuses on Ryou and Bakura. The tomb robber thinks about his new life while Ryou wants an end to the hostilities between Bakura and his friends. No slash, just friendship. COMPLETE.

Another story from season 5, this time its from ep 203, where Bakura interrupts Atem's Coronation ceremony, this is from Priest Seto's POV - ONESHOT I dont own Yugioh or its characters, all credit goes to Kazuki Takahashi
Short Puzzleshipping One-shot, while sitting & watching TV on a rainy day things start to get steamy between Atem & Yugi
A series of ficlets of random pairings. Requests accepted.
A sort of sequel to 'The Meeting', Loretta & Atem have a bit of hot & steamy 'fun' one afternoon, No Lemons but heaps of build up & fluff I dont own Yugioh all credit to Kazuki Takahashi

Atem's father kept him hidden for years, until his passing. Atem, never knowing why he was hidden, gets a job as a waiter. Getting Yami Sennen as a customer one night, however, changes everything, and sends Atem spiralling into the world his father tried to keep him out of.
Yami has fallen into darkness. Can Yugi help him? Or will Yami forever cause torment to the light of the world and himself? This is a little one shot. Enjoy. :p
First, Bakura is aware of Ryou. Then, Ryou is mindful of Bakura. Lastly, they are acquainted with each other.

Inspired by Bad End Night. Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. Everyone begins regaining memories of a dark time when Yami Marik harmed Bakura and then gave the others a cruel chance to save him: by playing a dark Shadow Game where time resets whenever they fail.

Just before bed Atem decides to have a shower but gets interrupted by Loretta (my OC) & then things start to get a little bit steamy, Fluffy little one-shot I dont own Yugioh, all credit to Kazuki Takahashi
Joey duels Mokuba as a final test. who will win? A madeup card will be used. Sorry for any spelling and grammar mistakes I missed. This fanfic takes place in the Grand Championship arc.
Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. Tristan gets in trouble with a gang late at night ... and is rescued by someone he didn't expect.

Dead. Yami Sennen is dead. He thought it'd be simple. Die, go up or go down. But now, he has a second chance at life, under one condition: he becomes the boyfriend of the demon giving him the second chance!
Yami Bakura duels yami yugi and get destoryed by Yami yugi. Sorry for bad spelling and grammar mistakes

Yami, I thought you were a tough prick when I met you but that's what I fell in love with. When we found out about the cancer it was the worst day of my life. I don't regret that day though. I fell hard for you and have continued to fall in love with you each day. I wish we had more time together. Just know if you die tomorrow or in a hundred years I will always love you. AU.

Yori Yoshida is ready to make a new life in Domino City—until she meets Yuugi Mutou, a boy famous for turning life on its head. He and the mysterious spirit locked in his puzzle are in for the fight of their lives against an ancient secret, and although Yori knows she should walk away, she can't help but feel that this is her fight, too. (Anime manga influences, OCxYY, other ships)
Finding out that Atem has Royal council in Rome, Loretta (OC) gets upset but heaps of fluff ensues, things start to get a bit steamy in the middle (No Lemons) just tonnes of romance

Seto is put in a corner by Noah over their Father's will. Seto has to show Noah that he found love within a year so he can be the owner of the company. Will he get the company of his dreams or will he get something much worse by faking this love. "1... 2... 3... Test love." Serenity says as she holds hands with Seto. I don't own Yu-Gi-Oh.

Yugi and yami yugi thinks Mokuba likes Téa Gardner. This makes Yugi and Yami yugi mad. So they challenge Mokuba to a duel. Who will win? Madeup cards will be used. Sorry fro grammar and spelling mistakes. If you like yugi or yami yugi, you will not like this fanfic most likely.

Winter thought that her life was great, until her house burned down with her mother and brother inside it. Now she lives with her Aunt in Domino city and things couldn't get weirder for her. Wait, it just did. The spirit from a puzzle is possessing her new friend and it's not even the strangest thing she's going to see? She's going to have one hell of an adventure isn't she?
My first AtemxYugi fic, No lemons just brotherly fluff I dont own Yugioh & yes my summary sucks

A fight between the rivalling houses of upper and lower Egypt, Atem invades Lower Egypt in an attempt to avenge his father and take full control of off the country, it all goes downhill when his court advisers him that he must marry one of the princesses of lower Egypt to make his rule of Lower Egypt legit. Based loosely off the war of the roses. Yugi X Atem Fem Yugi (DISCONTINUED)

As part of her birthday weekend, Anzu suggests that she and both Yugi's go on a three way date. She hopes that by doing so, it will help her to sort out her feelings for them both. Will it work out as she hopes? Written in celebration of Anzu's birthday. Contains peachshipping and revolutionshipping.

Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. After the latest defeat of the Big 5, Mokuba finds himself wondering whether Lector ever actually cared about him and Seto, since Lector helped raise them but then betrayed them. He isn't expecting Yami Marik to suddenly kidnap him to the Shadow Realm so he can ask in person. Now everyone else must journey to the heart of darkness to find him.

"I'm not saying that I want to get married," Kaiba said, holding the blonde's hand in his own, "but I don't want another day to go by without you knowing that I plan on spending the rest of my life with you." [Puppyshipping / Violetshipping].

Yugi's daughter, Kyo, and Seto's daughter, Kisara, wind up living together while Yugi goes off on a tour. But living under Seto Kaiba isn't the easiest, and when Yugi goes missing and a new evil arrives to threaten the world, things seem as if they're spiraling out of control... (Updates weekly)
Short One-shot between Atem & Tea, heaps of fluff I dont own YuGiOh

1926, Egypt. Yugis grandfather spend his life searching for games, adventure and the occasional treasure. But one day, he doesn't return from one if his trips , the only thing arriving home is an old papyrus, hidden in a metallic box. A map, leading towards Hamunaptra, the legendary city of the death, grave of Egypt's riches. But what s lurking there is far more dangerous than gold

In the midst of trying to adjust to their new life in Egypt, Malik's perceptions of his sister are challenged. Of this, he finds that the greatest difficulty in living together is accepting that he and Isis share more similarities than he'd like to admit. Rishid, meanwhile, is happy they have something in common. Ishtar family shenanigans. Three-parter.
On the night before the Ceremonial Duel, Anzu and Atem grapple with the future ahead of them. And in the process, they heal each other. {Revolutionshipping}

(Por amor a quien - Traducido al ingles ) We all fall in love at some point of our lives and have trouble at admitting it. Jounouchi finds it difficult to confess his love to his best friend, Yuugi, but what kind of effect will this situation have on Kaiba Seto and Atem? (WishShipping/JounouchiXYuugi) (PrideShipping/KaibaXAtem) [One-Shot].
(AU where Yami stays) Yugi is glad to have Yami in his life. But sometimes, there are the times where he dreams of what would happen if he left again. Then what happens?
Seto Kaiba was not 'Smitten'

BLUESHIPPING! A romantic relationship is the last thing Kaiba wants right now, but when he finds out about a secret agreement made by Gosaburo and Pegasus where they agreed that he had to marry Kisara, Pegasus' niece, he realizes that there are some things from the past that he cannot escape... All Blueshippers, after all this time, unite once again!
She tries to make him understand —Yami/Téa
Yugi's anxiety gets the better of him mid-flight, and Yami tries to reassure him. /Canon AU. Puzzleshipping. Standalone.
Atem's father has given him a rare opportunity to find his own bride. Planned three part story for Yami Yugi's birthday.

n, dependence on chance or on the fulfillment of a condition. Long ago, Seto made a decision to protect Mokuba even if his plan to take over Kaiba Corporation failed. He forgot to make any backup plans for himself, however. (AU where Seto does not become the president of Kaiba Corp.)
Yugi finally got away, but did he really? Everyone is a little insane, it just takes the right person to bring it out. (Yandere/oneshot)
Understanding the weight beneath her newly bestowed epithet, she brushes his hand aside and places a kiss to the hollow scar. Isis/Pegasus, Sightshipping. 1K one-shot.
Why Rex Raptor Suffers On This Day
This is my first Yami Yugi and Mai Valentine fanfic so be nice.

He looked outside, the only thing to see was darkness. He sighed and looked around, there was no one else in the carriage. He took out his ticket, it was in completely blank, he sighed again. Which was his station?
"Did you come here knowing how you felt or are you only now realizing that… you wanted more?"

Kaiba Corp is developing a prototype game that allows you to become your favourite Duel Monster, or create your own. However, this game is about more than just entering the Duel, it's a game to save lives, and they'll need everyones help to make sure they can escape the Labyrinth.

Priest Seto was lucky to escape the shrine with his life. Kisara and her dragon's soul will be his death. And yet, in Rosenkreuz's dreams, their legend is very much alive. Post-Forbidden Memories, pre-Duelists of the Roses.

The Creatures of Shadow. They were everything in this world. They were your partner, your friend, and your ally. To not have a Shadow was to be nothing more than Unchosen. But as one these 'Unchosen' would soon learn, even when abandoned by the Shadows one may still feel the everglowing warmth of the Sun. (AU, OC x FemaleRa) (Considered Complete/Up for Adoption.)

It's been a rough eighteen months for Kaiba Corporation, but a new tournament offers a chance to rise from the ashes. What better way to regain the public interest than have the CEO duel the King of Games? Of course, it would be even better if Seto were here, but Mokuba and Yugi have a plan that might help with that… Takes place a year and a half after Dark Side of Dimensions.
When their camping trip gets rained out, Bakura has a surprise in store for his boyfriend... AU Kleptoshipping
or The Pedagogy of the Distressed. Mana is the Official Court Magician, so she doesn't know why she's still someone's apprentice. Isis/Mana, of a rather unpleasant variety.

Inspired by Yu-Gi-Oh: Abridged. Bakura and Marik decide to add their own flare to Episode 59 - Crown Atlas, but Yami isn't very impressed. (Originally was going to be a Blooper, but was changed to a One-Shot)

No pun intended, not a songfic either. After being away for a year Atem comes back from the afterlife to admit his true feelings for Tea, lots of fluff, ONESHOT done as a request by edowdle, I dont own Yugioh, all credit to Kazuki Takahashi
Chocolate flavored smooches. Modern AU.

It was just a stupid story his brother told him to get him to help with the garden. Forget-Me-Nots didn't actually hold memories, and destroying them didn't make those memories fade. It wasn't until he was older, though, that Yami found out just how much he wished it could have been true. Because, sometimes, you need help remembering. Especially when life tries to make you forget.

COMPLETE - After losing to the King of Games in Battle City, Seto Kaiba is ready to move on and begin taking Kaiba Corp to the next level. But when someone threatens to steal his new technology, a green-eyed internship student comes in to distract him. It's when she turns him down that he realizes he might need some help from his arch rival to win her over.
Hemingway 6 challenge. 24 YGO characters; 6 words each.
"My name is Ryou Bakura, I am under the control of an evil spirit." Ryou's perspective on the duel between Yami Bakura and Yami Yugi during Duelist Kingdom.
Five times Seto Kaiba eats sweets and one time he bakes a cake himself Prideshipping

Yugi and Kaiba settle in for a friendly game of cards. But what seems to be a friendly game with no stakes, turns out to be anything but. Kaiba is deadly serious about finally defeating Yugi once and for all, and there's nothing he's not willing to do. Plus, he's not putting up with Yugi's rule-bending. With the help of the heart of the cards, can Yugi manage to win?

Drabble. Yugi does not carry his other self's name. Perhaps they should have questioned that Bakura does. (Or: Ryou is more Thief King than anyone is really comfortable admitting, and he'll be thrice damned before he lets this spirit steal his name in addition to his life.)
Ryou stops at a curiously decaying house on his way home.

Tristan's hit with the realization that the only thing better than living with and dating Serenity would be to marry her. Of course, he needs to ask her to do that before it can happen. (Spin-off of Legally Blond, very slight knowledge needed to understand this, which I will tell you in the Author's Notes)

Seto Kaiba's secretary has had enough of her boss' unprofessional attire and decides to take him shopping. Sure, Seto is a bull-headed philanthropist teenage, but there must be some way she can convince him to expand his wardrobe. And how will she handle the challenge when her boss reveals he has a fancy for dresses?
With her parents away for the weekend, Anzu invites Yugi round for a romantic candle-lit dinner, lovingly prepared by herself. Written as a one-shot in celebration of Yugi's birthday.

Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. Seto Kaiba is ready with his augmented reality game at last, but everything turns upsidedown when the Big Five resurface and use the program to escape into the real world. With them bent on claiming KaibaCorp for their own and rewriting the program to turn Domino City into other locations, how will everyone stop them?

Nuni is all but a slave in her own home. On a trip to Egypt she uncovers a peculiar pendant and finds a handsome and some what frightening spirit within it. Nuni doesn't know why this puzzle has "chosen her" but her life can change... if she lets it. **Book 2 is in Progress: My Demon Escorts, Yu Yu Hakoshu Crossover**

A certain individual plans his revenge, and Yami challenges him to a Shadow game. How will the events unfold? And the trials ahead...will be the most challenging trials the man had ever faced. Correction. They're not that hard actually...—.—()
Bakura is sat at home, playing with video games and talking to his baby son, confident that he's the best the tomb robber ever. But Malik has other ideas..

In a tale as old as time, join the gang as they share another adventure. When Yugi arrives at the dark castle looking for his Grampa, he wasn't expecting to find a beast as well. Not to mention talking household items.
When Amane insisted on going into a store, she was not expecting to find someone in need. And neither was Atem.

(A pirate AU) When Malik and Ryou get tired of their poor, miserable town, the decide to sneak on to a pirate ship that unexpectedly arrived at their dock. Their friendship is tested and they are met with the responsibilities and unpredictable nature of being a pirate as an adventure full of envy and hatred unravels before them.

A year after the final duel between Yugi and Atem, strange things had been happening in Domino City. Yugi had been getting strange dreams and soon, Ryou and Malik are also getting them. Is there another evil coming in? And what happens when Yugi, Ryou, and Malik mysteriously vanished? YxY, RxB, MxM, JxS
Pharaoh Atem ceases to exist in the Millennium Puzzle. Dark Yuugi is born.

A young woman from a small village; offers to take her Guardian's place, as a prisoner in the palace of a ugly creature. He is a king, cursed by the Goddess of Light; to be as ugly on the outside as he is inside. The only way to end the spell, is to love and to earn love in return. You all know this story...a tale as old as time itself. (Beauty & The Beast Fairyshipping Atem X OC)

Serenity's pregnancy test comes back positive, and she's positive the baby is Kaiba's. Though she successfully keeps the news from her brother and keeps her distance from the baby's father at first, her life is turned upside down when a strange twist of fate forces her to move into the Kaiba mansion. [Takes place six years after the end of the series. SxS, some JxM]
Kaiba can't seem to get someone out of his head. Songfic (Wrabel's 11 Blocks)

For Kaiba, it all started with the dog. The dog and a promise. That encounter forced him to face aspects of his lifestyle that he might have preferred to leave in the dark, ignored like all the things that made his skin crawl in disgust and his insides to turn- especially those pertaining to Katsuya Jounouchi. (Kaijou)
Or, Sugoroku watches a reincarnation try to balance itself with one half gone, and one half with him.
Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. What if Yami Bakura ran across a part of his spirit he'd broken off and the shadow didn't want to re-merge?
Sometimes enraging a working Kaiba is all fun for a bored Jounouchi. Oneshot.
Ficlet about Mai x Yami Yugi [Please read and review.]

It's been 20 years since Death-T, give or take, and Seto Kaiba is still in a coma from the Mind Crush. Mokuba Kaiba reflects on the past as he prepares to make a decision. Set after the Toei anime, commonly known as "Season Zero."

Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. Yami Marik accosts Yami Bakura and Ryou Bakura late at night, wanting a duel. Of course, he has several cruel twists in mind, including a usage for Ectoplasmer that Yami Bakura never dreamed of...
Follow-up to It Happened on Maple Street. Yami Bakura deals with the aftereffects of Bakura having been tricked into getting drunk at a school party.

Marik invites Mokuba to sightseeing on his glorious, glorious motorcycle, but quickly realises that Kaiba and Jounouchi/Joey are out to ruin his joy ride. Rated K for general silliness, explosions, and unhappy lawn gnomes. Please note that the genres only mildly contribute in comparison to the laughable nature of this story.
Post-series, my Pendulum Swings verse. Yami Bakura finds Bakura having been tricked into getting drunk at a classmate's party. To say he is angry at those responsible is an understatement.
And one time he learned about Ryou. Lots of heartshipping fluff. [Cross posted on AO3]
Talesverse. While Atem studies for the entrance exams for Duel Academy, Mana gets inspired by the internet and assembles an army to invade the bathroom.
The day of Gozaburo Kaiba's funeral has arrived, and Seto is feeling less than mournful. Songfic to "Styrofoam Plates" by Death Cab for Cutie.

The son of the Pharaoh goes missing, but only the priests know. To avoid alarming anyone, especially the Pharaoh himself, they find a local peasant boy to take his place until they find and rescue Prince Atem. But with Bakura haunting this ancient Egyptian city, how can anyone figure out what happened to him? Blindshipping, you can see it as platonic or romantic.

It's been six months since graduation and all Yugi does is work. Well, today's the day that his best friend decides to fix that by setting him up on a different kind of adventure. Some language in chapter 2.
AU- The bad thing about pranks, is that they sometimes backfire... but not always in the worst of ways... Tendershipping BxR
My version of "Those Eyes", inspired by Dark Magician Freak. My story is told through the eye of Yugi's Dark Magician and Dark Magician Girl.

Yuugi has a massive crush on his handsome co-worker who works down the hall from him. In an attempt to dazzle said co-worker, Yuugi finds out that he's in desperate need of help, and immediately volunteers. Little does Yuugi know that his co-worker's troubles run a little deeper than he could have ever imagined.
This is a poem I wrote based on Slifer the Sky Dragon.

On the way to the place of the Ceremonial Duel, Téa is depressed with the idea, mainly because it did not reveal its feelings. When Atem appears in her own body, she sees a chance to tell him. But how did he get his own body? (I'm Bad with summaries, I know XD)
Sometimes the paparazzi is right, sometimes they're wrong... so so wrong. Peachshipping (YugixAnzu/Tea) Multi Chapt. Humor.
A poem about what Joey thinks about Mai Valentine
This is a poem I wrote about Yami Yugi falling in love with Tea Gardener.

One-Shot. Tea gives Rebecca a ballet lesson. As the lesson goes on, they have a heart to heart about the tri-color haired boy who brought them together, and Tea is forced to confront the feelings she'd been avoiding. Discussions about Peach, Replay, and Revolutionshipping.
Yugi has a dinner date with Kaiba. It goes about as awkward as one might expect. (short & fluffy one shot)
Marik has a talk with his other self, who's a bit different after his return from the shadows once Zorc was defeated, to try and come to an agreement.
The Spirit of the Millennium Ring has been unusually quiet lately. What could he be planning?
Expanding on my turn by turn idea, read on how Joey Wheeler not only manages to beat Yugi, but also defeats the creator of Duel Monsters, Maxillion Pegasus.
Atem is a merman, and Yami a human. But, will that keep them separated for long?

After defeating Diva and graduating high school Yugi and the others had went their separate ways to start their careers in adulthood. Now Joey is starting his career as a pro duelist.What happens when he runs into Mai again? Will the two be able to fix a broken friendship? Will Joey be able to convince Mai that he could be a person she could call a friend once again? Please R&R!
In the middle of Battle City Yugi goes home for the night, the Pharaoh is impatient and tries to leave as soon as Yugi's gotten an adequate amount of sleep. Grandpa, however, has other plans.
Not part of my main timeline. Following the end of the Pharaoh's Memories arc, Yami Bakura seems to have mysteriously returned with no explanation. But something seems off. Is the truth much darker?
Marik isn't entirely sure what will happen now that Battle City is over.
Ryou doesn't get much closure. Yugi notices when he starts to splinter. Manga continuity, post-canon but pre-DSOD.

It was meant to be a regular Dueling Tournament filled with exhilarating duels, new rivals and potentially new friends for Kylie and Katherine Hope but when they come into contact with a budding new duelist known as Yugi Muto, a sinister, secret agenda crops up putting the sisters in danger... but this is only the beginning. Part 1 of 6 in the Hope Chronicles.

18 years after DSOD Yugi and his friends are thriving. The future's looking bright until the Zero Reverse takes it all away. What seems like the end turns out to be a new beginning. Atem's back with a mission. The problem is he's still a teenager. The world's changed, the Pharaoh's friends have new troubles and he has new enemies. This time around, Yugi is the one protecting him.

After the fall of the Neo-Orichalcos, peace and quiet don't last for long. Atem returns from the afterlife, just in time to be caught up in Bandit Keith's dark plot to take revenge on Marik for mind-controlling him before Battle City. When Yami Marik joins the plot as well, the stakes increase exponentially.
When the hairdresser Yugi made an appointment with is a no show, he's put in the capable hands of Atem, Mirror Mirror's top hairdresser.

After Duelist Kingdom, Pegasus wins the final battle in his tower. It leaves him with nothing but Ryou and the spirit who took all hope from them both. Warnings for Emotional and Physical Abuse/Torture.
Some of Seto's mornings are better than others, but Mokuba makes them all worthwhile. Childhood character study.
They both lived in hell. Seto is grateful his was worse.
Shortly after the Pharaoh's Memories arc. The bikers have moved into a house in Domino City and are trying to get back to leading regular lives. But Alister and Valon are still having problems. . . .
What if Yami had decided NOT to play the Seal of Orichalcos to win the duel? There are two versions of the story, one in each chapter. Feel free to rate and review. :)

Mangaverse. Yugi's feeling lazy after promising his friends he'd go on a hike with them during a school camping trip. So naturally, he convinces the voice in his head that sometimes takes over his body to go for him. But then again, maybe that was the plan from the beginning. Chapter 2 features Yami Bakura's POV

Shortly after the Pharaoh's Memories arc. So, how did the bikers meet up again? Here is one concept. While each one is separated, Valon stumbles across an odd little theatre and a strange yet compelling actor.

Yami and Yugi Sennen are invited to their brothers' wedding. The only thing is: they have not contacted them in ten years. Knowing this, a friend of theirs came up with an idea to prank them and they agree. Hilarity and drama ensues! Fem!Yugi

During the events at Duelist Kingdom, Yugi and his friends wonder about two American girls that are present. Why do the girls look and feel familiar to Yami and Seto? What is their past and how are they connected to Yugi and his friends?
Seto Kaiba can't fix every problem, but he does what he can. One-shot.
When Anzu won't stop taking about a certain fling she had in college, Mai proposes a game to raise the stakes. Raise them far above each of their heads, it seems. Anzu/Mai.
While playing a video game, Atemu and Yuugi use cheap tricks to one-up each other.

The gang have not been to Bakura's apartment since their last visit almost resulted in them perishing during a game of Monster World. Not wishing to upset Ryou, they accept an invite to his birthday party, during which, Jonouchi is turned into a woman the. Can Jounouch and his friends deal with this change? And how will Katsu avoid the attention of a certain CEO?

The Zombie Apocalypse has broken out, and Yugi, Atem, Joey, Tristan, Tea, Mana, and Grandpa are looking to survive. They can't stay holed up in the game shop forever. Can they make it to KaibaCorp and Duelist Kingdom, or will the zombies get them? Hints of Peach, Polar, and Vaseshipping. Based on a writing contest prompt.
Yuugi has only a vague idea of what he's doing, but he has to be quick before his roommates catch him and tease him to death. Fortunately for him, one roommate is happy to lend a hand.
Joey and Seto duel. The winner get's to choose the punishment. [#Fluff, #Established Relationship, #Plotless]

When Kaiba has an accident he wanders around in spirit form, unable to interact with anyone. Except for Mokuba who reveals himself to be his guardian angel that came to lead him to the next world. Kaiba wants to join his brother in the afterlife as soon as possible... but is there really nothing left for him that is worth fighting for? (Prideshipping)

The thief had his eyes for Malik, not that the teen was aware of it, nor was he aware that there was another spirit residing in the Ring. Though the theif was loathed to have his way when he was in Ryou's body, although they had a special link that he got the 'ok' from.

After several miscarriages and a stillbirth, a young man by the name of Yami and the husband of the Pharaoh decides to do something drastic to protect both his husband and his fragile heart. (continuation of Alia D's one-shot story) Gift fic to Kuro-chan
Future Bulma takes a short moment to "celebrate" a special someone.
Bulma's awoken by a loud banging on her door in the middle of the night to be greeted by an unlikely houseguest...
Videl plays a game and has a crush on Gohan. Will she ever tell him how she feels? One-shot
Vegeta and Raditz decide to engage in a pranking contest. It's all fun and games until someone gets hurt. Short story in the same universe as "You Can Break Me but Can't Take My Pride"

Sequel to Chances. This was supposed to be the proudest day of her life, a payoff of her training with Krillin and Gohan, another day to spend with him and the Z Fighters, and a chance to get to know the Son Goku. Instead, the world is ending, losses keep piling up, and there's a bubblegum pink alien that is the cause of it all. How is anyone supposed to comprehend this?
(Cell Aftermath) Videl could unequivocally pinpoint the exact moment her life began to change. It was the day she met a lonely boy in the woods.

All is normal, until Future Trunks is impaled and killed. Vegeta snaps and the legendary SSJ2 shows itself. However, even though Cell is taken down easy, that doesn't mean the fight is over - oh boy, far from it. A menace takes the stage yet again, and the saiyan race in hell and heaven alike still play a role far from their own era. This is what if Vegeta went SSJ2 against Cell.
As Bulma looked at her Saiyan husband, she was once again reminded of how unfair it was that, unlike herself, Vegeta still looked as youthful and god-like as he did the day they met.
[Post-Buu Saga] Gohan reunites with the girl whose heart has been tested yet again. [Gohime]
Vegeta confronts Trunks before his second visit to the hyperbolic time chamber.

After Krillin and 18 have a nasty split, all hope seems lost. Though Chi-Chi and Bulma support her, 18 isn't sure she will ever find love again. But the man named Goku surprises her with how good and loyal of a friend he could be. This is not recommended for K/18 fans.
Bulma's candid reflection on her relationship with Vegeta as he confronts his emotional demons during the Babadi/Buu Sagas. (One-shot story. This is a repost. Reasons explained in the notes.)

Modern AU. Lapis is tired of being (negatively) compared to his sister, leading him to be somewhat depressed and antisocial. But young man named Yamcha enters his life and shows him all of the love and acceptance that Lapis never expected to get.
Vegeta is in search of a weapon fit for the Gladiator games. (Based on Nala1588's Space Arena AU.)
Jeice hates the rain, because frankly he has too much hair to enjoy it. And while no one else in the Ginyus understands, at least his equally long-haired new boyfriend will... right?
*ONESHOT* Goku is fighting the dreadful virus that attacks his heart, the only thing that's getting him through it is the soothing voice of his beloved wife.
Bardock can't shake the feeling of death he's had since returning home. When his plan to save his sons falls apart he must take a different approach, and a legend comes to life.
This child was Son Goku's last gift. [Writing month challenge - Day 23]

When Atticus gets killed after saving Cherry's life, he's sent to something called The Other World Tournament where he must compete with Goku to test whether he can go into Heaven or spend eternity of his afterlife in Hell, but it becomes a quick turn for the worst when a demon named Janemba starts challenging them.

Videl is not overly fussed by the new kid at school, Gohan, yet she seems to think he's not telling the whole truth. With this on her mind, she sets out to find the truth about this strange new guy and get's a little more than she bargained for.
Jeice is used to being watched - with fear, with respect, with admiration, but Raditz's eyes hold something different, and intriguing enough to start watching back...
this is about ghetto stuff

Bulma goes to comfort Chi Chi after the death of Goku, post Cell Games. A take on how their friendship might have gone from just having Goku in common to becoming friends in their own right. One shot.

Now living with Bulma, 16-year-old Gohan struggles to confront the demons of his past. Riddled with anxiety and PTSD, Bulma suggests he give high school a try. Yet Gohan can't seem to find his place in the world, and he soon finds himself pushed over the edge.
Goku and Chichi go on a vacation. Lots of fluff. A little lime. Set Post Majin Buu.
Goku and Vegeta share a personal moment, and it brings some memories back for Vegeta.
There was only silence now.
A short poem about Master Roshi.
A one-shot. What normal now stands for the Sons after Goku's death.
Goten's eyes reflect back something that he is not, nor he will ever be. Goku knows it very well: in his son he sees no flaws at all. Drabble!
After receiving a blow to the head, Goku reverts to his brutal Saiyan ways. Who has the strength and wit to save planet Earth from certain destruction and enslavement?
To prevent an early-death from high blood pressure, Bulma suggests Vegeta try an interesting method of relaxation.
A handsome visitor captures the attention of the busy Brief family – especially Bulma, it seems - leaving Prince Vegeta unmoored and contemplative about youth. (Lemon lurks in here.)
Goku kills Cell with the Instant Kamehameha. One-shot about the aftermath. I own nothing.
Peeked out and engrossed in the doorway that connected the terrace and the rest, Bra felt that nothing would move her from that place, except that...
After all, what was true in reality?
I died, I don't know how, but I died, and I've been floating in the void... aaaaaa ahhhh what's going ooooooon?...
After a difficult and demoralizing day at school, Little Bra finds herself in a completely bad mood. Still, that's nothing an afternoon with her papa couldn't fix.
this is what happens when I don't get any sleep and try to write lol, enjoy the madness xlxl
Goku gets an unexpected surprise when he goes speed dating, I wonder what it is lol xlxl
A fic about how pan and trunks got together after pan left his life . A. TP FIC WITH A SLIGHT GB.
Chi-Chi and Piccolo bonding over the same topic (Gohan)! Non-romantic fluff, oneshot.
Tenshinhan and Yamucha are Earth's last hope. Will they be able to defeat the villian who is someone they know? Rated T for content.
*ONESHOT* Bulma decides to throw a dinner party for her dear friends, will this be successful or is set up for disaster?

Ever since he met her, he had admired her, dreamt about her, thought what it would be like to have her with him, just to hold her, to watch her sleeping face. Now his time had come, and… 'Merciful Dende, get me out of here' (The horror part is sarcasm.) One-shot.

Zangya decides to hunt down the reclusive Gohan for some much-needed relaxation. When news of the impending Intergalactic Tournament comes to the attention of the preteens much to Zangya's dismay. She is soon forced into a choice between that of her blood or the bonds that she has made. What lies in Earth's future? Sequel to: Strong in The Real Way

An IMAGINE PROMPT CHALLENGE Imagine Frieza is resurrected. Upon his resurrection, he reconstructs his empire unbeknownst to the Z-fighters and puts a plan into motion to extract revenge against them. His first order of business...

This is part one of this series and well it all starts with a bagle. To truly understand this fanfiction you must give it a read. A bagle can cause a war? Yes it can go ahead and enjoy Goku fighting for his beloved bagle against BEENUS (i have been spelling that wrong on purpose) who will win?
Bandit Prince Yamcha tells his friends how he loved, and lost, the Princess of Science, Bulma, in a tragic tale of adventure.

What if Krillin and Trunks had not destroyed Dr. Gero's lab? Well, you would get what happens when a superintelligent computer able to perform its own research and develop lethal new weapons is unleashed on the world with a single purpose: killing Goku...

Yamcha didn't expect anyone to respond to his sticky-notes-to-the-window method of announcing a movie night. Much less a cute guy with a shared interest in martial arts. Although the more he looks at his new friend the more familiar he seems... well, nothing like a B-movie from decades ago your roommate picked out to embarrass you and slightly burnt popcorn to jog ones memory.
Bulma sees Krillin and 18 get in a fight and tries to help fix it. But they don't want her help or necessarily need it.

Between aliens and senzu beans, Gohan has never been able to decide whether he's living a fantasy or a sci-fi. But when you're up against a dizzying mixture of destruction gods, clones of your family and closest friends, alien dictators, androids, and magical beings, you use what you have. And for most of them? That's ki.

Bulma wrestles with unwelcome feelings and doubts about Vegeta and Bulla's father-daughter bond. For the first time ever, she wonders if she's a nuisance as a mother. (Has some fluff. One-shot story.)

Set during the three year gap before the attack of the Androids. Vegeta can't find his cereal and Bulma receives a rather unfortunate call from Yamcha. What will happen when Yamcha cancels a date on Bulma yet again?
Majin buu finds love

PLEASE READ THE A/N INSIDE. Based on Screen Rant's Movie Pitch Meetings. A scriptwriter approaches his boss with the movie idea for "Broly: The Legendary Super Saiyan", and gives a very "honest" proposal of what the movie is about, including flaws, plot holes, and everything else. Will it be hard to pass off this movie, or will it be "Super easy, barely an inconvenience"? COMPLETE

"Chocolates are a type of candy. They're made of sugar, milk, cocoa, and sometimes, nuts." The scientist explained "And I ate one so you could see that they aren't dangerous." Bulma snatched another one, she ignored Vegeta's growl. "And, I gave them to you; coz today is Valentine's Day!" Drabble from the series 'In Three Years'. It can be read after 'Baby Photo'.

Almost a year had passed since everyone learned of Son Goku's survival of Namek's explosion. While continuing to wait for Goku, Chi-Chi begins to think of Goku's possible reappearance in her life. Gochi Week Prompt: Daydreams

Decades have passed since Son Goku had left the world with the Eternal Dragon God. On the anniversary of Son Goku's disappearance, a certain individual pays her respects to Goku remembering her life with him and when they were at their strongest together. GoChi Week Prompt: Memories

I finally sat down and worked on my OC Lily's origin story and how she attained her Immortality that I usually mention briefly in the prologues of my works. It's just a small one shot story to explain it. Rated for violent character death and a few curse words. Story is placed in the Dead Zone Dragon Ball movie.

(Complete) This is the beginning of Rayne's story. How will it go? Will Rayne be able to redeem himself? Who is Vanilla? Find out on the next exciting entry of Rayne's beginnings! (Now with less walls of text!)
Vegeta is furious that his post-training meal is ruined by the Brief's annual winter ball. But when he goes to confront Bulma, his priorities shift.
Oneshot: He hadn't been born on Earth, but it had become his home. As such, he would defend it to the end. His Earth, or any other world that bore his world's namesake.

Full Story! After an incident with a sandwich, Bulma banished Vegeta from the gravity chamber until he apologized, which is unlikely. Retreating into the woods to train, he hears the soft sounds of a sobbing child...a child with a tail. Now complete, pending small blurbs

Videl is used to cheer and happiness on the anniversary of the Cell Games. The world survived and that's a good thing. When she visits Gohan she finds the happiness is not universal for her friend or his family. Two-shot.

Gohan has enjoyed the peace of his timeline for a few months, and the friendship with 17 and 18. He returns to the future to learn more about the other Universes and their fighters. However one bit of trouble after another starts when the time machine is lost in another timeline, and more trouble arrives early. How can Gohan fix a problem across multiple timelines?

This is a story about Vegeta training his son, Trunks, for the World Tournament that takes place in the beginning of the Buu saga. Can Trunks gain Vegeta's approval while making him proud as well? Find out NOW!
Vegeta had become much more than a rival long ago.
Did he miss Kakarot? Of course not.

"You'd think they'd be willing to work together now that they're a couple." Whis's statement was so surprising that Beerus had spit out what was left of his treat. Vegeta and Goku...together? What kind of joke was that?
"You know what I don't get, Vegeta?" He only hummed in response. "I don't get why you don't like Vegito. He's amazing."
Oneshot. Takes place during the Cell Games Saga. Yamcha and Krillin have a talk over beers when Yamcha's breakup is brought up.

Android Seventeen makes good on his promise to take Marron on a road trip too look for the dragon balls. All she's hoping for is a chance to get away from her overbearing parents. All he's hoping for is to let her have a little fun. Both of them get more than they bargained for. Sequel to Abnormal. Cover image by FinalGale Kira

When Yamcha is sent out on a field assignment he expects to see some fish, a little coral, maybe a few eels, the usual. That's what any other marine biologist would find. He finds a merman. Of course.
AU Prompt: Ice Cream Truck. Bulma makes Vegeta help her serve ice cream treats from a refrigerated truck. First time writing for this particular fandom...
Bardock is granted a request to meet his son Kakarrot and his family on Earth.
How Goten and Bra's relationship changes over the years. GotenxBra, One Shot.

She will be happy for her children. She will make sure to give them the life they deserve. Chi Chi copes with the loss of Goku after the Cell Games while she realizes she's going to have a second child. For Mother's Day.
Piccolo, Gohan and Goku cross paths with a Seer who once worked with King Piccolo centuries ago, and Piccolo is left to deal with the consequences. A DBZ interlude, complete.
Received as an anonymous Tumblr request. Bardock and Gine meet newborn Gohan. One shot.

Bulma and friend Krillin discuss Vegeta through the lens of the prince's relationships with others. When her husband arrives, she receives an earful - and then some. One-shot story.
Goten is really excited to be training with his brother Gohan for the upcoming world martial arts tournament. But he becomes upset when it seems like Gohan doesn't feel the same.

Still trying to catch up on my old BVDN drabble. T rated for flirtatious Bulma and a bit of citrus at the end. This set of drabbles are inspired by the One Piece/DBZ crossover Cross Epoch, and the Cross Epoch inspired doujins by Pachi. Not Beta-ed.

Raditz has been living with the others at Kame House. Launch has avoided him ever since he came, but one night discovers he's been sneaking out. Putting on a brave face, she decides to follow and confront him when the chance arises. For what reason could Raditz be sneaking out for?
Juuhachigou decides to go out with her newly found freedom and find a purpose. Or something like that anyway.

This is a one-shot based directly after the planet Potafu arc in Dragonball Super. It is what could've possibly happened if Vegeta punished Trunks for sneaking on Monaka's spaceship. Will Vegeta teach Trunks the hard lesson he needs? Find out now!

COMPLETE! Piccolo had thought that he had seen and experienced everything, in his long life. Through the persistence and support of a man and his family, he is about to learn how wrong he was. Spin-off to A Thrilling Chase.

Gohan, Videl and Pan are out to enjoy a nice time out, but low and behold, Piccolo has other plans for Gohan that day and it leads to a couple of pretty unexpected outcomes. Part of an art-trade with cc6512.

-ONE SHOT- He couldn't take his eyes off her. Son Goku, the greatest warrior in the world; mesmerised and perplexed by her in every way. He couldn't explain it. He was falling … there was no doubt about that ...

One fateful day, Goku and Vegeta wake up in each other's bodies. Until Bulma can find a solution, they decide to live out each other's lives...while keeping the situation a secret. Read & review if you like!

Bulma has discovered a mysterious energy deep within the planet. Reunited with her childhood friend Goku, they set course for adventure in hopes of awakening ancient power! Little does Bulma know that she's about to get hopelessly entangled in the bitter, age-old feud between the remnants of a fabled race of deadly warriors, and a tyrannical galactic overlord.
Goten is enjoying a lovely evening in with his best friends. Shame if something were to ruin that, huh?

Kid Buu is defeated and the universe is safe once more. The battle has left the saviour of Earth drained and weary. Now that the fight is over, the Son family reunite as a whole. Follow Goku and his family in the aftermath of battle.

Goku becomes sick with the deadly Heart Virus. Set in the Mirai Timeline. But there's a twist. It's up to Bulma to make the cure that can save Goku's life! Hurry up, Bulma! Goku is running out of time! Mostly Chi-Chi's P.O.V. No flaming.

One of the suggested breathing exercises from Gohan's ki-training textbook - to perform a song, written by Goten to entertain Pan and Bra. This one's about Vegeta. Once upon a time there was a handsome young martial artist who managed to get by/go to the ball with a little help from his friends, even if their methods were a little unconventional, and meet a cool, charming princess.

Prince Vegeta embarks on fatherhood, the sequel. Narrating the documentary of one's life can be both entertaining and difficult, especially while holding a newborn baby. (This doesn't follow any events in Dragon Ball Super.)

After years, he'd come to the conclusion that the world might very well be full of that kind of people, but he must have been particularly unlucky. That generally left him with Plan B.

"Just this morning, he had her in his arms..." An experimental one-shot depicting Majin Vegeta's thoughts and emotions right before his sacrifice. A song-fic, sequel to my one-shot "Hurt", inspired by the song "And All That Could Have Been" by NIN.

It started with a seemingly innocent visit with her husband on his break. It ended with handcuffs and a utility closet rendezvous. Seems she lives up to her reputation after all. Just not the way you'd expect.

"With only this amount of power you call yourself stronger!", I roar in his face as my fists connect with it again and again. Throwing him around like nothing. My power overwhelming him. Overwhelming a man worth the title of a god of destruction. And it feels damn good.

The next installment of The Time Patrollers, which will lead right into Xenoverse 2. Towa and Mira are back, and they're bringing some evil allies to deal with The Time Patrollers. But the Patrollers also have some new allies and a few new abilities as well. But will it be enough to stop the new evil alliance?

Gohan and Videl were going on their day at school as usual, until a strange man appeared, and offers to take them four hundred years into the future. Only to find out history was recorded a little differently then what the both of them expected. And they have quite the adventure together. Rated T for some slightly naughty scenes, and the occasional strong language.

Vegeta is forced to watch Bra and Pan for the day while Bulma and Gohan attend their work meetings and the saiyan prince is forced to shove his pride to the side for several hours of his life. One shot.

"Although he knew she could not see him, her eyes spoke a mile a minute. And, they were telling him to get his ass over there, and beat the living shit out of the man who had battered her gorgeous face." Bulma has been kidnapped, and it is up to Vegeta to be her saviour. Will he get there in time?

AU. Gohan and Tobney managed to defeat Vegeta and take over the army so now Gohan cannot wait to go back to planet Earth. Many years have passed since Majin Buu and the World Martial Arts Tournament has arrived again. Trunks is an adult and Vegeta has finally surpassed Goku. At the final match, its Trunks versus Vegeta. The younger Saiyan is ready to prove himself to his father, and he Can. Not. Lose.

He doesn't know why or how, but ever so often he wakes up on a strange planet in the body of a blue haired woman. If that wasn't bad enough, while he's there she's taking his place, royally screwing up his life. He's going to find her, one day, and when he does, she's going to pay. /complete

This is the story of the 'Dragon Ball Z' saga...in gender-flipped form! It follows the adventures of the gender-swapped versions of the Z Warriors, including Goka, Gohana, Krilla, Piccola, Princess Vegena, and much more as they gathered the Dragon Balls and fight countless evils. Goku has a nightmare that makes him realize he needs to tell Chichi how he feels about her, but between handling a Christmas party and crossing the line comments from his friends. Goku has to find the perfect time to tell her before its too late.

Was it because he had just seen her win her first junior division tournament? Where has the time gone? He was witnessing his little girl step into the full bloom of her womanhood and he wasn't ready for it.

High school AU. Vegeta, the new student in high school, is interested in Bulma. But there's some information that he doesn't want to tell her, as it might result in her not being interested in him. Can he find a way to tell her the truth? Bulma/Vegeta. Vegeta is a bit more mellow in this one.

One-shot. Visiting Sadala, the Saiyan planet in Universe Six, Trunks discusses his father's complexities with the king there. Vegeta has left an unforgettable mark on everyone in his wake. Trunks depicts the prince's transformative life in the best way he knows: through song. He doesn't fully grasp how much others who've encountered his father understand the melody - until he does.

A one shot tribute, and way to let out my feels, to the talented and beautiful Hiromi Tsuru, the Japanese voice actress of Bulma. May she rest in peace.

Chichi is feeling jealousy towards Goku's relationship with Bulma. Can Goku ease her mind?
Vegeta and Bulma find each other in the middle of the night. Both hoping to curb their loneliness and sharing their first kiss.

After Piccolo dies protecting Gohan, an enraged Gohan transforms into Super Saiyan 2 and decides to fight Frieza. Will the out-of-practice Demi-Saiyan manage to topple the tyrant and his newfound power, or will Frieza send Gohan off to join Piccolo? Following the Tournament of Power, Master Roshi decides that it's time to move on in life. With only Turtle at his side he finally embraces his fate, but this is Master Roshi we're talking about...
Something was amiss. Bra never came home that late. He knew something had to be wrong.

My first songfic. Gohan has a secret to tell but does he want to tell it? He questions himself, can he trust Videl with this secret? Gohan has an internal struggle and it's eating him apart. Entry for Gh/Vi Lovers Month 7.0 Contest

Bulma was given a note, a note not to be read until the love of her life had passed into Otherworld. The afternoon of his day of passing, Bulma read the note, and was surprised beyond belief. Read to find out what the note read, and how the Prince had surprised his wife to tears. (Deals with character death)

I'm Vegeta and i used to be the prince of a super powerful warrior space race that is now extinct. Long ago, i made a wish to some magic spheres and became immortal. Back then, i thought it was the best thing that has ever happened to me. Now i know how idiotic that decision was.

-"You can run. But you can not hide from the inevitable."- In which a deaf girl must fight for her survival against a bloodthirsty hunter. Her night gets even worse when he makes it his mission to have her head... [Oneshot] [Based off of the movie Hush]
A small collection shorts that take place in the DBZA universe.
*One-shot entry for the GhVi Month 7.0 Contest* *Songfic warning!* When two neglected souls meet during a heavy storm, they express their desire to get away from it all...
Here's a story of how yet another child attaches to the heart of our favorite Namek. and how he ends up warming up to the idea.

A sequel to "A Princess in Blue," Elyon continues her life on Earth, not revealing to anyone about the secrets of her past, not even to the love of her life, Piccolo. But when unexpected visitors and old and new villains begin to appear, it is becoming harder and harder for her to keep her "real" life a secret. Takes place during the Dragon Ball Super timeline. Romance included.
a collection of one shots embodying the moments, across time and universes, in which bulma and/or vegeta realize they've found their equal in one another.
Years go by, and Goku still can't help but spoil the kids in his life.
This 'what if' story explores what changes would be made to the latter half of the Majin Buu arc if Son Gohan had remained the main character! Includes a new epilogue 10 years after Buu!
Bulma asks, and is asked, 'why' a lot. Set in that tricksy 3-year-gap.
no no no no no this is a bad one this is GOD i only wrote this dream out for a friend just god it makes me want to v o m i t

Vegeta remembers his years with Zarbon, and regrets killing the man he once thought of as a father. "I only wish to visit him, or see him once more. To see if he is proud, or if he is disappointed." (May be out of character slightly, and could be considered as an AU. Not yaoi.)
series of drabbles focused around our favorite couple and their brand new baby girl. vegeta's pov
