crack!fic - A random AU scenario taking place in the first arc of Dragon Ball: everything is the same, except everyone has short-term memory loss (or just memory problems in general).

This story takes place in Resurrection F. When Frieza is finally revived and at the near end of his training, he hears that Whis is taking disciples! He asks and Whis agrees to train him. Frieza arrives on the planet to discover that Whis is also training Goku and Vegeta! Whis forces them to work together! How will the rivals stand each other!
Bulma hears something dying in the shower so she barges in and of course the saiyan prince doesn't lock doors.
To settle Trunks's curiosity, Bulma takes an impromptu trip down memory lane with use of the time machine hoping that she will be able to finally placate her son.

Trunks has been getting lost in his work for months, ignoring his best friend. When he finally finds the free time to spend with his friend, he realizes what he had a little too late. Can Trunks stop Goten from making the worst decision of her life or will he lose her forever? Trunks/FemGoten. Genderbent Goten.
What happens when the god of destruction finds himself in a world of dragons? Slight AU mostly centered around Beerus and his misadventures on Skyrim.
After some odd behavior, Chichi shares some exciting news. Lots of fluff. GoChi.
Dragon Ball Z, the greatest anime of all time, seen by Goku's eyes. This gives a revisions of all Sagas from Goku's point of view.
When Bulma made her time machine to send her son to the past she did not expect him to get stuck there only to come back years later with a family.

Gohan is damaged from all of his friends and even his student Trunks dying from the hands of the androids even now when he's destroyed them he's scarred and lies to the World to hide his pain. A woman knows he's hiding something she could see it in his lonely eyes she wants to find out in order to comfort him. Set in a Future Timeline AU. One Shot. Entry for Gh/Vi Lovers Month 6.0

Everything changes yet everything stays the same. What was it that made Trunks and Bulma desperate enough to break the laws of the universe and return to the past? What sort of nightmare did they experience and what hope could they have left? A retelling of "The History of Trunks" that's canon to "Tales of the Monkey Queen."
What really happended on plenet piccolo
Gohan observes Goku playing with Pan and thinks about what he wants to replicate from his father's parenting.

What if Goku never went to Earth and became one of Vegeta's soldiers?

Mirai Trunks has been summoned to a meeting by Android 18. In a desolate future, can the man trying to save earth make a truce with one of the creatures trying to destroy it?
After a sparring session, Trunks has a single question to ask Vegeta about his relationship with his mother.

The Briefs are throwing a party to celebrate the life they have before the destined arrival of the androids. Bulma really wants Vegeta to go, if only for all the free food. She also wants him to dance with her, but apparently Saiyans 'don't dance'. Can she convince him otherwise? All reviews welcome.
Sequel to The Troubles of Our Time. Two years after the defeat of Kid Buuly, Bardock is given another set of visions that causes him and the other Saiyans to go the alternate timeline to save them.

Welcome to my first fan fiction published for an audience! This story follows the character of Elyon, a princess from a far away planet that escapes her boring and controlled life to have a much more rewarding and adventurous life on planet Earth. Once she settles down, she ends up meeting, guess who? This story follows the Majin Buu, Fusion, and Kid Buu sagas.
After Thirteen Years, Gohan finally gets a chance to see those he's missed. How will his dead friends react to seeing him dead in the afterlife? One-shot.

Vegeta and Bulma's hearts and memories are stirred by a crimson-colored artifact, uncovered by their curious daughter, reminding them of their path to marriage. This is a one-shot sequel to "Bulma's Cold Misfortune," set seven years later, so the light humor and relaxed portrayals of the characters are similar.
When Goku and Vegeta are gone, Gohan decides its time to step up.

Sometimes the words 'I love you' are not necessary. Vegeta can't understand why he can't say those words after being together with Bulma for decades but then she decides to explain to him why she knows that even if he never said so, he does love her.
Bulma is a legendary Saiyan assassin and Vegeta is her next target. B/V, Vegeta-sei AU. Cover image, by annegoddamn, aka obiwanskenobi on tumblr.

One day at Capsule Corp, Bulma notices something odd going on with Vegeta, but of course, he refuses to be upfront about it. She formulates a plan to find out the truth. ONE-SHOT! Read & review if you like!

what happens Vegeta learns about Bloody Mary, the terror that makes even the adults piss their pants? and what would be the consequence of the frequent mockery Vegeta throws at Bloody Mary? Read and Find out what happens next

my first fanfic here and is a trail since i dont know how to use the network takes place after the buu saga and focuses on gohan's life WARNING! suicide enjoy and review i will soon publish a fanfic on dbz and zatch bell crossover
A one shot focusing on how Freiza tried to wipe out all the Saiyans, but Vegeta still got him in the grand scheme of things.

In a totally reversed Dragon Ball universe/multiverse (take your pick), Kakarot has been kidnapped by Jaco and will be brainwashed to conquer Earth. What will happen in the future? Only you can decide. Challenge story.

Gohan had returned to the past after his adventure in the future timeline. With the knowledge of what's to happen, he felt ready to prevent any trouble the Androids would cause. While he expected timeline changes, he wasn't expecting the ones that were about to happen. Can he defeat Cell before he becomes Perfect? And what happens when another enemy arrives years early?
(DISCONTINUED)The students of Orange Star High School listens to an odd documentary about an alien warrior race, the Saiyans. FOLLOW GoHaNViDeLSoN's story...
Sometimes they settle disagreements with their fists. The outcome is always unexpected, but pleasant.

Goten Day - Trunks has a problem. Goten has promised to do what he can to help. Though it's definitely not something he expected.
She's the standard of what is beautiful. He's not. She's strong. He's way behind in strength. However, 18 will choose him over and over again.

Not satisfied with Planet Vegeta's demise, the Frieza Force seeks to exterminate all surviving Saiyans and make sure their race can never be revived. In order to be absolutely certain, all beings who reproduce with them must either be modified from accepting the Saiyan blood or face their own destruction. Challenge story.
Gohan Day - Little toddler Gohan wakes up because of a nightmare and seeks his own comfort instead of interrupting his parents in the middle of the night.

GoChi Day Fic - Modern Military AU Setting - Chi-Chi and Gohan wait for an expected call from Goku, who is currently deployed, and Chi-Chi wonders if she'll be able to share some important news with her husband or not.

(1st fanfiction story) - 7 Years after the defeat of Cell, Gohan is in High School. 3 weeks have past since his first day, and things are not looking to well for him, in terms of fitting in. Then, Bulma sends the original video of the Cell Games to his High School. How did she get the video and how will Gohan's relationship with his classmates and with Videl turn out to be?
In a different universe, the Saiyans of Planet Vegeta expand on their own terms. Challenge story.
Vaguely he wonders if it is possible to call and reach out into a broken shell of once former self. A prelude to a tragedy known as Frieza.
"You haven't begged yet," the thing following James said.
Lily and James meet minutes after death

Harry is feeling depressed after Sirius's death and hearing the prophecy, but spending time with a certain muggleborn witch has made him realize that life might actually be worth living after all. Harry ponders just how important Hermione has grown to him, and comes to a startling epiphany about his feelings for her. Sixth year oneshot. Total HHr.
When Tom sleeps, he is at peace. It is, perhaps, the only time Tom ever looks at peace. In slumber, his carefully constructed mask of absolute composure is only that—a mask. (COMPLETE.)
Voldemort has won the war, or so he thinks. How will Ron and Hermione react to his latest establishment: a Marriage Law?
ONE-SHOT: No one knew about Hermione's long-distance relationship with her former professor. It's been a decade. They've both moved on. Mostly.

'Love is a form of magic more powerful and glorious than any other'. She wasn't someone he deserved to be with but someone he needed, a watchful guardian, a silent support, a shoulder to cry on and someone who would never leave his side even in death. Even in times of sorrow and loss, Harry realized, life gave chances to people, and he strove to live his life to the fullest.

After witnessing the trial of Draco Malfoy, Hermione Granger has been getting to know him more during his time on house arrest. She falls asleep on his couch one night, forcing her to reflect on her true feelings. She can't take the uncertainty any longer. A companion piece to chapter 10 of my WIP 'The Bright Green Blanket' however it also functions as a standalone one-shot.
What would Tonks do if she survived the Final Battle…but Remus didn’t? Who would be there to comfort her? And would a second chance at love live up to the love of her life she thought she’d lost?

Ariana doesn't die in the duel in Godric's Hollow. Instead, Aberforth convinces Albus and Gellert to help her before starting on their quest. Grindelwald soon finds that it serves his plan perfectly. Low-key Grindeldore.
Hermione meets her girlfriend Daphne's parents for the first time.
The castle knew that everyone was in need of a reminder of the good old days - even if that reminder came with the slightest hitches.

Sirius and Regulus have been out of contact ever since Sirius ran away from their childhood. However, with the death of their mother, Sirius finds himself in the passenger seat of Regulus' car and heading towards London. Between new and old trauma, popped tyres and green paddocks, Sirius comes to realise that Regulus might not be so bad-but just what waits for them in London?
James always saw something more in Regulus and even tried telling him, but knowing how stubborn a Black could be, came up with a plan should Regulus ever need help - one involving Kreacher.
Sirius didn't expect to ever find himself vindicated, let alone that soon. Nor did he expect to find something he thought lost now back in his life, let alone the kind of changes that would mean.
Sirius wanted Regulus to be sorted into Gryffindor and pines over it.
Fred and Hermione share a drink or two. * Fred Lives
Romilda Vane learns that her actions can lead to unwanted confrontations.
Inserted into Dumbledore and de-aged to a four-year-old child, SI decides to fix it all. Snape is there, playing hapless father to the little eager beaver. Part 12 — Albus and Charlotte bake a cake.
Albus Dumbledore is faced by an irate Harry Potter who demands answers pertaining his involvement since his childhood.
Harry Potter. The man. The myth. The legend. But sometimes, legends get a bit distorted. AKA, four drunkards in a bar tell a random stranger Chuck Norris jokes, Harry Potter style! Crack!Fic
Lavender noticed Hermione hasn’t been taking care of herself and decides to help
The trial and plea of a man trying to say sorry, but is it enough?

Ghost!AU. A ghost story causes Harry to go and search out the entity haunting the owlery in order to figure out who they are and why they are haunting the owl's roost. But will what he finds bring about a more disastrous ending than he thought it would?
Tom kidnaps Harry. They fight. Harry falls in love. Yes, another Tomarry. Written for IWSC; S4; R6.
Just another mundane Dramione date night
Death isn't quick. At least not for Anthony or Daphne. It's a slow torturous process, but maybe together, they can stand up against the injustices of the world.

And then I saw her face, now I'm a believer...There's only one girl James Potter wants to ask to the school fundraiser dance; Lily Evans, the Head Girl to his Head Boy, and master of the Bat-Bogey Hex. This time will she finally say yes? Or will he once more end up with bogey bats flying out of his nose?
Dobby's child will have better than her father did.
After the battle, Fred returns earthside to check on his brother.
Harry Potter finds himself sulking on Halloween in his 6th year of Hogwarts when he gets interrupted by a certain Daphne Greengrass. Sometimes, all it takes is a wish upon a star. Short One-shot.
Pettigrew's death seemed like defeat, but the momentary impulse that caused it changed the course of wizarding history.

Everyone knew about soulmates. There was someone out there who would love you no matter what. But fate wasn't kind, and sometimes soulmates had trouble finding each other. Fem!HarryxPercy, slowburn, Soulmate AU

"We could take a chance, holdin' nothin' back like it's our last dance" Hermione never thought she was going to be involved with someone like Theodore Nott, but here she was, owning him a life debt. (AU Canon Divergence)
Neville's lifelong wish comes true: he gets to bring his mother home with him. Now, he only has to make sure she's happy.

Dear Muggles, wizards, creatures...whoever is actually reading this, Don't believe everything you see at the movies. Behind every lie is some truth, though. You just have to look for it. I am Atsuko Fuji, and I was Gellert Grindelwald's only Obscurial. I was his weapon against tyranny and the only girl he ever loved. I thought they killed him, he thought they killed me...
Voldemort's last thoughts before death.

One shot drabble, taking place in Lupin's office during his first session teaching Harry to repel the dementors.
Mia Aimee Potter, daughter of Fleamont and Euphemia Potter, decides her name is now is James Cayden Potter, son of Fleamont and Euphemia, NOT a daughter.
When Teddy has his first child, he knows just who to ask for guidance. Microfic, That's Life Together Universe side-story.

Harry Potter is rescued by an ancient order of knights, and is raised and trained to become one. What will that do to change the Wizarding World? A fairy tale of knights, princesses, toads, and trolls set in the Harry Potter universe. Good versus evil. Further Words of Warning are in the prologue. Harry, Hermione, Neville are joined by some O/C's.
"There were wizards and there were Muggles, but Brayden was neither." A story about a squib from an old magical family, set in the time of the Hogwarts Legacy game. Warning: it can get a bit dark.
When Percy spots Penelope in the hallway, he somehow finds his legs carrying himself behind a large pillar. He stands, mostly hidden, peering around the column.
A reconciling moment for Luna and Draco.
The Prefects' bathroom is one of Myrtle's favorite places to escape, and she soon discovers that she's not the only one with the same idea.
How can a question change so much? An angry Harry demands to know who entered his name in the goblet. "Who? Who entered my name?". One-shot.
Written for the Minor Character Romione March Challenge!
After all, he had already lost everything that mattered, there was only the game and, of course, his infinite years.
Harry confronts Hermione about how useless the DA list jinx was. One Shot.

One chapter ("Aberforth") of my bigger piece, "After The War", has a bit of Harry's perspective on Dumbledore's machinations. It got me thinking about how the Headmaster himself would have seen it: I wanted to go with grey instead of black and white. Reviews welcome, as always-I often feel like I'm tossing my stuff off a steep cliff.
Teddy Lupin looks up at the stars the night before his first day at Hogwarts and thinks of his parents.

One world, or many, the mission of defeating Voldemort remains the same yet the heaviness of the burden adds together until there's nothing left but a broken shell of a man. Master-of-Death-Kinda. One-Shot. AU.
A little Weasley family moment. Written for IWSC Writing School Round 6, wc limit: 250.
Harry takes someone unexpected to the Yule Ball, and both parties are happy about it.
Not everyone gets serenaded at their wedding, but then not everyone marries someone like Severus Snape.
The new Muggle Studies professor at Hogwarts makes Severus second guess his decision to not pursue the witch he is in love with, thinking she's too young for him.

Set some time after Dumbledore's death and funeral in the Half-Blood Prince, Professor McGonagall finds Harry in Dumbledore's office. She insists they have a little chat. The inspiration is from the scene where McGonagall finds Harry in Dumbledore's office in Half-Blood Prince. What if Harry accepted her offer to have a chat?

Once in a Cat's-Eye Moon, Minerva finally gets to dance with the one she loves. A flash fiction story of love, curses, and fate. May this be a reminder to us all, Dear Reader, to make the most of the short time allotted to us with the ones we cherish.

Post War, Non Epilogue Compliant. Even years after the battle against Voldemort, Harry still has trouble sleeping. So the new DADA professor finds himself wandering the lonely stone halls at night. During one of his midnight strolls, he bumps into the only other night owl at Hogwarts, Aurora Sinistra, the Astronomy professor. Taking a chance, they strike up a conversation.
Established Bellamione oneshot

*Why would you ignore me?* Draco thought furiously, as the Mudblood turned her back on him in 1st year. *Why would you talk to me?* Draco thought, filled with shame, in his 8th year. *Please talk to me.* Draco thought endlessly, as he looked at his Dept of Mysteries colleague. A mutual pining fic for a pair who only share one brain cell when it comes to each other.
A glimpse into Dobby's life as a servant to Lucius Malfoy. Written for IWSC season 4, round 6.
She never guessed she'd turn into a crazy cat lady.
Everybody thinks everything is going to be all hunky-dory and they can just sit back and relax after they've won the war. Umm...No. A "...That Idea?" alternate universe story.
One shot song fic to Thomas Rhett's Unforgettable. All recognizable components belong to their respective owners.
After the battle, after all the funerals and the ceremonies, Harry begins to heal with the one person that matters
Harry is having a string of bad dates. Thankfully, Kingsley is always there with a blanket, a cuddle, and an egg sandwich.
Harry's not really sure what's going on, but Tom looks pretty when he smokes, and that's a bit of a problem.
It took them a long time to get there, but eventually, they were right where they were supposed to be.

After Fred was lost in the Battle of Hogwarts, George just isn't as happy as he used to be. Knowing what was needed to cheer his friend / soon to be brother up, Harry goes looking for it, and finds it, giving it to him as a birthday present on the 1st of April.

DRABBLE: A group of Gryffindors were trying to set up Hermione and Severus, little did they know, they both had mutual interests regarding each other but too afraid to act upon them. With the help of the castle and Moaning Myrtle, will the two finally act upon those feelings?
If everyone had a hidden talent, Harry's would be tickling the ivories.
Remus's favourite muggle book series has a new addition, Sirius hasn't done his Christmas holiday homework, magical snowball fights and stickmen?

Chaser Molly Prewett is captain of the Gryffindor quidditch team and looking for a new beater. Driven by an intense protective feeling, out of nowhere, Arthur Weasley tries out. Rival captain (and Molly's secret snog partner) Lucius Malfoy does not like it, rightly suspecting that Weasle-Bee might be just what Molly needs to finally put Lucius behind her forever. Marthur? HEA
Andromeda isn't sure about reconnecting with her sister after the War, but Teddy might just be the key to making it all work. A prompt from the amazing ThisIsMegz! Family fluff!
One-shot. Ginny is about to receive a Quidditch award in a night of her dreams. And no matter what he says, Harry has to be there.
Happy birthday Deadwoodpecker! A little Hinny fluff for you! Ginny is used to the teasing, but Harry's always happy to help when the teasing gets to her. Post-War Hinny fluff.
There was a moment of clarity for Regulus one New Year's Eve, in foolish stubbornness the rest of the family would have associated only with his older brother.

As far back as Harry could remember, Sirius had always been there in his life. From every skinned knee to winning the 'Best Milkshake Competition' in Muggle Primary. To him, Sirius was just as much a parent as Dad was and Harry will make sure he knows it. - Or, Harry Potter wants to become Harry Potter-Black. James is supportive and Sirius is overwhelmed. AU. James!Lives.
One day, the Room of Requirement shows Ted and Andromeda something it has never shown them before. Andromeda has never wanted it more. Oneshot.
Just Regulus and Narcissa interacting. (literally just cousins talking)
Reading those terrible books about werewolves feels different, when Harry has Teddy in his arms. Oneshot.
Sirius is always so, so aware of how much time he lost in Azkaban; but never more so than when he is with Kingsley. Oneshot.

AU, SSHG, Crack, In a world where Lily lived, life was not perfect for Severus Snape. Hope came with the arrival of Hermione Granger who first became his apprentice, friend, and then so much more. But old friends are not happy with his happiness, and one spell changes everything.
With less than a day to prepare will Hagrid be able to give these kids the Easter of a lifetime?
Limerical Love, a Hermione & Severus short. HG/SS HEA, always. AU, fluff, no warnings. I'm working without a Beta, so it's just overly edited by the Owl; all mistakes are my own.

The multi-chapter "After the War" piece goes with the book version, with Harry not taking leave before going to the forest. This is a smaller piece where he goes the movie route and does say goodbye, with minor changes for Greater Plausibility and Moar Angst.

Hermione is in teen pregnancy, and her labour starts during class. Ginny helps her give birth to Rose, but not without complications. Tell me what to write next! Only condition: Harry Potter related! *Disclaimer, I don't own Harry Potter*
It started the moment her mudblood skin connected with my face. The nagging feeling at the base of my throat.

In a universe where Sirius and James are coparenting Harry, they've slowly been heading towards something neither of them have acknowledged so far. Until an accident and some fortuitously placed panic gives them the push they needed. Or, Harry gets hurt, Sirius freaks out & James is confusion max. A coming together Prongsfoot fic.
Sirius dreads returning home to Grimmauld Place. As they sit on the roof and share a bottle of firewhisky, James offers him another option.
Hermione doesn't mean to help with any product development for Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes. She just happens to know a lot about plants, that's all. * Fred Lives
Harry isn't the only one with a secret. Yeah, I'm doing Haphne again.
Muggle AU in which Hermione and Draco form a rivalry over a Squeeze Toy Alien plushie at Disney World. One-shot. Complete.
Draco walks into the Quidditch game, irritated and late, expecting to walk out with one prize- and ends up with two. *features fem-Harry*
For I Could Not Have Her.
James and Sirius first potions lesson in Hogwarts.

Romione one-shot. During the horcrux hunt Ron and Hermione share a long-awaited uninhibited moment to sort out their past and steel themselves to survive their difficult present, together. Complete, HEA
Harry, Hermione, Ron and Luna plan on having a fun, wacky Christmas. Even Professor Snape is invited. However, Ron causes some tension between Harry and Hermione.
She was very fond of the 3 R's, not reading, writing and arithmancy, right now the 3 R's were reading, rest and relaxation
After a night out drinking with friends, Hermione discovers an unexpected souvenir that may just show what she's wanted all along.

Fuck expectations, she was Ginny fucking Weasley and they will have a stellar night tonight. She didn't know just how stellar it would turn out though, especially with the gorgeous barmaid who smelled of aniseed and oranges, her favourite fruit.
Draco Lucius Malfoy was not a fool, he knows what his father did. But he was named after him for a reason, and he will not let that memory die.
When Blaise makes the mistake of sharing his secret with Theo, he should have known it was only a matter of time before the lack of filter bit him in the backside

After overhearing that Professor Snape helps abused victims, Harry decides to give it a go. But, of course, he's Harry and nothing goes smoothly. This is my take on how the scene should've gone. Written for Writing School; IWSC; S4; R5.

Harry Potter was his, and Lavender Brown would rue the day she was born. But, what was supposed to be a simple task, went horribly, horribly wrong. Or: when Tom Riddle accidentally murdered the wrong person. MCD, angst, murder, suicide, accidental murder. Muggle!AU, SameAge!AU, NoDarkLord!AU. Written for IWSC; S4; R5.
A pregnant Chinese Fireball dragon? No problem! Constant sideways rain in Ireland? Piece of cake. Hermione having to deal with her feelings for Charlie Weasley… well that's another story.
In which everyone is well-adjusted and trying to organise a Little League Quidditch game that ends with someone catching the snitch. Or Severus Snape gets roped into refereeing Little League.
When Shyou's father dies under mysterious circumstances, it is up to her and a kind healer to bring the killer to justice. Will they succeed or will Shyou meet a similar fate?
Where a magical feather forces Harry to address his trauma
Harry doubts a lot. This time, he questions why his boyfriend chose him out of all people in the world. (CDHP)
Daphne never thought she'd get to have a conversation with the Tony Gold of all people!

When Severus is given the opportunity to serve an alternate sentence for the murder of Albus Dumbledore in the Department of Mysteries, he is certain that it will be preferable to Azkaban. Hermione feels deep guilt about having left Severus in the Shrieking Shack, so she is willing to sign anything to help him. The devil, as always, is in the details.
George is suffering after the events of the Battle of Hogwarts, and nobody can reach him. That is, nobody until Lee Jordan. Title credit to TSwift
Hermione has the perfect plan to get Harry all to herself in Year 6. Which, sadly, doesn't go quite according to plan... Just for fun. R&R.
Harry meets Walburga, alone, whilst in Diagon Alley instead of the usual Slytherin crowd. The repercussions of this difference see him down a very different path.
I'll bet you're familiar with fairy tales, so here's my death story in a format you'll understand. But be warned: not all fairy tales have a happily ever after.

Draco had always wished that Colin Creevey would look up to him the same way that Colin looked up to Harry Potter. But Colin never had, no matter what Draco did. And now, Colin was dead. It seemed unfathomable that the one person whom Draco had based his entire life around was gone.

Ron Weasley has loved Princess Hermione Granger for years now. Silently and completely. But he's her personal guard, and Hermione doesn't even know his name. And then a potential suitor shows up. [Fairytale!AU & Royalty!AU]
Ron Weasley has met his dreamgirl. The pressure is on when he needs to craft the perfect text. Can his friends help him? Muggle AU
Harry's happy for his friends and their engagement. No, really, he is! But he's also really, truly miserable. EWE, Triad, Neville/Luna/Harry

"Because of you, we're stuck together for life!" James couldn't help but feel smug over what she said, especially when he remembered how he felt hearing Alice talk about Francis. He could only hope she would see his side of things. (Muggle AU)

Hermione may have lost her voice due to a cold, but this doesn't mean Theo wouldn't be there to try to give her voice—even if it was with a true love kiss. (Muggle AU) (could be read as snippet from 'One I've Been Missing')

Soulmates are rare, but real. Each mate has a mark that is completely unique to their connection. What happens if the soulmates are on opposite sides of the war? Can the two still come together in harmony, knowing the odds are against them? What would they risk to be together?
It's the end of the day, and all Poppy wants to do is sit down and rest. Unfortunately, the students are getting in the way of that.
Sirius and Regulus talk about their first kiss. AU!
Harry and Sarah Goldhorn from my story, The Power of Love. In this one-shot, we see a story that never was.

Following the death of sixteen-year-old Harry at the hands of Voldemort, the Order of the Phoenix get desperate and decide to summon a Chosen One from another dimension. When nobody appears, they believe they failed, and try again. But, they didn't. As they repeated the ritual, more and more Harrys landed right outside Headquarters, one more confused than the other.
Ginny and Draco are Hogwarts professors and married to each other. After a long day, Ginny decided to create a feast for them. What could possibly be the occasion? ONESHOT, AU.
Harry begins to get to know his cousin, Phemy, and discovers more of his Potter heritage.

Daphne Greengrass wants to know if those points Ron Weasley got for Wizard's Chess in First Year were earned, or given. Ron demonstrates his skill, and soon is in for more than he expected. One shot, Chess themed, RonxDaphne. R&R please.

After accidentally drinking a mind-clarifying potion, Harry renounces magic when told he is in the Triwizard Tournament. He walks away from the magical community to begin a new life as a Squib in the Muggle world. However, he sees no harm in taking advantage of what magic he can!

"I've had enough." She said and finished her drink. "I'm fucking sick of all this, this pain, do you understand? That your sick head prevents you from loving me, that it takes you away from me. That you're an asshole and I'm such a naive girl. But it ends today. " /prompt: Pansy Parkinson/Sirius Black plus denial of feelings on Sirius part

She was almost sixteen when she first saw him. It was during the winter break when she returned from the Beauxbatons to England, to spend the holidays with her Father. /Idea of Bill being her soulmate was like an air for Hermione and she would do anything to make it true. So desparate moves required desperate measures.
Harry witnesses Corene's true personality, and he loves it.
Ron, who has been having money problems, puts Harry in a tough situation. Hermione wants everything to be okay for her friends, but Ron gets in the way. Thankfully, Luna shows up to help Harry out.
Harry overhears the Order discussing his Horcrux status and barricades himself in his room.
Ron is surprised by an actual job interview when he suggests that he come and work at WWW. [Everybody Lives AU, implied Romione]

COMPLETE. Originally written over 15 years ago, this has been completely revamped. Dumbledore decides that what the school really needs is a good old fashioned singing competition to shake things up. (Dr/H, HP/GW, RW/PP)
If only Harry was brave enough to confess his love, then he and Cedric won't be switching stares all the time. (CDHP)

Sometime during the 1930s, Albus Dumbledore and Gellert Grindelwald come together to talk about their past, present, and future. Lots of angst ensues. Inspired by the Secrets of Dumbldore restaurant scene released two weeks ago
Ginny challenges Hermione to have a normal conversation with Ron. Hermione can't stand to let someone think she doesn't have full control of herself. This should be easy, right?
When Hermione gets stuck in her dreams, Harry and Ron will have to wake her up. In order to do that, Harry might have to tell Hermione about how much she means to him.

"So, what do you think kissing girls would be like?" Theo didn't know the answer to that, and it pained him—not only because he hadn't kissed a girl yet, but because he didn't know the answer. He had always prided himself on knowing things.
He should have walked away and left the stag to its own devices, but instead, Regulus began to speak. "Hi, my name is Regulus."
Lee glanced at Fred's reflection and immediately whirled around to face him. "Oh, Merlin, that's your 'I did something bad' face. How bad did you fuck up?" "On a scale of one to ten, it's an eleven."
Draco was rudely awakened by a loud, "Wakey wakey, eggs and bake-y!" He groaned and rolled over in bed, yanking the pillow over his head to silence the annoying voice of one Harry Potter.

AU One-Shot: Ron Weasley has lived his life knowing he will never be chosen, knowing that others will forever be more important. Knowing something and feeling it are two very different things and, when Harry's name comes out of the Goblet of Fire, Ron finally buckles under the weight of that truth.
A friendship between Padma and Terry develops into something more over the years.
A drabble in which Hermione, Ginny, and Luna drink wine, watch 10 Things I Hate About You, and gossip about boys.
After the war, Ron prepares to testify against Peter Pettigrew.
Companion piece to 'Fudge Gets Told Off.' Here's what was being talked about in the galleries during the Fudge trial.
Harry Potter Headmaster of the Rocky Mountain school of Magic struggles to move on following the death of his wife. EWE. Not Slash. Post Hogwarts. First of a three book series.
Blaise chuckled and began his story. "Do you know the legend of La Befana?" Scorpius shook his head, his eyes widening. "Wha's dat?" "Not what, it's a who." "An owl?" "No, La Befana is a witch."
When Hermione smiled up at him, her eyelashes fluttering, Thorfinn's breath hitched. He realised that he had been lying not only to Lucius but to himself too.
"Um, Granger… Don't panic, yeah…" "Cedric…" "But… we just might be… lost."
"I know you miss her, Harry," she whispered in the darkness. "I do, too. I can't even imagine what you're going through, but you should know that I'm here for you."

"All you need is true love's kiss, Reggie," Sirius said, wrapping his arm around Regulus's shoulder and tugging him closer—even though Regulus was now baring his teeth at Sirius and was a second away from ripping his brother's head off. "The mistletoe will disappear as soon as you get that kiss, I promise."

"Do you think you're ready to meet our relatives?" "As ready as I'll ever be," Harry replied, running his hand through his hair. Hermione sighed and turned towards him to smooth down the strands. "Well, get ready to be proven wrong."

Lily Evans knew that the moment she decided to get together with Narcissa Malfoy it would make her live the best life she could have, and she hadn't been wrong since. (AU Canon Divergence) (Could be read as a sequel to 'why can't I kiss you on the dancefloor')
Draco has started acting even ruder than usual. Harry and Ron think that Draco's a hopeless jerk, but Hermione thinks Draco's a victim of his dad's bad influence.
Harry and Daphne were perfect together... But when Daphne is taken from him, he will will do anything to right that wrong.
Ron and Hermione spend some time together before Harry's rescue from the Dursleys.
A week after the war, and after caring for the Weasleys, Hermione can no longer put what happened with her and Ron aside. Warnings for very subtle sexual references.

Prompt: "you're famous and I jokingly left a comment on your social media asking if you'll go egg my ex-partners house with me this weekend, and I never expected you to respond, let alone show up Friday night with dark sweatshirts, toilet paper rolls, and three egg cartons tucked under your arm" Muggle AU. R&R.
Ron decides to plan a wedding for him and Hermione. This comes as a surprise to Hermione. Ron has a lot of plans, but he needs Harry's help.

Pranks! Plots! Dancing? The Yule Ball goes a little differently when Neville is forced to leave early, and Ginny, left all alone, is asked for the last dance of the night by none other than Harry Potter. What starts as a kind gesture turns into something a little more meaningful as Harry discovers that there is more to his best friend's little sister than he thought.
Adrian and Oliver are just acquaintances. Until they're aren't.

Inspired by a Reddit Prompt: A bigger bully than Dudley moves to Little Whinging and befriends Harry out of spite for Dudley. A mostly canon compliant one shot story with small changes and a different ending. Hopefully you find this simple and sweet.

Rose Granger-Weasley-Snape offers to help her friend Teddy out by hiding his girlfriend's birthday present at her house. The one thing she forgot was that her mother is allergic to bunnies which is what Teddy got Victoire. Will Servus be able to get his stepmother to open up and admit to her mother what's going on or will she find out on her own?

Oh what Draco Malfoy wouldn't give for a date with Harry Potter... "What! Take me out on a date? ...Malfoy, you have got to be kidding me." And that's why... "Yeah sure, when pigs fly. Now shove off." Flying pigs were seen all over Hogwarts the next couple of days.

Falling into a pit in the middle of nowhere might sound like the last thing they need on their dangerous quest. In reality, it might be exactly the excuse they're looking for to mend everything that had been damaged.
When Bill sees Harry abused, he does everything he can to find out what happened. *Disclaimer: I don't own Harry Potter* Please review!
Draco was determined to win Hermione for himself. Hermione's cat had other ideas.
Harry's planning on getting married to Luna. However, Ron decides to sabotage the wedding.
Hermione was hoping for a nice, pleasant day, but her classmates give her a chaotic day.

Harry finally says he has had enough. Entering the wizarding world, Harry had thought his life would be different. Well, he was wrong. Fed up of the treatment he got from Snape, he left Hogwarts at the end of first year. Was his decision right? Will he get a better chance at life now? Or will he finally be lost to darkness? let us discover. Ultimately Slash at the later years.

In Harry's first year, a Ravenclaw creates a device that projects your first significant memory for all to see. Hoping to see his parents, Harry gives it a go. He does get his parents…but also far, far more than he had bargained for.

Hermione Granger is smart enough to notice the flaws of her classmates and teachers. She used to be afraid of giving them advice, in order to avoid seeming like Ms. Know It All, but she can tell that her advice is needed.

Summary: When someone tries to kidnap Harry from Hogsmeade during their fourth year and Hermione is dragged along with, she uses her magical inheritance to make sure their kidnapper never bothers them again; creature!Hermione; One-shot; Warnings: Kidnapping, death
Harry wakes with no memories, only faint impressions of people he has never met. All except one: Tom Riddle. Harry knows everything about Tom Riddle.

WARNINGS; Abuse, Neglect, Self-Harm, Suicide Attempts. Harry has been abused and neglected by the Dursleys for years. No knows what he does to cope. No one knows he cuts. Except Remus. How can Remus help? And will Remus tell Sirius?
Harry is getting his six-year-old checkup at Hogwarts. However, not everything goes according to plan. AU. I'm Fine universe. One shot.
The one with the power the Dark Lord knows not. Humor/Parody. AU. OOC. One-Shot. Complete.

The seasons change in habitual monotone for the rest of the world, but Draco always associates the transition of weather with his conjunction with Hermione. Fall together and then apart, it’s a whirlwind. A storm. And in the eye of it, standing still, is the boy from the astronomy tower with his heart on his sleeves. Because after all is said and done, he is still in love with her.
One night was all it took for James's life to change forever. Or the one where James was the Werewolf, instead of Remus. Oneshot.
Hermione, Harry and Ron all have responsibilities, but Harry and Ron don't take their responsibilities very seriously. Because of this, Hermione has to save them.
The Yule Ball is drawing nearer and nearer every second. Harry decides to ask Cho to the ball to get to know her and the experience was more than worth it. (CCHP)

Harry's lessons with Professor Snape to learn how to defend his mind from intrusion are only causing the teenager great pain. A little friend prays for help and the next night the ghost of Lily Potter shows up and possesses Severus Snape. Lily helps Harry for the first month and the James has his turn as the helper and he teaches his son to prank the Death Eaters. One shot/no ships
She can't stop herself from always fearing the worst; no matter how hard she squeezes her eyes shut in an attempt to block out her mind, she can't sleep. Neither, she realizes, can Ron.

In the aftermath of the Battle, Ron and Hermione lose track of one another. They set out in a desperate attempt to find each other so that they can finally address the infuriating status of their relationship.
A reworking of the King's Cross chapter in Deathly Hallows. Harry picks up the creature under the bench. I don't own the characters or the H P world. They belong to the author.
REUPLOAD - Snape knows the danger he is in. However he appreciates the little moments like this. Dedicated to the man himself.
The one with the overheard secret conversation. Humor/Parody. AU. OOC. One-Shot. Complete.

Hermione almost falls down in the hallway. Harry manages to save her falling, but in the process of doing so, he ends up sharing a kiss with Hermione. Later, Professor Dumbledore has his staff and students celebrate Opposite Day. Harry tries to be the opposite of shy by giving his crush a kiss. However, he accidentally kisses the wrong girl.
Luna believes in a lot of strange things. You might think Divination would be just one more of those. But nothing is ever straightforward with Luna Lovegood. [FFFX treat for ChokolatteJedi.]

Going from smartphones, laptops and a world encyclopedia at the literal tips of her fingers, Emma Wood was reborn in a time where technology had peaked with nuclear bombs threatening the lives of civilians for the greed of others. A brief look into Emma's school years, as she works towards getting the wizarding world on what she considers "up to date". Oh and there is Riddle. SI/OC
He's all alone. And maybe a little lonely. But that's fine : he's willing to pay any price for the freedom of being himself.

Hermione Granger's birthday is coming up. Harry and Ron want to give her a party, but Professor Lockhart has his own celebration on the same day. Harry and Ron are confused about how to celebrate two events on the same day.

Does he know what he wants? He thinks he does, buried somewhere deep inside where his conscious mind can't reach, but he pushes this thought out of his head the instant it occurs to him. It's not real if James doesn't give it the time of day, and some things are better left in the night. xx Sirius moves in with the Potters the summer before sixth year. Tension ensues.
Need a lawyer? Better call Weasley. [Increasingly canon-divergent version of Book 5. FFFX gift for FeatheryMinx.]

Professor Dumbledore announces a competition that involves magic duels. He claims that the winner will be claimed the year's best student, so several students enter. Harry and Hermione try to ignore their feelings for each other, so they can focus on winning. However, Ron, who has gotten some bad advice from Draco, starts causing problems.

With the Second Wizarding War finally over, new friends Archie Barrows and Barbara Nicholson go to lunch together and meet Archie's new family, the Woods. The lunch is a bit of disaster and they are pursued by a portrait of Merlin, who gives them and the Woods a dangerous quest to fix his tomb... incl.:Found family, enemies to lovers, enemies to friends, slow burn. R&R appreciated
What if Harry had been a split second late in casting the Sectumsempra Curse at Malfoy? AU HBP Harry/Ginny

[Originally posted on ao3 on 2021-11-15 Cursed Child inspired work] "Yeah? Well sometimes I wish you weren't my son!" the immediate aftermath of Harry's words, Albus running out and Harry not staying in Albus's room
Harry's grades are becoming worse and worse. Hermione believes in Harry, but Harry's worried about what to do. Is this the end of Harry's time at Hogwarts?
Professor Lockhart has a new lesson, but Harry thinks that he's a con artist. All of Harry's classmates turn against him, except for Hermione.
On Christmas Eve, Tonks has an unusual gift for Snape.

Set in the month after the Battle of Hogwarts, everyone is grieving. Hermione volunteers Ron and Harry to help clean up Hogwarts as a distraction. Little do they know that a secret from Minerva's past is coming to cause horrors rivaling that of Voldemort while the Wizarding World is most vulnerable.
Ron agrees to be Hermione's fake boyfriend for her family reunion. They both get a bit more than they bargained for. Written for the Romione Trope Fest on Tumblr; selected trope: Fake Dating.

Regulus Black's death was announced in the Daily Prophet a week after his mother last saw him alive. She had lost a husband earlier that year, and lost another son several years before. "Poor woman," said the more genteel members of Pureblood society. The out-and-out Death Eaters, who had counted Regulus as one of their own, said "Coward." His body was never found.
Ginny Weasley likes darkness. But not just any darkness. /A drabble on Ginny’s relationship to Riddle’s diary.
Harry's birthday is coming up, so Hermione and Ron try to prepare him a special birthday. On the day of the party, Harry ends up running into Voldemort.
Ginny is very upset when her favorite brother has to go away to Hogwarts. Can her remaining brothers help cheer her up?
Draco keeps bullying Harry, Hermione, and Ron. In order to avoid getting bullied himself, Ron tries to become a bully. Hermione and Harry try to help him learn the error of his ways.

Harry Potter is dead. His body is still walking around and talking after May 1998 but it's not him. It's just a body. No one can help him. No one understands. A body can't cry so his tears just ricochet.

A newspaper article about Harry and Hermione getting married comes out. Most people don't believe it, but Ron becomes concerned. Harry and Hermione hope that they can explain what's really going on. A rumor starts spreading about somebody at Hogwarts getting married. The rumor grows when it turns out that Harry has been hiding a ring in his pocket.
I see no difference. Four, little words that sound so harsh. And yet, two people discover that the phrase means so much more below the surface.
Hermione calls Harry her boyfriend. Naturally, this confuses Harry and gets Ron jealous. The three of them, along with Luna, get caught up in one of the most confusing experiences of their lives.
Moments after the end, Ron and Hermione turn to each other for comfort and direction.
Dorcas agreed on helping Sirius with the preparation for Marauders' prank. But not everything went as expected when they were standing on a pier of the Great Lake.
Sirius was being Sirius. Remus was a little fed up cheering up the girls his crush had cast aside. So, he finally snapped which led to surprising results.

Lily didn't need to turn to recognize who that was, but she did it nonetheless; the round glasses were the same – they were famous, even! – and the disarray of a hair was also familiar. When he saw her, he grinned. When she saw him, she groaned. "Alright, Evans?"
Hermione comforts a devastated George in the middle of the night. FRIENDSHIP only.

Draco/Harry. A night of rain. A bare-boned safe house. A clandestine meeting between a spy and his case officer. Being with Harry is like falling through the air—and Draco isn't sure he wants to stop.
Draco keeps his Malfoy mask in place during his engagement.
Petunia struggles with the death of her parents
At a wedding reception, Severus thinks back on how his life turned out. He'd never expect it to go this way.

The Dursleys gave me nothing to call my own, and to them, I was the heaviest of all burdens. I did not understand it then, and I cannot pretend to understand their reasons for opening their door to me now.
The times when Moody is alone, his thoughts turn to old cases and new in search for answers that will never come.
He was the perfect tenth victim, and she was determined to get him. Written for IWSC; R4.
After Ginny accidently kills Malfoy she starts a unique collection.
In a time of exams, there is stress for all when you can't figure out the right way to study. Perhaps there's someone who can show Luna an easier way

'Interested in learning some Muggle board games? Then come along to the back room of The Leaky Cauldron, this Friday at 8pm.' All Hermione had been looking for was for some people to help her work through her board game collection, but she ended up with much more than she bargained for... especially when a couple of Slytherins showed up.
They're not sure how it happens, but Rabastan and Emmeline always end up helping each other.

Nisryn perched on the crag overlooking the valley like a queen upon her throne. He was a human, and that in itself made him untrustworthy; after all, humans and dragons had warred for millennia. But somehow Charlie Weasley managed to break through her walls and become a friend.

broken (adjective) 1. having been fractured or damaged and no longer in one piece or in working order. trust (noun) 1. firm belief in the reliability, truth, ability, or strength of someone or something. Sirius would never do anything to broke the trust that James had on him, but can you deny the wishes of your heart? (Canon Divergence)
Unable to cope with the aftermath of the war, Harry is deteriorating. Despite his friends' attempts to keep him safe, Harry takes matters into his own hands.
Victoire Weasley is so full of feelings, she doesn't know what to do with them. So she walks on the beach. Of course, her loving father follows her. [part four in the 'broken wireless' series']

Harry is fine. Just fine. Everyone has nightmares, and he's had them for years. No big deal. Teddy has a stable home, and as long as Harry gives him all the love he possibly can, everything will be okay. Right? [EWE] [trigger warning for PTSD] [cover art: upthehill art on tumblr]

Muggle Ballet AU. Despite the ache in her feet from the many calluses and blisters on her skin, Hermione refuses to break, regardless of how often her body screams at her to stop. Written for IWSC Writing School, Round 4.

To anyone looking at the group, so clearly happy in each other's company, it looked as though each of them would be together through it all, straight to the end. Maybe, if their timing hadn't been so unlucky, that would've been the case.
"I need to tell you about my cousin." Charlotte's boyfriend Dudley has some family secrets. Ficlet, That's Life Together Universe side-story.
It's been building for years, and Harry's finally ready to make the move from friends to lovers. Hopefully, he's not too late. EWE, Drarry, Harry/Draco
Everyone is indifferent, but when Harry gets his first taste of passion, he wonders what is missing. Hints of slash.

If Bagsy thought her problems ended at the start of her second year at Hogwarts, she was gravely mistaken. Between her closest friend being framed for theft, worms spelling ominous warnings in the mud and the dangerous allure of the Corvid Trials, a test that could finally grant Bagsy the ability to cast spells, her second year is shaping up to be even more hectic than the first...

Luna thought about the years she'd spent secretly pining after Ginny, the months in the dungeon that her love of Ginny had helped her survive, the weeks spent here, at the burrow, among these fields, where her devotion to Ginny only grew. Perhaps some things never really changed, despite everything.
The No Kiss List had been the saving document for Sirius and Jamie's friendship. However, they both can see the other is in love, and are not above using the List to play matchmaker.

Amidst the confusion of post-war bleakness, two desperate people fall together like puzzle pieces, like a needle pricked into the perfect vein. Pansy Parkinson would rather be anywhere than finding comfort in the ticking time bomb Harry Potter. She would like to stop comparing her life and her lies to those in story books - two lovers in fair Verona, two people set into their doom.
Juliette Elm's life changes when she comes across a portrait. Or, how The Fat Lady came to be.
Harry discovers just how much family means to him.

After the events of Cursed Child Harry visits Andromeda to tell her about the existence of Delphi. The pair reflect on the life of Bellatrix Lestrange, a sister lost to Lord Voldemort. Hints of Bellamort (Voldemort/Bellatrix)
Harry's second year could have ended far more tragically if not for the unsung skill of Professors Spout and Snape in brewing the mandrake potion. But were they ever thanked? Short one-shot.
Voldemort visited the wrong house that night

You've seen, done, experienced everything. All that you want – magic swelling like a star within your being and lifetimes, it seems, passing like days – is to no longer exist. And with all your power, all your knowledge, with everything you have created and destroyed as worlds pass you by, it is the one wish you cannot grant.

Ted Lupin is on a journey to find himself when he is abruptly kidnapped and forced into a dangerous heist against his will. As he finds himself falling deeper into an impossible situation with ever-increasing stakes, he will discover that his captors are not the most dangerous part of the endeavor.
Ron's only objective at his brother's wedding is to ask Hermione for a dance. Will he miss his chance, or will fortune favour the bold?

Before the rescue of Harry from the Dursleys in Deathly Hallows, tensions are high. The youngest of the Burrow's inhabitants are excluded from Order meetings, and they are sick of it. Especially Ron, who decides to do something about it. Originally a part of the Romione Trope Fest 2022 on tumblr.
Confused about his feelings for his best mate, Seamus agrees to go on a thrilling Muggle adventure despite some hesitation. Will he take the plunge?
The one with the trip to the bank. Parody/Humor. AU. OC. OOC. One-Shot. Complete.
It's not easy for the marauders to get together on a holiday, this is a story about one time they could.

Mrs. Snape is a muggle
Based on my series Dumbledore's Daughter this will be Hermione's first Summer as a Dumbledore.

Bella is the Princess of France, Edward the crown Prince of England. Now that they're both attending the same college, will they fall in love, or will it end in heartbreak?

Plain-Jane Bella Swan slept drunk with the handsome rich kid Edward Cullen, landing her pregnant. She goes to Seattle to help her cousin with his restaurant. But what happens when her child is born too intelligent, physically beautiful, and immortal?
