The sisters of mercy, they are not departed or gone. Éowyn in the Houses of Healing.

Frodo and Legolas both return from the Quest irrevocably changed. They talk through the joys and sorrows of knowing that their closest friends would do anything to help them, and that even this will never restore them to how they were before. A story about love and letting go.
Arwen reflects upon her love for Aragorn. One shot. Bookverse.
Once a conspirator, always a conspirator. Meriadoc Brandybuck in the Houses of Healing.
More office politics in Minas Tirith with the Steward and the King.
Gandalf has stupidly gotten himself captured. Will Lavinnia and Aragorn be able to save him?

Glimpses of Finduilas and Denethor's life after "Come Leave the Sea and Let Us Run." These are drabbles (and a few double drabbles) written on the prompts of the 30-Day OTP Challenge. Also guest starring members of the Dol Amroth family and some original characters.
Aragorn loses a man under his command for the first time.
In the days between the end of the War and the return of the King, Faramir and Éowyn conduct a private investigation.

Having befriended Éowyn in the aftermath of war, Lothíriel travels north to help her prepare for a new life in Gondor. But in Rohan, she discovers more than she expected: a land still fighting to survive and a young king struggling to find his own peace.
Fatty Bolger one-shot. Left behind to keep up appearances at Crickhollow, Fatty Bolger suddenly finds things all too crazy for his liking... or sanity.

Aragorn, Legolas and Gimli make the difficult decision to follow the Orcs and attempt to rescue Merry and Pippin. This is story of their journey from Parth Galen to Fangorn Forest from each of their perspectives. Written for the Tolkien Reverse Summer Bang 2018 for the prompt of Three Hunters with artwork by @master-of-the-lackadaisical Art in cover image for this fic.
Sometimes a celebration brings more pain than joy.

The past is already written. The ink is dry. But the future remains unset and the Valar have begun to sing a song anew. Boromir and Faramir fight on the frontline to hold back the forces of the Dark Lord, but some battles must also be fought within the walls of the White City. That is where Aeardis of Tol Eressëa fights for the people and country that she loves.
A (poetic) lament for Gandalf after his fall in Moria.
Written for Eldhoron's "Days of the Week " detailing characters' thoughts on events throughout their lives in Middle-Earth.

Somewhere in the distance, as if by a return cry,/Not knowing when or why a fell voice called/A Nazgûl nonetheless heard me. A free-verse poem I wrote back in 2011. Featuring Frodo Baggins and the Nazgul/Ringwraiths.
Lothíriel has some feelings she's struggling to cope with, but soon that won't be her only problem. Involving poison, a jail cell, and a poorly-timed love declaration.

Fierce battles took place across Middle Earth in the last days of the War of the Ring- and messengers can only cover so many miles in a day. What would it be like to ponder the fate of your homeland before those crucial tidings arrive? In Ithilien after the destruction of the Ring, Legolas and Gimli await news of their homes and loved ones. One-shot from Aragorn's POV.
Gandalf teaches young Faramir a trick or two.
Slowly he worked through the pages, scratching out a word here, a line there... Faramir is writing the Great Gondorian Novel. Slowly.
"I knew how much Legolas always hated when his father had to leave, especially when he saw others preparing armor and weapons. "
Faramir and Eowyn convene a family council.
Legolas is late arriving to Rivendell and little Estel jumps to conclusions.
Faramir takes stock.
17 years after the War of the Ring, the hobbit Nob from The Prancing Pony encounters an unexpected sight.
What moved Beregond to act as he did?

When we are hurt very deeply in our nascent adulthood, it may take a very long time for us to grieve. Sometimes, we ask for things that cannot be given, and that we have to find ourselves. / Legolas-centric, "Enough" universe
Inspired by my favorite character from J.R.R Tolkien's work, the amazing and powerful Glorfindel!
A poem about the Ring's effect on Frodo.

With a horde of orcs hot on their trail, Aragorn and Legolas take matters into their own hands and are willing to make the sacrifices needed in order to protect the ring bearer. The duo stay behind in an attempt to buy the rest of the fellowship some time to reach Lothlorien. Legolas whump!
"Love and work are the cornerstones of our humanness." Sigmund Freud. Faramir in the Houses of Healing.
A Legolas-centric reflection on the aftermath of the Battle of the Black Gate, as he finds his unique place helping Frodo and Sam and supporting Aragorn as he heals them.

Lothíriel is going to kill her brother once she finds him! He should not make promises he doesn't intend to keep. She's decided to hunt him down if necessary. And hunting him down is how the princess of Dol Amroth finds herself in a stranger's bed. All in all... It could be a lot worse.
"Give me enough medals and I'll win you any war." Napoleon Bonaparte. Who gets the honours in Minas Tirith?

Odd ducks, black sheep, black swan; the Dol Amroth family's unconventional member is the middle daughter, Finduilas. When she blurts out the first words in her mind rather than restricting herself to polite topics like weather and the state of the roads, she strikes up a curious friendship with Denethor, the family guest. This story placed first in the May 2018 Teitho Contest.
Faramir loves Boromir more than anyone, but when Denethor dares to do the unthinkable, the brothers suffer from the fall out.

Long after the defeat of Dol Guldur, the Mirkwood elves still fear for the return of Evil. Will Thranduil be strong enough to face the never sleeping evil or will this time be his demise? Little Leggy fluff, Sick! Thranduil, Mischievous twins, Caring Peredhel/ Peredhil. Minor appearance of Erestor and Glorfindel, Elfling Elladan, Elfling Elrohir, Elfling Legolas. Good Thranduil!

Then, all of a sudden, it began to rain—a gentle but steady rain, cool but not cold, that washed away the mists and dripped like gentle tears down their faces. Another voice wound through the hills and barrows around them, wordless, but young and ancient as spring, and warm, and welcoming.
Another collection of one shots. These will be centered around Legolas' time in Rohan and his encounters with its people. A request from Bookworm-soul. Rating to be safe for future updates. Enjoy!

The tale of Éomer and Lothíriel, transposed into different times, lands, and circumstances. In other words, a collection of oneshots capturing moments in their (sometimes) great romance. Marked complete for now, but will perhaps add more oneshots at some point in the future.

A new and deadly poison appears in Mirkwood while Elrond, Glorfindel, and the twins spend the winter there with Thranduil and Legolas. will they be able to survive and find out who is doing this? And, will they be able to break the tradition of hurt that spans three generations or will the cycle continue? AU. Rating is just to be safe. Please review!
Pippin tries to work out when a compliment is not a compliment. (A 2012 LOTR GFic September Challenge story) One-shot; book-verse.

Aragorn/OC - Menna has put her knife-throwing skills to good use, helping save one of the Company from almost certain death. When a race for the Hobbits veers off course and lands what remains of the Company in Rohan, Menna will find herself facing more battles than ever before. All the while Aragorn must face an enemy within himself. Second in the Quests of the Nameless trilogy.
When an ailing Legolas visits Rivendell, he catches the eye of a living legend who's seen it all – war, peace, life and death – but not love. Lord Glorfindel falls for a Wood-elf.

"Oh, what a beautiful day!" Belladonna skipped out into the sunshine, breathing in deeply. The Dwarven cities beneath the Blue Mountains were wonderful, but it was always a relief to emerge into the world again, to see the sky and the grass and the flowers and trees that grew on the mountainside. "Dís, look at all the flowers!"

Aragorn knows how to fight, but can he learn how to wait? He faces a new challenge outside the royal birthing chamber, awaiting the arrival of his first child. Luckily, he has a friend by his side. One-shot.
Elrond's family sits for a portrait. Chaos ensues, and Elrond learns what it means to be a good father.

Being twelve months pregnant with twins is not all that cut out to be. Celebrían feels herself going stir crazy staying in bed all the time, and Elrond is not fond of the idea of taking care of the twins for a month by himself. Yes, even before they were born, Elladan and Elrohir were already causing mischief.
Elrohir is jilted by his significant other. Injured and betrayed, it is up to Elladan to cheer him up. Written for LadyPorpoise, no slash.
Merry and Pippin come back to Crickhollow after the Quest...(A double drabble -200 words; written in 2005 for Dana.) Book-verse; One shot.

Word of Ithilien's splendor is taking Middle-Earth by storm. Everyone is eager to visit, except for two kings who know its beauty may be coming from the worsening torment of its chief elven architect, Legolas.

There's a nasty rumor going around the Shire that Farmer Maggot's land is crawling with insects. When Frodo and his friends journey through Maggot's cornfield, they find it hard to keep quiet. Inspired by "A Quiet Place" and SNL's skit "A Kanye Place". Theme: Survival.
In the Houses of Healing, Faramir tries to pick up all the pieces. One-shot.
Confusion and disagreement over Gondorion laundry rituals can only mean one thing. Disaster for Aragorn as he attempts to control the wood-elven member of the Fellowship.
What did she say to you, the Lady That Dies Not?
Arwen has a nightmare and looks for comfort in her Adar.

While debating on what to write, Frodo Baggins comes across a reclusive brown rabbit, whose found a way to cause mischief and invade Bag End, with his hoard of plot bunnies. Never underestimate a plot bunny! Theme: Imagination
Gandalf searches the archives of Minas Tirith for clues about the true identity of Isildur's Ring, and in doing so manages to outwit the Chief Archivist's sleuthing.
On his first trip to Rivendell Legolas slips out of the twins care and makes a new friend, who almost has a somewhat unfortunate end but is saved by a 'daring' rescue mission.

Legolas is a young wood elf- the equivalent of a 15 year old human- and goes to visit Rivendell. What happens when he, Elladan, and Elrohir get taken captive by orcs while on a hunting trip? (Rated T just to be safe)

Thorin and Thranduil find themselves swept away from the battlefield. Forced to spend time together, both dwarf and elf prove to be formidable characters, and anger soon raises its head. Now complete.

Aragorn and Legolas are somehow aware of how the duel between Gandalf and the Balrog would turn out and decide to prevent something terrible from happening. Pure crack fic! Sequel to 'Taking the Hobbits to Isengard.'
Another poem from the perspective of the last elf on Middle Earth. I hope you like it! AU.
Thranduil and his siblings find themselves at a loose end one evening, and what starts out as impromptu fun quickly escalates!
The new year is here. What will it bring?
Elrohir and his wife, Lalorn are traveling back from a visit to Mirkwood when somthing unexpected happens.
The Steward's family dreams.
"They were so alike, him and my father." (Faramir grieves for his family. It's complicated.)

Halbarad has been left behind in Minas Tirith when the host leaves for Morannon. While there he meets Faramir, the current steward of Gondor, who is also recovering from his injuries and has been left behind. Now they have to wait to see how the march will turn out. See how they spend their time.
The dwarves' secrets are no one's business but their own.
Sometimes it is harder to stay behind.
AU. Due to Sokka's poor time management, the boys are late to Karaoke at June's Tavern and are volunteered to be the night's first singers. Kataang, Yukka and Jinko with mentions of Jetzula.
It's that time of year again, and to make your 2020 a little brighter, what could be better than another Kataang Christmas fic? Merry Christmas, everyone!

"What if… What if I can't forgive him?" Forgiveness isn't easy. (And really, who ever said it was?) This fic follows Katara's emotional journey from the events of "The Western Air Temple" to those of "The Southern Raiders," as she experiences firsthand both the challenges and rewards of forgiving others (and perhaps even learns to forgive herself along the way).

Zuko didn't want to be at his roommate's party, let alone wearing an ugly Christmas sweater. But since Katara picked it out... maybe it would be worth it. OR Zuko and Katara have been pining for each other for years and a holiday party reveals some truths.

"You were lucky to be born." Azulon once said those words to Ozai when he was a child, but Ozai always finds a way to twist his father's words. Though the palace is large, Azulon hears everything that happens within. A story of Azulon's relationship with his secondborn child. Azulon is less bad in this fic than in canon, but I tried to keep events as faithful as possible. Oneshot.
He knew it was going to happen some time. It had to, right? But he had been saying 'not yet' for so long, he forgot he didn't have a say after all. Zuko and Grief become acquainted too early.

When an investor comes to stay with single-father Zuko he finds himself in need of a husband that he doesn't have. Enter Sokka, a single-father himself who suddenly finds himself with some unexpected home expenses. A Zukka winter time story inspired by Borrowed Hearts.

AU, Modern World. Sokka is pushed by Katara to try out online dating. To get her off his back, he grudgingly agrees. But he never expected to meet a girl like Azula. Within a few days, they are already dating. But is Azula with him for the right reasons? Oneshot.
Zuko and Lee from the farm find closure. /ONESHOT/

"The greatest illusion of this world is the illusion of separation."- Guru Pathik. As Katara grows older, she recalls the passing of her husband and family, and counts down the days until she can see them again.
Zuko is captured by the Dai Li and brainwashed. The Gaang finds Zuko and attempts to heal him. (Starts out cute and funny but doesn’t stay that way.)
Katara waits for the war to end, and has never felt more powerless. / Or, Katara's reflections on her feelings for Zuko as he sleeps and Sozin's comet burns. Zutara.
On a trip to the South Pole, the lack of sunshine takes a toll on Zuko, and Katara makes some time for snuggling.
Zuko wakes up after the final Agni Kai and finds Katara there. Written for the Zutara December Drabble Day 22 Prompt, "Stay?" because I'm late to the party and I'm bad at following directions.

After the war, the Gaang focuses on rebuilding their homes and spending time with family. Zuko struggles with guilt and worries about Azula's health, but for the first time in his life he has a large support system and a loving family around him. A short story about love, healing, and learning to understand and support a loved one who is struggling with mental health. Zutara

Crown Princess Azula of the Fire Nation was not always a monster. But from an early age she is made to be one, until she only sees herself as such. The last tether to her humanity is a little girl with grey-brown eyes. The only person who really sees her [Tyzula. Canon-divergence (but not much). A look at their trips across Books 2 and 3 and how different things could've been]

When Katara takes a post as ambassador in the Fire Nation, Zuko wants to celebrate her and give their friends a proper sendoff. But their trip to the Equinox Festival doesn't go quite as he planned. Based on the Day 4 prompt from Zutara Week 2010: Date

"If I tell you a story, you promise you won't fall asleep?" "Tell me something I don't know, something exciting." "Like what?" At this, Katara's eyes shine. "Tell me why you kissed me last year. That'll keep me awake." - Zuko and Katara get stuck in a cave in, Katara is badly injured and it's time for discussions about love.
With Aang desperate for a way to defeat the Fire Lord without taking his life, Zuko suddenly remembers what Katara did to the commander of the Southern Raiders.

Katara has always been confident. She has always loved herself, the path she has carved for herself, and everyone around her. Sometimes, the first one gets a little difficult. Featuring: body image issues, Katara struggling, and Zuko being a good partner. Zutara, modern AU.
Zuko wants to take the car. Katara wants to walk. A compromise must be reached. (zutara modern fluff!)
she sees someone who knows her: not for her smiles or the love she gives, but for the girl underneath. [zutara poem]

Zuko and Katara share a moment together after the Agni Kai, when they don't quite know whether or not the rest of the world is burning. What do you do when you have nothing to lose? [zutara, underwater kisses, canon-compliant]
Essentially: Zuko has hair loopies. He is not okay with this. [zutara fluff]
Zuko gets a little lucky before his quidditch match - but there's no Felix Felicis in this love story. [zutara, first kiss, hogwarts au]
Azula ruminates on men with power. Zuko tries to help.

Zuko's first pride was supposed to be a short parade experience with his uncle. He wasn't supposed to meet the most gorgeous guy in the world and he definitely wasn't supposed to end up spending the whole day with said guy and his friends. After all, it isn't like he's got a chance with him... right? Cross posted AO3.
Toph might not have many happy memories with her parents, but she does have them.

Many writers send Zuko to join the Southern Water Tribe and Katara and Sokka's family. But if Zuko is ever to fulfill his destiny by hauling the Fire Nation away from its destructive path, sooner or later, he has to return to the Fire Nation.

My third fanfic based on my dreams from the night before. This dream blended the universe of Avatar with my volunteer job. Therefore I hope you read, review, and appreciate this story. Furthermore, support animal shelters, including helping animals find reliable homes moreover not die!

Captain Suki, commanding the ship Kyoshi of the Earth Kingdom navy, is dispatched to hunt down a water tribe ship that has been preying on merchant vessels. However, her mission becomes complicated when she discovers that they are not the enemies she thought they were... and there are far worse things to worry about. AU, obviously.
Katara and Zuko take the kids to the Southern Water Tribe for a visit.
Azulon knows certain family members are special, but speaking to Zuko in front of Ilah's picture reminds him of this.
Suki has been captured by Azula. The cruel firebending girl has a question for the Kyoshi Warrior and will do anything to get it. Rated for minor violence.

You Grew Up So Fast/You Grew Up Too Fast. Kataang. Katara is overjoyed when Aang starts catching up to her in height and other physical aspects, even if his maturity stays the same. But every fulfilled wish comes with a consequence... Bordering on mature at times
Aang comes to Suki with an unusual request.
Aang and Katara have been avoiding an important conversation. Set after Sozin's Comet, but before the Coronation.
Zuko makes a special soup and reflects on the memories of making it as a teen.

Avatar Roku returns home after 11 years away to find that all is not well in the Caldera. Navigating politics, love and his duties as the Avatar, Roku discovers a conspiracy within the Fire Nation government that threatens to topple his friend Sozin’s reign.
One quiet morning, Zuko holds Izumi by himself for the first time.
Iroh let's a secret slip at Zuko's engagement party and Katara can't deal with it.
Is this really life-changing news? Find out!
Oneshot. The Gaang is spending an evening together by the fire, but Toph is suddenly running away from the camp. Aang is looking for her, and eventually they talk about their feelings.

Zutara - three-shot set after Zuko and Azula's Agni Kai. "Why….why would you do this?" she managed, containing her sobs, tears threatening to spill from her eyes again. "Because I couldn't let YOU die," he rasped, barely above a whisper.
Ember Island Players AU – Katara has tribal Water Tribe tattoos she has keep secret and Zuko wonders about them. Inspired by Zutara Week 2011 prompt Day 4: Secret.

Every day Azula gets on the train. Every day Sokka gets on the train. From Monday to Friday, they ride the train. Based on the song "Jueves" from La Oreja de Van Gogh. This song is based on true events, so I don't know if I'm being insensitive by doing this fic, but I just truly love the song and this idea has been on my mind for a while.
Final Sokkla Saturday: While on vacation to a ski resort, Azula and Sokka get stranded in a blizzard.

Avatar Aang knows that his time to depart this world is growing near, and he decides to say a final goodbye to his family. So much has happened in his life, how best can he share his love with his family, with his wife and kids, so that they will remember him when he is gon?

Sokkla Saturdays 2020 Day 9 (Sokkla is painful for Zuko): It was hurting to see her so happy. Zuko knows it is his fault that it was hurting so much. And so this day was a display of all the pain and misery his mistakes have caused...

Two songfics for the price of one. Chapter 1：终于结束的起点 (Beginning of the End) Link: /watch?v Jv3zvWZlXkk Chapter 2: 告白气球 (Confession Balloon) Link: /watch?v bu7nU9Mhpyo *Yes ik the 1st one sounds super depressing but it be like it do
"Again?" he preempted, and Zuko nodded wordlessly. "How many times would you like me to kiss you?" "All of them?" "I can do that." Sap. Fluff. Zukka.

A series of drabbles with character perspectives on Kataang. A mix of fluff and emotional moments with some humor thrown in. Canon and head-canon included! i.e. Aang and Katara talk about home, Suki gives them a "gentle" nudge, and Hakoda ponders Katara's pending wedding without Kya (her mother, not daughter) present. More to come! Katara X Aang, plus other pairings mentioned
A zutara story from the pov of Mai, featuring Mai and Aang friendship.
During her sixth month of pregnancy, Katara can't help but feel very unattractive, but to one man, nothing could be further from the truth. A Kataang oneshot.
Aang surpises Kataraq
Toko Week 4, written many years ago and posted on DA when it occurred. Now, bringing it over here. Enjoy! R&R!
Zuko's thoughts on trees. Sokka's thoughts on Zuko. (Modern setting, technically. For two words.) Zukka.
"You want what Father gives me so bad, Azula? You can have it. Come to my room tonight." (Ozai\Zuko, non-graphic but much ickiness implied. Azula&Zuko, little ickiness implied.)

The Creation Avatar is before the lion turtle era, the avatar cycle that Aang is apart of is after the lion turtle era, hand-to-hand(our current world as it is now), creation avatar, lion-turtle, avatar wan's era, that is how the cycle goes. The creation avatar travels to the future of wan's era to Aang's time to help defeat the Fire Lord Ozai and help Azula gain a happier ending.

Ozai changes after the birth of his first child. His relationship with Zuko is far from perfect, but for now, it is enough. Part One of Allure AU, where Zuko is transgender (assigned female at birth).
Azula ends up in the South Pole. Katara doesn't quite know what to do about her.

Two weeks ago, the diabolical Prince Ozai was exiled, never to be heard from again. However, his legacy will live on. For his concubine now carries his child. However, is the Fire Nation or world ready for the birth of a Demon Princess?
"You can feel it, can't you?" Yue's musical voice broke the enchanted silence after a few minutes of silent paddling. "The push and pull of the water."
For the first time, Azula questions the direction her father put her in.

The unimaginable ultimately happened. Prince Ozai is on trial for transgressions against the crown. No one knows what will happen to the sinister prince. Will he be thrown in prison? Will he be executed? Or will he be exiled? What will be the fate of Prince Ozai? Moreover, how will this affect the worst of his victims? His own family? Read and find out!
Mayhem occurs and it's iroh's job to pick up the pieces. Relationships are in turmoil as the Gaang meets in Ba Sing Sae. What will happen? R&R

Sokkla Saturdays 2020 Day 8 (First Times) - Sokka has never expected to hear or see these things from Azula he has seen this night. It was a coincidence that he has caught her within the halls of the Palace and so he got the chance to see Azula in a new way he has never seen her before...

Crystal is the twin sister of Sokka, and older sister of Katara. She has always believed that firebenders are cruel and heartless beasts, especially after being burned by one as a child. However, that all changes when she meets a certain Fire Nation Prince. Join Crystal on her journey as she learns about the world, grows stronger, and falls in love. *Romance. Crystal (OC) X Zuko.*

Zuko is stuck in traffic on his way home from his court-mandated anger management class. Rush hour traffic is not a good time to be on the road when one has anger issues. just some fun crack! modern AU, gifted to goldilocks23 on AO3

An arranged marriage has been set up between the young prince of the Fire Nation and the Southern Water Tribe Chief's daughter. It's all very political and all very practical, especially under the guidance of the apparently reformed Dragon of the West acting as Fire Lord. But Katara has to decide if she can trust her husband-to-be to side with her over his own family. [Oneshot]
Aang awoke in pain. It all came back to him slowly. The attack. The smoke. The arrow. The blood pouring from the wounds. The smell of burnt flesh as the world went dark.
The Air Nomads were a very spiritual people. The Air Nomads adored their home. Though their time was cut short, it did not mean they had to leave. Or, Aang swears that his people are still here.

Three years after their defeat by Firelord Ozai, the Gaang is still traveling around what was formally Earth Kingdom territory, freeing what people they can, when Avatar Roku comes to them with the perfect opportunity, to fix their past mistakes, as long as they don't talk to their past selves. Time Travel!AU.

Set between ATLA and LOK. What happened to our beloved boomerang-wielding, water tribe guy after the 100-year war came to a close? Many have different opinions on what the world needs to do - none more than Sokka. Ghosts from his past still haunt him, but nothing is more frightening than facing his destiny. (Sukka in later chapters, Kataang, and Maiko are primary ships.)
In the face of numerous assassination attempts, Zuko's council is pushing for him to marry and produce an heir. The Gaang has some thoughts on the topic.
Sokka and Katara get into a fight before Sokka goes hunting. When Sokka comes back hurt Katara realizes how important family is.
The Gaang knows a little too much about each other's sex lives, Toph and Sokka have some fun, and Zuko REALLY needs to get some sleep. Crackfic.
Katara has never been arrested at a protest before, and intends to keep it that way.
Based off the MV for Jay Chou's song 说好不哭. Written for the prompt 'Reunited after a long time'
Zutara one-shot. A quiet moment between Katara and Zuko at a Fire Nation ball.
Sokkla Saturdays Day 7 (Loyality): It was the perfect moment for Sokka's ambush. Azula has fallen asleep at the beach and her loyal guards are nowhere to be seen. Sokka would get her this time...
Zutara - Set at the Western Air Temple where Zuko and Katara are a secret couple. Fluffy, slightly steamy one-shot.
It's a bird! It's a war balloon! It's Druk! –or– The baby dragon comes into Fire Lord Zuko's life like everyone else he ever met – with a bang and hard to shake off.
A deeper look into Katara and Aang's feelings and states of mind between major events throughout Books 1-3.
after helping Aang, Kamara, and Sokka, Shyu is awaiting his fate on his treachary, which could be death.
written for a fluff challenge: Zuko and Katara part ways at a train station, Hallmark style.
written for an angst challenge: Katara and Zuko struggle with their inability to conceive a child.
The first time he sees her, she is inconsequential. That doesn't last for long.
Even the Fire Lord and his Lady want to relax and play at the end of the day. Sometimes it's more important to be just grandma and grandpa than the Fire Nation's fearsome rulers.
Maybe his love isn't unrequited after all. And maybe her parents are okay with that. Taang
If there was one thing that Aang loved the most about Katara, it was watching her shine. A Kataang oneshot.
Aang learns information about his life that he might have wished he hadn't. Originally written in 2012
Avatar Aang hears a rumor while traveling, and rushes back home. Kataang fluff. Originally written in 2010
Zutara one shot post Southern Raiders episode. Katara is still feeling pain from her experience and Zuko is there to help her further.

"Together, from now on. Right?" "Right. Wait, do you mean together, or do you mean together? I mean either is absolutely fine with me, in fact both are pretty agreeable to me but I'd appreciate the distinction because they're definitely different things"- "Sokka. Shut up." Sokk and Suki on the ride home from The Boiling Rock. Suki reflects. Sokka apologises. Short Oneshot.
Sokkla Saturday: Making a deal. "I'll dye my hair purple if you shave the beard." Azula begins to regret making this deal.
160 years after the end of the Hundred Years’ War, the Avatar goes rogue. Snatched from their own times to stop him, four Avatars confront their most dangerous enemy: Themselves.
Sokkla Saturdays Day 6 (Making a deal): Too much food. Why has Zuko agreed to help Azula and Sokka picking the food for their wedding? And why are they so eager to feed him so much...?
Summary: The full moon above them glows with a constant, steady presence, her guiding light as surely as he is; just different sources.

Katara never really looked old. Little did they know, though, that her only secret was nothing more than just having her goofball best friend-husband by her side. He never lost that childlike sense of fun, and he made sure everyone around him didn't, either. That is, until he couldn't.

When Aang and Toph have Toph's house all to themselves after her parents left the city for the weekend, Toph decides that she wants to adopt a dog. But neither of them is counting on Azula, the school bully, coincidentally wanting the same dog as her.

Aang and Toph receive a letter from Katara asking for their help in the Southern Water Tribe to prevent an unwanted marriage. But things get complicated when they both discover that there is an ancient tradition of hunting and sacrificing Bei Fongs that will make things more difficult for them.

Katara healed Zuko's chest once more, the two couldn't help but worry where their friends were and how they were doing. Katara and Zuko talk about Aang and the comet. Reunion after Sozin's Comet. Kataang. Zutara friendship. One-shot.
Toph and Sokka tease Aang and Katara about a few things that are not so discreet. Post-Blind Bandit. Kataang.
Katara has abandonment issues and Zuko's the only one that notices. So he tries (in his special Zuko way) to help her through it as much as he can.
Sokkla Saturday the Halloween edition. Azula tries to get Sokka some Halloween chocolate but it keeps melts before she can give it to him.
Years later, Ursa visits Ozai in his cell. He seems to have learned nothing - but has she? (Urzai Week 2020 Day 7 - Monster, followup to "The Tragic End of Fire Lord Azulon")
Ursa is dead and Azula needs flowers for the funeral. Aang owns a flower shop. Flower shop AU. Modern Day.
Zuko's favorite holiday was definitely Halloween. And it was entirely because of the traditions he shared with Katara. Fits with Hauntober Day 1: Pumpkin and Day 31: Celebrate
Izumi grows up in the Fire Nation Palace with the world at her feet and the best parents. [zutara, dadko & momtara drabbles]
Kataang, one shot. It's only been a few days since Aang discovered the Fire Nation killed his people. He says he's fine, but the dark circles under his eyes say otherwise.
Zuko's hands moved down of their own volition, and before he quite knew why they were at his wrist, tugging at a loose leather band.
Zuko didn't know that the hardest part of dying would be trying to let go. Written for the Hauntober 2020 prompt, "Ghost".
Little Kya wonders where her Gran-Gran is. Innocently, she asks her mother.
A series of one-shots focusing on some of the insecurities in Aang and Katara's relationship. Ratings will vary.
Aang is just chilling in his apartment in between work appointments when the woman of his dreams shows up at his door with a startling accusation. (This is a modern AU, there is no bending)
Several years into a relationship with Princess Azula, Ty Lee's permanently sweet demeanor begins to change...
Slowly, Azula learns about love. Azula-centric.

Katara Aqua didn't really have bad days. In fact, most of them went rather well. But no one can avoid bad days forever. And unfortunately for her, she can't seem to avoid having one herself. After a long morning before work, the young waterbender can't help but let her frustration out at her job after an accident. But what will happen when a stranger decides to help her? Kataang.
Shula dreamed all her life to serve her Fire Lord and country. When allowed to be Prince Ozai's concubine, she gladly takes it. Will she be able to handle the wicked prince?
Zuko is just looking out for his little girl

Collections of one shots for the Urzai Week 2020. None of the chapters are actually connected to each other, going so far as that they are the different interpretations of the same ship. Some of them canon compliant, while others are definitely set in an alternate universe or in a different setting. Some of them are closer to fluff, while some might be a bit darker.
Azula is immunocompromised and Zuko takes care of her.

"By the end of avatar it's pretty clear that the gaang have no problem with/are friends with mai (suki playing pai sho with her, katara watching, sokka including her in his picture) so I was wondering how you think mai and the gaang's relationship developed from the coronation to the end scene." The Gaang meets Mai. Friendship is a rocky path, but it's a road worth travelling.

The sequel to my other story "Father Figures" After the war has ended three weeks ago, Zuko followed Katara, Sokka and Hakoda to the South Pole, them wanting to give him an experience of how a normal family is supposed to be. Zuko is learning new things, unlearning some other, but most importantly he hopes to be able to call this new strange place home.

Azula dealing with a panic attack post-finale in whatever passes for a mental institution in the Fire Kingdom. Featuring Big Brother Zuko attempting to help. Written for Azula Week 2020, the prompt I used was Night. CW: Panic Attack
They're lost. In a forest. Maybe feelings. Did I mention feels?
Fire Sibling Week Day 6, Modern AU: Azula reunites with Zuko after having been held ransom for months.
Sokkla Saturdays 3: Lost In The Forest And Feelings. Azula is lost in a forest that shows her visions of what could have been.
[Set after the Boiling Rock] The Gaang had noticed Zuko was distant and avoided them. He was scared of them. (basically Gaang finds out about Zuko's scar)

Head Servant Ren had seen many strange things in his life, but he had never seen a Fire Lord sobbing into the shoulder of a Waterbending Master, asking why his mother chose to forget. Written for Zutara OPM Week, Day 6. Inspired by the song You'll Be Safe Here by Rivermaya.

The last thing Katara expects when she decides to walk home from work one night is to be attacked by a vampire. And she definitely doesn't expect to get saved by a second vampire. Her life will never be the same after this. Written for the Hauntober 2020 prompt "vampire."

Katara and Zuko attend the first annual Foliage Festival since the end of the 100 year war. While at the festival, they find themselves alone for the first time in weeks. Zutara Fic. Budding relationship.
Aang somehow switches places with himself... 20 years into the future. Silly Taang drabble
“This feels like some bullshit teenage summer dream.” Zutara one-shot
One-shot small in-depth of what went through Zuko and Katara's minds as they crossed paths in the cave.

A short poem written from Katara's perspective for the end of book 2; before, during, and after Aang is brought down by Azula. This poem was inspired by the song "Not About Angels" by Jasmine Thompson. Rated T just to be safe, but it is nothing more than the show itself.
Katara's dream seems to real to be fake. Aang is there to reassure her.

Katara lay on her deathbed at an old age thinking back on her life. She'd had a life filled with regret for the choices she'd made What will she do and what patner will she pic if she is given another chance to live a life right exactly when she defeated Azula?
Marriage in exchange for diplomatic immunity, sure why not? The catch? It's Azula.
A little boy has lost his mom. The Firelord helps him find her again.

Sokkla Saturday 3: Touch. Summary: Azula enjoys the sensation of hot wax on her skin. Nothing else, just hot wax and subtle touches. Notes: Takes place six to seven years after the comet. Sort of NSFW for nudity.

Sokkla Saturdays Day 3 (Touch): Panic is rising in Azula everytime someone tries to hug her. She has always been picky with closeness but since her return from the asylum the situation has become so much worse...

Katara loves fall. Zuko loves Katara. So he'll happily put up with her fall-loving shenanigans. Written for Hauntober 2020 prompt "leaves" from over on Tumblr. Beta-read by LadyFaePhillips/FireLadyFae
Sharing an apartment is hard when your flatmates are Aang and Toph. Lucky for Zuko, he has nice neighbours who are always happy to help out in a pinch. (Modern AU. Minor Zutara)

The gAang is supposed to go on vacation to Ember Island, but Sokka, Suki, and Toph can't make it. Zuko waits for Aang and Katara to arrive, but when she shows up alone, she has a confession to make. Written for Zutara Week 2020 promot "reunion". Reposted.
After taking her kids trick-or-treating, Katara stops at the newly-opened Jasmine Dragon. Zutara. One-Shot. Written for the Hauntober 2020 prompt, "Tea".
You cannot burn away what has always been aflame. [Sokka x Zuko]

Katara's counting down the days till she can leave her part-time job as a barista as she finishes nursing school. Zuko just needs a caffeine fix before work everyday at his family's company. Neither are particularly thrilled to see each other, until they are.

Katara is thrilled that she and Aang will finally get time alone to explore a new place - and each other - when Aang plans a romantic getaway. Takes place some years after the events of Imbalance. [Kataang]
After multiple failed attempts on his life and years of self-set expectations, Fire Lord Zuko is a shell of the man he used to be. But Katara won't turn her back on those who need her.
She shakes against the bench and he takes off his sweater—she can see his muscles tense in the lowlight—and hands it over to her, silently. [zutara, modern au]
Orange is an awful color.
After an encounter with the local wildlife in the Earth Kingdom, Katara runs into Zuko, who has had an unpleasant encounter of his own.
Katara and Aang are about to get a rude awakening. (kataang fluff, T to be safe)
Title is self explanatory. Oneshot fluff(?)/slice of life dealing with not very obedient kiddos

"Katara, you're the only one I can trust to help me -" "Tui and La, fine," Katara groaned. "I'll be there in twenty." All Katara wanted to do on her Saturday was sleep in. But when Zuko needs help at the Jasmine Dragon, she can't exactly leave him hanging. And who knows? Maybe something - or someone - good will come out of it. (Kataang meet-cute with platonic Zutara. Modern!AU.)

Zuko had been silent when Katara had faced Yon Rha, had stood next to her with an understanding that sunk into her bones. Today they are facing a different monster, and she does not think forgiveness is the answer.

Aang loved all of his friends dearly, but sometimes, the nagging thought that he didn't belong in this world became too loud to ignore. As his birthday—which he had once shared with several other Air Nomads—rolls around, he struggles to distract himself from all he's lost to time and war. However, the birthday party Katara throws him helps him remember all he's gained.

Sokkla Saturdays 2020 Day 2 ("As if that would happen!"): Azula has learned to deal with lies and false hope. She has found a way to steel her heart with bitter lessons and right now she's about to use her mantra again cause her world is spinning like it has never done before...

Instead of participating in the break-out of the Earthbenders on the Prison Rig, Katara fails to escape and is picked up by Zuko. Held captive on his ship as he hunts the Avatar, Katara vows to never be a ploy of the banished prince. She'll protect her friends in Zuko's chains. She'll fight the Prince with everything she has. But can her heart survive the battle? Book One: Rewrite!
Who would have guessed where something simple, innocent, and sincere could lead?

Zuko is a nervous wreck as he prepares to ask Katara to marry him. Short, sweet, and all fluff. Plus some TyZula. Zutara. Written for the Hauntober prompt "pumpkin" over on Tumblr. Special thanks to FireLadyFae/LadyFaePhillips for her work on this piece!
Parting ways after the war's end, Katara and Zuko make a plan for the future to make the pain easier to bear. [Oneshot] [Whumptober]
The new Ambassador program created during the third annual peace treaty conference is Zuko's favorite peacetime program for all of about 20 minutes. That is, until Katara's decision is announced.

Zuko loves Mai. Zuko loves the resilience in her eyes, the beautiful fire under her skin, the courage of her touch and the strength of her countenance. Zuko loves Mai. Zuko . . . Zuko cannot stop thinking of Katara.

Azula is grace and Zuko is not. Everything comes so natural to her. Where she swims Zuko just floats. Where she dives Zuko just sinks. It's hard when your sister is born ducky and you're just ducky to be born... (Turtle-Duck-AU)
Azula was born lucky, and he was lucky to be born. But the way he sees it, maybe he has more luck than any of them realize. Zutara Family one-shot! Please read and review.
While Aang is away, Katara and their firstborn child, Bumi, spend time together on Ember Island. Katara finds that the joys of motherhood are more amazing than she could have ever imagined.
Goretober Day 5: Candy/Fruit Gore. An assassin attempts to kill a newly crowned Azula with an unidentified poison from the Foggy Swamp.
When Ozai is crowned Fire Lord without Ursa by his side, the people of the Fire Nation notice, and they draw their own conclusions. Zuko is far from the only one who misses her.

In the Fire Nation, there is a centuries-old tradition known as the Phoenix Season. A time when the daughters of nobles are presented to society for the first time. Most of the high-breed young ladies look eagerly forward to their Season. Ilah, the daughter of a lord, wishes she could skip it altogether. However, her Season might have a few surprises awaiting her.
"I'm not afraid of monsters anymore. I once loved one with all my heart." Tyzula. Oneshot.
Sokkla Saturdays Prompt 1. After finding her wandering around in a daze, Sokka gives Azula his super cozy, comfort pajamas.

Oneshot Winter, Spring, Summer, and Fall. After peacefully ending the Hundred Year War we find Team Avatar at the Jasmine Dragon with Iroh. Join us as we see them enjoy tea together and experience the bond of love. Listen to Iroh sing about love and the four seasons. Bad summary, I know. Please read and review.
Summary: While initially scoffing at her friend's suggestion of taking a hot yoga class, Azula relents. What she didn't expect was to be interested in the instructor.

Because Toph knows everything, she is the first member of Team Avatar to realize how touch starved Zuko is. A short fic in which Toph knows everything, Zuko is touch starved, and Toph's going to help. And maybe spread a little chaos as well. Begins at The Western Air Temple.
Katara loses her necklace, prompting Aang to help her find it. Aang becomes confused and surprised at what he finds, forcing him to figure out what it means. Kataang.
Azula has a therapy komodo rhino that helps keep her safe and cared for when she can't do it herself.

In the height of wedded bliss, during a time for family and new beginnings, who'd ever suspect there were danger lies within? Iroh and his wife Kimana are quite content together, but they're happily ever after is not to be. Their love story will only end in tragedy and betrayal.

They attempt to live normal, peaceful lives; but things happen that challenge the peace they've all worked hard for and threaten to return them to their old ways. - AU of Smoke and Shadow. Sequel to White Fire. -
On the eve of their first wedding anniversary, Aang shows Katara what he has been planning for them. A Kataang oneshot.

Making mochi with her daughter's keeper hadn't been on her list of things to do that day, but Ursa would never turn away a blessing from the universe. Or, mochi bringing out the best in people one sticky ball at a time.
For the prompt: nature. (Writtent for Taang Week 2020). The sparring fic that we all deserve. If things get a little heated, well, that's the nature of sparring.
The war hasn't ended yet, but for a moment, everything is just right.
For the prompt: the past (for Taang Week 2020). Aang reminisces about old times and reflects on what that means for his legacy.
Aang gave her life meaning. He made her life colorful. Taang Oneshot
For the prompt: the future (Written for Taang Week 2020) How Toph and Aang see their future together.
Faint hearts never win fair maidens. [Aang x Katara] [drabble]
A small take of what happened after the fight between Aang and Ozai during Sozin's Comet. Taang Week Entry - Traditional
For the prompt: Spirit world Three times the spirit world impacts the lives of Toph and Aang.

There is a belief in something called the Red Threads of Fate. This Thread is meant to tie you together with your true love. But like anything to do with love, there is this simple fact. You don't find it. It finds you when you least expected. Still, are we ever prepared the day we meet our one true love?

It begins with an innocent question from Lin, and Sokka carving a betrothal necklace. Over the years, Katara watches the story of Sokka and Toph and Lin and Suyin, trying not to feel caught between them. [Cover art by @mayamylove on AO3, used with permission]
Summary: 4 times, the avatar and the fire princess meet each other.
After closing up the shop, Iroh takes a rare opportunity to make tea with his nephew and friends. Tea and fluff.
Aang is sure spicy ice cream could be added to the list of Fire Nation atrocities. Fluff with Zukaang undertones.

Have you ever wondered what was going through Katara's mind during the "Cave of Two Lovers" episode? Well, wonder no more! This fic takes place during the episode and goes into more depth of why Katara did what she did in the episode with Aang, and explains her thoughts and emotions during each important scene.
Based off the prompt: Modern AU Aang works as a lifeguard at the local pools during the summer and happens to save a damsel in distress.
Zuko ruminates on all of the firsts.
A few days after the birth of their first child, Bumi, Aang and Katara take the time to admire how precious he is. A Kataang oneshot.
Zuko meets the prettiest girl in the world and decides he wants to be her boyfriend. [zutara fluff]
Aang has died, but he left a letter. what will happen when his family and friends read it?
"Is this what it's like to be ordinary?" — Azula x Ty Lee. O/S. For RollerYogaDisco
For the prompt 'tradition'. Aang seeks out Toph's father to fulfil an old Earth Kingdom tradition.

One generation's time has come and so the world must evolve. But first, family and friends have to say goodbye. Can be considered AU in some aspects, but mostly sticks to the canon. Kataang. One-shot.
“Mai forgave me. About the Boiling Rock. She wants to start again with me. A clean slate,a new beginning. This is good for us.” We never had a new beginning, Katara screamed.
Takes place right after Jet's death. While Katara and the gang ride off after getting Appa back, she internally gives him what she knows is his last wish. Jetara poem
Quick little thing that I whipped up. First Story posted. Cross posted on A03.
Aang was an Air Nomad through and through. That being said, his concept of home had always shifted around. Aang introspection with Kataang on the side. Oneshot.
After her battle with Hama, Katara can't help but feel horrible for using bloodbending. She's not the person she thought she was. But to one person that couldn't be further from the truth.

After the painted lady leaves, Katara finds she isn't alone on the bank of the river. And he was right; she was beautiful. "...When did I say that?" "Back when you caught me. You said that I was a more attractive spirit before you realized it was just me pretending to be the painted lady." [Pointless one-shot staged after Katara's encounter with the painted lady]
Iroh tries comforts Zuko the first night away from the Fire Nation. But it's hard.
The one-time Commander of the Southern Raiders, Yon Rha, is sentenced to death. How does his fate affect the Waterbender who once spared his life? (Background Kataang, Maiko)
A story about the death of Suki. Sokka and Zuko reminiscing their memories and love to the same girl without breaking their friendship. One-shot.
The girl doesn't know pain, wasn't made for pain. She was made to inflict it. And that, she did well. (for a time)

Chaos builds slowly. A Prophet predicts an age of endless war and doom. Benders are mysteriously losing their ability to bend. And a new foe rises, claiming to be the true heir to the Fire Nation throne. And as Aang searches for the Air Nomads, he learns that by defeating Fire Lord Ozai, he may have unwittingly secured the Fire Nation's victory in a war thought already won...
Zuko sees an apparition. He can't believe she's here after all this time.
Sometimes, the Cabbage Merchant really hates his job. See also: Piandao, the Karen of the Avatarverse. #atla15 prompt Cabbages
A small Zutara poem I wrote whilst I deal with my writer's block for my 'Shattered, Healed' story. Enjoy!

Maybe she wanted to argue more. Maybe she wanted to give him a piece of her mind. Maybe she felt a lot more sorry for him than she had admitted to herself. Maybe she wanted to talk to the one person in this stupid beach house who seemed to be as afraid as she was, and who actually emoted in any semblance of a normal fashion. It was probably the tiredness, in all honesty.
Instead of the Blue Spirit getting knocked out, Aang saves him from the arrow and they make off into the woods. (Season 1, Episode 13 AU.)
Zuko is too late. [zutara angst challenge]

"Hey, I was wondering… Does it not bother you that Aang is still shorter than you, Katara?" (Of course she doesn't mind. Aang is the perfect height for her to... to rest her chin on his head. Yeah, that's it. No other reason.)
Starting from The Southern Raiders episode, Zuko and Katara have three different nights where they learn more about their relationship and feelings toward each other.
Even nightmares go wrong sometimes.
Piandao might be a prick but at least they can read his handwriting.

Sokka turns away from him, illuminated by moonlight. "Yeah, well, what does she know?" He snaps, bitter. "She left her family for duty, too." The waves crash. They sound defeated. [Toph and Sokka explore what family can be, with a little help from Yue. Written for Tokka Week 2020, Day 6: Moonlight, Family. Oneshot.]

Are you confused about human children? Do you wonder where their other four feet went? Is your human child throwing himself into random danger? Is your other human child refusing to take a shower? Fear not! In this wikihow article, I will detail everything you need to be a good bison parents. Step 1: Don't be Ozai. Just. Don't. Please.
Takes place right after the end of the show. Oneshot

Toph stills. "You did this for my baby?" Her voice is a whisper. Swallowing, Sokka nods. "So that they'll have something to remember us by. So they'll know how we felt." [A gift of Sokka's, to Lin. Traced from the moment of creation, to the moment of relinquishment. Oneshot. Written for Tokka Week 2020, Day 4: Vision, Art.]
Rejection hurts, especially when it comes from someone you've loved forever. But luckily the Avatar has that one person who will be there for him no matter what.

Toph shoves the lilacs into his arms, then takes the letter. "I should pound you into next week for that!" Sokka nudges her, "But you won't." She glares towards his direction. "What makes you so sure?" [Somewhere deep in Yu Dao's marketplace, Sokka discovers an old secret of Toph's… and of course, doesn't let her live it down. Written for Tokka Week 2020, Day 3: Knockout. Oneshot.]

Aang had always found Katara beautiful. And while he loved everything about her—from the gentle cascade of ebony hair down her back, the lovely shade her skin got when tinted by a blush, and the way her smile knocked him breathless—if he had to choose just one part, he'd have to pick her eyes.

In the morning, Sokka is still holding her, and it isn't until he wakes up that Toph detangles herself from his arms. They don't mention how they wake up; they don't need to. It's another constitution that came as naturally as the first. [Oneshot. Written for Tokka Week 2020, Day 2. A short story on Tokka through the years, and all the times they serve as the other's constitution.]
Tokka Week 2020 Day 1: Jealousy/Grief: Sokka awakes to a knock at his door, and emotions run high when he receives an unexpected visitor. Oh...and Toph really wants pickles.
Suki and the Kyoshi Warriors take on Azula, Mai and Ty Lee in “Appa’s Lost Days” but this time they win. How does this affect the rest of the story? AU.

"Oh, I don't know," Azula said, shrugging nonchalantly, though her eyes glinted with a malicious mirth. "But if I had to guess… Maybe it had something to do with the royal advisors talking about what a shame it is that someone as dull and plain as her is going to be the next Fire Lady of our great country -" Zuko didn't wait for her to finish. (young!maiko fluff and hurt/comfort.)
Zuko turns out to be a cultivator, Katara learns what an "arbuz" is and everything becomes just a little bit sweeter.
Platonic Zutara. Katara is pregnant with Kya and struggles, but Zuko can help.
A few months after Ozai's defeat, the Gaang stops at Kyoshi Island for a breather. Aang and Katara spend some time goofing off. Rated T for safety.
"Given the opportunity, would you get rid of your scar?" "I don't know." - Katara and Zuko have a chance to talk about what happened down in the catacombs.
Only Katara coming home from a long day of work -Kataang one shot-
Sokka teaches Toph how to dance. S03 E02, The Headband.
This is an Iroh punishing Zuko story taking place after the Blue Spirit. Warning: Corporal Punishment in the form of a spanking of a teenager by a parental figure. Probably a one-shot.
Short little Stories for AZULA WEEK 2020
High school AU, short story
Aang has a new trick for his family. Cute and short Kataang fluff for soul
The night after Ember Island Players Aang and Katara can't sleep.
A snack-run leaves Zuko in some hot water with Katara's older brother. Zutara. One-shot. Just overall ridiculous.
An unspecified number of years post-series, only partly comic-compliant, ignores LOK. Katara surprises Aang.
A collection of Fire Nation drabbles. / 1. Zuko regrets conquering the Southern Water Tribe.

It should have been lonely, yet it wasn't. Katara supposed that to be lonely required thinking about the people that she wanted to have around her, but all she could think about was Aang, and he was right there: motionless on the bed. It had been a week and he'd still yet to so much as stir. Or, Katara and the three weeks that she spends at Aang's bedside after he (almost) dies.
After the events in the catacombs under the Earth Kingdom palace, Zuko struggles to rectify the situation with what Azula swears will happen once they return to the Fire Nation. [Oneshot] [Rule 63]
Katara surpises Aang. Cute Kataang fluff for heart

He's pretty sure Suki is gonna break up with him today. He could feel it in the air—her distant stare to her hand clutching his a little too tight. This past week he's been trying to give her space to figure things out. And if he's honest with himself, he's also providing space to himself and trying to avoid the inevitable. Sukka week day one: Post Canon
[one-shot] ... Had it really come to this? A duel with a child. He knew his brother to be cruel, but why had his nephew agreed?
Katara lies between her teeth. She hates him. This morning brings regrets. [zutara, one-shot]
Aang and Katara have been together for a month, but Aang is wondering what happened during the play on Ember Island.

Fire Lord Zuko doesn't sleep well since months since his feelings for Suki keeps his mind occupied. At another midnight walk through the Royal Gardens he finds Sokka and his sister at a pavilion and seeks for an advise how to tell Suki that he's in love with her... Inspired by a flirting talk out of Star Trek: The Next Generation between Guinan and Riker

Ozai is summoned by the Firelord for a talk. His son's motives are a mystery to him, but perhaps playing along with the game will bring about the answer as to why Zuko is suddenly looking for information on Azulon.
On a sleepless night, Zuko discovers some forgotten memories. (Zuko-centric, post-war, pre-comics)

*Ozai rolled his eyes, "Zuko, I burned you because you are weak. You were a pathetic bender and you were naive. I need to set you straight, teach you a lesson." You Will Learn Respect and Suffering Shall be your Teacher. (OR) Zuko confronts Ozai after the war and it doesn't go as well as he hopes.
Inspired by the song Here. Oneshot: Ty lee and Azula convince Mai to go to a party with them. After meeting someone there, she doesn‘t regret coming too

Oneshot: inspired by the song Heather. Mai thinks about her feelings towards Zuko and the pain his relationship with katara causes in her. When zuko realizes his true feelings, it‘s too late. Disclaimer: I don‘t own a:tla
Oneshot: azula, mai and ty lee are in class when the teacher gives them the task to talk about their families.
War never gives opporunity to love...Or so he thought, after all, he was still a teenager. One that was madly in love.
"You shouldn't leave your window unlocked, sweetheart, a criminal might come in," and she can tell that he's smirking as his wooden mask brushes her face. [zutara/blutara, modern!au, oneshot]

Slight AU one-shot. What if Aang had never done anything to show Katara how he felt? This one-shot explores what likely would have happened if Aang had never done anything to tell her how he felt during the show, and how the tension between them from keeping their feelings bottled up inside would likely have ended up with something like this. Kataang.

Katara gets stood up on a Tinder date, but clicks with the cute barista, Zuko. Just a cute little Zutara drabble. The title comes from All Time Low's song, "Coffee Shop Soundtrack". It's a bop. You should definitely check it out.

They're just a different kind, and when Katara spots Zuko alone on the beach one night, she explains just that. "A copper piece for your thoughts?" "Since when have I become an open book to you?" "Zuko, you're nearly as easy to read sometimes as Aang is; especially when something is bothering you"
They were bound to find out anyway, except this isn't how they'd envisioned it. — ZukoKatara.

Now that LOK is airing on Netflix, a lot of focus is on Korra. This slowpoke however just finished writing a story that is taking place in the Avatar - the last airbender eera. Feel free to enjoy some extra stories of the original Team avatar. I wrote two chapters of an alternative universe. The story starts halfway book 2 when a unsuspected plottwist happens..
What if… instead of Katara being the one captured in The Waterbending Scroll, it was Sokka? Let's just say Zuko should be glad he took Katara.

After 3 years of the war ending, everything goes wrong once more: Ozai escapes from prison, Azula is having life changing decisions and Ty Lee is dealing with really strange nightmares, old friends return and some others leave, all while the Gaang faces their most powerful enemy ever, what will happen now? (Warnings on first chapter)
Ty Lee runs into Azula in the beach house's kitchen in the middle of the night. Drabble.
Zuko and Azula are dragons. Lmao. Oneshot
The weight of being alone while surrounded can be devastating.
While trying to cling onto her daughter Kiyi, Ursa reminisces on a time when her other daughter Azula was a small child and things were a bit simpler.
after finding a interdimensioal portal in Idaho, the US military and AAAS lead a research operation in this new world.(one shot)
AU Katara is the one shot by Azula instead of Aang and he must now save her. Kataang
On their home at Air Temple Island, Aang takes the time to admire Katara. There were many words that could be used to describe her, but Aang thought only one was appropriate.

A series of the water-tribe betrothal necklace and its new owners as time goes on. Kya getting proposed, to Katara getting her hands on the necklace, to her obtaining her own in her future and her daughter. Rated T on just the subject on death/ grief.
What happens when Katara refuses to give in? Let's find out.
Aang just maybe falls for another best friend and he just hopes this doesn't end up the same as last time. Taang, Zutara, and Sukka.
Azula, Ty Lee, and a chance meeting at a tavern in the rural Fire Nation. Tyzula. Oneshot.

The GAang is back together months after the war has ended. They are taking a vacation to visit the (not so) Secret Tunnel and properly enjoy the crystals and encounter some badgermoles. There's no way they can get lost with two earthbenders - right? Chaos and shenanigans disrupt what was supposed to be a relaxing trip - and Katara discovers that she can be just as awkward as Zuko.
Atla femslash week: Day 6, Second Chances. Azula struggles to recover and make the most of her second chance. Mai helps her work through it.
Katara wants a baby, but Zuko is a little hesitant. Can he cure her baby fever?

ATLA Femslash Week Day 5: Summary: Katara sees Azula without her makeup for the first time, and finds that she's actually kind of squishy. Katara makes a habit of squishing a very grumpy princess' cheeks. Basically unrepentant fluff.
The last hours of the Fire Lady, surrounded by her family.

Super quick Sukka fanfic about what happens when Katara finds some of Suki's war makeup on Sokka's shirt before he told her about their relationship. Family fluff, T for language. Pretty mild otherwise. Featuring Toph being Toph.
Katara was having a bad day. The pressure of becoming the Fire Lord's bride was simply more than she could bear. Maybe they were better off as friends...
ATLA Femslash Week, Day 2: Wedding. Azula (a transman) tries on a tux for the first time since the transition. Suki reflects upon the struggles Azula had to face before and during the transition.
Set during "The Firebending Masters," Katara tries to work out her messy feelings towards Aang and Zuko. Luckily, Toph has a way to help her.
Avatar Femslash Week Day 1: Role Swap. Azula betrays TyLee at the Boiling Rock.
Zuko wasn't expecting to be accepted into the group very quickly. He didn't expect the Avatar's lemur to be the first to do so either. [Disclaimer: I do not own ATLA] [Oneshot] [Season 3 ATLA]

It has been ten years since the Hundred Year War ended. Katara and Aang haven't seen each other in five years after a break up. At the 10th year anniversary, they will finally meet again. But will it be too late? Kataang, Sukka, Maiko COMPLETED

Mai was not a fan of triviality. Actions demanded intent, gifts required purpose. What was the point of a 'present' with no meaning behind it? What was the point of thoughtless actions, of careless gifts? Simply put - there wasn't one. Mai knew this firsthand. (Mai often wonders if she is enough. Zuko knows she is.)

Katara is spending an afternoon at the local tea shop near Ba Sing Se University finishing up a paper for class. Zuko is a server at his Uncle's tea shop. A few pots and pans fall on Zuko's head and Katara is there to patch him up. Lots of fluff and cuteness. Modern AU with bending. Zutara

Post-war, Sokka goes on a shopping trip to replace boomerang and to ponder the changes that have taken place, especially for Katara, since Zuko joined the group. In the marketplace, he sees two cloaked figures and follows them, believing them to be pro-Ozai assassins. However, what he finds might be different, and his worldview may require some adjustments.
If they're not going to be late, one of them has to move. But neither really wants to, and neither really does. — ZukoKatara.

Welcome to the Fire Nation Royal Palace's waiting hall, where innocent Earth Kingdom citizens break out in a cold sweat because why the hell would the new Fire Lord want to talk to them? (Mai would like to know, too.)

She hated the rain... well, maybe that was taking it a bit too far, but when Katara falls prey to a small bout of sickness, and she is forced to stay inside because of the tiny water droplets that fell from the sky, maybe it really wasn't going too far. But who knows.. maybe the rain isn't so bad after all. [Kataang One-shot. It's a terrible summary, but you should read anyway.]

Takes place after "The Headband". The Gaang have all escaped the dance party and avoided the headmaster's wrath, and are looking for a place to stay for the night. As they find a place and try to get some sleep, Katara finds that she's too happy to rest and goes for a walk, not noticing that Aang wants to join her. What will happen when she and Aang talk about their magical night?
A rewrite of the dance party in "The Headband." What if the headmaster came ten minutes later? Aang decides he wants to let Katara know how he feels, but how will she take it? Kataang, Oneshot.

Kataang Week 2020, PDA. Aang and Katara had never been shy about showing their affections towards one another in public, especially after being married for two years. But maybe they were too predictable.

She is the moon and he is the sun. Zuko reflects on every stage of his relationship with Katara. They've been through war and desolation, betrayal and redemption. Will he lose her now when he's finally discovered what she means to him? One-shot fanfic for Zutara Week 2020 covering all themes to some degree. Canon complicit until ending.

Dawn travels to Pallet Town to see Ash, in hopes of persuading him to join her on a journey. After six months at home, Ash will need some convincing. This story takes place two years before Pokémon: Return to Kalos.

Following the post-game events of Pokemon Super Mystery Dungeon and ever onward, this is the story of the human turned Snivy Vallion, his Fennekin partner Panne, and the industrious world which grows and swells around them.

After getting dragged into a trip to Alola with Ash and Goh, Chloe gets suspicious of Ash's secrecy on his past and seemingly not being the goofball she always thought he was. After the trip takes a sudden turn for the worse, Chloe starts to truly wonder if Ash is what he originally seems... AshxChloe. Set right after Pokemon Journeys episode 66.
In the aftermath of the Alolan league, Ash's old friends and family reflect and wish the boy who had helped him so much well...

Serena's quite grateful she's made friends in May and Dawn while on Pokemon contest circuit. Unfortunately, Kalos has a far healthier drinking culture than Hoenn, and one night, when May has a bit too much to drink, they end up on the topic of the men in their lives.
Nate wanted to do something special for his girlfriend, Yancy. What Yancy didn't know was that Nate's special date would be a lot more than what she was expecting...

This is a story I wrote in 3rd grade. I am aware of the bad grammar and also am aware that it is unfinished. I am creating this to compare my current talent to my previous work. If you see repeated character names when I post my new story(s), I want you to know that I created these characters in advance. If you want me to redo this story I can. I don't own pokemon. (Oneshot)
Sometimes the weather forces you to take a break. And that's fine, too.
In the world of "Gates to Infinity" a totally-nott-a-human Tepig finds himself before a mysterious store that offers to change the world for a price... and much more than that. AO3 crosspost.
In her final moments, a Riolu ponders the gentlest way to break someone's heart. (MAJOR PSMD SPOILERS)

After giving some advice to Max on how to keep someone in their heart, Ash decides to visit the friend he was referring to when he gave that advice. But on his way there, a question he never had answered comes back to him, and he decides today's the day he finds out the answer. A Pokeshipping collaboration with HollyLu.
Yes.
Loosely connected one-shots showing various years of Serena's life leading up to her eventual reunion with Ash. Amourshipping, mentioned laserbladeshipping. Inspired by the song by Keane.
Ash invited his friends to a cafe, but he is instead joined by a mysterious but familiar looking woman. Perhaps she can help Ash with his recent feelings? (One shot)

Absol is infamously portrayed as a harbinger of death and destruction in human folklore, even though all absol wants to do is protect the people of its home region. So what would happen when an absol had had enough of receiving such unfair treatment? What if that absol was to adopt its role as a doom-bringer as retribution to show the humans what a "real monster" is?
Dwalt tries his usual mayhem. Though, it seems that luck is not on his side this time.

Ash and Dawn briefly reunite to pay an old friend a visit. During this time, past memories are brought up and something new is discovered, reminding them of the bond they once shared. As they prepare to go their separate ways once again, the two have one final chance to confess to each other how they truly feel. Pearlshipping Day one shot.

Dawn (Engineer) and Green (Medic) make an chilling discovery while experimenting with a teleporter, while Rosa (Scout) tries to finally ask out her crush Nate (Miss Pauling) out for a date, but she will need all the help she can get.
Ash is participating in the Tournament of the Strongest, an annual Tournament. Contains Amourshipping
A poem comparing Xerneas, Yveltal, and Zygarde.
He marvels that these common words—"I love you"—can still have such an effect upon him. In which Falkner gets tired of dancing around his feelings. Falkner, Janine, HGSS fatherlyshipping.
It's a known fact that Eevee should have more new evolutions, so I have made some of my own.
Magnemite learns that their team leaders got chased out of town, and, despite their worry, all they can do is hope everything's okay. Rescue Team Red/Blue/DX one shot.

Becoming Champion was fun, but Diana is ready for real research. Unfortunately, Lusamine's actions had consequences, and Diana has to fix them. Saving the world is one thing, she's done it before. But doing it while knee-deep in family secrets and missions from the international police? That's new. (Moon version's postgame)
During a walk together, Pikachu and the Pichu Bros encounter Meowth. When he corners them in a gym, Pikachu has no choice but to fight.
The world's newest Pokemon Trainer has begun her journey. Armed with her ancestry, her skills, and her new starter Pokemon, Danica is ready to make her mark on the world.
A story of Ash’s perspective on his relationship with his partner Pikachu. A very heart warming story of their unbreakable bond, Pikashipping.

This is a slice of life with original characters. It follows a boy as he progresses through the pivotal portion of his life. Rather than run out to have adventures with a Starter, he settles into his own unique niche. There is a purpose, but it is secondary to Easter Eggs, character development, and just the general feel of realistically living in the Pokemon world.

This is the story of an Heir, a young Pokémon who is to succeed his father, as King of their Kingdom; however, after the Heir's paternal uncle murders the king, The Heir is manipulated into thinking he was responsible and flees into exile. Story Image does not belong to me. It Belongs to "ManaphyLovers18" on Deviantart.

Ash had always been a positive person. He had always maintained a positive attitude through pretty much anything. The Kalos group had only seen him in a bad mood once, in Snowbelle City. One day, on their way to the Kalos League, he woke up feeling quite depressed. What can his friends do to help him out? (Amourshipping, Insectivoreshipping, Iconshipping)

With the Gym Challenge over, Sapphire has no desire to succeed Ruby as Champion. She instead turns her eye towards the Isle of Armour, an island that has great trials for trainers to try their hand at. But she soon ends up with more than she bargained for when a vengeful Pokemon from Mustard's past comes back with murder on its mind. Can Sapphire defeat this Pokemon...?
In which Professor Mirror has to remind his team to not eat random plants they come across at camp. New Snap one shot, slight crack.

Why? Why do I suffer? If not for these damn humans, I would still be free… but being caught does not bother me too much, as I know my two brothers, Terrakion and Cobalion will come and help me. I hear screams, looks like they are here…
It is the Sinnoh League Finals between Bobby and Tobias. Who will win? Read and find out!

ONE-SHOT original by writer Kaelstrider. READ DISCLAIMER. AshxHarem / AshxMulti. CHARACTERS: Ash, Misty, May, Dawn, Iris, Serena, Mallow, Lillie, Lana. PAIRINGS: Pokéshipping, Advanceshipping, Pearlshipping, Negaishipping, Amourshipping, Alolashipping, Aureliashipping, Blueangelshipping.
One-shot. The ground is discolored, the air is stale, sound doesn't work correctly, and the world is far, far too quiet.

After another embarrassing incident with his sister asking a random woman to 'take care of' her brother, one of Clemont's inventions explodes, endangering Bonnie. A devastated Clemont feels awful about this and blames himself. He then tells his friends that he is giving up on science and inventing for good.

Forced on a vacation, the young Pokemon Rehabiliator Nori Carino has a battle with a fellow trainer north of Mahogany Town. Yet both him and his opponent have things they don't want the other knowing...

After getting a makeover by team rocket and being laughed at by Ash, Misty tries to take advice from her famous sensational sisters. but she may not need their advice to woo Ash. Pure fluff with humour

Pikachu and Ash are on another adventure when they run into a mean Garbodor and attacks them! Pikachu of course defeats it and it runs away. However, this Garbodor is actually very sensitive and was depressed to the point where he needed help. Pikachu comes to help him back on his feet. Oneshot.
A broken-hearted trainer and an adopted pokémon come into each others' lives, each wondering if the scars of their past will ever heal.

Ash, Brock, and Dawn arrive in Selenia Town on the eve of the annual Cresselia Festival. Ash and Dawn can't help but enter into a tournament that could see them meeting the Legendary Cresselia, but as they reunite with old friends and discover new ones, it gradually becomes clear that something sinister is afoot.
To kiss her is like living an eternal summer, that season he loves so much. PokéShipping drabble, written by ClaudiaDaro.
This is one of Pikachu’s happy memories of how Ash comforted him when he went through a tramatic experience and needed support. Ash would always be there for him when he needed it most. Pikashipping.

What if Ash started in the Kalos region instead of Kanto. It's mostly going to be based off the game, and I'm going to make a parody about it and treat it seriously at the same time. It's a triple genre of Humor, Parody and Romance.
After the events of Rescue Team's main story, Gengar reflects on his situation. PMD1/PMD5 one shot.

An arrogant young prince and the castle's servants fall under the spell of a wicked enchantress, who turns the prince into a hideous Monster until it learns to love and be loved in return. When A spirited, headstrong village girl enters the Monster's castle to Save her father, she begins to draw the cold-hearted Monster out of isolation with the help of the enchanted servants.

This is the story of how I died over a Pikachu who was too adorable to even breathe upon. Believe me, I have tried EVERYTHING to avoid it, but it was simply inevetible. Read if you want you witness how it happened. Enjoy!

Ash and Misty are set up with each other by good old Brock. But they don't know it yet. What will happen when they officially go on a date for the first time and find each other? Will things be awkward as hell or will they actually confess their feelings? My first work. Written a long time ago. Pokeshipping.
Misty was captured, but apparently escaped with the help of a little yellow pal.
A boy... his family... and the event that drove him to be who he is today... (Oneshot based on the backstory of Luke from 'The Shattered Sword')

Giovanni and a few of his trusted agents and employees get the chance to spend the day at the Hano Grand Resort. However problems start to arrive when Wendy loses her coin purse and finding it might be more trouble than it's worth. Oneshot, rated T for cursing. I think I cursed. I probably cursed. There was a typo in the title whoops!
Nice little Froslass shares time with her trainer. There might be something between them! Ronny, her trainer, certainly is the gentleman!
Sometimes a good bond between Pokeboys is just farting lol.
A hypothetical article about how the Battle Bond ability works from an in-universe perspective.

"Saint Bonapisa's good luck for trainers," Cass told me once. Maybe she should've kept some of that luck for herself. The drifblim was still following me, but if Lake Valor was what Cass wanted, then I'd find a way to get her there. COMPLETE.
After saving the world, a human and their partner long to see each other again, even if the laws of reality prohibit it. An alternate epilogue to Gates to Infinity. Oneshot.
A coordinator's beloved pokemon is stolen from her.

A year after becoming a couple, Serena, Ash's Sylveon-Human Hybrid girlfriend is finally ready to head to Kalos and reunite with her parents. However, Ash's status as Alolan Champion and Serena being a hybrid begins to attract unexpected attention, putting their relationship through its toughest challenge yet. Sequel to "Intertwined". Second Story of the "Tied in Love" Trilogy.
