A challenger approached, one Dakota Ryder never saw coming, probably because he wasn't more than a dandelion. He had guts. She'd give him that, but her trainer days were over and she wasn't about to pick up her belt for a squiggly wiggly little bellsprout. Unfortunately, the language of flowers was complicated and weeds were notorious for taking root in the unlikeliest of places.
Wendy and Domino attempt to enjoy a snow day together. One-shot with light cussing. Also the Wendy tagged is not the one from Pokémon Ranger: Shadows of Almia, she is a one-off team rocket grunt.

After Ash's Mt. Silver training is cut short, a letter from Iron Island catches his attention, and he takes up an offer from his old acquaintance, Riley. Even as he acquires new skills, and a new dear friend, he's left wondering just which path he should take next on his road to mastery. Meanwhile, Dawn is wondering the very same thing! Sequel to Another Road Repaved - The Climb.
When Clemont leaves to prepare for his Gym Battle against Ash, it falls to Serena to take care of his little sister Bonnie while he's away.
Ash wakes up from a two-year coma and realizes that pokémon isn't real.
Evelyn (Glaceon) and Ryu are not on speaking terms and Eevee and Sylveon are there to pick up the pieces. A short, comforting episode before the drama-fueled Year 4 begins.

Serena and Ash are about to go their separate ways, Serena feels unsure of her future. All she knows is that she doesn't want to say goodbye. But, maybe this goodbye might be more special than she thinks.

May returns to Hoenn after her journey in Unova. There she runs into Serena, whom May realizes shares a similar bond that she once had with a certain trainer, reminding her of that boy and bringing back memories of the past. May agrees to help Serena get with him, but can she overcome her feelings that she thought were a thing of the past? Advanceshipping, Amourshipping.

With their Expedition Gadget broken and work an impossibility, a pair of explorers find themselves trying to figure out what to do with an unexpected day off. (short, fluffy Pokemon Super Mystery Dungeon oneshot)

This takes place after the end of Pokémon Sun & Moon Episode 146 - "Thank You, Alola". Just as Ash leaves the Alolan region, Kukui & Burnet are wondering what are they going to do; without their "Alolan" son. It will be a rough time for them, as they both admit that they truly miss Ash, & want him to be a permanent member of their family. Prequel to "Ash's Alolan Family Surprise"
Chloe has a heartfelt birthday surprise for Ash. General Friendship themes, but maybe a spark of Bloomboltshipping / SatoKoha if you want to look into it that way.

Traveling together through Johto, May and Drew will have problems with trying to figure out if they like each other beyond rivals and friends. Problems arise, new Pokémon are caught, Contests are won. All while journeying together through Johto. ContestShipping!
Reshiram and Zekrom share a few words with each other before the battle that will decide the fate of humans and Pokėmon. (Pokėmon Black)
A seance gone wrong as Hex Maniacs and Channelers are cut down in droves! It's up to Phoebe alone to stop the enraged Ghost-types!
In which Professor Mirror gets a rather questionable research idea. New Snap one shot.

Bede has just been kicked out of the Galarian Gym Challenge. Now he is thrusting for revenge against for the people responsible, for his expulsion from the challenge. However unbeknownst to him, he is getting watched from the distance, by a certain someone. Set prior to Chapter 1 of Will of a Champion. [TWO SHOT] Formally known as Fifty Shades of Pink.

Misty is in the middle of her training under Lorelei, in preparation to become the latter's successor in the Elite Four. After a long day, the former Cerulean Gym Leader will learn that her mentor has a lot more to offer than just battle training, including some heart-to-heart advice to deal with long-distance relationships. Prequel of "Water vs Ice".
Takes place near the end of a chilling curse Please read and review
A story told by Pikachu about the love Ash brings to him. Their tight bond is unbreakable, they would do anything for each other.
Just a simple One shot Of Victor X Marnie; A Punkblade fanfic

A Pokémon adventure heavily based off the HeartGold and SoulSilver games. Embark with young Pokémon Trainer Ethan as he sets to make a name for himself across the Johto region encountering wild Pokémon, trainers, gym leaders and even the evil Team Rocket.

He was just in time to see her arms slipping away from the rope before being raggedly thrown across the big rock. This isn't happening. He found himself thinking and was almost over the edge before arms pulled him backwards. Read to find out how a string of events changed the seemingly happy and innocent picnic day into one of terror for Paul and his family.

Mermaids. They're born in the sea, they live in the sea, and then one night they wake up and decide that they don't belong in the sea. That's the way it is...until one young princess asks a question that turns the whole story upside down. An anti-Little Mermaid story; contains minor Advanceshipping
Silent surveillance footage from a gas station south of Eterna City captures glimpses of an otherworldly visitor. Reality-warping antics ensue.
Moments away from Vermillion City, Ethan dreams of his fated rematch with Red. A one-shot that hopefully becomes a full story.
Rated T for certain slapstick humor.

A harsh defeat has completely crushed Gary Oak's spirits. Determined to recover from it, he swallows his pride and decides to seek help with a certain veteran trainer-turned-novelist, whom he believes might help him find what he lacks to become a better trainer and come back stronger. Part of the Pokémon Reset Bloodlines universe. Knowledge of the main story is highly recommended.

Miykui is the bess fanfiction aboot a normat girl who find INCREDIBIL things vias a PROFECY. she falls in love with silver and thry're in luv. miyuki gets a celbi as her startere and is the best traner in pokemon!
Immediately following XY episode 63 (A Fork In The Road! A Parting Of The Ways!), Jessie and James have a heart to heart, discussing Jessie's love for...Team Rocket.
Serena is pregnant, and Clemont's mind is wrecked with bad possibilities.
This is a series of short stories that reflect on Ash and his Pikachu’s relationship and their strong bond with each other. These stories are meant to be cute and light hearted. So enjoy!

Ash was Under the Care of Forbidden Pokémon in the Forbidden Pokémon Zone ever since Magearna discovered him as a baby. One day during a fight with an unknown Forbidden Pokémon leaving him injured, he falls through a portal to the human world only for Professor Burnet and Professor Kukui to Rescue and Heal Him. What secrets of the past will he discover with this family?
Matt looks for love in a utopia. Betaadminadshipping, ORAS Team-Aqua-wins AU.
Gary Oak gets poisoned when Umbreon goes crazy under the moonlight of a blue moon.
Misty is a girl with an orange fragrance and acid words [Anipoke SatoKasu/Pokeshipping]. Original written by ClaudiaDaro.

Serena gasped upon feeling how much she hated this Ash. [Anipoke Ash & Caprice!Serena] Distorted version of the "Ash yells at Serena" scene. Not quite a SatoSere, but it depends on the reader's perspective. Original written by ClaudiaDaro.
Love is a sweet but funny thing, as May finds out when she works up the courage to tell Ash how she feels. Advanceshipping Oneshot
"You think Misty is pretty." "...I already said that." "You've said it every night this past week, after all." "Well, that's because it's true!" OneShot Pokeshipping
The 4 Part Finale of My Series Ash Ketchum the Half Ghost Knight Hero as a One Shot. All 4 Parts COMBINED INTO 1!

Ash and Pikachu always go on adventures together to spend some bonding time. However, they manage to get into trouble and Ash becomes paralyzed! There is no one to help take care of Ash execpt Pikachu. Ash has always been there for Pikachu when he needed help, now it is Pikachu’s turn to care for Ash and take on the responsbillites!

With strange sightings in the Wetlands in Kalos, Professor Cerise sends Ash and his friends to investigate. Wondering if legendary Pokemon are at the core of the mystery, and with a Pokemon Coronation Series battle festival approaching, Ash is eager to embrace the challenge. Old friends and old rivals return in this three part story.
Tierno takes Trevor out dancing in the middle of the night. Takes place after XY.

In the year 2019, all is well, until the Big Event happens. All of a sudden, 30% of the human population have become Pokemon! As the world goes to hell all around, Lucas must cling to whatever sanity he has left. Percentverse AU TF fic. Rated T for Teen. I do not own the cover.

It's a typical day for Jessie, James and Meowth as they search for rare and valuable Pokémon to steal. That is until a mischievous baby with a heart of gold crawls into their bag when they're not looking!
Chloe is sent on a sudden task from her father while the boys are busy. Along the way, she meets a Kalosian girl gives her some life advice. Slight Amourshipping hints.

The stories of Arcana continue in this second installment in the Crimson Fury Trilogy. As all of the regions of the world gather for the largest Pokémon Tournament ever to be held, the fractured remnants of the evil Syndicate return in force to wreak havoc on all who would dare oppose them. Loyalties will be tested, grudges will be upheld and no one is safe from Mewtwo's wrath!
"Ash Ketchum, are you jealous?" she asked with playfulness. Is Ash Ketchum really jealous because of her? Does this mean even he likes her? Misty blushed at her thoughts. poke shipping. AAML

Although he has cared for pokemon before, this is only his first one. As times goes, despite their blossoming friendship, their situation keeps getting worse. By now a member of the elite four would not be able to handle this. How is he supposed to?
Brock goes out to search for Ash only to find himself stuck in a bind.
Pearlshipping. And domestic fluff.
Good things come to those who wait, unless Serena's the one waiting.

A really, REALLY old piece of writing of mine I found in my OneDrive after I got bit by the writing bug again. It was inspired by an amazing AshxLatias fic. I've written a lot when I was young but never uploaded. I figured this, though old, was good enough that some people might be able to enjoy it. Ash argues with Pikachu, Pikachu and Glaceon fluff, Brock and Gary talk history.
When a human boy turns into a Lucario, he then meets a new friend in Togetic and together they have to convince a powerful Pokemon to stop an incoming meteor before it's too late.
Ash has secretly been thinking about Dawn to the point where he can't sleep. What is this about? Cast older, Pearlshipping, one-sided Amourshipping, mentioned Contestshipping
Serena has trouble with her Physics exams. Trevor advises her to find a tutor. Clemont is too glad to help.

I've seen some stories like this on ao3,, thought I'd give it a shot. Ash wants to end it all, but must convince others not to go the same way he does. Finally, he meets someone who feels the same, but tries to end it all the same. TW for attempted suicide and hints (if you squint) of child abuse.
Misty and Brock visit Alola, but something happened, and Misty is forced to finally confront her feelings.
After winning his second gym badge in Unova, Ash decided to bring his reserve pokemon for Unova league where he decided to train his old and new pokemon together.
One of my requests I created on Tumblr. Read it, enjoy and Long live Tumblr
Proton is hungover and can't deal with Lance's remark.
A poem comparing Nincada to real life cicadas.
This just showed up in my email

Experience the Pokemon World in a brand new way unlike anything before. No Trainers, no people. Just pokemon in their natural Habitat. Come with us as we explore the World of Pokemon through every ecosystem across the planet. Written with my good friend Jexi the hunter. Inspired by the Netflix Documentary Series, Our Planet, and Narrated by David Attenborough.

With a bunch of pound-reject pokemon like a rattata and a blind and deaf eevee, one trainer tries to change the world. A science loving OC-insert reincarnation fic. Warning for briefly mentioned suicide by the OC in past life and violence. (Note: Pro-slavery characters are NOT reliable narrators. Can't believe I have to clarify that...) Complete.

Champions, Elite trainers, gym leaders, friend and family from all the regions were in here to celebrate. People and pokemon were dancing. Food and drinks were flowing. The ballroom was full of cheer. Everyone was is a great mood except for the honey blonde sitting in the corner. She was a little sick of all the love in the air.

Jasmine's never been one to speak her mind. Now, with a little help from an unlikely source, her lips won't stay sealed. On the night of the Sinnoh Summit, what's a girl to do? Embarrass herself on global television, maybe. Let down the Kanto-Johto League. Or tell Volkner the truth—that she's in love with him.
he ate a fucking apple

Ash was never one to be eloquent with words; taking action was always his greatest specialty. However, when it comes to a certain action with a certain redhead, it's a slightly different story. OneShot Pokeshipping
It's fine to be busy, but sometimes, you just have to visit the local Virbank City cafe and just enjoy life for a bit, you know? (One shot, slice of life)

When Venus Wisteria-Kosaburo takes Mightyena for a walk around the city, she finds a poor, abandoned Skitty, in need of a home. Modern-ish AU. HisuiShipping! aka Butch x OC! Fluffy! Plus little hints of Rocketshipping, and Cassidy x HR!Wendy.

A year after becoming the first Champion of Alola, the Champion reflects on what it means to be a Champion and starts to doubt herself until her team comforts her. SI/OC-centered. My reflection piece on my original run of Pokémon Moon. Slight spoilers for the ending of Sun and Moon.

In this week's episode of Scyther High, Night Terror wants to woo his sweetheart (and fellow Scyther) Scythe at a house party, but untold obstacles await him. Written for April Fool's Day and lovingly inspired by Dragonfree's visual novel Sutoraiku High (oh, and please don't sue me, Free).

When a princess of an underwater kingdom doesn't want to rule there are always going to be problems. But Pulse wants nothing more than to be able to spend time with her best friend, and she'll do anything to get out of her royal duties. But she might find that her desire not to rule is granted in quite a different way to what she thinks...
Detective May interrogates her friends (mssrs. Leaf, Gary, Ash, Drew, Dawn, and Paul) to discover who stole the last liechi berry cone that belonged to her.
That boy just can't stop farting.
A horrible nightmare brings out all of Ash's worst fears. Just when it seems like he won't be able to go back to sleep, someone finds him. Will Ash find peace with her help? Advanceshipping

When Hop finds out that Leon has endorsed two other Trainers for the Gym Challenge, Hop wants to know all about them - including what they did to catch his brother's eye. Turns out, one of them catches Hop's eye, too - but for a completely different reason. (Or, Hop develops his first crush, and Leon helps him through it.) [Hop x Schildemilia]

Follow the Pokemon Adventure of Buck Dorwind, a trainer from Pallet City who aspires to be the best! This is a Novelization of the Kanto Storyline (from Red and Blue) Taken place many years after the exploits of Ash! I hope you all read, enjoy, and review! Edit: Novel concluded with a shocking and abrupt end that aims to shock and surprise!
An alternate timeline of Ash after he lost the Indigo League. Here, he meets a mysterious man named Cyrus.

After their time in Kalos, Ash and Serena go to the Galar region for what would be their sixth anniversary of dating, while ether the two catch a Pokemon and Give it to Bonnie as a gift. What Pokemon will they catch? And what will happen with Ash and Serena during their time in Galar? Only I know. But read to find out. Amourshipping one-shot. Read and Review.

This is my first fanfiction as well as my first Pokémon fanfiction. It's a Pokémon version of The Looney Tunes Show Episode, Double Date. And I decided to focus it on my most favorite Pokémon Ship, Umbreon x Sylveon. I hope you like it.

The Lily of the Valley Conference was Ash Ketchum's greatest showing yet. Naturally, the trainer from Pallet Town wasn't satisfied with that! Reflecting on his past choices, Ash decides to focus on growing alongside the loyal roster of pokémon he's already accumulated, with the same goal in mind they've always shared; to be the very best! Part 1 of a reboot of Another Road.
Eight times the Roswell siblings came to terms with their feelings. Eight times the Copper siblings let themselves relish within their feelings.
It's the night before Ash's Fortree gym battle, and May's got something on her mind. What happens when she shares her troubles with Ash? The answer might surprise her. Advanceshipping
This is a series of shipping fanfics that I am writing between various characters in Pokémon Masters EX and the female protagonist for a fan otome game that I am planning to make.
Suicune takes some time reflect on its new life as one of Goh's Pokémon.

He'll shatter the heavens one day, because that's what a hero does. Hilbert returns from Unova with an odd partner for an even odder experience during Sinnoh's Gym Challenge. He'll learn, change, adapt; And any wall that stands in his way, well, you know what they say about drills. A very unserious Journey fic, a lame pun for a title, and a hell of a lotta Gurren Lagann references.
Glitchy returns to Kanto to re-challenge the Gym Leaders

Ash has completely forgot about valentines day and had to lie to his girlfriend the most popular girl in school May Maple What will happen to Ash and May relationship will in work out or will it fall (has brief strong language)
A journey's end at the throat of the world. What is there left for Kris to do? Throw down.
Ash and Goh travel to Hoenn for a World Coronation Series event. While Ash battles, Goh ends up meeting a young performer from Kalos. This is one idea for how Serena could appear in Pokémon Journeys.
This tells the Pokemon point of view when they watch Ash compete in the first Alola Pokemon League

This is a series of shipping fanfics that I am writing between various characters in Pokémon Masters EX and the female protagonist. This story takes place after ‘New World Dilemma' in Pokémon Masters EX.
Formerly Femboi Ash Part 2 of Trap Ash Ash has been dressing as a girl for a while, but what happens when a strange letter adressed to him comes to the lab.

Things between Goh and Chloe were fine, until Ash arrived and changed the whole dynamic. A silly argument between old friends leads them to rediscovering why they became friends in the first place, with a little help from Ash the Wise. Friendship fic for the Journey's trio. No shippy stuff, not even if you squint.
May, Brendan, and Wally make a perfect trio when it comes to both rivalries and dating.
A spoof dex entry comparing Lickitung and Greninja.

A story based on a piece of artwork. After trying to solve a missing Pokemon case, Detective Pikachu is captured and finds out exactly what this kidnapper wants: a test subject. (Pokemon belongs to Nintendo)
After losing to Brawly, Ash is having some trouble sleeping at night. When he goes to get a midnight snack, someone unexpected is there as well. What happens next? Light Advanceshipping

The years for Unova have gone by Iris the Grand Champion of Unova and Ash Ketchum have a set of twins. Soot and Rosa, their caretaker Gardevior seeks to return to her home region of Kalos for a bit of inspiration. Unaware that they'll stumble onto something something sinister. Negaishipping. Warning: Child abuse.
In which Ash meets people he encountered during his travels, not necessarily his friends, and spends some more time with them. Sequel to Letters to Ash.
You did it. You finally managed to become Alola's first ever champion and now a festival was being held for you. But then, a certain blonde girl pays you a visit. (Crossposted on AOO)

Inspired by Jason Chen's "Best Friend". Each verse (or so) is a chapter in Ash and Misty's relationship. Watch Ash Ketchum realize his feelings for his best friend, and then their relationship blossoms. Along the way, each person loses the other for various reasons, but they always find a way back to one another. Song-fic!
A widowed doctor in the Sinnoh region learns the one who took his wife away is still at large and vows vengeance. Fate grants his wish, if he can come to terms with its price.
Wulfric makes a stop at the Pokémon Village to check on its residents. Just a bit of fluff. One shot.
Flamers are well gonna get beatens cause I had sex with Brock. Anyway shut up I ain't even done nothing or nuffin
Buneary finaly reunites with Pikachu in Unova. All seems perfect but there is a Gengar wanting to spoil their fun Contains Lagomorpshipping (Pikachu X Buneary)
In Pokemon Journeys Episode 46, Mewtwo is secluded on an island with Pokemon who fear humans. Just what did humans do to scare those Pokemon so much? What did Mewtwo rescue them from?
Small pokemon/human fluff piece

A new Professor is in town. Two actually. Moving just up the hill from our favorite Melemele Professors, Kukui and Burnet. However, a mysterious air seems to follow around these two as one accident after another causes struggles for both them and those who come near. What could be the cause of this poisonous aura and can they find help before a more serious incident occurs?
In which Goh is having a panic attack and Ash is being his supportive, friendly self. Pokémon Journeys oneshot.
He tried to convince himself it was unintentional. He really did. But seeing his terrified expression... He knew he couldn't hide his feelings any longer.

Matthew and his childhood friend Jenny had always been close. Matthew has to live up to his fathers name of Pokemon Master, and Jenny has to face past demons that will soon threaten the world itself. Contains violence.

Written for r/pokemonfanfiction's inaugural Great Fic Writing contest. Tori was not ready to take on this responsibility, but thanks to scheduling conflicts, he was the only one who could do the job. He did not have the experience to make the right calls, especially with the given time-frame. There is only so much you can do when you have a limited time to move (tutor).
Politoed throws a pool party for his friends and helps some of them along the way.
Hop is on a losing streak, and Chairman Rose wants to talk to Leon about it. Leon just wants to keep his little brother from getting hurt.
In which a girafarig and his chatty, aggravating tail have to set aside their differences to survive in a dark, dangerous forest.
Strength in numbers is the only kind of strength Kono knows. But strength offers no absolution from the coming storm.
"How is Ash still ten years old? Why does no-one else find this strange? Why did I not find it strange?" From the notes of Professor Gary Oak.
It has been 25 years since the series began and to commemorate this occasion, here's a special poem! Happy 25th anniversary, Pokémon!

Nearly a year after their Kalos journey, Ash is the champion of the Alola region, while Serena has just competed in the Hoenn Grand Festival. When the pair meet again in Kanto, they decide to travel together once again. Serena is ecstatic to be with her crush again, but... does Ash really still not understand her feelings? An Amourshipping One-Shot.
Rewrite of seeing the forest for the trees. Trigger Warning. Ash has had enough of people telling him what to do. Lotsa triggers.

Orville Hayes was a average kid, who got transformed into a Pokemon. (Note: Story is complete until further notice.) (C)Author Arnold 2009-2019 All rights reserved to GameFreak, Nintendo, and Pokemon Company (C) 1995-2019
A sequel to The Meeting of Champions. Kukui and Goh freaking out about what they had learned. (Sorry I'm bad at summaries)

As the Hoenn League's newest hire, Roxanne's determined to succeed—not to fall for Brawly, with his laid-back Dewford lifestyle and apparent propensity for networking in swim trunks. In fact, there are many good reasons why she shouldn't. Her only mistake is writing them down.
Ash and Clemont have a date at the Perl Fountain in Kalos. Fluff ensues. Crossposted on Archive of Our Own.

(REWRITE) In PokeFan city, everyone is a pokemon fan! Everyone, except the odd boy our heroes meet early into their visit. Can Ash put aside his frustration with this boy who hates pokemon? What will our heroes discover about the mysterious pokemon, Tew?
The title says it all! This is a one-shot
Victor has defeated Leon, but the now former Champion is not taking the loss well. He almost seems afraid. What reason could Leon have to be upset over this? Slight crack.
After being chased out of Pokémon Square, Flower keeps running. Because running towards what she dreads most is the only way to make the trip worth it. PMD1/PMD5 one shot.
Ash is loved. There are people who loved him and worried about his wellbeing even if they haven't talk in long time. Those letters and gift are proof of it.
Ash and Pikachu return home with some unexpected surprises, including a confession in front of many people and Pokémon.
lil gordie/reader fic for a friend! in which gordie makes questionable purchasing decisions
Lillie and Selene have arrived to confront Lusamine, but at the cry of the Nihilegos, Lillie hesitates. Lillie/Selene.
Given a set of tasks to complete on Valentine's Day, Richard uses this opportunity to prepare the perfect gift for Rosetta. Based on the Pokémon Desolation fangame.
When Skyla saw Elesa was in the bath, she did not expect to see what she did.
Tonight, Dawn will be officially become Champion, and Barry has something very important to tell her. If only he could find the right words.

This is the start of a young girl named Mew who begins her Pokemon Journey. A young girl raised and can understand Pokemon begins her journey to become a Pokemon trainer with Eevee and Pikachu. Together, they meet good friends, evil enemies, and adventures beyond their imaginations. See how the young girl and her friends, human and Pokemon across Kanto in the world of Pokemon.
A day comes that shatters Ash's view of himself.

[One-shot] One youngster on a lovely Alolan vacation yearns to experience the well-known Mantine Surf island-hopping. A strange encounter with the regional fauna, however, changes how his summer break is supposed to eventuate.
Disillusioned and depressed, Kanto's latest Champion is about to fall off the deep end - and it's up to Lorelei to save him. Contains dark themes and a bit of adult language.

After a massive portal opens, a security guard finds Pokemon roaming the Earth. Now faced with these strange and terrifying creatures, she must pick up the broken pieces of her old life while struggling with her denial of a world irrevocably changed.

"In the evenings, this pokémon is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain." Two kids, their emotional baggage, and a lapras chase a myth into the bottom of the ocean.

Solstice eve brings a stranger and a murder to the quiet town of Silversteer. Well, at first only the stranger called it a murder. Murder requires a person, and the amaura, lying with her neck snapped in the snow, wasn't one. PMD.

What is the life of a Pokemon like from their own eyes? A small charmander boy lives with his family and friends in a valley where the Pokemon live free, but when some black guys come to ruin the peace, it will be up to him and his friends to save their home. However, on the journey, he will discover that a prophecy will mark his fate, and that perhaps he is not entirely Pokemon...

May is the Princess Of Hoenn who ran away from home. She's been missing for more than 2 years. She meets Drew and they become friends and then discover that they hold feelings for each other in only a week of knowing each other. Can Drew stop May's wedding to a Prince and be with her himself? ContestShipping!
Journey into the underworld and have the party of your life. Or your death.
Poor girl ends up dynamaxing herself.
They've been at war since the dawn of time. Two creatures, forever locked in an endless war. He was just the poor farmer caught in the middle. Journey-verse side story.
Sophocles experiences the legendary "Pokémon Shock" after a Porygon appears on his Nintendo 3DS. [ZingZapShipping]
Rose forgets Bede's name, prompting Bede to be more determined than ever to prove himself. SwSh one shot.
A beautiful Shaymin is encountered by a person who has a special heart for pokémon. (Human X Female Feral Pokémon / Poképhilia / WAF)

Welcome to the Shamard Region, a mostly desert Region filled with multiple Pokemons living in harmony with man, but an evil force has risen to send this peaceful lands into chaos. Who will save this region from its destructive? Maybe a pair of children will. (There will be Fakemons) (Inspired by the Pokemon Adventures manga) (Discontinued)
Leon has a fluffy cape, and Sonia decides to steal it. LionHeartShipping (SoniaxLeon) fluff. First attempt at fluff so sorry if it sucks.
Chloe reflects on her hands and how they, and those of her best friend, have changed over time. Takes place after/during JN52. Vermilionshipping, or GoKoha/Goharu.
Sabrina defeat the leader of the Karate Dojo.
By day, Perry the Popplio is the star battler on Elio's Pokemon team. Also by day, he's Agent P, a secret superspy tasked with foiling the schemes of the evil Dr. Faba. Rated E for everybody.
Drew is the Prince. May is a thief. After meeting each other, what would happen between them? Read to find out! ContestShipping!

A glimpse into the backstory of Emily David and how she got her starter Klefki told from the perspective of a humble fisherman. One shot companion piece to The Calling of a Trainer; submission for the Inaugural Writing Contest on r/pokemonfanfiction.
A Relaxing day at the beach for Ash and Friends gets interrupted but not in the way anyone might expect

The Unova region, the business hub of the Pokemon world and the place where three young adventurers are about to start their journey. The quick thinking Bianca, the know-it-all Cheren and the star of the show, the confident Hilbert. Danger and excitement waits around every corner as everyone learns about Unova's history, but also battle the threat of the liberating Team Plasma.
Ash has had enough of failing, of letting everyone down. He has a solution, but no one's gonna like it. . . *TRIGGER WARNING* Suicide Major Character Death *Fixed!
Leon is looking forward to a night by himself but it turns out Raihan is going to need to stay with him for tonight. And there's only one bed in the Champion's Suite.
My life has been very difficult. I'll tell you a story, my story to be precise.
A Story about a corrupt judge, a soldier seeking justice, a beautiful and benevolent performer, and the disfigured bellringer from Lumiose Cathedral. Based on Disney's The Hunchback of Notre Dame

A Pokémon Valentine's Day story about Ash returning home from the Galar region; only to find a basket of Pecha berries. But who sent him the berries, and the clues that would lead him to his crush. (Ash x Homika) Pechaberryshipping

Jasmine and Clair have recently started a romantic relationship, and must now submit themselves to the mortifying ordeal of being known. More specifically, they have to attend the New Year's League party as a couple. There, however, Clair must meet and face her greatest enemies: embarassment, jealousy, Whitney's teasing and a Romantic Compatibility App.

When a Pokemon Ranger takes time off from her job to have a nice vacation in the sunny and tropical Alola region, she winds up getting a lot more than what she bargained for. Will it still be the best vacation ever? Probably. A slice of paradise mixed with tales of other worlds, coming up!

A lonely Eevee is forced to leave home and become a bounty hunter. He misses home dearly, but he tells himself that he must be strong and live this new life. Unfortunately, he quickly begins despising his mentor and his willpower falters. The Glaceon Chapter of Eon Fable by ScytheRider. Written by me and posted with his permission.

An argument in the woods leads Ash and Pikachu on a wacky body swap adventure to Cerulean City thanks to a mischievous little Mew. There they meet up with an old friend and fan old flames. Can Pikachu show Ash what was so obvious to everyone else? Just a silly and fun Pokeshipping oneshot!
Retelling of Pokemon Black 2/White 2, told from Kyurem's perspective. Rewrite of the oldest fanfic I could recover from my hard drive.
Raboot is fed up with how slow Goh's progressing in the romance department. Meanwhile, Ash Ketchum's as oblivious as always. [FirstFriendShipping]

I'm trapped without escape. There's no way out. It only remains for me to die. I only have left to die and serve as food for… for those… things. And it all is because of my ingenuousness. But how was I supposed to know?

After the Fuchsia Tag Tournament, Paul continues to travel across Kanto, seeking to vent his frustration after his loss. His starter Pokémon, for his part, has a rather interesting encounter, when he decides to go out for a night walk. Part of the Pokémon Reset Bloodlines universe, written collaboratively with Shadow Ninja Koopa. Main story knowledge recommended up to Chapter 28
Ash reminisces about a certain someone...someone that makes him believe Angels do truly exists

Rule #1 of interplanetary travel: "One mustn't meddle in the affairs of other worlds." Terra never fully understood what Master Eraqus meant by that, but he was quite certain he'd broken every aspect of the rule to an irreparable degree, thanks to the pretty maiden he'd spotted by a bench.
Sora's final night as a Single man doesn't go Quite as expected as the young Keyblade Master discovers another thing of this world to add to his list of Kryptonite.
Sora and Kairi meet up in the Final World. Kingdom Hearts III Re:Mind spoilers.

A humble rice farmer's daughter waits longingly for her love every night in the Moonlit Tower. Will Roxas be able to conquer his biggest foe yet to rush to the rescue? Sometimes forbidden love is a gamble.
Contains spoilers for Re:Mind. As they travel the worlds together, Sora helps Kairi fulfill her final wish.
Sora is tired of losing to Riku in races. Instead he shifts his target to Kairi. This race should be a piece of cake, right?
Sora has some sort of girl phobia. Kairi was determined to fix it [SOKAI ONESHOT]

Book 2 of KH Re-Imagined: Sora won the battle against darkness but now he must battle against his own memories. New forces wish to invade his mind, those who use darkness and demons alike, will he survive or will he come out a whole new person. Meanwhile Riku struggles to find a new road, one that has led him to a little town called Gravity Falls

The feeling of losing the person you love is one guaranteed to shatter your heart. Especially when they put their lives on the line just to keep you safe. All one can do is pray they are alright, wherever they are, and are making their way home - to return to you... One-shot, SoKai. Warning! Contains spoilers for Kingdom Hearts III and Re:Mind!
It was just a fantasy. Only a fantasy. Only a fantasy worth waking up from for him. KH3 Re:Mind Spoilers. (Yozora Character Study)

Based on the "Yozora" secret ending and the ending of the State of Play Kingdom Hearts III Re:Mind Trailer. What if the meeting between Sora and Yozora in the Final World continued into Shibuya? What if Yozora comes across Sora instead of watching over Riku?
In which Selphie sees Sora come back to the Island, leave, and come back with Aqua and Riku. [KH3]
We've all heard the phrase: "Lost in a book", but who knew it could actually happen. [KH3]

Ven was meant to sleep in Sora's heart—not replace it. Now, he's trapped in the child's stolen body, forced to live a lie. The stars are fading fast, and as he grapples with his new identity, he'll find the past is not so easily escaped. Written for the KH Rogue Nebula.
Sequel to ReMind and Secret Episode. Sora finds himself in Shibuya and competing in the Reaper's Game. Rated K for dark themes.
Based on the HISHE YouTube series, the original Kingdom Hearts game is a beloved classic but here is a slit of things that could or should have happened. Oneshot.

An AU where fate and the future are much more fickle, so easy to change that even those with the gazing eyes- the Foretellers can't always predict the future but have every intention to aim it at their chosen path. The struggle to regain one's lost control is hard, especially when it against the darkness. If reaching out, help can be found and some in some very unusual places.

What if instead of Sora, Kairi was the one to recive a Keyblade first? And what if Sora was the one to turn to darkness, both trying to save a prince of heart? An au that swaps most characters! Edit: Chain of Memories is now released!
A One shot mini story that involves the development of friendship between Aqua and Vanitas. Takes place after a crucial battle that causes Vanitas to fade. No Ships, just friend-ships! :D
Sora's not feeling the holly, jolly warmth of the holidays. That may change with some help. Modern/High School!AU with some little references here or there.

There are less than 24 hours left before the final showdown between the Guardians of Light and the Seekers of Darkness, and Saïx spends most of them reflecting on how he got to where he is. For the first time, he meets Xion, and through their training and their conversation, he slowly begins to understand what Axel saw in her. Will he have it in him to go through with their plan?

Have you ever imagined Sora and his friends reacting to their third main video game, after they played the entire game? Do you think that maybe they also were playing it? Just like the rest of the fans? There you have an example of how would be it in the most Kingdom Hearts style, alongside some other funny surprise. A little present for all Kingdom Hearts fans. Enjoy it.

Post KH3. While struggling to sleep, Terra and Aqua reflect on the day that changed their lives. Not wanting to be alone, they find themselves drawn to one another. Once together, feelings come forth and they feel closer than ever. Spoilers for KH3 and rated T for one 'adult' word. Song fic.
Sequel to ReMind. With Sora gone, Riku desperately searches for him.

Reupload of an old fic of mine. An alternate ending to KHIII, where Kairi is conscious when Xehanort summons her to kill her, and so gets to cleverly escape and be a part of the ending. Though this isn't the "completely happy ending story", as Sora still disappears in the end (but not via death), because Joshua needs his help, etc. So it's just a temporary goodbye. Canon/AU.
Reupload of an old fic of mine (that I wrote soon after KHIII came out), where Sora and Kairi get a moment together before the gathering of the Seven Lights and he gets to see her new look.
Sneak peaks for something I have planned for 2020
Riku gets a sunburn, Sora has a realization, and Kairi does all the work (as usual).
Kairi accepts a dangerous mission from the King, not realizing she'll have to team up with an old enemy and uncover the mysteries of her past.

There's something weird about Roxas and Xion. Something involving the guys in the black coats. Hayner, Pence, and Olette decide it's time they got to the bottom of it. (Post KH3. Part 6 of the Seasalt Fam series)

While it is quite obvious Xion and Axel are keeping something from Roxas, they keep pretending all is fine - much to the boy's worries. What could he possibly have done wrong? One shot, Secret Santa 2019
Ven has a request for Vanitas: to spend Christmas with his family as his pretend boyfriend. For Vanven week with the prompt "Warmth". Continuation of my VanVen holiday AU (part 2).
When the time comes to buy gifts, Roxas and Naminé do their best to put thought into each other's gifts
Sora and Aqua discuss their similiarities, differences, and help each other deal with the hardships that they've endured over the past few years.

An alternate retelling of Lea and Isa's tragic backstory as human test subjects, with Isa as Subject X. Immediately following the events of KH3D, Lea trains with Kairi to master the Keyblade and has flashbacks of his childhood. The two become friends, Lea tells her about his life before he joined Organization XIII, and his best friend Isa, who Lea loved.
When Riku is fatally wounded fighting the Dark One, Sora has but one choice to save him. Fic for Soriku Week 2019, with the prompt "Curse".

Xion took in another deep long breath, looking at her old clothes that now lay abandoned on the floor. Her past life lay there, and Xion was slowly unburdening herself from it. [Wherein Olette helps Xion put together her new outfit. Implied Rokushi, post-KH3]

When Sora comes to date night chased by someone trying to shoot him, Riku makes some important discoveries about his boyfriend. Fic for Soriku Week 2019, with the prompt "I like getting dragged into your messes"
In which Riku has to tell Sora's parents that their little boy isn't coming home. Takes place after KHIII.
it took Sora a bit to realize that his feelings had changed – that they were deeper, something a little more. post kh2, sorikai
A oneshot drabble sequel to Sora and his Three Girlfriends, Sora and his new loves are at a Christmas party with them having fun but one of them has a plan.
KH3 SPOILERS. Reunited at last, Riku is determined to make a fresh start. Especially with Sora. He hasn't confessed yet, but he's accepted those feelings for Sora. For now, that's enough.
A short oneshot showing a look into the new life of Sora and his three girlfriends Jasmine, Rapunzel and Larxene/Elrena.
After Xemnas, after everything, Riku and Sora have some time to themselves. A story about trauma, forgiveness, and friendship.
Just imagine in the Final Battle of KH4 where everyone comes to help Sora to fight the darkness similar to the Endgame's portals

The first SoKai story I wrote after beating Kingdom Hearts III, where Sora doesn't fade away and everything is happy. And Sora and Kairi are officially together... but still super innocent and not thinking about anything sexual at all and are fine just holding hands and stuff, and figuring out how to balance this new relationship with everything else in their lives now.
In which, respects are paid and promises are given. Post KH3.

Fashion is an important part of everyday life, and can be heavily influenced by the world it's part of. Most people in most worlds alter their clothes to show off and express themselves. Except Sora. He'd rather keep hiding what others would put in a spotlight. Of course, it's impossible to keep secrets from Riku and Kairi. Part 2 of All That Glitters Must Be Gold.
The first thing I wrote after I beat KHIII, that I'm uploading again. Sora in Shinjuku with Yozora, some Invi and Ava stuff, and Sora missing Kairi/SoKai.
Kairi feels useless after the war. Then she has dreams about other Princesses of heart who had keyblades before her. One-shot
In which a terribly awkward first encounter transitions into one of the most meaningful relationships they've ever had. RokuNami. AU.

So many Worlds, and so many people. Each one was unique and an adventure to Sora. But one thing that was constant on his journey, was the keychains he received. An exploration of Sora's thoughts, experiences, and feelings for each keychain he received during his first journey.
An old work of mine, that was in Destiny-Islanders' "The Ties That Bind" KH magazine, that's about Lauriam/Marluxia's bonds with Strelitzia and Naminé.

stress overcomes riku as his finals approach. when he meets a barista girl named naminé, he finds that there were more things to be stressed about than solving physics equations. — a riku/naminé fanfic. [for rikunami day 2019!]
A little Christmas fun between Riku and Naminé for Namiku Day.

Riku and Naminé are an unlikely duo working towards a common goal: helping Sora. But as they spend more and more time together, they start to question if they're doing the right thing. It's easier to focus on that than on what might be happening between them. After all, a Nobody doesn't have feelings of her own, and a human wouldn't fall for a Nobody… right? KH3 Spoilers.

[COMPLETE] It's been 3 years since Sora left to search for Kairi. When a falling star signals the return of a fallen friend, it sets in motion a chain of events that could bring about the beginning of the end (or the end of the beginning). The Foretellers gather, the Master returns, and we finally answer the question: What's in the box?

Sora is separated from Donald and Goofy in the world of Agrabah as he tries to find them, along with the world's Keyhole. He did not imagine he would end up being the faithful hero to a princess on the run, along with falling in love with said princess! What fates will await the boy and girl? Sora x Jasmine; Requested by cornholio4.
The Keyblade Wielders gather on the Destiny Islands for an important event following revelations made in the Forgotten Worlds. Omake/Teaser for my Reconnect: Kingdom Hearts Saga.

Riku has been kidnapped by his father and is being forced to marry a woman he has never met. Can Sora save him? Pirate Sora AU, Gift for Kyo on the Sky and Land (soriku) Discord for the Easter Bunny Exchange.
Roxas has a nightmare! It's up to his two dads to make him feel all better again!
[Based on a list of prompts posted on tumblr] An unconnected assortment of short happy moments between Ventus and Naminé.

Different yet the same, three men run into an inescapable fate. The only thing in common? They desperately struggle against the chains that bind them — searching for someone or something. While they might not like one another, working together might be the only way to ensure their goals are met. It all starts with one prince and making sure he stays safe.
It's been gone since Ienzo woke up.
When Ventus is stuck trick-or-treating with his brothers, he received help from an unexpected place. Start of my VanVen holiday AU.

Right before the Sora and the others head to the Keyblade Graveyard to fight the final fight, a certain summon catches wind of what's happening. Watch how they decide that they want to help out, whether the keybladers know or not! Xehanort certainly won't know what hit him.
A missing moment from Kingdom Hearts III. Sora learns that Kairi's training to be a Keyblade wielder. SoKai. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Kairi friendship.

Post-KHIII. A Naminé who's still in love with Sora-but partly because she can still feel Kairi's own feelings for him-ends up in the former home of the True King, King Yozora and meets the love of his life, Hoshi (Stella/Stella 2.0). The two of them bond quickly, as they have much in common, and Hoshi even gives Naminé the first clue on how to find Sora. HoshiYozora, SxN, SoKai.

Kairi may have lost someone important, but she isn't alone, and she isn't without hope. And her mysterious dreams just might have a clue as to Sora's whereabouts. (Kairi and Riku friendship, implied SoKai. Set post-Kingdom Hearts III).
Kairi ISN'T kidnapped by Xemnas in Kingdom Hearts III, and this is how the story changes from there. Slight SoKai. Kairi-centric.
Sora asks his brothers for romantic help. What he gets is teasing, bad advice, worse advice, and surprisingly good advice in that order. Will any of this help him get his first kiss?
This world is just too small. Being kidnapped by pirates would be a nice way out, Xehanort thinks. (A very crack take on Eraqus and Xehanort's first meeting.)
SoKai. RokuNami. A piece for "Two Sides." There are wedding bells today, and it's time for a confession. 1500 words.
Sora gets a closer look at Kairi's Keyblade, and maybe today will be the day the two of them realize the depth of their bond. Written for the Two Sides Fanzine.
A strange phenomena happens throughout all the worlds, and the once proud heroes, are forced to submit to fate itself (Post KHIII, all errors fixed!)
Roxas meets his daughter. Roxas x Xion pairing

There had been stories about a district just outside the main gate of Radiant Garden. As Sora and his friends go to investigate the abandoned section of the town, they soon discover that one of the buildings has been hiding a dark secret.
Sora and his friends are sent to investigate an abandoned town shrouded in darkness. However, it may not be as abandoned as they had originally thought. (Suspense/Psychological) (Discontinued...)

In the month of October, it is the month for spookiness and all things magical and weird. Strange, powerful, and sometimes mschievious magic is in the air, and anything can happen. From, spooky, to weird or funny, or anything else magical, enjoy a series of short stories in honor of the October month.

Turn around and smell what you don't see. Close your eyes... it is so clear now. His name was Xemnas. Her name was Aqua. The tides pulled at his heart. The light shimmered from her soul. Xemqua Mini Slow Burn One-Shot. Somewhat Post KH3
Kh3Au Sora is a kid who is broken and yet is looking for the person. He been missing all along. Aqua is a Mom looking for her son she loss long ago. Sora child/Aqua Mom fanfic
Rated T for swearing. Vanitas is sick and whiny, and Repliku is tired of him being out of commission. Implied Vanitas x Repliku. Props to Fuzu for being my beta reader and Repliku pro!

Larxene is in a GOOD mood. This is so unusual that it catches Xigbar's and Marluxia's attention right away. And since the number XII is not going to share her secrets so easily, it is up to Marluxia to find out what she could be hiding...

Sora and his friends are on their journey to rescue Terra, Ven, and Aqua from their fates from a decade ago. Along the way, they face new friends, new enemies, and new challenges. Will they manage to save everyone? And who is the cloaked figure helping them?

Terra, Aqua, and Ventus return to the Million Dreams Festival, and they are determined to make this one more memorable than the last one. When Ventus goes off on his own, his two grown-ups find their own way to enjoy the festival.

TRIGGER WARNING: This story has a devastating beginning and a beautiful ending. The ending alone is worth the read. Minnie and Mickey have just gotten engaged and Disney Kingdom is beginning to form around them when tragedy strikes. Mortimer has been infected by the unknown darkness and before anyone can stop it... it's done. Will Yen Sid be able to help Mickey put things right?...
Naminé has an important painting to complete, but has artist's block, so Riku offers to help her, which might have turned out to have a much bigger impact on him than he ever imagined. [RikuNami]

Naminé had wanted to see one person when she returned. There was one person she wanted to see more than anyone. So it did hurt her heart when she only saw Riku waiting for her… and not the other who looked just like him.
In which Riku is a good friend. Spoilers for KH3.

Kairi leaves her home on Destiny Islands only once a month to visit Naminé in Radiant Garden. She expects this trip to be like any other, but Namine has a surprise waiting for her sister once she arrives.

A request by a user who chooses to remain anonymous. They wanted me to write a fic where the Foretellers used darkness instead of light, and Ava became the Master of Master's second over Ira: this is what I did with that idea. AU.

Xehanort and Eraqus used to play chess. Xehanort hated to lose, and Eraqus longed for the day that he would finally surprise Xehanort. Cutting together the fateful chess game from KH3 and Eraqus and Xehanort's final moments together, Eraqus considers his best friend of past and future, how he has changed, and how he hasn't. Oneshot!

Kairi loses a bet, and now it seems that everyone in her life is conspiring for her to pay the forfeit. She would have been fine if only it didn't involve a horse Dream Eater. All she wanted to do was spend some time with Sora. Maybe this woudn't end as badly as she expected?
A quiet day in Radiant Garden turns into a day of revelations for Leon. It's a lot of information to take in at once.

They took his world and his heart all at once (how much more could he take). She was lost in the dark and in her memories (weren't they all the same). After all they suffered, all he wanted was rest (how could he rest without his friends beside him). From the beginning to the end, the lives of Sora, Kairi, and Riku were woven together by destiny.

Vanitas is swallowed by light after floating in the darkness for far too long. He awakens in Radiant Garden with a 7-year-old Kairi and a penchant for calling her "Princess." A 6,000-word Vanitas character study in KH fashion (i.e. light/dark metaphors, mumbo jumbo magic laws, and an incoherent plot.)

Post KH3 - spoilers if you haven't finished the game. Kairi has been given the chance to restore Sora to who he was and bring him home, but as the opportunity presents itself she's unsure if that is truly the best choice.

"There's a legend about humans. Legend says that originally people were born four arms, four legs, and a head with two faces. The gods feared their power, and thus split them in half, so they were two separate entities. And so their lives began, an endless search to find their other halves, that could only end in tragedy." – the "Twisted Lore" KH fanfiction by aradian nights.

The Master of Masters turns out to be the one person Kairi didn't want him to be, and yet she finds herself drawn to him anyway. Fate bound them together all those years ago, and now she must make a choice about their future. For SoKai Day 2019.
The four main incarnations of Xehanort lay out their plan of attack, only to realize that there might be a few flaws.

Hope is back with her friends, off to explore new worlds in order to stop the rising darkness. However, the Dark One has already set the wheels in motion for his resurrection in order to plunge the world into darkness.
Life after the Keyblade War has its trials and conquests, but their bond endures through the best and worst of days. Prompts and one-shots for Terraqua Week 2019.
Jim has found his way to the Land of Departure! But can he move on and accept these new Keyblade wielders as his friends? Or will his past be too much and overcome him?

Demyx asked Ienzo to chat sometime, and the young scientist agreed. After all, he had some pressing questions about their past relationship while at the Organization and exactly what it meant for their present. (Cover is an official screenshot.)
kairi and riku talk about boys, and why maybe boys are a difficult topic for riku.

The Master of Masters (Sora) changed the past, so that he remained a Heartless when he stabbed himself with the Keyblade of People's Hearts and then Kairi got the Keyblade and saved the day. KH1 AU, basically, where Kairi becomes the protagonist at the end of the game. Request pic from AO3's TechnovoreX.

Three friends who are finally reunited after so long try to find out what happened to their other friends. Their investigation leads them to a certain corridor under the Radiant Garden Castle, and brings its share of sorrow... (KH3 Secret reports spoilers)

With the Keyblade War having finally come to an end, Sora and his friends decide to take a long deserved vacation at the Destiny Islands. However, the islands may once again be under threat as the friends will soon realize the true power and dangers of a tropical storm. (Rated for drama and suspense)

The tale of Kingdom Hearts you all know and love, but with one additional character. Come now and see the origins of Jim the Keyblade Wielder of the ancient past known to us as Union Cross. DISCLAIMER: I originally posted this on another account, but have been locked out of it for reasons I do not understand. I apologize for any confusion, thank you for understanding.

After being brought back, Roxas and Naminé return to their worlds to rediscover the purpose they lost as nobodies, and live the lives they dreamed of as people with hearts. But perfect copies of themselves created by a scientific error force the two to face one of their greatest challenges: the right to exist and the ordeal of existing.

Kairi had never liked yellow... and when her time training and in the Keyblade War is surrounded by that color, she thinks that maybe that somehow had something to do with her failures there. But her failures don't have to stay that way, right? Maybe she can finally succeed in finding Sora! Kairi-centric. Character study. Friendships. During KHII. Leading into KHIV.
In which Naminé betrays DiZ and sets Roxas free on the last day, but it does not go the way she expected. [RokuNami Week 2019: September 1]

[POST KH3 CONTENT] When Vexen doesn't want to be Vexen anymore, when he rejects these eyes and ears and name, he knows what the only way to get his heart back is. But being aware that this might fail, and he might disappear for good, isn't quite helping.
He shouldn't. He really shouldn't. But the moment she took his proffered hand, Roxas allowed himself get swept up in the illusion of this fairytale. [RokuNami Week 2019: August 31 - Words Unspoken]
A series of short stories centered around Roxas, Namine, and their relationship. Updates daily, Aug 30 through Sept 5. Happy RokuNami Week everyone!
Rokunami Week 2019. A destined reunion between them brought them back together in a new light. Now was their chance to express old feelings with a new life ahead of them.

Sora, Riku, Kairi, Mickey, Donald, Goofy, Roxas, and Marty travel to 1885 in the Old West version of Hill Valley to save Doc from getting killed by Biff's great-grandfather, Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Along the way, Doc falls for a school teacher named Clara and Vanitas, Pete, and Mortimer try to eliminate all the heroes. A Kingdom Hearts/Back to the Future Crossover.

Sora and his friends are on a mission to investigate a castle being held in an unyielding darkness. As they delve deeper into the darkness of the castle, the five friends may realize that some things may be best left alone. (Supernatural/Suspense)
[POST KHIII SPOILERS] Kairi reflects on what should be the end of her journey. Even if nobody else remembers the last door left to open, she will. [Twelve Shots of Summer: Hexa-Code Kernel]
This was it, Aqua realized. She was going to see him again after more than ten years. Her Ven. -About their reunion in/post KH3. VenQua if you squint.

"Cloud … um, are you aware that ...you're budding?" - Cloud's head snapped up from it's dazed stare at the bubbling coffee. "What!" - Falling to his knees Cloud pushed Tifa aside to stare into the oven's shiny door, he hurriedly parted his hair only to see the same thing as Tifa, the same thing his hands had felt. Buds. Soft little green buds …
One shot for my four year anniversary extravaganza! A young Kairi helps take care of Sora when he is sick.
Xehanort has been defeated and all is right with the world again. Ienzo and Lea still have some lingering questions though...
Yellow roses— the symbol of friendship A short story of Hikari's first love. OC/KH3 spoilers.
Somebody's gotta look after the town while Sora's away... [Twelve Shots of Summer: Hexa-Code Kernel]

Unimpressed by the dark, creepy appearance of Vanitas, Ventas takes it upon himself to give him a new and improved look. Will the efforts of the happy-go-lucky kid be appreciated by his broody, evil brother-like figure? One-shot.
Ventus always enjoyed nights like this. He really did. There is a bit of Terraqua fluff in this as well. Request I got from someone on Instagram.

Ky, Noel, Pax, Nex, Sora, and Riku have unlocked all fifteen Prison and Sleeping Keyholes, but as they're supposed to be finished with their test, things turn unexpected. Ky, Noel, and Sora unknowingly deal with traps in store for them while Pax, Nex, and Riku try to find out what is happening. How will they fare and will they make it? Rate T for violence. Takes place in KH: DDD.
After a long day of adventuring, the Destiny Islands trio decided to relax one night.

Sequel to Sorrow's Promise. All Meli wants is to try to live a normal life. But with ghosts of her past haunting her at every turn, and Yen Sid sending the Keyblade wielders on another journey, that no longer seems possible. The Organization isn't the only enemy she'll have to face; she'll need to conquer her own darkness to win this war.
In which Sabrina (OC/UX Player) confides in Ventus about a particularly concerning matter, not that Ven is prepared to hear it… [KHUX bias with possible spoilers up to Mission 880][oneshot]

Sora has a friend, whom he dubbed Chirithy. He only sees the spirit-creature in his dreams, and he always tells vivid real or made-up stories. This is a short, sweet oneshot that shows their last meeting, when Sora was still a child. Makes the most sense if you've played Union x [Cross] and probably Birth By Sleep as well.

Though the Champions of the Light thought that with the destruction of the mysterious black box their battle against the Foretellers and their shadowy master had come to an end, the truth is much more sinister. The Master of Masters has succesfully returned and now possesses almost everything in order to accompish the grand plan he had been concocting ever since the ages of old.

In this place, to find is to lose, and to lose is to find. Worried that this might apply to them too, Larxene makes sure she remembers everything on a daily basis, because her memories are all she has left. But how do you know if you forgot something, if you cannot remember what it is...?

In an attempt to get Kairi and Lea up to speed, Yen-Sid sent them to train together alone. As a total Keyblade rookie stuck with another total rookie, Lea has certain feelings on this plan of action. [Twelve Shots of Summer: Hexa-Code Kernel]

Roxas has a girlfriend! However, his heart belongs to another girl, and his girlfriend knows too. This can either be a Roxas x Naminé or a Roxas x Xion story. Kind of like Rebound where the choice is yours. Enjoy.

Two siblings play at a beach during twilight. Lea picks them up to bring them back to his parents. Their earliest recollection plays out, at least in their parents perspective. After all, "Best Friend's Promise".

As Sora attempts to find Kairi's heart at the end of Kingdom Hearts III, images of Kairi herself seem to attack him–punishment, Sora thinks, for letting her die–and as he gets closer and closer to her heart platform, memories of her (and past mistakes of his there) begin to play as Sora tortures himself, but not all is what it seems.

After Invi's rich parents had disowned her, for an accident where she'd injured her horse-for they were insane, and thought she hadn't cared enough about the pet or bonded to it well enough-she'd never felt loved by anyone. But Ira... he cared, she was learning more and more every day. Canon, believe it or not. Oneshot for now.

The meeting between Noctis and Stella in Versus XIII, but done with Sora and Kairi in a Kingdom Hearts IV scenario instead (though this isn't a meeting for them). Because, even while I don't think it'll happen… it could happen, since Nomura went out of his way to make Sora and Kairi like Noctis and Stella in KHIII. And because he might not have time to fully develop YozoraStella.

What Sora had planned was something he had thought about often enough, but had never actually experienced. He had never believe Kairi would be interested in doing this with him, yet the fact it was something which only occurred in his dreams was so frustrating. It was time to see if he could make it actually happen. No more sitting back, dreaming and wishing. It was now or never...

With Master Xehanort killing Kairi in front of Sora's eyes, the Guardians of Light ready themselves to finish the fight once and for all. However, Kairi reappears behind them, only to discover that she isn't their Kairi. Master Xehanort can play with time, but what happens when someone from a different timeline shows up to challenge him?
It's hard being a replica of Riku, especially when you don't have your own name. (One-shot. Inspiration from playing KH3 with my cousins.)
The aftermath of Goofy's death. (Kingdom Hearts 2)

It seemed to be peaceful in Agrabah so Sora and the gang attended Aladdin and Jasmine's wedding. However the situation would change with the appearance of the Fort Thieves, word about an ultimate treasure and the reveal of Aladdin's father who was thought to be long dead.

Sora vanishes, dims, fades at the end of Kingdom Hearts III-much like the Master of Masters did in Back Cover-and this is because Sora is him via a paradox. And when Sora disappears at the end of KHIII, he gets sent back to the Key era and lives out his time as the Master of Masters there-trying to get back to his beloved Kairi, all the while... Except that she was once Ava.

Vantias had been on his own for some time now. Lost and alone, he tried to make it work, but the weight of the world was proving to be a bit much. He was only one little boy in the huge scary world. However, what will happen when he encounters a bright and happy boy about his age?
(Slight Terraqua. One-shot.) Aqua knew it would take time for her to heal, but with Ventus and Terra by her side, she knew she would find a way to believe again.
Wanting to see if either Sora or Riku could become Keyblade Masters, Luna arrives at The Mysterious Tower only to learn the truth of where Aqua has been for all these years. Part 2 of 3.
Namine is frustrated by a nickname Riku keeps calling her.
Who says Love at first sight is dead? Specially if you spot a cute girl sitting in your usual favorite café.
When a nightmare reveals itself to be a vision, Terra and Sora go to the Dark Realm to save Aqua. What they find is a being of rage and hate. Can they save the wayward Master?

Ever thought about what happened to Cloud or any other loose ends from KH2? In this group of short stories, you'll see that and more that link or overlap with my KH3 and 4 stories. These will be side stories that connect to everything (This will be a on-going summer project) (hiatus)

Every story was the same. Every talk they've ever had lead to more questions than answers. But under the brilliant light of Kingdom Hearts, they could finally agree on something. / Just a drabble idea of my version of what happens in the Epilogue of KH3 / Slight spoilers, nothing too major though.

A bravery and will-spirited boy named Taiyo who traversed all across the worlds, met the newest allies he ever had and fought the enemies for spreading the Darkness into the Realm of Light. Taiyo must save all the countless worlds from Darkness and stop the evil forces from taking over the Multiverse.

After abusing the Power of Waking, Sora finds himself wandering through a never ending void of white. As Sora searches for an exit from this place, the solitude and emptiness of the world threatens to tear his sanity apart. But will a newfound power change all that? And will that change be a gift or a curse? (Mostly Sora alone, eventual Yozora)[Ends where the secret ending begins]
Memories of the Keyblade Graveyard and its aftermath continue to haunt Sora and Kairi, but together they'll start the long road to healing. Set post-KH3.
Luxu wanders among his empty vessels.

Sequel to Kingdom Hearts Princess of Hearts. "You have been branded." What did this phrase mean? This is what Sora and six other Keyblade wielders must find out after they are given strange marks and new Keyblades. rated T for violence.
As her summer continues Olette finds herself in trouble with those black crawly things again, ending with no other than Fuu as her protector.

Sora, Riku, Kairi, Mickey, Donald, and Goofy must help Mulan and her fellow soldiers protect three princesses during an important mission. But throughout the journey, problems start to rise. Will the mission be successful? Will Sora and Kairi reveal their love to everyone? Or is China doomed? A crossover between Kingdom Hearts and Mulan II.

Vanitas was supposed to have merged with Ventus after his defeat in the Keyblade Graveyard, yet here he was, and now he has a stowaway. Sora had bound his heart to Vanitas', and the Guardians of Light were going to help evict him. Whether they wanted to or not. Sora had opened his heart to protect so many people. Now, it was time that someone finally paid him back.

It's Christmastime at Beast's Castle. Though Beast himself isn't excited for it due to it being the day of the curse. It's up to Sora, Riku, Kairi, Mickey, Donald, and Goofy to help Belle get Beast back into the Christmas spirit and once again protect the world from the darkness destroying it. A cross over with Beauty and the Beast: The Enchanted Christmas.

It's been 5 years since the ending battle against Xehanort and Organization XIII. Riku has never stopped searching for the friend that sacrificed himself for another. He's vowed to never give up, but what if the one person who's supposed to be the light in their lives claims to not be able to take the loss anymore? One-Shot story!

Following on from KH3, This will cover the what-ifs of the next saga with new worlds, mysteries and surprises. Can Sora be saved? Is Charis beyond help and can Grace avoid the fate Young Xehanort hinted at? Read on to find out (This includes speculation, theories, OC and other new elements)(on hiatus until Remind is completed)
Of angels and stars, Kairi knew well. Rated T for safety.

Roxas and Xion have the day to themselves, and decide to spend it with each other to relieve their past stress. Being back for only a week now, their friends view their scenario a little…differently. (Post Kingdom Hearts III)

Despite finally being granted a body of his own and reuniting with his friends while making some new ones, Roxas isn't entirely happy. There is something missing from his life preventing him from feeling whole. Things change, however, when the Gummi Ship lands on Destiny Islands with a very special passenger onboard... Warning! Contains spoilers for Kingdom Hearts III!

Kairi was a stellar example of your every day do-gooder Samaritan. She was helpful, calm, and always smiled at customers no matter how much she wanted to wring their stupid little necks― Ahem. Anyway, even princesses gotta break the rules every once in awhile. Lucky for her, she knows a guy. In which Kairi isn't all sugar and spice and Axel sucks at impulse control.
Terra finds Namine drawing in the night.

Simple things can seem much more to others. Scars and memories are left behind, engrained in someone's mind forever. Even is one of these people with secrets that scarred his mind. He only hopes that no one finds out.
Sick in bed, Axel was expecting seashells and rocks from his friends. The usual gifts. He should have remembered there was nothing usual about his friends.
Sora wanted to keep his promise to Kairi, no matter what. Perhaps he should've been more careful what he wished for.
Just a little look at Sora's life home
Everyone knows the battle between Axel and Roxas in the Virtual Twilight Town.. But.. What if Axel had won instead of Roxas? (A.U.) (Angst/Friendship)
Once they were brothers and now, they're fighting to death. OS crossover between KH and Prince of Egypt.
Even though everything has seemingly come to a calm, Sora's demons still come back to haunt him at night.
It may have seemed like just another morning surf, but to Kairi, everyday was an adventure with him. Surfing AU.

Ava ended up on Destiny Islands where she sets up a normal life herself while being completely disillusioned of the Master of Masters. What happens when the Heartless comes and she has to go on an adventure while keeping an eye on her son Sora? Ava is Sora's mother. Retelling of Kingdom Hearts 1. Sora/Ariel.

In thinking there's no other way to save Kairi-or to give all his other friends the life they deserve-Sora takes advantage of Xehanort handing him the X-Blade, and rewrites the multiverse as its new god: Here, we have a stolen moment between Sora and Kairi in that new universe.
When words escape you, sometimes writing them down - or acting them out - is the best alternative. KH3 spoilers. TW: Grief
Despite the distance, Sora and Kairi search for ways to feel closer to one another. Set post-KH3.
Now and again, Ïsa had to write a confession letter. They were all different, but they had one thing in common: he'd never deliver them to the intended recipient. Probably.
Having found his way back home after the Keyblade War, Sora comes home to find out the person he loves may not have waited for him
The night before their biggest day yet, Sora and Kairi get some well-deserved time together. The night, and the town, is theirs for the taking. May contain KH3 spoilers.
A series of short stories about our favourite Kingdom Hearts couple, for SoKai Week 2019. Aiming for June 2-8 publishing, but, well... you can see the title. Better late than never!
Sora grows increasingly frustrated with each fight against the growing Darkness in the Keyblade Graveyard. Soon, he will discover a strength he has yet to tap into. Contains KH3 spoilers.
A week of prompts that expresses Sora and Kairi's endearing love for each other! June 2nd - 8th. Current: (First Meeting) The cute little story of how Sora and Kairi met. -Done for the year-
Sora and Kairi spend a lazy morning together as Kairi remembers an important moment from their past. Set post-KH3.
What would have happened if Sora, Donald and Goofy went missing at the end? What would everyone's reactions have been? What could have transpired in that time? Alternate ending to KH III.

Andi has no memory of her past when she comes to Radient Garden. When Radient Garden gets under attack; Andi finds herself in Twilight Town with three new friends. But making a new life for herself hasn't stopped her past from following her there too. R&R

Brothers Ventus and Vanitas do not have a easy life. Vanitas cannot hear and Ventus cannot see. But together they find a way to get through each day. Finnally though one of them got a break. There is a surgery Vanitas could undergo to fix his hearing...
Late at night, Riku sees that Sora and Kairi are having a nightmare. A SoRiKai quick read, nothing special.
Lea, Isa, Roxas, and Xion go on a picnic. They are interrupted. (Spoilers for KH3. Part 5 of the Seasalt Fam series)
This is a story about another ending to kingdom hearts 3, and is the Prequel to another story. This story is about an Oc, so if you don't like that don't read.
On one side of the world, Axel and a certain pair of royals must deal with their dark host. In the other Larxenne most deal with the trails of her newly rediscovered life. (OUTDATED)
Meeting you was like stepping into a dream. And now, I fear that dream may be lost to me forever.
Naminé hated him. Oneshot. Drabble.
Post KH3! SPOILERS! Riku dreams of Sora but even that moment of happiness he won't allow himself.
Kairi thinks of Sora.

"With the way things are progressing out there, the Datascape might end up getting destroyed anyway." "I know. I just wanted to help. Instead I only made things worse." [Re:coded. Data-Naminé/Data-Roxas]

Demyx returns from a failed mission. After having a rather rough confrontation with Xemnas for his failure, Demyx finds comfort in the most unlikely place. (Takes place during KH 358/2 Days) (Sad/Uplifting) (One-Shot)
Kingdom Hearts III AU. While in Arrendelle with Sora, Kairi relates to him that she understands Elsa. SoKai. AU.
Summary: Sora and company duke it out in one of the most violent fighting games!

Axel is found alone in The Realm of Darkness, critically injured and has been brought back to the Twilight Town Mansion to recover.. The only problem is, he cannot remember what happened to him or why he had been in The Realm of Darkness. All he knows is that his friends were somehow involved. Will he be able to find the answer to his past? Or will not knowing slowly drive him mad?
Sora has fallen into a deep slumber after pricking his finger on the magic spindle. Only true love's kiss can save him. But, who is his true love?
Spoilers for Kingdom Hearts III. What if more than friendship had developed between Sora and Rapunzel? Oneshot.

[Summary wit KH3 spoilers] Life had to go on, and Destiny's Island was buzzing with activity - even though they still had to save their best friend, these two childhood friends couldn't neglect their other responsibilities as Keyblade Wielders. (one shot)

Sora's heart seemed to have a hard time staying still while he slept, but it always managed to find its way back home. Still, when your heart is carrying four others with it, a moment of rest for one is an opportunity for another willing to take the plunge. Sora sure has been sleepwalking a lot these days...
Kairi and Riku search the ends of the worlds for Sora; it takes them a while, but they find him eventually. sorikai, post-KH3.

Xigbar is a Nobody of many faces. Roxas discovers that merchandiser is one of them! A playful nod to that classic 2009 Rokushi fanfic "The Old Life Alive Again." Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days. Slight Rokushi, more Larxel. Friendship, romance, drama, comedy.

Every since they were young, mermen Sora and Riku were told to never get close to the surface. But there are times when children are a little too curious. Consequences happen and Sora becomes fearful of the surface. But when Riku is captured by humans and taken away to the surface, it is up to Sora to be brave adventure up and out there in order to get his best friend back.
[implied spoilers for kh3 ending] dawn and dusk are quite similar

Based off an idea I've seen mentioned often, taking place just after KH3 final battle, Sora awakens at home. He is the only one that seems to know of the things that happened since that fateful day on Destiny Islands, was it all just a dream?
Aqua wasn't sure how to thank him, especially because in her heart, something made her want to kiss him. Short Fic, Potential Spoilers set in KH3
Post KH3. Kairi, Xion and Naminé go shopping for the latter's new clothes.
(heavy ending spoilers for kh3)
A one-shot "What if" KH3 should Kairi had managed to prevent herself from being kidnapped. Warning: KH3 spoilers!

Having crash landed on a new world, Sora, Donald, and Goofy find themselves turned into living toys. However, after meeting a cowboy and spaceman toy in the backpack of a boy named Sid, the trio begin to doubt the authenticity of their own memories outside of this world. An alternate take on Sora's events in Toy Box. [Rated T for Body Horror elements] [Some Sokai in later chapters]

Sora and Riku arrive to visit the Castle of Dreams in time for the one-year anniversary of Cinderella's coronation as Queen. There will be a ball to celebrate and Sora and Riku are the guests of honor. Maybe a dance is what they need to confess. SoRiku. NONCANON
On the beach of Destiny Islands Xion was trapped in a snarl of memories. And then the girl in so many of those memories came to help her.
Memories remind her of the painful reality. Kairi sees his phantom everywhere she goes, a reminder that he's not with her. A certain plant she saw in Radiant Garden helps her cope with her guilt.
