After being recompleted, Saïx returns to his original world- Radiant Garden. However, little does he know what is waiting for him. Light Axel x Saïx fluff, with guest appearances by Roxas and Xion.
Memories of them are her treasure. Naminé's sketchbook is filled with silver hair and pink carnations. Whenever she sees him, her heart breaks just a little because he will never be him

After spending so long away from home, travelling to different worlds and fighting against Heartless, Sora finally returns to Destiny Islands, where he at long last does something which he failed to do on the night his journey began; to finally have his dinner which his mother called him down for. How exactly will tying up this loose end go for the adorkable young hero? One-shot.
Sora wants to show off all the cooking skills he learned working with Little Chef for Riku, in the hopes of expressing something he can't find the words for, but things go awry.

Who was she? Why was she here? How did she end up here? So many questions, so few memories left. Sha had no past, wasn't sure she had a future either. The only identity she knew could be summed up to a simple letter, the one given to her: X [potential KH3 spoilers]

Having finished her Keyblade training, Kairi returns to the Mysterious Tower to meet her other friends before the Xehanort fight. However, her's and Sora's hearts have one final thing to say to each other one last time before the two say goodbye once more.

AU: Kairi, Sora and Riku live on Destiny Island, they are 14 and go to school together. Sora's personality have changed these last years. But what's the reason for that, Kairi is about to discover. Rated T for a reason. So/Kai in later chapters. This is my first AU fic, so please review

While training with Kairi in Merlin's realm, Axel gets two unexpected visitors that really should be there. They want him to pay for his past and he's having enough problems training with his newly acquired Keyblade. The Assassin of the old Organization makes his stand...
Memories never truly fade. Roxas' dreams are haunted by ice cream and seashells, waking moments are spent staring at certain wildflowers.
Axel wakes up not feeling too hot. Good thing he's got friends who'll look after him whether he likes it or not.
Sora makes it to Elsa's palace. What can one conversation change?
A collection of one shots.

Larxene had no reason to be in a good mood. Her job sucked, her coworkers sucked, she hated everything and everyone (except perhaps Marluxia on her good days). And yet, somehow, for reasons she'd rather die than tell anyone, her mood was significantly better than it used to be. [KH3 spoilers]
A little bit what-if scenario after post KH3 ending. A sad rikuroku and a subtle soriku.

Idol AU. "The first time Sora had seen her, it had been love at first sight." Sora falls in love with a beautiful idol he sees performing on TV. Roxas doesn't feel like telling his brother that 'she' really is a dream girl, just not in the way that Sora thinks she is.

There was something important he needed them to know. Something that kept him up at night. They were all back in Radiant Garden for what could be the most important thing he ever had to tell anyone. /!\ Heavy KH3 spoilers

From every wound there is a scar, and every scar has a story to tell. Some are small and some are not. But it's the ones that last, the ones that hurt even when the wound heals and the danger ceased that are the more telling. And for Axel, his only scar he received in the Organization, runs deeper then most know, even to himself. (No Slash/yaoi content. All platonic friendship)
Luxord and Sora play that card game that they talked about.

Giana and Liana's world fell a decade ago. Since then, they have fallen under the tutelage of the new Keyblade Masters, training to use the Keyblade themselves all while searching for their own world. But the Heartless have been acting strange recently and so the two of them and the eight other apprentices are trusted to investigate this new, unknown threat. SYOC CLOSED
The climax of the series!
A story of Ienzo's past (More Details Inside) (Sad/Uplifting) (One-Shot)
Riku would always protect Sora from the darkness, no matter how torturous it was to accomplish.
He woke up in a familiar place, and yet he couldn't remember where he was. And that thing in his chest... Could this be what they called a heart? (no KH3 spoiler)
"What is a kiss?" Vanitas asked, not understanding what the purpose of that was. Sora felt his face flush, and he let his eyes wonder as he thought about it for a moment with a soft smile. Fluff

If there's one good thing which came out of the Keyblade War, it brought some friends who were long separated from one another back together. One of them has something he really needs to has the other - and now he finally has his much-awaited chance...

[Spoilers for KHIII][Oneshot][XigDem][Review!] As the Keyblade War draws ever closer, Demyx begins to question his purpose in the Organization. But soon, Xigbar shows up. The two catch up on old times, and discuss the future. A future, Demyx knows, that will possibly never happen. [Based on a popular fan theory- see inside for details][PLEASE REVIEW!]
Nursing a heart for ten years means that it's gonna be painful once that heart returns to its owner.

Let's be honest - it's disappointing that there are no FF characters in KH3. I've expected at least the old gang to return along with the debuts of Lightning and Noctis (being the latest additions to the franchise). So I've made my own "DLC story" about Radiant Garden. [Mild Spoilers for KH3]
The series climax approaches, and Ignus still has plenty to do!
Sometimes, a broken heart can be put back together just as easy as connecting with another one. My first Kingdom Hearts story! Enjoy!
Sora tells Donald and Goofy the story of how he got his crown necklace. HAPPY BIRTHDAY, SORA! HAPPY 17th ANNIVERSARY KINGDOM HEARTS!

After returning to Destiny Islands from their incredible life-changing journey, Sora, Riku and Kairi decide to go exploring different worlds again - this time, in the way they intended; with the raft. With no evil to battle, the three young trio are keen to explore outside lands at their own pace. If only the ocean-going vessel they constructed themselves had a better captain...
For RokuNami Day 2019. Roxas and Namine bake a cake while supporting one another. approx. 555 words
"May I stay here with you?" [KHIII. Naminé/Roxas. KHIII Spoilers.]
Happy birthday, Sora...
At Ansem's insistence, Ienzo decides to publish their research on the final phase of the Replica Project. Even edits.
Just a Talk after doing the mission at the clock tower while eat some sea salt ice cream...
Everything is behind them now. All of the sadness and regret - it means nothing compared to how brightly their love for each other burns.
a hero falls, and a new journey begins... a poem for kh3. Minor spoilers for the ending.

"A fragmented tale. A world without you." Roxas always knew something lied within Organization XIII's motives. When he meets the girl in white and experiences flashbacks to a life he never knew of, his investigation will uncover another side to a truth. A truth that will tear away everything from him. Prequel fic to Lines In-Between. (Rokunami) (COMPLETE)
"Believe? Like, know in my heart he will return without any proof?" Spoilers post KH3
Sora and company go to a club for Sora's 21st birthday and plan to have a blast! But, you should always make sure to be careful with your drinks when out in a club setting! Oh no!

Riku has experienced incredible pain throughout his life. Nothing, however, prepares him for the moment in which Sora cries that he is 'alone' while Riku is still standing by his side. During KHIII amidst the first trial-run-encounter with Terranort in the Keyblade Graveyard.

Planning destiny isn't easy. While the flow of time typically follows a set pattern, you still have to account for the unexpected. And sometimes the unexpected leads to something even greater. Or not. We'll just have to wait and see, won't we, Sora?
Re-submitted. In Arendelle, Sora ends up meeting Larxene. My parody attempt of Larxene's first scene in Arendelle and Kingdom Hearts III.

As the darkness returns to Twilight Town, Axel discovers the New Organization has been searching for him in hopes of bringing him back to the path of Darkness. However, he finds he may have more concerns when a stranger becomes caught in the middle. (Rated for suspense) (Set during KHIII) (Possible A.U.)
Does Riku have it in him to confess to Sora? Maybe a meteor shower will give him the moment and the courage that he needs. [Set after KH3, spoilers if you squint?]

Ventus gets into fights with Vanitas...a lot, and while he does fight back, he's never won. And that's fine, Ven hold's no hard feelings towards him. After all, even if it doesn't justify anything he does, everyone has a reason for what they do...and the two do have some things in common, despite having different lives. Trigger warnings and more info inside, rated a high T.
How far would they go to protect those dear to them? To seek forgiveness? To find peace? In the wake of a war, the indomitable spirit of three men shines with fervor.
vanitas wakes up. unfortunately - or maybe fortunately - ventus is there, too. post kh3. written for the kh60 min prompt 'reunion'.

The child born of obligation, not love, will be your guiding key. Keep her safe, at all costs. Keep her away from the darkness. For if she remembers the shadows that will fall, she will become nothing but a pawn. ((Prequel to 'Let It Burn', contains major spoilers for 'Let It Burn', do not read this until you've finished that. Or Kingdom Hearts III for that matter.))

The fight may be over, for now, but Sora needs to know if what Vanitas revealed to them is true. He needs to know if there really is a boy named Ventus inside his heart. / KHIII AU-ish, Directly After Monstropolis

Roxas and Namine have hit a rough spot in their relationship, with Riku caught playing intermediary for the two. But, a bigger problem soon arises. That's right, the scourge of the future children returns, the three of them caught in their sights. Can anyone survive the embarrassment and insanity? Please Read and Review!
[Post Kingdom Hearts 3, ignores secret ending] There's a debt to pay off and the ocean never forgets.

When Luke starts dreaming of a desert, and a man dressed in black, he does not realise what it will mean. Vader is happy to take advantage of that, if it means bringing his fifteen-year-old Jedi son right to him. Or: five times Luke and Vader met in a dream, and one time they met in reality.

While the Rebel Alliance continues to settle into Echo Base, Leia insists on carrying out a reconnaissance mission herself. Much to her horror—and disgruntlement—a certain stuck-up, half-witted, scruffy-looking nerf herder is the only experienced pilot available.

"She sighed to herself, wondering why every interaction with him felt like an obstacle course, land mines to be evaded, mishaps to be avoided, before they could arrive at some sort of emotional truce."
While training a young Mara Jade at the emperor's behest, Vader encounters a very grave danger.
Luke comes home one evening to find Mara facing an old enemy from her past.

Cade Skywalker and company have finally tracked down Khat Lah, the Yuuzhan Vong mystic who has uncovered shocking revelations about the Force. Meanwhile, Ania Solo plots a rescue of her cousin, deposed empress Marasiah Fel.
Modern AU in which Anakin is a flat earther and Padmé loses her mind trying to prove the Earth isn't flat.

Emperor Palpatine, aka Darth Sidious, is dead. Darth Vader died with him, ending the Sith.. or so we think. But now Anakin Skywalker is about to die with his Sith Master and his Sith alter ego. But he has Luke to stay with him, in his last moments.

Two precious nocturnal moments between Padawan Obi Wan Kenobi and Satine Kryze, on the run and far from home. Another overflow one-shot from 'The Last of the Clan Kryze' that can be enjoyed in isolation.

AE where, after defeating Snoke, Rey accepts Ben's offer to join sides instead of rejecting him outright. I started this fanfic shortly after TLJ's release, a bit disappointed that Disney didn't explore Rey's (and Ben's as well) potential as something in the realm of a Gray Jedi. Unfortunately I lost the file, but recently found it again & revised it so that it connects with ROS.

After a failed assassination attempt on Emperor Vader, Luke Skywalker realizes the horrifying truth, that the man who raised and trained him with the Force, Ben Kenobi, lied to him. Vader did not kill his father. Vader is his father. They'll have to work it out from here, but they'll do it together: father and son, just how it always should have been.

Captured on Vrogas Vas, Luke Skywalker finds himself in the hands of Darth Vader, something which will change their futures forever. More than that, Luke learns that Vader is his father. Anakin Skywalker isn't dead. Not completely. A single spark of him remains inside the heart of Darth Vader, and Luke may be the only one who can bring him back.

Vader visits Padme to say goodbye as she lies in state before her funeral. As he bids farewell to her and their child, the Force grants him a vision of the twins' birth. He will spin the galaxy backwards if he must to find them.
If anyone had bothered to ask First Order Lieutenant Dodd Malcolm his opinion, he'd have suggested — not argued — that they not live-cast the killing of Luke Skywalker across the Holonet.

Since the Empire tried to attack Earth, the isolated planet has been building up its forces for the opportunity to strike back. Now it has been over a year, and with new allies and enemies, a once unknown world will thrust itself into the galactic stage. (sequel to The Small Planet That Changed Everything: Or, just Earth in Star Wars)

"Pups who are abused often grow to be vicious creatures. But they never forget where they came from. And they never forgive." - 'Star Wars: Age of Resistance; Marooned'; Alt-title: The last 30-odd years in the lives of the Generals Hux.

X-over with the video game King's Quest VI, it can be followed even if you're unfamiliar with the game. Set before ANH. Han Solo has flown from one side of the galaxy to the other, and he's seen a lot of strange stuff. But when the Millennium Falcon crash lands on a strange planet, nothing can prepare him for who and what he and Chewbacca about to encounter.
Han Solo goes on a long journey with the Princess and some spies.
Leia gets a pregnancy craving while Han's taking a nap, but she decides to take care of the craving herself for once. Inspired by the H/L fanfic prompt "Cake."

She reaches for that faint spark inside her for reassurance, that little supernova waiting to explode. It warms at her touch, knowing, welcoming. So small and yet so powerful. It's the last good thing she has left, and she has to give up even that. Fem!Obi-Wan

Obi-Wan Kenobi's apprenticeship to Qui-Gon Jinn has been tumultuous from the start. Even so, he's gutted when he discovers his Master has been offered a seat on the Jedi Council. Will a mission to the Pijal system help them to finally forge the bond other Padawans have with their Masters or will he find himself shipped off to the AgriCorps? One-Shot. Pre-TPM. *Complete*
Luke's life has been shattered now he knows the truth about Darth Vader. Spoilers for Empire Strikes Back.
Oneshot set immediately after RotJ. An honest discussion between Han Solo and Luke Skywalker after they leave Endor.
A oneshot (This is a troll, not a fanfiction)
Rey doesn't understand why Poe keeps tormenting her.
Communication and culture can be inextricably intertwined with cross-cultural miscommunication. Anakin and Obi-Wan figure that out with some help from third parties.
Obi-Wan Kenobi has seen many things throughout his life but he never expected to see the Chosen One, his former padawan, the great Anakin Skywalker meditating. It was surely the end of the world.

I think we all have those days where one minute you're the statue and the next you're the pigeon. Well for Jacen Solo, he'd had that feeling all his life...but if he'd just stopped to look around, he'd realise he wasn't the only one...
Ben finds a baby bird, and calls an Uber to take it to safety. Based on a Twitter prompt.

When Darth Sidious, the self-proclaimed Sith'ari, dies in the second Death Star's reactor shaft, incinerated minutes before the station's destruction, the whole galaxy feels it. Only three sense the passing that comes after.

Sith holocrons can cause chaos. And they're dangerous. Everything spirals into mayhem when the fight over the holocron on Malachor has unexpected consequences, leaving Darth Vader, Ahsoka Tano, Ezra Bridger, and Kanan Jarrus de-aged to five-year-olds. Hopefully, it'll be temporary, but the four are stuck dealing with old traumas and secrets that have come to light.

Very short ficlet or quadrabble I wrote in response to the challenge prompt: cake. NB: All of my stories stem from the OT but are tagged as AU, as the present "official canon" (depicting events after RotJ) is revolting to me and I reject it with all of my heart.

Satine Kryze is of the opinion that sleep is the only known antidote to Jedi Padawan Obi Wan Kenobi's generally insufferable personality. Obi Wan finds that sleep brings out the worst in him. Or: the woes of teenage hormones, and sharing a tent. This is a one-shot add-on to my longer story, The Last of the Clan Kryze, but very happily stands alone.

A one-shot story about Ahsoka questioning whether she deserves to be Anakin's apprentice despite everything they've been through in the first year alone of the Clone Wars. What will Anakin do to help her when he finds out? Rated K for warm feelings.
An alternate ending to season two (2) of Star Wars the Mandalorian Chapter sixteen (16). This is the premise to the new original story: The Mandalorian - The Jedi Academy.

Jedi Shaina Dameron is determined to prove to her parents that she is mature enough to make her own decisions, but when two older Jedi are killed by an unknown assailant Shaina finds herself in over her head as she attempts to stop the evil by herself.
When Padme Amidala suffers a broken ankle, she must push on to make it to an important negotiation.
General Grievous faces a final duel against his greatest rival.

Set between ANH and ESB. "It's okay," Han Solo told them as he inched his way in, "we're here to help. It's over." Something he'd really never thought he'd be saying, to anybody. He was a smuggler, he didn't do rescue missions, he didn't get involved in stuff that didn't affect him...but this time it did affect him, and he could only care about the boy he'd come to get.
Leia remembers the gifts Han has given her over their life together.
AU. In a universe where Ben Solo never turned to the dark side and pursued an alternate career path, Han and Ben share a moment on the day Ben graduates from medical school.
Obi-Wan Kenobi receives a distress call. Now he, Qui-Gon and Mace Windu travel to the outskirts of the republic, to a planet with a Kyber crystal core. (Prequel/ Legends/ Jedi Apprentice references)
Rey tells the story of Goldilocks...but with a personal twist. A modern AU.
Two sinister legends, looked up to by many fans and with quite reputations behind them, get into a heated argument over which one of them is cooler than the other... One-shot.

What if Anakin Skywalker had failed to duck when Qui Gon told him to? What if Darth Maul had destroyed Anakin with the speeder bike? The death of the Chosen One leads to so many unforeseen consequences and the will of the force accommodates itself to this new awakening.
Unable to sleep, Leia joins the Rogues in a game of Sabacc.

My Version of the Star Wars Prequels. Im calling the whole project Star Wars Beyond because net I'm next doing an SW Sequels Rewrite which will be pt.2 and after that a Trilogy containing My Episode 10,11,12 which will be pt.3
A oneshot in response to challenge: Cake. Posted here by request. Early on Yavin, Han approaches Leia with an odd proposition.
Set after the events of A Galaxy Changing Call, Jar Jar thinks about his life until that point and reveals his plans for the future.
Luke realizes he doesn't have anything to wear to the medal ceremony.
While searching for her crystal in the caves of Ilum, a Jedi Youngling catches a glimpse of her past and her future. A Light and Dark series Interlude.
Prompt: Due to the sheer volume of death and shock of the battlefield, seven Jedi Fall within the first few weeks of the Clone Wars.
In a cantina Han enjoys a drink when someone from his past appears.

In year 34BBY, a violent coup leaves but two surviving heirs of the Clan Kryze. Satine flees under the protection of Jedi, and Bo-Katan declares allegiance to the new government. A sprawling story of love and hate: of that which sparks between two young idealists who cannot seem to understand each other, between Master and growing Padawan, and between two sisters separated by war.

On a transport, Ahsoka falls off a cliff, and is presumed dead. Years later, after Anakin had fully recovered, a new assassin named "The Winter Jedi" appears. She has 2 lightsabers and her full name is unknown. Anakin and Obi-Wan are sent to find any information on her, but the truth might hurt more than the lie. AU where Ahsoka is Winter Soldiered. UPDATES ONLY ON WATTPAD AND AO3

Set before "A New Hope". "Chewie, hand me the-" the rest of the sentence died on Han Solo's lips and his eyes widened at the sight of the woman approaching dressed in black gloves, boots, and a long black tunic that was tattered around the edges. "Charon?" "Hey Han," she replied, "how've you been?" "You still got the ferry?" Han inquired. "Over there," Charon nodded her head.
Anakin tries to give Leia a compliment. It doesn't go over well. Set in my On Second Thoughts-verse.
As one adventure ends for Ben and Tahiri, they contemplate the rise of the First Order and the revelation that Ben's grandfather was Darth Vader.
Obi-Wan's thoughts on his diabolical lie to Luke.

Oneshot set after A New Hope. It was all over, the battle to destroy the Death Star, the medal ceremony, the fanfare, the excitement; all that was left was the silence, and time, time for Luke Skywalker to come to terms with the fact he'd lost everything and everyone that had ever mattered to him. His saving grace is he's not going through it alone.
It's a story of a family coming back together. It's a story of a hope that is never truly gone. It's a story of a love that will never fade.

After a failed coup against the Emperor in the wake of his discovery of his long-lost son, Darth Vader flees from the Empire, crashing on a small, mostly uninhabited planet where he's found and captured by the Rebel Alliance. Instead of killing Vader, the Rebels opt to imprison him to obtain valuable information. Predictably, nothing goes as planned.
Anakin has a toothache that saves the galaxy. A.K.A. Anakin has wisdom tooth surgery and reveals certain things under the influence of the anesthesia.

Valen Rannix, newly christened Commander of Hawk Group, navigates the treacherous waters of Imperial leadership as Death Squadron continues its campaign to stab at the heart of the Rebellion. Meanwhile, Andorus Merik continues his fight with boots on the ground amongst his Scout Walker Battalionmates, and blusterous copilot, Gunnery Sergeant Hammand
Anakin investigates the identity of the sith, not dismissing the claims of Fives about the chips. He comes to a startling revelation.
A Prequel To 'The Return Of Hope' that explains the origins of the Embodiments of the Force as well as some context behind their duel and Nyx's subsequent blindness.

Obi-Wan goes to rescue Satine Kryze from Death Watch and Darth Maul. Anakin catches him stealing a ship from the Jedi Temple and invites himself along. Between Sith Lords and long-buried loves, Anakin's trajectory towards the Dark changes. Second in the Shatterpoints series.
Young Anakin progresses a little quicker in connectivity training than his Master had expected. A meditation on an unwittingly shared memory.

ROTS Fix-It. The sky was falling, the world was crumbling beneath his feet. Palpatine was a Sith Lord, Padmé was going to die, and Anakin was desperate enough to do the unthinkable: actually ask Obi-Wan for help. [CROSS-POST FROM AO3]

"Through the Force," Yoda said, "things you will see. Other places. The future, the past. Old friends long gone." Except, Luke isn't the only one who's seeing things. [Soul-2-Soul 2021 gift for plinge.]
"Would you really have stayed, had I asked you to?" Obi Wan and Satine speak in the medical room aboard the Coronet after Merrik's failed assassination.
The young Duchess of Mandalore makes an erroneous phone call late at night. An Obitine one-shot, titled for the song by The Avalanches that inspired it.
Han and Chewie are sent to retrieve a certain droid from Jawas, but Tuskens get in the way and Han learns a surprising fact about Chewie.
the bad batch and some of their friends go bowling.
Instead of reaching for his lightsaber, Obi-Wan knelt and reached for Padme.
Palpatine muses about the near triumph of the Sith, and what needs to be done to make it happen. Spoilers for Attack of the Clones, Legends, and Revenge of the Sith.

Following on from 'Gone', it's now seven months since the abduction of Jacen and Tilly's baby daughter, Rey, and as anyone who has lost someone knows life still goes on. (At the time of writing Rey's fate was undecided for me, so here are some conversations in the meantime).
Faced with his new itty-bitty baby Luke, what is a Dark Lord to do?
Ben lamented this memory. He would kill his father again. The past would never die, forever shackling Ben to Kylo Ren. ** My take on the unsaid parts of Kef Bir
Rey, Finn, Poe, and Rose decide to upend the game-board. It goes better than one might have expected.
Nightswan survives the Battle of Batonn. Thrawn takes the opportunity to incorporate his fallen adversary into his designs for the future. Alternate ending to Thrawn (2017) by Timothy Zahn.

After the end of the war with the Empire, Obi-Wan wakes up in his twelve-year old body. Now all he needs to do is convince everyone he's psychic, trick his Master into taking him on before he's sent to Bandomeer, redeem a few bad guys, and try not to have a nervous breakdown. Pretty easy. Now with a sequel! Second in series is "a soul that's born in cold and rain".

New Hope went a bit more according to plan, until it didn't. The destruction of Alderaan pushes the Force to adjust its scales. Now back before the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan, Cody, Rex and Appo will make several corrections and several more mistakes. Darth Vader turns early and the Order has to ask, will Pri? AU Time Travel. Open ended, hope.
A newly-christened Darth Vader reunites with the wife he thought was dead.
Maybe it's just her… but Zorii kind of likes a woman that can kick her butt. (Canon AU. Star Wars-Rise of Skywalker AU. ZoriiRey. Femslash.)

Obi-Wan knew that he would not survive this mission, but as long as he managed to save Anakin's daughter first, he was fine with it. What he hadn't counted on, however, was that he would also learn first-hand how far his line had fallen. Part 8 of the "An Apprentice" series

Following on from 'Jaizun'. Jorj Bailey Solo has already endured too much in his young life, yet once again he is facing an uncertain future. For Han and Leia too the future may be traumatic, for how will they survive if they find their son is suddenly gone...

Even as the throne room crumbles to the ground, Ben only has his eyes on Rey as he asks her to join him and rule the galaxy. But when an unexpected Force set back has Ben practically begging on his knees for the one thing he asks of Rey, the question remains; will she stand her ground and go through with it? Or leave him to his demise as the new Supreme Leader?

He is too injured to stand when Rey brings them back to the Resistance base, too injured to do much of anything other than sit on the ground at her feet and try to cling to consciousness while she argues with her friends over his head about what should be done with him.
An excerpt from the unpublished autobiography of Ochi of Bestoon.
Boy Meets World jokes aside, this is a one-shot where a Star Wars fanboy has an out-of-the-blue encounter with the man himself, Darth Vader.
"Obi-wan asked me to be his Padawan again." "And? How do you feel about it?" "I... really don't know." - Sister Story to Inevitability of Oversight.

What if Leia died during the Lost Tribe of the Sith's attack on the Jedi Temple? Who comes to teach her one last lesson on the force that her brother skipped? Anakin Skywalker's force ghost. This was chapter 1 of my Star Wars One Shots, but is being reposted. This is set in Legends.
Kylo Ren decides to look for the droid on Jakku himself. [TFA AU]
A love story.

Yet another 100-word drabble about (you guessed it) Han and Leia in bed. This time it's their very first time... Co-written with Erin Darroch. For the record, we reject the Disney trilogy entirely, so these two stay together forever and ever. The End.

Yet another 100-word drabble about (you guessed it) Han and Leia in bed. This time it's their very first time... Co-written with Justine Graham. For the record, we reject the Disney trilogy entirely, so these two stay together forever and ever. The End.

Anakin Skywalker's life is fantastic. He has an amazing wife, a young daughter training to be a Jedi, and an estate in the Naboo countryside. The Clone Wars ended in victory five years ago, the Republic is peaceful and prosperous, Palpatine is a retired old politician, and there's no such thing as 'Rebels' or an 'Empire'. Everything's great... but will it last?

Companion piece to "A Messed Up Destiny". Anakin Skywalker and Obi Wan Kenobi are sent to assist the growing Resistance Movement on Jabiim, a world whose mining operations are vital to the Republic and will have to guide the Jedi trough one of the bloodiest campaigns in the Clone War as Asajj Ventress and her Separatist forces close in, endangering the mission and our Jedi heroes.
Ahsoka has trouble coping with her PTSD. Luckily, there are always those willing to help her. Rated T just in case, TW for panic attack. Takes place in Happy Au (see profile for details).
Cody is having trouble sleeping and Obi-Wan is willing to help him get some well-deserved rest.
What if Ren was strong enough not to kill Han Solo? A little OS about Ben turning his back on the First Order.

Star Wars: prequel era where again Jenica gets in the middle of Qui Gon Jinn & Obi Wan Kenobi. This time she is older has more training & is generous by helping Qui Gon buy the parts he needs sending them on their way without Anakin & a little bit of advice to a young girl. Her guides are three holocrons & legends in their own right. Lord Scourge, Meetra Surik, Revan.
Childhood friends Ben and Poe reunite after Poe leaves the Spice Runners.
Darth Sidious enjoys two vices at once.
Sidious's thoughts after he's murdered Plagueis.
Qui-Gon frees Anakin, and the Force is not satisfied. Seeking to avoid a dark future, he decides that it is a Jedi's mandate to free slaves. Part 1 in the Shatterpoint series.
Ahsoka goes to Ilum to receive her kyber crystal just before being paired with her Master, Anakin Skywalker.
a long time ago in a galaxy far far away
The Jedi of the Old Order defeated both Sidious and Vader, and the Republic never fell. Of course, that leaves new enemies to take their place.
Five messages Shmi Skywalker began and one she finished.

When Rey learns of two Republic-era Jedi that are still alive after the demise of the First Order, she was expecting a pair of wise, venerable Jedi Masters. Trained in every area of the Force and formidable opponents. This...is not that.
Luke is not the only child of Darth Vader
Faced with his wife's kidnapping at the hands of his enemy, Emperor Jagged Fel is forced to make an agonizing choice with agonizing consequences.
Set before ANH. Han is forced by gun point into flying a determined woman to Alderaan.
Anakin says goodbye to Ahsoka with his final breath (RotJ)
Darth Vader kidnaps Han in order to lure his son out of hiding.

Padawans Luke Skywalker and Mara Jade take some time off from Jedi training to attend a high-end art gallery exhibition. It also happens to be their so-very-secret first date. (AU vignette, 1 BBY, Luke/Mara, some Anakin/Padmé, Leia. Romance, family, dare I say fluff?)

Rey is boarding Luke's X-Wing to finish what she started and to hopefully fit the last piece of her life's puzzle into place. The Force is with her, as always. Characters (c) Lucasfilms Ltd., Story by me
When Revan is teleported to the future things don't go as planned. How will the council react? Can he foil Palpatine's plans? What will happen? *Stopped due to reasons written inside story*
Vader used to hate bacta baths. But not anymore. / Tiny fluffy ficlet, Luke & Vader.

"The damage was bright, jagged, and bloodied. Rey desperately tried to avoid scrutinizing it too closely, afraid of what it would reveal." Rey faces the emotional fallout of Ben's death alone (AKA the mourning we didn't get in TROS)
As the sun sets on Tatooine, Rey receives an important visitor to answer her last few questions before she begins her new journey.
Anakin Skywalker was dead. At least, Darth Vader assumed so. That is until, he saw her again. Solo companion to Ashes in Snow

Happy May the 4th! To celebrate, I decided to write a one-shot covering Anakin's inner thoughts throughout Revenge of the Sith, picking up right when he's watching out the window of the council chamber, and details the lengths he's willing to go to save Padme.

Seeing with how the sequel series unsatisfied me and many other fans, I wanted to rewrite the entire thing in a way which brings a sense of consistency to the plotline, but also respects the timeline of both the Lucasverse and the Disneyverse. To avoid conflicting both timelines, this series will take place after the events Luke Skywalker's exile from the Republic, before 137 ABY.

Nearly a decade after Order 66, Vader fails to eliminate a Jedi survivor and earns the fury of his master's wrath. Will Darth Vader survive what he will experience when he comes face to face with Lord Sidious?

Before Artoo was shipped off to the past, courtesy of the now dead Skywalker clan, he was given two important directives: expose Order 66 and assassinate Chancellor Palpatine. Oh, and he has to play a number of messages from his Master's family to the Sith Lord before he dies. Easy, right? Not really...

In another timeline the First Order never came into power and Ben Solo never turned to the Dark Side. He finds Rey on Jakku and takes her to the Jedi Order to be trained. Oneshot Drabble written for May the 4th Be With You.
Ben wakes up and he can't breathe. Post-Rise of Skywalker if that movie had a happy ending.

Luke is sent to Kuat to sabotage the Executor on her first launch. But when Vader realises his son is there, he unwittingly does that himself. / Crack oneshot based on the Ever Given's stay in the Suez Canal.

Dog groomer Rey Skywalker has to deal with a neglected Doodle, his jealous owner, and the owner's ex-boyfriend, who just happens to be the man Rey loves. Modern AU. Written for the Damerey Creations May the 4th Mix 'n Match Challenge.
To celebrate May the Fourth, Rey goes to work dressed up as Kira, her favorite Galaxy Wars character. She didn't expect to find her very own Kylo Ren there.
Rey hires hitman Kylo to deal with her ex-boyfriend, but she's a little unclear on the concept. Based on a Twitter prompt.
The Death Star has a second flaw-the wiring tastes good. Kind of like licorice. Luke Skywalker and Princess Leia exploit this flaw. Tarkin does so by sheer accident. rated T.
Darth Vader though it was the last he'd see of his former master after Obi-Wan's body mysteriously vanished. Obi-Wan is determined to prove him wrong. As always.

Rex meets Luke Skywalker for the first time after Endor, and quickly realizes that he's far more similar to his deceased father than anyone knows. Luke is still mourning Vader's death, and Rex may be the only one who truly understands the loss.
In which Leia and Luke reveal and discuss their pasts with each other (and Han makes fun of Luke).
It was a dark and stormy night... and Rey was frightened. She hated thunderstorms. What happens when she makes so much noise her neighbor rushes over, convinced she's in danger?

After a certain unfortunate incident involving Moff Tarkin, thirteen-year-old Leia Organa gets summoned to attend court on Coruscant. If she can just avoid Palpatine and Darth Vader, everything will be fine.
An old Mandalorian story of a Jedi who fell in love with a Mandalorian and found the Way.

A dangerous storm is approaching the Resistance base. Leia and Rose have to save the base, Rose by fixing the broken shield generators, and Leia by holding back the storm... Mentions of a Legends book (Clone Wars Gambit: Siege), and has force ghosts.
The four Jedi that Grogu spoke to and the one that answered.
Jedi Padawan Mara Jade has kept her feelings for Luke well-hidden, until Corran Horn steals her biology textbook.
Vader is ready to enact the coup he has been planning for nearly a year, but he may have underestimated Palpatine, and overestimated his son. / Ficlet originally written for Whumptober 2020.
A one-off story of Ben and Rey becoming a true dyad on Exegol.

With Leia's history revealed to the galaxy the couple are forced to move from Coruscant to Terrendoc, where they start to forge a new life together - setting up their new home, making new friends, welcoming a new grandchild. Things can only get better, right?...
Palpatine meets his end in a most unexpected way. Humor, vignette.
Just how far is Poe Dameron willing to go to help his wife? Or... that's not how the Force works... or is it?
A very short one shot. Obi Wan is injured, Qui Gon wants to keep him in bed, and cats are the best. Bonus, Obi Wan's revenge!
final chapter.
What were Luke's thoughts when he was being tortured by Darth Sidious in the Return of the Jedi?
Ice cream, conversation, and possibilities. A sequel to "Fortunate Souls".

The Galactic Republic is on the verge of a civil war! Anakin Skywalker, the adopted son of Chancellor Palpatine and a recent graduate from an elite military academy, has returned to Coruscant with a special mission from his father. In the meantime, the Jedi Order is facing challenges on ethical grounds. This story is about Anakin's love, hate, passion, and redemption.
For a double cross, it was breathtakingly effective.
A soft scene between Ben Solo and Rey that takes place during the hand touch scene in 'The Last Jedi.' This time, Luke doesn't barge in on them.

Prompt: Swap AU where Speedrick is the monster machine racer cheater who is arrogant, a show-off and bullies everyone, expecially Darington, Blaze and AJ. One day, Darington's big brother puts him in his place. Blueberry Fam AU, Star Wars/Star Wars Rebels/Blaze and The Monster Machines Crossover.

Companion piece to "A Messed Up Destiny". Sensing a disturbance in the Force under the Jedi Temple, Yoda sends Anakin and Revan to investigate, only for them to discover a greater threat than they could have ever imagined. But will the Jedi be able to destroy the source of darkness lurking beneath the Jedi's precious Temple, or will they fall to the Sith lurking under their feet?

Rey waited a moment, making sure to take at least two breaths. Inhale, exhale, inhale, exhale. "I've decided I can't be your fake girlfriend." Knowing that this was just as awkward for him as it was for her, gave her extra courage. Another two breaths, and then she continued, dropping what she knew would be a bit of a bomb. "But I can do…real…girlfriend." (S&R: CRW)
Nute Gunray reflects on his life after sacrifing himself. Set after Star Wars Episode VI: Path of Fates.

"Think it might be twins again?" He said with a joking smile. She scoffed, "If it is, you're getting a vasectomy," She threatened. What would they do if they were having twins again? She wasn't sure she could go through having her innards stretched that much again let alone give birth to two more babies in succession.

A short story in the style of the recent From a Certain Point of View anthologies. Wedge Antilles does not consider himself a hero, but that is what the Rebellion needs as they launch a desperate attack against the Second Death Star. With the fate of the galaxy hanging in the balance, Wedge must overcome the doubts haunting him since Yavin and take a step into a much larger world.
Battling to keep the Separatists from taking a planet rich with ionite, Obi-Wan lets slip to Anakin how he's familiar with it.

After finishing up an assignment on the idyllic planet Kurin, Jedi Knight Allana Djo finds herself attending a lavish masquerade ball… and dealing with a dangerous uninvited guest. Allana/OC, AU, 59 ABY. Romance, drama, introspection, angst. Featuring the Super Evil Chaos Twins of Evil, some other OCs, and a Ben Skywalker cameo. Short story. Part of my Enter!verse.

A mission to get information from a Separatist base doesn't go as planned and hurts Ahsoka in ways she never thought she would have to deal with. I don't own Star Wars. The title may be fluffy, but the story isn't. Warning: major character death(s), depression, suicidal thoughts, self harm. UPDATES ONLY ON WATTPAD

Han and Leia's 13 year old daughter learns a few things about love (and passion) as she watches her parents dancing together one night. AU story in which I make Han and Leia insanely happy, read at your own risk.
On a night seemingly like any other, doom falls on the Jedi Order. A small series of shorts from the perspective of different characters.

Vader is short on time in order to plan an attack on the rebellion. Unfortunately he has no patience for something so time consuming as surgery. He can patch it himself, he is used to pain. tw. body horror, medical horror, pain.
Did you ever hear the Tragedy of Darth Sidious the Proud?

After the First Order makes an alliance with the planet Atoa, Kylo Ren is sent to the planet to oversee the creation of an army of Force-sensitive warriors. Unbeknownst to him, Dalia, daughter of the High Priestess of Atoa, works with the Resistance and her aunt Varra to overthrow her mother's control of the planet and dissolve the alliance with the First Order.

Companion piece to "A Messed Up Destiny". As the Clone Wars continue to set the Galaxy ablaze, Anakin Skywalker has returned from deployment and decides to spend the evening with his girlfriend, taking a break from the crisis that threatens to destroy everything they fear to lose. Unfortunately for him, he doesn't count of his love's bodyguard taking her a job a bit too seriously.
At the end, Darth Vader looks inside himself to decide whether to save his son from the Emperor's attack.
The full moon strikes as Ben adn Rey walk home. Who's hunting whom?

Companion piece to "A Messed Up Destiny". Struggling to believe what he saw during his duel with Anakin Skywalker and with his world view being challenged on all fronts, Count Dooku begins to question if joining Darth Sidious was the right thing to do as Qui Gon Jinn pays him a visit to help him see through the lies of the Sith, hoping to turn his Master away from the Dark Path.
War doesn't determine who's right. War determines who remains. - R.F. Kuang Obi-Wan receives tragic news. Anakin learns a grim truth. They both mourn a friend. Offscreen minor character death.
Dark Nest AU. What if, instead of Jacen falling to the dark side, as he would in Legacy of the Force, it were Jaina instead?

Jedi padawan Kithera Rinani and her Master have gotten themselves into a spot of trouble with a giant bug and a dark, dank cave. How can they extricate themselves without losing their heads to the giant beast?
Vader, on a forced trip to Naboo, senses a powerful Force-sensitive. / Originally written for Flufftober 2020, for the prompt "Serendipity".

The story takes place a bit after Return of the Jedi. Ahsoka Tano went home and was about to meditate but Anakin Skywalker's and Obi-Wan Kenobi's Force ghosts appear on front of her. They remember stories from the past, they joke and roast each other. The fanfiction is meant to put a little smile on the reader's face using some cute humor.

"Honk! Act like you know me! My name is Ben!" Rey sees the sign on the car when she pulls up to the grocery store, and decides to play along. The giant, surly man, apparently named Ben, is not amused. S&R: CONSTRUCTIVE REVIEWS WELCOME (CRW).
When the Rebellion kidnaps a young Luke Skywalker from his father, his aunt objects. / Two consecutive ficlets written for Flufftober 2020 and only now being posted here.
The Real Star Wars Sequel Trilogy begins after Rey wakes up, revealing the entire Disney Sequel Trilogy was nothing but a fake computer virtual simulation. The franchise was thus saved.
Based on the song, written in 10 minutes. "I did want to take your hand. Ben's hand." "Really?" Reylo.

"Have you seen her yet?" The answer haunts Ben. The last time he had felt the presence of Leia Organa was her final attempt to reach him before returning to the Force. A mother's sacrifice. In the three years following Exegol and the completion of his Barash Vow, Ben Solo continues to wait for a visit he isn't convinced will ever happen or he even deserves. [2-part series]
Short one-shots regarding Anakin's terrible sense of humor. Or Why Anakin Doesn't Need to be a Sith to be Evil.

Rey works at the Disney Store, and she's got laryngitis, so she wears a note saying the Sea Witch stole her voice. A small customer takes this literally, and hilarity ensues as they search for a means to keep Rey human... Based on a Twitter prompt.

Before the first Death Star run Luke gets pulled to the side to be tested as a pilot to prove he has what it takes to go up with the rest of them. A little standalone to add a bit to those scenes in the movie. Luke Skywalker, Jan Dodonna, Garven Dreis (Red Leader).

Happy 16th Birthday, Trisha! Featuring your top 10 ships: Reylo (Star Wars), ChristinexErik (Phantom of the Opera), ScarlettxRhett (Gone with the Wind), RosexThe Doctor (Doctor Who), HermionexRon (Harry Potter), TophxSokka (Avatar), Marinette/LadybugxAdrien/Cat Noir (Miraculous), BellexBeast (Beauty and the Beast), JeanniexAnthony (I Dream of Jeannie), AngelaxDwight (The Office) :D

Long after the fall of the First Order, Rey ventured to the outer-rim in search of an infamous criminal. Instead she found a man, a child, and a difficult decision. Part 5/5 ***MASSIVE spoilers for the rest of the series***
Leia begins to sort through her feelings, or doesn't.
Thrawn does not handle jealousy well. Thranto, set during the first canon Thrawn book by Timothy Zahn.
Rey finally gets a name for the ghost she's always known

During the Rako Hardeen mission after his masters supposed death, Anakin returns home after Obi-Wan’s funeral service feeling hopeless and broken. Painful memories of his childhood on Tatooine resurface as dreams. Feeling as if nothing is left for him Anakin makes a promise to himself that he won’t soon forget.
In which Rey may or may not assault her confusing, cute, and very aggravating coworker with a jelly donut.
A New Hope, but through the Millenium Falcon's eyes

Her eyes shut against the glaring blue and against the cold, heartless world that has tried so desperately to wipe her and all her loved ones from existence. And for what? Simply to cause pain? To pierce holes in her chest where love used to be? His shaking hand lands on her shoulder. They have each other and yet, still . . . they're completely alone.
Just a short fluffy fic about a shared monent in cloyd city.
With the Separatist fleet failing, one lone battle droid takes up the role of leadership to lead his forces to victory. A definitely ridiculous canon divergence from Downfall of a Droid (TCW S1 E6).

I'm sure you have wondered about how the turning events of Revenge of the Sith (my favourite movie) could have gone down differently. In this short but super emotional story you can have an insight into a fictional ending. Is there anything or anyone that could possibly bring back Anakin or has Darth Vader already consumed him too much? What would be the consequences of that?

Follow the story of a clone trooper during the era of the Galactic Empire. A long time ago he failed to complete the order the Chancellor gave all clones and he isn't sure if he can do it now. However, he isn't the only one who struggles with their past. The story is a spin-off to a beloved canonic Star Wars story featuring a few already existing favourized characters.

In this story, Ben and Rey share what have to be the worst cookies ever at a fundraiser at Chandrila University. Rose Tico, the sweetest person ever, baked them. Ben wants to throw them away... Rey wants to keep Rose from finding out the ugly and tasteless truth: that her cookies are awful.
Hux's last thoughts as he lay dying from Pryde's shot.

In a world torn apart by magic, necromancy and war, Luke wakes up in a strange place with a strange mark on his chest and no idea how he got there. Some people recognise him and some people want to help him. Others do not. / High fantasy necromancy AU.

Rey Johnson will be honored by Hollywood for Excellence in Teaching at the Oscars. She has a plan to ask celebrities at the after-party to give her students some advice about life-and record the conversations on her phone. She would love to get grumpy actor Ben Solo to speak to her, but he's not the least bit interested. Or is he? Find out here...

Following on from "Collateral Damage": Han and Leia must start to make plans for their future now that Leia's true heritage has been exposed, threatening the truce declared between father and son, as well as the growing relationship between mother and daughter.
Sequel to "Meanwhile" story. Ben finds out about Hux's family.

The One Sith are on the rise! Despite multiple victories by Edaan Palpatine and the Jedi Order, the galaxy continues to slide closer to the edge of the Dark Side. And with Edaan thrown into a coma, their allies will have to manage without him as the enemy tightens their grip. But help may come in the most unexpected of ways, if they can find their way back to the Light! 59 ABY.
Began as a joke about how JarJar would sound during sex, somehow became this. Anakin/Jar-Jar for the memes. Bone apple tea
Three people, two cots, one room, and one wookie. (Rated T for one utterance of d*mn)
Of all the local customs Cody has been roped into, this takes the cake. (Codywan Week, Day 5: Fluffl)
What more can she do to comfort this vulnerable, complicated man? Can her gentleness push him even closer to the light? [throne room AU]
To be Sith is to be Free.

"What kind of monster was he, to wish for beauty?" - Just a whole lotta touch-starved, lonely Ben Solo feeling a lot of feels when the Force decides to connect him to Rey. Completely self-indulgent angst and fluff.
Five times Han touches his son's cheek.
Post-ROTJ, Vader lives AU. Many years ago, Anakin Skywalker said that he would free all the slaves. He has to start somewhere. (Originally published on AO3, reuploading to FF in chronological order.)
In the aftermath of Exegol, Ben and Rey are divided by misunderstandings. It will take time and danger for them to work things out...
When Ahsoka crash lands on a planet, she discovers a plot against the New Republic. Will she be able to put an end to it?
Post-ROTJ, Vader lives AU. Leia finds herself troubled by unsettling dreams, and there is only one person who can help her. (Originally published on AO3, reuploading to FF in chronological order.)
In which Obi-Wan gets a little too reckless in his fight with Grievous and Anakin is more than a little worried.

Post-ROTJ, Vader lives AU. After noticing that R2-D2 seems to share a strange personal connection with Vader, C-3PO decides to visit the former Sith Lord in search of some answers. (Originally published on AO3, reuploading to FF in chronological order.)

Post-ROTJ, Vader lives AU. When Han confronts Vader on the subject of his feelings for Leia, the former Sith doesn't react the way Han expects him to. (Originally published on AO3, reuploading to FF in chronological order.)
What happens when Vader and Boba Fett cross paths in a modern store? Absurdity ensues.
A young Jedi begins her journey to the dark side.

For a moment, Anakin lets his worries slip away and loses himself in the legend of Darth Plagueis. But the Sith's death means the death of the knowledge he'd possessed. Maybe. There's really only one way to find out, right? ROTS AU, fix-it
The Mandalorian, S2ep08 ALTERNATE ENDING
The crowning achievement of His Majesty, King Dathka Graush

Post-ROTJ, Vader lives AU. Ahsoka faces her former master once again, not entirely sure who or what she will find behind the mask. (Originally published on AO3, reuploading to FF in chronological order.) Part 2 now available.

The story is supposed to end with the girl and the boy riding off into the sunset. Isn't it? That's what Rey thought too—so she changed the ending. Now the story goes something like this: "Rey and Ben are living happily ever after, rebuilding the Jedi Order with twins on the way." But as the twins grow up, the cracks form in the world Rey created.
Children are going missing from their homes. Obi-Wan and Qui-Gon are tasked with finding and stopping the gang of pirates responsible. Things don't go according to plan.
In which Obi-Wan and Anakin discuss hair and girls.
Han's musings after his and Leia's private time on Bespin
Han & Leia on Bespin have a romantic interlude

Something about the man was familiar. Almost like Luke, but not. He was younger, but not considerably, and much taller, broader. He spoke with a Core accent with a hint of an Outer Rim – Tatooine? - twang. The face from the side looked a lot like Luke, with none of Luke's kindness. And the way he walked… Han's eyes widened, his heart stopped and his breathing stuttered w
My Name is Commander CT-2224. My rank is Martial Commander. And I have earned that with my prowess with and without my blaster. This is how I ended the Clone Wars. based on a thing I found on tumblr.
"Han got drunk last night and tried to set our marriage certificate on fire. He said — Good luck on trying to return me without the receipt, sweetheart."

Companion piece to "A Messed Up Destiny". As the Clone Wars continue to rage on across the galaxy Ahsoka Tano is assinged to Anakin Skywalker as his apprentice and must figure out what's wrong with her new Master while struggling to survive in a Galaxy at War.
It's all Anakin wants.

The Jedi are vampire hunters, but since Luke saw Vader murder his teacher in front of him, he's not been a Jedi. A run in with Vader on the planet of eternal night poses problems and revelations for the both of them. / Vampire AU set in GFFA, oneshot. A little Luke/Zev in the background.
Luke and Leia talk about the nuances between being fostered and being adopted.

A Force Ghost Ben/Rey love story, with a side of rebuilding the galaxy. Post-TROS, semi fix-it, Reylo, side-Stormpilot, Jedi School, Building a Relationship, Politics, Protecting Ben's legacy, Force pregnancy (at the very end). For the RFFA To Find Your Kiss exchange, 2021, written as a pinch hit assignment for magnetgirl, co-written with Annaelle.

Left behind by accident by her own master, Theca must fight to survive the most hostile planet of the Outer Rim. Her skills are put to the test, and not just to survive the planet, but the future in which she sees an army of thousands with a single face, and a great age of chaos and suffering to follow in which she must either stand firm in her beliefs, or break under the pressure.
Leia and young Ben have a day out together.
Luke and Leia are trying to hide on Arkanis when some local customs for celebrating Empire Day help them out. / Snippet written for Flufftober a few months ago.

Poe had been shot at, beaten and tortured – physically and mentally – by Kylo Ren and his minions, blown out of the sky, and then had wandered around the desert for hours until he finally met another soul who took him to safety. Nothing a gallon of water, some med patches, and 14 hours of sleep couldn't fix. Right? Right... Leia didn't believe it for a second.
Palpatine surprises Vader on his 40th birthday.

Companion piece to "A Messed Up Destiny". In order to master the ability of Pyrokinesis Anakin returns to the fiery world of Mustafar, where he will face the fear Darth Vader was never able to overcome. (One-shot)
In the moments leading up to Ahsoka's trial, everything changes. (part 4 of the Broken series).
"If into the security recordings you go, only pain will you find." Master Yoda was right. ROTS one-shot.

Two years after Darth Krayt's death, Empress Marasiah Fel leads the hunt for fugitive Sith while Cade Skywalker and Ania Solo team up for one big score. However, a series of mysterious kidnappings foreshadow a crisis that will change the galaxy forever. A sequel to the Legacy and Legacy II comics and a finale for the Skywalker saga.

Rey settled behind the counter of her flower shop with her favorite novel series. Getting immersed in a pivotal part of the book, Rey missed the sound of the shop door opening, and was surprised to find a tall man out of breath suddenly standing in front of her. He slammed a wad of bills on the counter between them. "How do I passive aggressively say, 'fuck you' in flower?"
Sequel to "The White Rose" story. The Doom-Joust can have only one champion.
Leia gets caught in a small cave-in on Hoth and gets a bump on her head. When she wakes up, she finds she's back on Alderaan. After that, things get really bizarre for all concerned.
After his loss at Skako Minor, Wat Tambor tries to recoup on his investment.

Dex Jettster has made and lost a lot of friends between the Clone Wars, the rise of the Empire, and the Rebellion. One day Leia Organa, senator for Alderaan and aspiring Rebel agent, walks in and reminds him painfully of two old friends long gone. As they becomes allies, he recognizes she has more in common with his ghosts than he thought.
He'd accepted the job from Tyrannus, he'd made the promise to Roz, and he was minutes away from beginning the cloning process...(set right after the game Bounty Hunter)
Luke Organa faces an ultimatum. / Snippet originally posted to tumblr for Angstober 2020.

Towards the end of yet another mission, Jango and Zam return to Slave1 only to find Boba was taken and must fight to get him back...(first Star wars story. Written quite a while ago so the writing style is different from my current one on Clone wars) (T for violence)

Han and Leia have returned to Coruscant after an urgent call from their daughter, Jaina. There, Leia is faced with a revelation almost certain to force a change to the path her life has been taking. Whilst for Han, there's a chance to reconcile with his eldest son, Jacen. (Let's just accept I am really lousy at summary writing, if not writing in general!)
Han Solo finds a bottle in the sands of Tatooine, and when he opens it - against Chewie's advice - he gets more than he bargained for when a Genie/Jedi pops out.
Vader learns that his son has a terminal illness. / Tiny snippet posted to tumblr for the Angstober prompt "Terminal illness."

Padmé had always been a light sleeper ever since she was a small child, and thunderstorms... she absolutely hated them. They terrify her and she’s usually never able to sleep during them. But now that she had Anakin by her side... She can actually find peace while he holds her close to his warm chest. [Anakin Skywalker/Padmé Amidala] (Fluff/Comfort/Romance)

[COMPLETE] It had been supposed to be a simple mission: get in, get out, the Alliance got what they wanted, he got to brag about how the rebels would be dead without him, and the Falcon got an upgrade. At least that had been the sales pitch the princess had used when she'd approached him. Except, where would the fun be if something didn't go wrong?

Two weeks into their journey to Bespin, Leia and Han are finally in a good place — but Leia finds that grief and guilt, have a way of sneaking up unawares. Thankfully, Han's learned enough about Leia to know that sometimes, the best way to help is just to be there. Set during ESB; written for maggzblair for the HanLeia Celebration 2020 Holiday Exchange.

Something beautiful, while it lasted. Six weeks in sublight with Han, and Leia's unlearned everything she knew about how to press forward when your heart is broken. She couldn't afford to remember, but she didn't want to forget. Not all love stories end in tragedy. Set during ESB through early ROTJ. Written for thewritingpuss for the HanLeia Celebration 2020 Holiday Exchange.

In the aftermath of the Battle of Jakku, ex-Rebels and a former Imperial Customs officer uncover a plot to destroy the fragile peace between the New Republic and the defeated Galactic Empire. See my companion antology "Razorclaw: Adventures of a Rebel Cell" for valuable background information. Feedback welcome!
Just because Han is blind, that doesn't mean his enemies ever leave him alone. Sequel to "Endless Night"

After the events chronicled in the Mandalorian, Din Djarin has his son back and is on his way to setting up the council to rule over Mandalor with him. Life should be good. But sometimes you don't even realize what is missing until you find it.

Cody used to have two Jedi. Now he has two Tooka's, one of which is a very clingy kitten. AKA Cody is still a dad like in Obi Wan's Second Padawan and Sahl is still his child. The force likes messing with the Disaster linage though. And the 212th may be taking pictures along the way to blackmail their Commander later.

Ines Talia is a close friend of Princess Leia and from Alderaan. When she got a message from her friend, telling her to go to Tatooine, that will change her life forever after she meets Luke Skywalker. An event that was meant to happen since the beginning as Ines and Luke will find out in time. Follows the journey of OT and beyond: Luke Skywalker/OC, Leia Organa, Han Solo
Their bond won't let them be alone. At least this time it's the middle of the night and they can't get into a shouting match. [Oneshot]
Both Han and Mara receive the same mysterious letter hinting that the author knows their father. Of course, neither one can pass up this opportunity to find out about their paternity.
Wes Janson comes to Luke and Han to request assistance with a new entertainment program made by Lando Calrissian.

Have you ever wondered what happened if they listened to Fives? Well this is my take on it. What happenes when the Republic starts to surgically remove the inhibitor chips? What happens when Anakin is granted a seat on the council, AND made a master? Is shipping Ahsoka and Anakin a stupid waste of time and a sickening idea? (The answer to that last one is: YES) The answers to t
Everyone's favorite scene in which Problematic Dad Vader tries to convince Baby Skywalker to join him...after slicing off his hand moments before.

'Enough.' Maul thought, sheltered in the arms of his rival as death drew closer. 'Enough. It's over.' Only it isn't. Maul gets hurtled into the past where he is determined to hold tight to everything Sidious stole from him, and destroy the sith for good measure. Hope may move mountains, but spite tears open space and time. A Maul Time Travel fic. Part 1 of Falling Towards Grace.
Rey has a dream that's really a memory and Poe is there when she wakes
Han Solo is a lieutenant on the Death Star when an Alderaanian Princess is brought onboard. I will try to post this story once again since several readers have requested it.
After years of no contact between them, Eli reunites Thrawn with his mother. Post-Rebels finale, references Chaos Rising by Timothy Zahn.
It was a well-known secret that the Skywalker's marriage was a façade, even so, it was one of the favorite gossips on the entire Senate... Anidala One-Shot.
Obi-Wan shouldn't have accepted that odd little fruit from Anakin.

When Princess Rey of Coruscant calls upon the cursed Sir Kylo Ren to help her escape her grandfather's political machinations, she discovers freedom in the ancient familial magic that binds them together and the growing attraction that threatens to tear them apart. Fantasy/medieval AU. TW: Period-typical violence.
Rey finds a way to bring Ben back. But he isn't human anymore. [vampire AU]

The bond snaps back into place, even stronger than before. He is here. With Rey, yes, but with Luke - Luke, who is looking at them now with that same dangerous glint in his eye that haunts Ben's dreams. [TLJ hut scene AU]
What happens when Sabine gets hurt on a mission? One-shot - Rated T for Star Wars-style language
A newly-married Mara Jade has some time off coming up. The crew of the Wild Karrde want to make sure it's memorable. Vignette, Legends, New Republic era, several months post-Union, L/M.

They died together, and they woke up pissed. Sweeping in on the wings of chaos, little Obi-Wan finds himself with a new Master. Older Obi-Wan delves deeper into Mandalorian culture than he expected. And Satine may very well be pressed to violence to protect those she loves. Two Obi-Wans: Mandalorian Clone Wars Obi-Wan and Padawan Obi-Wan. Time Travel, landing in 44 BBY T/M rating

It was on the fifth anniversary of the Empire and the day Ahsoka Tano was officially introduced to the public. Meanwhile, the Emperor has a conversation about loyalty with his apprentice. Part 6 of the "An Apprentice" series

Two weeks after ROTS, Obi-Wan is trying to get Luke to his family on Tatooine. But Vader is on their tail. / A prequel to my fic Sparks, originally posted to tumblr for Whumptober. ft. major character death

In the aftermath of the acadec's field trip to Stark Industries, Pepper finds out that Peter's teachers has some... biased opinions and decides to go to Midtown to set the record straight. [ Peter Parker & Stark Industries / 6 ]

Clint and Natasha's relationship is… unusual. Undefinable. They're together but not in love, partners in life as well as in spy craft and crime. They share an apartment, sleep in the same bed, and would protect each other with their lives. And some people ask too many questions. Or: Clint and Natasha are in a QPR and annoyed by the incessant questions.

If someone had told Tony 5 years ago that he would be in love with a beautiful women and have an amazing pseudo-son who is as smart as he is, he would have laughed and slammed the door in their face. But now he does have that and he would do anything to get them back. *Set after the events of Infinity War*
A small snippet in Endgame when Steve and Natasha talk in the compound. Please review or comment, greatly appreciated. Thank you!

how peter's team decided enough was enough and invited midtown over to SI to deal with their baby boss' bullying issue. Surprisingly, they didn't have to do a thing. or: the field trip fic [ Peter Parker & Stark Industries / 5 ]

Just a little story about our favorite non-romantic duo. Takes place during Avengers: Age of Ultron. Natasha is broken after the flash backs from the Maximoff girl. Clint tries to make sure she knows that's she's not alone. Not anymore.

Wanda Maximoff likes taking care of people, including her new Avengers teammates. One of the ways she accomplishes this is through cooking, becoming the team's unofficial chef. Vision cannot eat, but he can smell, and his nose often leads him to assist in Wanda's Kitchen. Written for AU-gust Day 14, Chefs.
Crack fic of what I think would happen if the Avengers tried to throw a birthday party. Slight mentions of Alcohol. Purely Crack!
It all started with an invitation. The Invitation. In which Peter is invited to a gala and someone's a big fat meanie. But Tony fixes it though.
She and Natasha have a bet you see and Carol Danvers is not going to be outmatched by one Bucky Barnes or the Winter Soldier. (Carol Danvers x Bucky Barnes)
How Tony Stark cut off ties with Nick Fury and SHIELD, post-CW [ Peter Parker & Stark Industries / 3 ]

Tony woke up to too-bright lights and white walls all around him. It felt suffocating. But, he supposed, this was a feeling he was used to. Being Tony Stark and Iron Man and genius, playboy, philanthropist was just so tiring sometimes. Or: Tony Stark post-Siberia [ Peter Parker & Stark Industries / 2 ]
The CCTV footage of Tony and Steve's fight is released to the world. What did Sam think of it? [ Peter Parker & Stark Industries / 1 ]
Omegaverse, Asexual Tony, please mind the warnings. Growing up, Tony doesn't think he'll ever know happiness, and yet, life has a way of surprising us.
“This is this fight of our lives… Whatever it takes.”

"Let's show them what we can do," Freya tells her powers. Her voice now the distorted version it once was when they would assume control of her. Gladly. We are one, child. We are Mercury. There's moment of complete silence among them before it's broken by T'Challa's war cry. "WAKANDA FOREVER!"

"What do we do, Cap? Merc?" Sam asks. Steve looks down at Freya. With her eyes still on the opposing team, she feels his gaze on her. Her aura hasn't been ignited, but it flares up now, along with her eyes. Her answer to Steve's questioning stare loud and clear. Steve nods in agreement and turns his gaze back on the other team. "We fight.”

"Worthy." Freya's blood goes cold. The sickening feeling in her stomach hits again and amplifies. She gets to her feet when she spots a beat up Iron Legion suit limping out into the open across the room. "No," the suit mumbles as it turns to them. "How could you be worthy? You're all killers."

After Pepper and Tony distances SI from the Avengers Initiative and SHIELD post-CW, they get overworked by the number of new projects they're working on. As such, Peter Parker forces them to go on a vacation and, in the process, gets roped into becoming the CEO of Stark Industries for the next two weeks. [ Peter Parker & Stark Industries / 4 ]
One-shot story. After the battle with Thanos, Steve tries to see the proper ending for him and his lost friend.

When Fury kicks Tony Stark off the Avengers team and literally uses Starktech to destroy the armor, Tony vows to have nothing more to do with both SHIELD and the initiative. But that's before he learns that SHIELD is spread too thin to rescue their "beloved" heroes after they are captured by the villain du jour. He may no longer have a suit, but that does NOT mean he's helpless.

"How'd I do, Captain?" He blinks, completely confused as to what just happened. A small girl just handed his butt to him. Well, she's a grown woman. But still, she's so much smaller than him! He slowly stands, keeping his eyes on her. Analyzing her. Then, it finally clicks. "You're Mercury," he states. Her smile starts to fade as she nods in confirmation. "I am."
Home isn't always a place. Sometimes it's a person, or a team, or a family. Bucky needs to find his way home.
A few more minutes' conversation allows the Avengers to discuss the Sokovia Accords in a more relaxed environment, giving Steve in particular a chance to point out the flaws of government oversight.

Set after the first Avengers movie, within the timeline of the Loki TV series - After ending the TVA, Loki and his allies find refuge in Loki's timeline and seek Tony's help. Tony is baffled, but too curious to turn them away. And Pepper thinks that taking in a group of Lokis is just asking for trouble, at least until she gets to know them better. Sylvie/Pepper & Mobius/Loki/Tony

"And somehow, against all odds, she survives. She doesn't know how. Her ledger is gushing red, her body does not stop aching, her demons still haunt her, but she survives. Perhaps death is not a gift people like her are allowed to receive." *** Even the Iron Maiden is human, too.
Friends don't look at each other like that though. (Romanogers Oneshot, potentially a series of connected oneshots).
Spider-man singlehandedly defeats an enemy that even the Avengers couldn't on live TV. This is the aftermath. Or: the aftermath of Aegis, as seen through social media [What makes a hero? series / 4]

For the first time in two years, captured through cameras and preserved for the rest of time, Spider-man didn't pull his punches. He didn't calculate his strength. Spider-man let loose. He was going 100%. And as he did, the world goes quiet. Or: the obligatory OP Spider-man NYC fic [What makes a hero? series / 3]
After Peter rips them a new one, the Avengers realize that they have a long way to go. or: the Rogue Avengers realize that they may have been too narrow-minded. [What makes a hero? series / 2]

The Avengers find out that Peter Parker is Spider-man and they have some thoughts on it. Or: Peter Parker gives the Rogues a wake-up call on actions and consequences and what it truly means to be a hero. (Newsflash: it isn't the equipment or the fancy spandex.) [What makes a hero? series / 1]
There's something wrong with Tony.

In another life, Peter Parker doesn't get bitten by a spider. But one would find that there would always be variables that stay the same, no matter how many universes and worlds you look at. That just happens to be Peter Parker and Tony Stark's relationship. or: Tony Stark, Happy Hogan and Pepper Potts all meet Peter Parker. The kid feels familiar for some reason.

In the midst of battle with a certain Asgardian god, Bruce gets hit by a blast rendering him unconscious. When brain damage is a factor, what will happen when he finally wakes up? If he ever wakes up! (a request!)
Part 3 of Cause of Attraction - An accident in training gives Peter a shock, and reminds Tony that he's a mere human with no special abilities. He decides it's time for that to change.

Happy is dating and Tony really wants to meet the lucky lady. Except Happy doesn't want to tell him her name. A companion fic to "Not a bad thing", might be read as a stand-alone, has little to do with the rest of the series.
So my series 'Rewriting the Way This Story Ends: The Avengers' was taken down. So I'm cross posting on Archive of Our Own and Wattpad open the story to read more details and link to the stories

When the same answer to an unusual question gets five students assigned the same summer study group, they have no idea what to expect. Modern AU - where our lovely avengers are teenagers thrown together in a summer school program. Cue much protectiveness, whump, h/c, and friendship. (SEQUEL - Advancements)

Her glasses slipped to the end of her nose when she read and as he passed by he watched as she pushed them back up with her forefinger and tucked her hair behind her ear. As he ran by again she surprised him by looking up suddenly from her book and he quickly focused back on the ground in front of him, hoping she hadn't seen him looking.
Alternatively, Peter Parker's Thoughts from his Premature Coffin. Shameless Peter whump and angst because I'm terrible.

No one expected the Hulk to be taken out so quickly. Even more so, no one expected what that meant for Bruce. PROMPT: Bruce gets hurt, or blind, or gets amnesia and loses his memory or something and the others have to take care of him.
An alternate ending to Loki (2021). He Who Remains is not who Loki and Sylvie expected. Not at all.

Steve/OC - When Tony's desperate bid to protect the world ends up putting it in more danger than ever before, it's up to Steve and Olivia, his wife, the 1940s super soldiers, to help lead the Avengers to victory against Ultron. But when two Enhanced twins force them to confront their worst fears, even their fortitude may be put to the test. Fourth in the Medic Examinations series.

After hearing Peter Parker's passing comment regarding dogs, Thor decides to look into getting a puppy. He is excited to adopt his new war companion, a Saint Bernard, who ends up being quite mellow once he gets a bit older. Loki makes an appearance a couple years later, and tries to stir up some mischief.
Hoping to cheer up Tony, Steve plans a Christmas Eve in New York City.

May and Peter are moving to the Tower. While packing the apartment they find the old photos and share stories. Set after "Titles don't matter". It can be read independently, although the previous fic is referenced (in one line tho). Reposted from AO3

Peter Parker is just your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man with some not so subtle ties to the avengers. Now will they notice when our young wall crawler starts to act not so himself? Or will Venom get his perfect host.

The fine hairs on her neck tickle and she smiles as she feels the weight of his eyes on her. Her heartbeat quickens. Her hands raise slowly, lacing her fingers behind her wet braid. Her mouth quirks in a smile. "You're slipping, Barton. I tripped your trap ages ago." - post Avengers: Endgame.
Tony decides to take Peter out to a fancy restaurant in celebration of his good grades after starting college. It's just a dinner, nothing could go wrong... Right?
"I hate the Russian language..." Natasha, Peter, and Bucky simply cackled with amusement.
Tony was the only avenger who knew Spider-Man's secret identity. When Peter gets a call from Ned in the middle of a meeting, the other avengers come to their own interesting conclusion. One shot.

In 2024, Bucky Barnes follows a lead about more super soldier serum that takes him to Siberia. He encounters the unexpected and finds himself in 2014, shortly after the Winter Soldier vanished. Completed stories. I'll post one chapter every 1 to 2 days. Notes: This is a revision of a previous, very recent story due to formatting issues on the site (some updated content, as well)

Betty frowns, glancing around them. The crowd of students is still growing as people arrive, but nowhere can she see— The pieces fall together. "Oh my God." No Ned Leeds, and no Peter Parker. "He stood you up, didn't he?" (Betty and Liz. Homecoming, and what happened after.)

First, Happy was dating some mysterious woman. Then his new nephew turned out to be superhero. And now Tony somehow gained a kid. Sequel to "Not a bad thing", might be read independently, but probably will make more sense if the first one is read. Reposted from AO3

The year is 1992. Melina Vostokoff is only twenty-two, but she has already been cycled through the Red Room five times. She knows better than to form attachments, that love only brings pain. And yet, this little pretend family they've created doesn't seem so pretend anymore...

"Loki, you need to stop," Tony's voice rang through the room. Loki didn't move in the slightest as he continued regardless. "I can't stop now when I've come so far." Loki's voice was slightly hoarse and had a manic edge to it.
Take a dive into what Morgan’s day might’ve looked like if Thanos never got the stones.
Peter Parker is a disaster child and accidentally became the cryptid of Stark Tower.

In the spring of 1995, the Winter Soldier hits his head during a mission. In the spring of 1995, seven year old Darcy Lewis gets lost, and looks for a safe person to sit with. Improbably, they end up on the same bench. - Fluff, very little angst. AU. Kid!Darcy in the beginning, adult!Darcy at the end. Ending can be read as pre-Wintershock, or not, as you choose. ;)
