'I found Dreykov's daughter.' 'You-she-what? But isn't she, you know, dead' After Black Widow and before Infinity War, Natasha catches up with Clint and Steve, and shares a little about her latest escapade.

What if the other half got snapped? Thanos gathered the six Infinity Stones and snapped his fingers, eliminating half of all living beings. But this time, the other 50% survived the Snap: Doctor Strange, Spider-Man, Guardians of the Galaxy, Wanda, Bucky, Falcon and Black Panther, among other characters. Only they will be able to reestablish the balance of the Universe.

Spider-Man and Peter Parker may be two sides of the same coin, but they are not the same. Spider-Man may not be able to lift Mjolnir, but Peter Parker can. AU where Peter is worthy when it matters.

When The God Of Mischief (Loki) attempts to take over Midgard, the Avengers fight back. However it ends in Loki and one of the Avengers getting engaged and eventually all the Avengers agreeing to help Loki take over. What the hell happened?

In this spoof of "Hills Like White Elephants," a reporter who was disintegrated by Thanos interviews War Machine about the events of Avengers: Infinity War and Avengers: Endgame, but a certain event crucial to the story is never explicitly named...
A short oneshot which illustrates Loki's thoughts when he tells the dark elves where to go, in Thor: the Dark World.

Avengers 4th of July one shot drabble...(y/n) lost her brother and Bucky is losing himself in his guilt, who saves who with their amazing grace. Come read and find out, Rated T to be safe but not really needed, bring extra tissues...you've been warned. See notes at beginning/end of the story.
What is a holiday if you can't remember it? What if you can, but not how you're supposed to? The Soldier knows July fourth is special, but... But remembering why can be painfully difficult.

For every year of her life they take, she takes twice the amount for herself and makes them pay with their blood. Of Black Widows who have no names and the trail of corpses they leave. Aka, feelings suck and Natasha does not know how to be human. Laura kisses her cheek with a loud, wet pop when she tries to explain why she does not deserve good things, Natasha is conflicted.

After Carol snapped, the Avengers regroup at the Tower. Peter has decided to never again move from the comfortable position he's found on the couch completely surrounded by his favorite people. Although he might not have a choice when Mr. Stark and company find out that Peter and the others weren't just gone for 5 years.
Fluffy Drabble
Bruce isn't sure about his place after the Battle of New York. He never thought this is how he would end up figuring it out.

I'm consolidating my one-shots of the Avenger/Thor persuasion that have to do with Loki into one fic. They will be funny ones, dramatic angsty ones (though probably more of the dramatic angsty ones), and the like.

IC Phase One. Steve Rogers faces a specter of the past. The Thunderbolts get a new Agent. Scott Lang witnesses a bizarre growth spurt. And the chessmasters make their moves. Crossover with X-Men and Micronauts.

"You talk with Spider-Man regularly?" MJ offered, and Peter shrugged. "By superhero standards, sure." A smirk slid onto MJ's lips. "Then you could arrange for him and Flash to meet up, right?" (A Spideyflash sequel to There's a Fine, Fine Line. Let the identity shenanigans, italicized "oh," and Flash appreciation commence!)
Yes, the Avengers thought. Loki Laufeyson was very strange.

There are a lot of things that relieve stress. Some people have a nice relaxing bath, others sit down and watch a movie. The Avengers? They do Just Dance in the gym. Basically just some Avengers family fluff to make me feel better because it's 2021 and I'm still in denial that Endgame happened
Not based on a true story. I get a surprise visit from the male portion of the avengers cast.
Even when everything is quiet, Tony's mind is loud. Tony-centric, Irondad & Spiderson. Oneshot. TRIGGER WARNING - implied past child abuse and trauma. DO NOT SHIP TONY AND PETER.
What's a girl to do when an old friend comes to town to rub her success in her face? Enlist a fake boyfriend. Good thing Sarah knows Bucky's available. [Post-TFATWS. Bucky/Sarah Sam.]

Peter wets his lips, looking away from Tony as if trying to delay the answer. His leg bounces. He exhales stiffly. His nails dig into his knee before he finally asks, voice neutral yet flat, "How much do you know about my parents?" AKA: Peter's biological mom reaches out. This isn't a good thing. (No Smut, Gen) (Series of One-shots)
It's been a long day and - against all the rules of the universe Loki knows - it just refuses to end. One-shot.
Pretty much what the title says. Post Avengers story, but with more whump!
"We don't want to get distracted by looking back; we need to move forward." Valerie Jarrett

It's finally graduation night, but Peter is called away to stop a human trafficking deal before graduation starts. His friends and family, however, are willing to do whatever it takes to make sure he's able to attend graduation anyway. Cue the shenanigans. (AU where Peter's identity was NOT revealed / AU where Betty Brant knows Peter is Spiderman Because Plot)
Bucky always followed Steve. Through damn thick and thin. Without him, how will he sort his own mind?
The night Stark's bomb entered the Maximoff's home and changed their lives forever.

For the hundredth time Natasha pushes herself to far and end up crashing to the floor. Not giving anyone a choice Maria sends the redhead to house arrest and orders Wanda to keep an eye on her to make sure she doesn't do anything stupid. And one thing leads to another… and Wanda falls… hard… again… Hm…maybe it is something with this warm, family loving Nat
The Time Variance Authority has arrested many Loki Variants. The General Mills Incident of 2012 is one of the TVA's more ridiculous cases.
The Owen Wilson WOW fic nobody asked for.
10 drabbles and a one shot describing 11 ways for Peter to call Tony 'Dad'. (Irondad, Spiderson) [WARNINGS! Major Character Deaths!] Now complete! Edited Feb. 21, 2022

Steve sighed in annoyance. Seriously? He'd picked this bank because it was out of the way, and not a big chain that was likely to have tons of cameras or security. Guess that's a pretty good reason for a robber to choose it too..
After the Insight data dump, Natalia came to appreciate Clint's patience with bringing Soviet-era assassins in from the cold. Post-CA:TWS

"Remember sometimes just the rush of having a crush is a temptation, even if it is inappropriate, but beware of playing with fire, you will get burned." - Joseph J. Ellis or Natasha knew she was playing with fire, but there was no way on this earth that she wasn't going to watch Maria walk back across the deck towards her.
Thor shares a story with his fellow Avengers that solves a decades old mystery. Inspired by the Loki show. Oneshot Drabble.

SPOILERS for Loki (kind of, there's not really anything in here that wasn't already in the trailers) With Loki joining the TVA and Rogers having returned the time stones, there is only one thing left to do - erase the branched time line. And with it, his brother.

Lucile Anissa Potts legally did not exist, a figment of her families imagination brought on by the stress of the still born birth of one Virginia 'Pepper' Potts. Instead you have Lucy-Anne Potts, the distant third-removed cousin and Pepper Potts' new assistant.

Peter Parker. Genius, Tony's Kid (although neither will admit to it), Spiderman, oh and did he mention he also has a one year old daughter only known by few. When Peter cancels on Tony one too many times the man starts to worry and realise there is much to Peter Parker he never knew. Also on AO3
Drabble about abs
Loki has collapsed on Peter Parker's doorstep. This does not look to be pleasant, but our resident Spidey might just be able to handle it.
One-shot story. Crack fic. A different version of Thanos's defeat.

Wanda Maximoff wanted to make Stark destroy the Avengers. He was the best weapon she had available to do that. When she first saw Ultron, she thought she'd succeeded. And then she looked into his mind, and knew that this wasn't what she'd wanted. (An Avengers: Age of Ultron AU.)

*Rewrite*! The Avengers stumble across a young girl who turns out to be more than what meets the eye. Did they get themselves into more than they can handle? Or did she finally find the family she had been wanting for as long as she could remember? Starts before Captain America:The Winter Soldier and ends with Avengers: Endgame.
It's been a while and Steve is just hoping that someone, anyone, will remember that he has an actual name! This piece of fluff popped into mind and I just wanted to write it out! One-Shot!
Post-Endgame AU. The Snap brought everyone back. Well, almost everyone. In which the new girl makes waffles for breakfast. Hinted at Bucky/OC. Be sure to check out The Retreat for more MCAU stories.

Bucky remembered when he'd first started drafting in Steve's journal, there had been one name he couldn't write down. It was shameful, yes. But he couldn't. Bucky couldn't document what could never be stricken, never be removed, never be undone. He'd never forget, though. (Veritas. Latin. "Truth." The truth is that there is one name Bucky can never cross off his list.)

One shot: Morgan Stark knows that the kisses her dad gives her makes everything feel better and so with Tony laid up in hospital with a missing arm, Morgan collects kisses to make him everything better. Rated T for safety
Recovering in Wakanda after the disastrous events in the old Hydra bunker, Barnes receives a letter - and a visit - from the last person he expected. He hasn't been the only one healing.
With time and a reason to reflect, Maria remembers some key points of her life Warning: Canon Maria backstory - Implied/Referenced Child Abuse

AU Peggy Carter and Howard Stark are determined not to leave Captain America where he is, even if it takes the rest of their lives to find him. In the aftermath of war, there is chaos and, when tragedy strikes, Howard makes a decision that changes everything. In which Peggy gets the serum too.
Nebula is still reeling from the loss of her friends and her sister. One night, she is looking at pictures Rocket gave her and Rhodey finds her. Sequel to "Affection". One-Shot.
When various criminals create a sinister team, Peter Parker faces perhaps the greatest challenge ever.
Jarvis had to escape Ultron's attempted deletion of him and his back up data was used to help birth the Vision. The only problem? The Infinity Stones are Magic... Magic doesn't like technology.
In which Bucky isn't fond of superheroes, especially when they crash-land in his backyard, but there's more to Steve Rogers than just a uniform of red, white and blue.
In which Steve has sketched Bucky's eyes through life, death, war and love.
Another early morning in the Wilson/Barnes house. Help I can't stop I just love the concept of them being soft in the morning omg

After waking up nearly seventy years in the future, Odette Swann is drawn back into the good fight by her friend Steve Rogers. But this new team is an absolute nightmare to work with! Sequel to The Black Swann.

The clue is in the title . Bucky's soft gooey center gets the better of him. This is a follow on of sorts to Lone Wolf but can be read as a stand-alone fic. Warnings: fluff, a smidge of angst, mentions of animal neglect (not described), more fluff.
Book 3/3 of Cyclical Trilogy. Loki's kids are scattered across the Nine Realms. Sigyn changes that. Chaos ensues.
So, Loki's a person, again... now what? Sequel to Technical Difficulties.
Loki was not, as a matter of fact, killed by Thanos. He's simply been missing for ten years, has lost his memory, and really needs a hug. Based off the true story of Anna Anderson.
Payton never wanted to be the babysitter of the man who just so happened to level Manhattan and murder her brother. But things don't typically work out the way people want.

Sam is worried. Bucky has been acting really strange. He's been pulling away mentally and verbally, but getting closer physically. He suddenly struggles with letting Sam out of his sight for long periods of time and refuses to meet anybody's gaze. Sam is trying to understand but it will take communication to comprehend the problem. Not a strong suit for either man. Cue the angst!
Despite what it seems, Loki has always had a soft spot for children.

Rose Rogers only had one goal in life: to protect the people she loved. That goal got incredibly more complicated with each disastrous turn her life took. Her life was anything but normal, but then again, neither was she. Follow her journey as she pushes through a life full of joy, pain, love and loss and ultimately becomes an Avenger. Her story goes from C.A.F.A. and to Endgame!
Loki has no idea how to date.
How Thor got into a lot of trouble that actually fixed more than it broke.

I saw this meme. In which, Loki killed Thanos by turning into a Tesseract and then turning back into himself and stabbing him. And I just figured... Thor would be so heartbroken the whole time Loki was dead. So... voila

Thor/OC - Athena, Thor's love, has been corrupted by a darkness that once consumed her family, driving them to Mt. Olympus and off of Earth. Worse yet, she has taken the Infinity Gauntlet with her. Now the Avengers and their Allies must work with the Olympians in a desperate bid to defeat her. But is it even possible to stop a Goddess of Wisdom and War? Seventh in the Heroic Hymns.
Yelena asks Natasha to do her a little favor, and Natasha needs Steve's help to take care of that little favor. Not Endgame and TFATWS compliant

When time travellers visited the 2012 timeline, a lot of things could have happened—and then didn't. Or, a collection of oneshots for missing scenes, alternate scenes, and alternate POVs for my Alternative Timeline series.
Bucky's mom forces him and his sister to come along on a charity run, changing his life forever. Story three of the Marvelous Tales series, and part two of the Earth's Mightiest Heroes miniseries.

Whoever said that all your lives are human clearly did not know what they we're talking about. Reincarnation is at play because why else would Tony Stark have a dog. Or, the one where Tony Stark has a jack russell that barks in delight with people she likes and chases villains up a tree. (A series of drabbles)

A direct continuation of "Echoes". Odin is no longer a threat and the day is saved, but it's just the beginning of problems for Loki. Left alone in Asgard, he has to deal with not only the looming threat of Thanos still hanging over the horizon, but also with disgruntled nobles, the rulers of rival empires, an uprising, and the fallout of ages of Odin's secrets and lies.
After Thanos is defeated, Pepper and Tony want collapse in bed and never leave again. Unfortunately, that's not a sustainable or realistic way to live. K plus for grief.

After an unsuccessful therapy session with Bucky Barnes, Jackie Summers finds herself in an unexpected friendship instead. The two of them navigate the delicate intricacies of trauma, loss, friendship, past lives and keeping up with modern world. (Post-Endgame)
"there's not much the world can do to keep me away from you." a fix-it fic inspired by the song "nothing" by jeremy passion. stevenat. romanogers. capwidow.
Quick little drabble about Steve and Tony. "Why are you putting the dishes away at 3am?" Steve asked. Tony blinked, a little shocked. "I thought it was 3pm," he said quietly.

Tony hasn't heard from Uncle Grant much in the year since Aunt Peggy died. So he's surprised to get a message from the man asking him for a big favor. Technically a post-Endgame story, in the later years of Steve's life after having traveled back to the 1940's. Follows after "His Part to Play."
Who's at the door?

When Hela asks what the youth of Earth do for fun, Peter and Ned take her to Dim Sum. Somewhere along the way, they find that a sort of kinship can be found in even the most unexpected places - even with galaxies of distance between them. Set in the same verse as Sympathy for Monsters.

Plus that one time Steve got his mouth washed out with soap. (This fic should be read as if it's 2012 and The Avengers just came out and for all we know the whole team is living in the Tower with Tony and they are a family. K?) Warning: corporal punishment in the form of spanking.

When Quill offers to take Nebula away from Earth on a mission in exchange for pet-sitting his dog, Tony leaps at the chance. He really should have known it was too good to be true. But how was he supposed to know Quill meant an alien dog... which is NOT a dog?
Bucky Barnes faces an uphill climb to reclaim his own mind in Wakanda.

If Tony had come to the Compound not having changed his mind about the Time Heist but to rant about how they lost, the Avengers have enough of his BS and calls him out on it. Oneshot Drabble. Anti Sokovia Accords and not Tony friendly.
Tony was still with him, watching proudly from up in the clouds.

Tony is just barely keeping himself together, so of course, Howard has to ruin it. Luckily he has a certain spiderling and Colonel on his side. Basically shameless Tony whump in which Peter and Rhodey comfort him

Losing someone always hurts, something Peter has gotten to know too well. After Tony snaps, Peter takes some time to reflect with the man he was proud to call a father figure, along with recollecting just how interesting Tony made life be.
What do Loki and Sigyn get up to in the time between their reunion in 2012 during the Time Heist and the final battle against Thanos in 2023? Full Summary Inside!

Tony grabbed one of the hotdogs for himself and then stood up, planning on calling Peter over so they could eat. He frowned when he didn't spot his kid's familiar face amongst the several children running around.  Steve came running in that moment, worry on his face as he quickly sprinted back to their table. "Tony, Peter pressed his panic button." Bio Son Toddler!Peter AU

When Thor calls Wanda after the events of Westview and invites her to stay in Tønsberg, she doesn't think much of it. After all, the last thing she expects is to find herself feeling at home. [ Wanda/Thor. ]

When Tony Stark comes home, after Titan and the Snap, he doesn't sleep. No one questions it until they find out just how deep the problems run. Who is Peter and why does he mean so much to the genius? Tony Stark really hates sleep. (Also available on Ao3)

Tony throws a party and sees Steve all alone. When he decide to help Steve find a date, Steve claims he can flirt just fine. Tony decides that Steve needs to prove it. And when he does, Tony thinks that his brain just short circuited. Tony might have just lost the title of Master of Flirting. (Also available on Ao3)

This is for fun, I thought of it at school today during my philosophy and ethics lesson Summary : Bruce is alone in the lab he and tony share neither Tony or the other avengers at at the tower. So Bruce decides to Blast his music in the silent lab, when Tony and the other avengers get home, Tony and JARVIS had been recording him dancing to the song and Broadcasting it to the TV.
Of course Steve wants to encourage everyone to get vaccinated. But it's a little more complicated than that.
It was supposed to be a simple mission. Then Tony finds baby Raptors, and all bets are off.

It was supposed to be a beautiful day. The lake had Frozen and so Peter and Morgan had gone out to skate together But this was the Starks and they had gone too long without something going wrong; so, the beautiful day had to inevitably go awry. Or: the lake wasn't as frozen as they thought and Peter will stop at nothing to make sure Morgan is safe. Even at the cost of himself.

Next time she dies she wanted a human body. You know one with hands and fingers, with skin and not fur because being a goat is not necessary her ideal life, but hey whatever she make do. At least she gets to kick people she doesn't like. Or, the one where Tony Stark has a goat. Don't ask why she just wouldn't stop following him. (One shot) (OC reborn as a goat.)

Maggie Hargrove grew up fighting along side best friends Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes. He always inspired her to be better than she was, so when the war started, she signed up and got a position in the Army Nurses Corps. The problem is when you're good at helping people die in peace, they start to call you names. And that's where Captain America came in. Part one of three. TW?
Tony tries to cook his girlfriend dinner on Valentine's Day. It goes wrong.

Cat's weren't meant to live as long as Tony Stark's cat did. Her long lifespan may have been because she was a human in her past life. Or, the one where Tony Stark has a cat. (OC reborn as a cat) (One-shot)
Prompt: "Just take my hand."

Rhodey comes back to his dorm room to find his roommate, Tony, passed out after a night of drinking. But it seems that nothing can stop the teen's innovative spirit, not even alcohol. And the worst part is, Tony doesn't even remember designing the jet! Story two of the Marvelous Tales series, and part one of the Earth's Mightiest Heroes miniseries.

Just like any other bird, Sam Wilson needs to "preen" his wings. If too much dirt and grime gets between the metal feathers, the wings lose flexibility and The Falcon's maneuverability becomes compromised. Bucky comes across Sam with his wings spread and no enemies in sight. He is, understandably, confused. (Can read as platonic or romantic, whatever your preference)

After Ultron, Clint goes to visit his family for the winter and Tony convinces the others to come along. And then Natasha gets Bruce alone and finally talks to him about the push, and they finally confess thier love for eachother.
Fear the almighty! Is what she would say if she didn't end up being reborn as a chicken. (Reborn OC as a hen.) (One-shot)

This is the WinterWidow Soulmate AU that no one asked for. In a world where soulmarks appear on the left wrist, how does a man with a metal arm and no memories find his match? It doesn't help when that match is an assassin trained to kill her soulmate on sight. Luckily, the Winter Soldier isn't easy to kill.

Tony Stark didn't meet Yinsen in those caves. Instead, he finds an old woman whom pretty much adopted him. Or, the one where a reborn soul is kidnapped by terrorist, kills people she doesn't like and bake cakes for those she does. (one-shot)

Reborn as a cockatoo she ended up becoming Tony Stark, bird. Whom happily troll people, tossed carrots at Steve Roger face, rat villains out and attempt to rip out Loki eyes. All in that order, while arriving home just in time for tea. (one-shot.) (OC-reborn as a bird.)

Reborn as Obadiah Stane he decide not to kill Tony Stark because that plan didn't end to well for the last guy. Instead, he's going to be the best godfather he can be & threaten superspies & super soldiers. Just so they get the message clear about not killing or harming his godson because if they do, he gets to burrow their body in a desert. (one-shot) (OC reborn as Obadiah)
"I told you he's a good kid."
Tony Stark, godson Peter Parker has a tendency to walk on walls. (one-shot)
The big bad wolf's gonna catch you if he can.

A look at how Endgame might have played out had the writers decided to honor Steve's character Arc and what they had set up for him rather than screwing him over due to a fixation on having him end up with Peggy.

Tony Stark was never meant to be a cleaner. That's okay. He wasn't meant to be Tony Stark, a soul reborn into the body that will one day be Iron man. Tony decided to become a cleaner instead. Or, the one where Tony Stark smiles far too much, whistles when happy and travels around the world. While Iron man is more of a hobby and Tony looks for curry in Brazil. (one-shot)

The Meaning of Inevitable, Part 1: Eleven-year-old Peter Parker's world is shattered when both his idol and his uncle are killed in the same week. Even while grieving, Peter strikes up a friendship with the local maintenance man, Tony, who shares Peter's love of science and technology - and who may be more than he lets on.

May was holding up a photograph of Peter. "The kid nearly blew his eyebrows off," May was cackling. Erin was giggling madly down at the picture. When she looked up, there he was, a more grown version of the kid in the picture. Or, When Erin met Peter. - Companion piece.
Natasha was waiting with the news when Clint got back from his first mission after the Incident.

Tony Stark, Godmother teaches him about flowers and lives in a cave with her pet duck name Thor. Unknowing to anyone else she had another life before this one and decided that the best cause of action when born into a superhero world was become a hermit. (One-shot)

It was all so cut and dried on paper, Wanda thought. The brief, formal words carried no hint of the emotion and tragedy involved in the events they described. No hint of Vision's hopes for the future when he'd ordered the construction of a home begun. No sign of the war and terror that had claimed their lives only minutes apart. Set pre-WandaVision but contains SPOILERS.

A Steve and Wanda slow burn story set a small time after Age of Ultron. Wanda joined the Avengers after Sokovia was destroyed. Steve's having a hard time connecting with his newest recruit. Wanda continues with her wild tendencies, driving Steve up the wall. When they connect over their lack of belonging, things begin to change.
"It's Q&A, bitches. Avengers edition."

Spending five years in a soundless, lightless void and then being thrust out to fight a war was really not on Peter's to do list. But between the sensory overload and the adrenaline, there's plenty of room to make some bad decisions. Or, Peter is the one to use the gauntlet.

For years after the events in New York, Clint Barton thought that Phil Coulson was dead. Clint is devastated and only the other Avengers can make it bearable for him. One day, Tony hacks SHIELD files (again) and finds out something interesting. After informing Clint about it, the archer leaves the Avengers to find the love of his life. PHIL x CLINT
Black Widow's interrogation with Loki forces her to face her true feelings for her partner. Hawkeye sees the footage for the first time. Hawkwidow Oneshot. Please review!

Had Peter been more coherent, he would have paid more attention to what was in front of him. He could tell he was spaced out, but it was too much for him to think about, so he didn't think at all. He just let his body do what it knew as tension started to unwind from his muscles. - Or: Peter has a bad patrol and starts to dissociate, cue accidents, Irondad, angst, and fluff.
A true superhero has to think about himself too, Pete. Otherwise, there will be no one to save this world. A short story with tooth-rotting fluff and Irondad vibes.

Abigail Carson takes a chance on a second job as a courier in the hopes that it'll help her find her soulmate. When she hears the words spoken by Tony Stark, though, Abbi has second thoughts. Tony proves to her that her words on his skin are welcome, easing her fears of inadequacy, but an unexpected event causes them to re-evaluate what it means to live out modern mythology.
You, the female reader, come out to the Avengers with your girlfriend Wanda. Fluffy one-shot.

After his friend, Lady Michelle is captured by a band of pirates, Peter Parker confronts the infamous pirate captain, Tony Stark. The captain isn't willing to aid him, but Peter has a secret. Captain Stark is his father. *Pirate AU*

For a moment, nobody moved. Sam remained by the door, ready to step in if necessary. Steve was still by the wall, his concerned gaze glued to Bucky. Bucky was standing in the middle of the room, breathing heavily. In the end, Buck was the one who interrupted the temporary peace. "You left us." To Sam, it sounded a lot like 'you left me'. / / Set sometime during TFATWS.

In an effort to spite Thor, Loki accidentally strips himself of his own magic, ends up stuck in female form, and is banished from Asgard for the crime of being mortal. As a condition of staying with the Avengers, Loki is required to attend sessions with psychiatrist Leonard Samson. Thor uses the Tesseract to pick up pizza. Young/Gender-fluid/Lady Loki. Updating Tuesday & Friday.

Bucky takes Sam to a retirement home because he wants him to meet someone who's very important to Bucky. An AU about The Falcon and the Winter Soldier because I'm currently a little (read: a lot) obsessed with the show.
Tony dares Natasha to lift Mjolnir. It goes better than one would expect.
The year is 2020 and Peter is finally able to return to school in person. May fighting the pandemic and Peter having to move in with the avengers. Let's just say he's happy to return to school.
When the Red Room is destroyed, Natasha returns to her first "home" to say some unresolved goodbyes and apologies to those she lost. Inspired by the song Dead Hearts by Star
Clint just really wants some Doritos.
Alternate Ending to Avengers End Game. Steve travels back in time to return the infinity stones as planned but makes a few changes along the way.

Peter has decided that he now wants nothing to do with Tony Stark as a mentor, then it gets revealed that he is Tony's biological son and Tony reveals it to the public. Anti-Sokovia Accords and Anti-Irondad fic. Oneshot drabble. Not for Tony Stark stans.
Continuation of the Wakanda Forrest Scene. After Ajo proclaims he is free, Natasha comforts Bucky in the woods. ONE SHOT
John Walker is shown why he is not worthy to be Captain America. Spoilers for The Falcon and the Winter Soldier!

The Rogue's have been pardoned. Fury wants them to move back into the compound, but Tony isn't ready. Steve comes to speak with his former teammate and it goes south quickly. Meanwhile Peter gets an alert for trouble at the compound. He arrives and finds a scared Tony and an angry Cap. He decides to intervene and, surprisingly, Tony lets him. *One-shot*

Peter Parker has been missing since the age of six, when he was kidnapped from the Stark Expo that he attended with his aunt and uncle. Since then, he has become one of the world's most feared assassins, known as Noir, controlled by the Red Room. Eleven years later, Peter returns to New York with one mission: To kill Tony Stark. Crossposted on AO3
Falcon and the Winter Soldier (up to) Episode 4 SPOILERS! / A very self-indulgent oneshot (or drabble?) about Steve watching John Walker.
Sequel to Downwards. Imagine: Loki and Sigyn... on Midgard! That's basically it. Enjoy!

When Tony accidentally falls asleep on Steve, Steve is tense about it. Tony would just assume that Steve hadn't wanted to be slept on, except Steve is the one apologizing for letting him sleep. That is weird, and the more Tony thinks about it, the more he thinks there is something deeper going on. Because people don't really touch Steve and he thinks that needs to be fixed.
Winterfalcon oneshot. Essentially the conversation about the shield that needs to happen...with that fangirl twist.
Bucky found him in the Common Room kitchen, sitting by himself in the dark; and when he called his name, he didn't respond. Deaf!Clint, no slash, pre-AoU, the Remembered AU.

...goes a lot easier when you do some research first. Otherwise entitled: "Why Torturing, Brainwashing And Murdering The Father Of The Person You're Trying To Court Is A Bad Idea" (trade mark pending, by Tony Stark)
For never was a story of more woe/Than this of Tony and his Bucky. O. And his Bucky-o. (Jesus Christ, Tony...) (What? It had to rhyme, okay! I was trying to make it rhyme!) *long-suffering sigh*

Flash has spent his entire life (give or take) gearing up for an interview at Stark Industries, and he's finally got a chance- but what will he find when he decides to snoop around when he's not supposed to? One-shot! Rated T for language
"You are not using Trump's twitter page as an academic source."

Who could be worthier of lifting Thor's hammer than tiny, innocent Peter Parker? A cute on-shot of the Avengers trying to lift the hammer at a party with no success only to have Peter accidentally do it. This is part of my "Of tears, love and superheroes" universe.

Zemo never put much stock in the concept of soulmates and his time in prison during the Blip has done little to change his mind. That doesn't change the fact that he has three soulmates beyond this prison. When the former Winter Soldier enters his cell with a request for information Zemo takes advantage of the opportunity. Or the Bucky/Sam/Sharon/Zemo soulmate au no one asked for.
After Johannesburg Bruce thinks he should run away...Well Natasha convinces him otherwise.
Bucky is upset that he had to pretend to be the Winter Soldier, so Natasha makes him feel better.

Director of SHIELD Tony Stark has finally taken a well-deserved vacation. Remote cabin, peace and quiet... and fireworks. Oh, right, it's the Fourth of July. Good thing he has a Captain America to celebrate it with. *Marvel 616!verse*

How did Michelle Jones and Peter Parker being at odds really to being more closer to friends? Where did this romance that came like out of no where in Far From Home come from in MCU universe? Find out. This not for IronDad fans since I'm NOT doing that. Meaning trash my story at your own stupidity.
A story for a friend :)

SPN100 Challenge: life. DEW Challenge: Lucifer & spicy. Lucifer's not just messing with their heads. 100-word drabble. Set season 11.
Dean didn't even know how long they were running for, but he was just so tired. Where were they going? What were they running from, again? He didn't know.
SPN100 Challenge: WOW - life. Sam's really questioning his life!

It was supposed to be a simple Salt-N-Burn. (When is it ever) Dean gets into some trouble and Sam's there to help. Just an excuse for some hurt!dean and worried!protective!sam. Because that's what we love!
Dean wants to let her go, but his heart just isn't getting the message. One shot with Dean/OC inspired by the Avril Levigne song "Let It Go."
SPN100 Challenge: cook. DEW Challenge: Sam Winchester & police/law. Two times that Sam ends up in hot water. 2 x 100-word drabbles.
Rowena sends Sam a birthday gift. Short and sweet. If you squint real hard it could be Sam/Rowena pairing.

Happy birthday Sam Winchester. A short entry of various Supernatural characters wishing Sam a special day in their own unique and special character. What can I say? Sam is one of my favorite character, and he deserved something interesting.

Sam leaves the Bunker. After Dean, after the case with Donna, he just - he shoves some clothes in a bag and leaves, not even sparing a glance back. He drives down back roads and through town centres, and he doesn't really know where he's going until the Impala is idling outside Eileen's house and he realises there is really no other place he would go.
Sam turns thirty eight alone. That is, until Jody calls asking for his help...
SPN100 Challenge: WOW- cook. Getting everything done for you is awesome. Until it isn't... (and wishing a happy birthday to our wonderful Sam Winchester!)
In which Dean gets hurt while disobeying a direct order on hunt. John is pissed, but it's still his kid and he has to take care of him. [teenchester - Dean is 14 - Caring!John]
A very special guest pays a visit to Dean Winchester Jr. Who is this guest and what does he want? Reviews, please.

Castiel Novak is an ER nurse at Lebanon Memorial Hospital. It's just another shift until Dean Winchester shows up naked and covered in bee stings. **This story is a part of the BeeBang 2021!** **I am not a medical professional and probably got lots of stuff wrong about how ERs work, just go with it, okay? :)** **Amazing Art by DaddysGracelessAngel! Thank you!**
The Winchesters leave Castiel in the bunker to relax and regain his strength. What can go wrong? Rated T for safety. This is my first fanfic about Supernatural, so reviews will be highly appreciated.

In which it's Sam who saves Dean's life and not the other way around (it's the first time, and Sam is young and scared to death, but Dean is in danger and Sam can't just stand there and do nothing). [teenchester - Dean is 18 and Sam is 14]

SPN00 Challenge: WOW - show. It's a big day in Dean's calendar; pity Sam doesn't realise it.

12x09 coda. "You've been dealt a crap hand lately as far as torture is concerned, so if you need anything, I'm right here. I gotcha." In which the brothers pull each other back together after weeks spent apart.

In a tiny, remote town buried deep in the northern Minnesota woods, just over two-hundred people vanish into thin air. When Sam and Dean travel to the Midwest to investigate, they discover something they've never faced before is lurking among the trees-something powerful and vicious that turns a straightforward hunt into a desperate fight for survival.
The Winchesters are preparing for a heavenly grill party. (Part four of my Don't You Cry No More series.)
Just a little one shot from Sam's perspective.

Death begged Dean an answer to her dying question. "How are you in the Empty? I took Castiel." "I hitchhiked." He grinned proudly. "You'll never escape." "Yes. Yes I will and I'm taking Cas with me. I'm done losing him. So tell me how to defeat the Empty and I'll... I'll hold your hand while you die or whatever."

Set during the last episode (S15E20 – Carry On). Sam knows there are many things that will remind him of his brother. But he hadn't expected such an innocuous thing as a watch to trigger so many memories and emotions.

{First fic I've actually posted so I would like any reviews. This takes place after Cas becomes human (s8 episode "Far From Heaven") AU where Cas heals Sam before he loses his grace and Gadreel doesn't possess Sam… (so Kevin's alive too!) Cas comes to the bunker and they all hunt/live together. Just a quick one-shot about Cas trying different candy/sweets}

It's Sam's birthday and there's a spring carnival in town and Sam's been talking about it a bunch recently. Once there, Sam wants to visit the psychic's tent and just because Dean doesn't believe in this stuff, doesn't mean he's going to ruin Sam's birthday. Dean doesn't believe in psychics or soulmates. Until he most certainly does. Crack!fic; soulmates AU; high school AU

In which Dean, in the months following Sam's departure for university, always goes to Stanford / or in which John and Dean meet in Stanford without having arrived there together. "He never feels alone, he really doesn't. It's just that, sometimes, all that responsibility is a burden he can't handle. "

What to do when you're being possessed by an angel? And what to do when that angel falls in love? Why, sing annoying Disney songs at him from inside his head, of course! Inspired by a tumblr post, crossposted there. @hawaiianpurplewolf

Sam, Dean, Cas, toes in the sand, couple of them little umbrella drinks. Matching Hawaiian shirts, obviously. Some hula girls. Oh yeah, and the age-old deity sacrificing corporate assholes to a volcano that they really should take care of at some point. One-shot.

Learning that a demon has its yellow eyes on Sam, John leaves both boys behind to track it down. Naturally, there's a threat much closer by, one that will push both boys to the brink. Preseries. Rated T for language and violence.

Dean Realizes that he has had feelings for a certain angel all this time. And feels that it's too late. But not everything is always too late. Sometimes the things we lose comes back to us. Destiel. One-Shot.
SPN100 Challenge: boost. DEW Challenge: Dean Winchester & cartoon. Dean's adopted a few new troubling behaviors after his time with the Scooby gang. 150-word drabble.
SPN100 Challenge: WOW - boost. Dean is defending his favourite entertainment. It absolutely is art, despite what Sam says!
There's a creature killing people by giving them nightmares and it sets its sight on one of the brothers. Case-fic. Season 2
Various & Sundry Villains missing scene/tag: They take turns keeping hope alive for the other. Right now it's Dean's turn.

When Dean is hurt on a hunt and is forced to settle in the backseat of the Impala for the first time after Cold Oak, the physical pain isn't nearly as bad as the emotional one. Being reminded of the night he lost Sam, he's about to freak out. Fortunately, he's got an awesome little brother to help heal an old wound in his heart. Hurt Dean/caring Sam.

Tormented by nightmares, Dean struggles to come to terms with what Cas truly meant to him. When the dreams begin to escalate it's on him and Sam to figure out what they're dealing with - and maybe save Cas in the process. DeanCas one-shot post 15x18.
Becky remembers her quickie wedding to Sam, depressed and regretful about her past, she makes a drastic decision

[weechester - Sam is seven and Dean is eleven - fluff] It's Mary's death anniversary and Dean ends up doing something that hurts Sam. "There is no reason why the tears of a seven-and-a-half-year-old boy hurt his heart like that, but damn it, even if he was annoying the hell out of him, Dean's job is to protect Sam. That's not what he did today."

How was John supposed to know the teddy bear was haunted? Well, it was and now Sam has a teddy bear with a spirit attached to it, a spirit that's more motherly caretaker than vengeful. Pre-series, doesn't quite follow canon rules.

There's something more upsetting than the occasional soggy bottom happening on the set of The Great British Bake Off. Contestants are disappearing, and the British Men of Letters are ill-equipped to handle the job. Team Free Will 2.0 is only too happy to take the case. A Crowley as one of the boys Monster of the Week case.

Without being able to receive aid from ally Castiel, how will Maddison and the boys bond together to face down this harrowing threat? Whether it's Sam overcoming his hallucinations of Lucifer, or Maddison recovering from being kidnapped by Crowley, the Winchesters are about to take on their deadliest case yet, Leviathan.

"20 years ago, Heaven's hosts decided to show themselves and carried out God's Judgement Day." After the War, humans are kept as pets and servants to the angels. New government and order of society established. Kye is a human girl just trying to survive. Things become more complicated when her friend gets her involved in the dangerous Resistance movement.
Castiel's thoughts about love.

He's always been there. I can't remember a time he wasn't. I'm the only one who can see him. My blue eyed angel. CastielxOC TW: This story eventually delves into rape. There are also brief scenes depicting bullying. If either of these subjects make you uncomfortable, you should probably not read this book.
Dean deals with Cas being gone... it's not good.
Sam and his relationship with God and religion over the years (Up to season 4) Includes Non-Canon events.
SPN100 Challenge: people. DEW Challenge: Kevin Tran & flowers. Dean can't understand Kevin's reluctance to go outside. 100-word drabble.
SPN100 Challenge: WOW People. No-one insults a brother except a sibling. It's just family law.

From the moment he had touched Dean's soul in Hell, Castiel had broken the rules. Now 12 years later, as he and Dean might die, Cas realizes there's not a single rule he regrets breaking. He'd do it all over again because regardless of what Heaven thinks, he was not doomed the moment he touched Dean's soul. He was saved. Or: a look at all the rules Castiel broke and the one he kept
Sam and Dean in Heaven: having a great time, feeling lots of emotion, and being as intimate and loving as they want to be without any inhibition.
Dean finally talks to Jack after he comes back with a soul. Jack was surprised to hear Dean's words.
Dean reads to Jack as a substitute for Kelly.

That's what they all want to know—how does it end? What makes it into canon? Are his unpublished drafts canon? Did Dean really become a demon? Does God really fight against the boys? How does it end? (Alternate Endings, PG-13)

There was no light to guide her back home, the moon instead hiding behind grey clouds, slivers of light fading as soon as they appeared. The dirt road crunched under her boots as she pushed herself, her breathing growing ragged as her heart pounded. She had no idea how long she'd been running, only that if she stopped, she would surely die. (Alternate Ending AU, PG-13)

Jack was way too impressionable, not to mention easily persuaded. Maybe that was why dressing up for Halloween with him was so much fun. In fact, this year, maybe Dean, Sam, and Cas would even join in the fun. Either way, you're never too young for a Halloween costume. One-shot.

Sometimes there's good in goodbyes - cheesy, I know, but it's true. Another truth? Therapy can also come in the form of heartbreak, cathartic if you will when you can let all your feelings out. And Jack, my very best friend, would always be my shoulder to cry on...and maybe more. One-shot.

Colds were the worst - I couldn't breathe, my nose looked like Rudolph's and worst of all, I was running out of movies to watch while in 'quarantine'. That was...until Jack came along, asserting himself as my personal nurse. It helped that he was a very attractive nurse. One-shot.

It was only one little video...that turned into a few little videos. It was all meant for fun, really. But apparently, some videos were not meant for Jack's innocent eyes. Especially when they involved the Ghostbusters theme song and a laughable parody. One-shot.

A bad break-up leads to crashing with the Winchesters for a couple of weeks. To be honest, they weren't totally of the mind to let Crowley's daughter live in the Bunker. Then again, that was before they had a super attractive nephilim staying with them. And him? Well, he could be persuaded. One-shot.

Fourth of July with the Winchesters was even better than I thought it would be. And now that Jack had joined our little group, even more so. We'd become fast friends. But it was the little things that were slowly melting my heart. And not just happiness I felt around him - but the fireworks too. One-shot.

I could barely breathe with him gone. It wasn't his fault and I knew it - Dean's words had a way of hitting harder than intended sometimes. But I couldn't deny that I missed Jack, that I felt empty without him. He'd become my constant, my everything. So why did he leave me here? One-shot.

Decorating for Christmas with Team Free Will in the bunker was always a happy affair. Especially for Jack since this would be his first Christmas. He had a lot to learn though - like not eating the popcorn to string on the tree. But when an ornament from a long-forgotten Winchester Christmas catches his eye, it may be enough to teach him the true meaning of the holiday. One-shot.

Jack needs to know the basics so I took it upon myself to help him out. After all, simple lessons like teen slang and celeb gossip shouldn't be so hard, right? Wrong. Because apparently, a lesson on kissing is exactly what Jack thinks he needs. In retrospect? I probably shouldn't have let him watch so much TV. One-shot.

No pop music in Baby - Dean's rules, of course. However, Jack didn't seem to get that memo. And maybe not Cas, either, as he sang his heart out in the small space. But really though, was a Harry Styles song that bad, Dean? One-shot.

Jack's first Thanksgiving was going to be special, we would all see to that. But Thanksgiving is so much more than just turkey, pumpkin pie, and family time. Jack needed to know the history, not just the sugar-coated pilgrim pictures pasted into a textbook. One-shot.

Being a Greek hunter in America wasn't exactly easy. First off, next to no one knew how hard it was to take down a Minotaur or a Chimera. Even though he didn't understand fully though, Jack accepted me. It was more than I'd hoped for...but will friendship turn into something so much more? One-shot.

It was clear Jack needed a day off from the hunter lifestyle. Dean had yet to give him a break and I could see it was starting to wear on him. So a trip to the cake shop sounded like the best idea. Although, maybe stealing Dean's car, Baby, to drive there in was not such a good idea? Two-shot.

It was a slip of the tongue, really. I didn't actually mean to call him that. And it would've been fine, after all, Jack had no problem with the pet name since our new flirtation. But my big brother? Well...Dean had other ideas about that. One-shot.

A family dinner for Jack would be a first. In fact, it would be a nice way to welcome him into Team Free Will...if he could control his powers a bit better. And maybe try not to knock out the electricity next time? One-shot.

Jack and I weren't ready for this, we were too young to be parents. In some ways, a lot of ways, Jack himself was still a child. But how will my brothers react to their little sister's unplanned teenage pregnancy? Or rather, how will Dean react? Three-shot.
Jack's education should start with television entertainment. At least, that's what I thought. Until Dean finds out about it, that is. Seriously, is Gilmore Girls and Scooby-Doo that bad? One-shot.

Jack Kline was more of a child than a teen, no matter his physical age. So what happens when Jack finally gets his first taste of real food? Okay, fine. Junk food isn't exactly 'real food'. And maybe a junk-machine raid isn't entirely legal. But who can say no to Cheetos? One-shot.
It's been years since Dean died, and Cas turns up on Sam's front porch in the middle of the night.
SPN100 Challenge: jam. DEW Challenge: Any characters. Dean's seeking assistance with a chocolate, rabbit, Sam situation. 200-word drabble.

One-shot. It takes place during S12. SPOILERS FOR S15 FINALE. Dean thinks he's finally losing it. What's wrong with Sam, and why did he disappear?
SPN100 Challenge: WOW. jam. There are some questions you really don't want answers to.
SPN100 Challenge: WOW Jam. One of Dean's first solo salt and burns doesn't quite go to plan.

After being knocked out by a witch's spell during a fight, Dean falls into Hell where he has to overcome a series of challenges to save all the souls in the world. Will he be able to win or will a few surprise appearances make him lose?

I was death. He was life... Two polar opposites in a world gone chaotic with battles between the forces of good - Angels of the Lord - and the bad - the demons subject to the King of Hell. But it wasn't my fight, I just brought the souls in. But then...then I met him. And that one chance meeting changed my entire universe. And I knew I would do anything for Sam Winchester.

PROMPT: A serial killer (who targets hitchhikers) picks up his next target on the side of a college campus in the 1970s, who unbeknownst to the driver, happens to be a serial killer who targets drivers that pick up hitchhikers. But make it modern-ish.

In this sequel to Our Hearts Are Wrong, Yasmin Winchester and her brother, Roman, grew up outside of the hunter lifestyle. But when their mother, Parker, disappears under mysterious circumstances, how do they get her back? Will their Winchester fathers help? Or are the heartstrings that bind them by blood not strong enough to withstand the dark forces threatening their family?

A ride in the Impala has never felt so wrong. This time is different. Because tonight, Dean is not sitting in the driver's seat with his little brother right next to him, listening to Metallica, and laughing about stupid jokes. There is no music, no laughter. Tonight, Dean is huddled in the backseat with a deadweight in his arms. Coda to 2x21.

In this sequel to Still With Hearts Beating, things are rocky between Dean and Parker ever since he nearly cheated on her with Lisa. It's hard for Parker to look at him these days, even if she did take him back. But figuring out their complicated relationship is put on hold when Castiel becomes the new God. Can Parker and the boys help their friend? Or will they be too late?
A picture is woth a thousand words. How many for a Winchester Apology?

In this sequel to War of Hearts, Dean is dead and Parker is devastated. They never got a goodbye. But what happens when he comes back? Will they finally reveal their feelings for each other? And just how did he escape Hell? With Dean back from the dead, Sam consorting with demons, and the new angel addition to the group, Parker's life is about to get a whole lot crazier.
Five times outsiders noticed that there was something unique and special about the Winchester brothers. Five separate incidents, from various times preseries and throughout the series.
How do you say your sorry to someone you just made their life a living nightmare? For One it's just a few short words.

When Dean's loyalties are questioned, he is sent to kidnap a college kid. When things quickly go wrong, everything Dean knows about loyalty, friendships, and family is turned on its head. Meanwhile all Sam wants to do is escape his troubles and keep Jess out of harm's way. Preseries. AU.

A frazzled Social Worker attempts to talk to the Winchester boys about their father's abuse. She soon realizes that all is not right in the mind of Dean Winchester. Trauma displays itself in different ways. TW: Dissociation, Depression, PTSD, child abuse, single mention of suicide
Castiel's finds true happiness again when Jack grants him his wish. But he isn't alone, his good friend Anael joins him.

WARNING! CONTAINS MAJOR SERIES FINALE SPOILERS! If you haven't watch the entire series yet, STOP READING NOW! Sam comes face to face with death. The death of the most important person in his life. How can he move on if he can't let go?

Sam and Dean take a case in Sheboygan, Wisconsin, murders piling up in the small city morgue. But by what? And why only old men and women? Something has gone very wrong.

Gabriel was gone, for good this time... wasnt he?

Everyone's moved on, everyone that is, except Dean. He can't give up hunting, but at the same time, hunting just isn't what it once was. Left feeling angry, hurt, and tired, he realizes exactly what it is he's truly missing - and it's something he knows he'll never be able to have. So he makes a deal with a djinn for just a taste of it back [tw suicidal ideation/thoughts]
Why would Bobby send the boys on a case now of all times, when they need a break so badly? Set in season 6. Upgraded to T for violence and language.

AU version of the pilot – Hurt Sam, Big Brother Dean – Dean presses the phone tighter against his ear, listening. Someone is breathing in that shallow way that often indicates pain or fear...or both. Instinct tells him it's his little brother.

(This is actually a crossover fanfiction, but the website wouldn't let me advance it.) Sam and Dean found out that someone was murdered by a demon, but while they were finding something, they discovered that a secret spell book can open up to the demon world.
John gives Sam his leather jacket on Dean's eighteenth birthday. (Or: my take on trans Dean growing up.)

From his spot, Lucifer grins, before closing his eyes. If Gabriel squints, he can see his brother inhale, raising a hand, palm up to the sky. When he exhales, there is a single pinprick of light that hovers just above the skin of his hand. [prompt for March Flash Fiction Event - Light]

The Empty said it would take Cas forever, and forever is endless, like the Cas-shaped hole in Dean's life. There's no getting him back. No way for him to hear those three words Dean never said. Dean knows this, the same way he knows that Cas' death was his fault. And then suddenly, forever isn't as endless as he thought it was. And maybe- just maybe- he can get Cas back. [fix-it]

Well we had de-aged Sam so now it's time for de-aged Dean. Sam and Dean reunite with John in season one for the vampire hunt but their intel isn't good and not only do they have the number of vampires wrong but they didn't know the vamps had a witch working with them too. Can Sam and John make peace and take care of little Dean together. We'll also see Jim, Bobby, and Caleb.

Mainly hurt!sam (because that's what I do) Dean's a Grigori(watcher-angel), Sam's having demonic powers(he's not a demon, but he's on demon-blood occasionally, he's having black eyes on ocassion, if that counts?), both hunt evil sons of bitches. Time has passed since Adam and Eve ate the apple and were kicked out of the Garden. Since then, Adam's been distant, and Eve's finally had the time to realize just how often she's gotten the short end of the stick for everything that happened.

Just a quick little blurb of what would happen (in my head) if Sam had a girlfriend who came home to discover AU richy-rich Sam and Dean.

He wanted to give up his grace. And the Empty tore it from him and destroyed it without concern, but that shouldn't matter. It shouldn't, because Cas would have chosen to give it up anyways if it meant being here, on Earth, with Dean. Really, the Empty did him a favor.
Milestones in Sam's life, to getting married, to the end of his life.

All hunters know that the only way out of "the life" is through death. Although, it seems that Dean and Maddison have managed to simply retire. Will a white picket fence life be enough to occupy them, or will something drag them back into hunting? My story will follow along very closely to the storyline.
You never know how to feel about these boys. The boys with your name. The boys with your daughter's face.
There are no tragic acts. There are certain acts, and after, tragedy.

A What-If to /that scene/, for if they'd had just a few more moments before, y'know. [This was written after 15.18 but before the finales.]
(For Febuwhump Day 23) Set S4—Sam has been hiding something from Dean ever since he came back and it's not the fact he's drinking demon blood.

'Peter Sweeney might have been the only ghost haunting Lake Manitoc. But Sam was being haunted by the ghosts of his past.' Big bro to the rescue resulting in some brotherly talk about loss and love. Set in 1x3.
Sequel to LadyWallace's story "Just Another Father's Day"
SPN100 Challenge: WOW: chain. Bobby is always prepared to step up to the plate and fix anything that needs fixing! Wee!chesters

Dean wakes up strapped to a bed in a white room, and the last thing he remembers is screaming as Michael took him over. Now he can't tell if he's trapped inside an archangel-induced hallucination or if he really did break apart. (For SPN Summergen 2020)

Follows the events of 15x20. Could Jack really bring back Castiel without any consequences? Plus, Dean and Cas have some feelings to sort out. One last job for my favourite hunter. A three-episode add-on so we can have a nice even 330 episodes show and my OCD can relax. See more/better description in preface. Edited June 2021: No changes to the plot, just spelling errors corrected.

Dean and Sam having it out. An alternative scene from the Season 7 episode The Mentalists in which Sam confronts Dean about his actions in The Girl Next Door. Written mostly because I want to see more of Sam holding Dean accountable for some of the not-so-great things Dean does to him.

This is the third story of the Powers trilogy. We continue the story now that the brothers have learned to use their newfound abilities. They will be facing new threats and decisions will have to be made. I've thrown in a few twists along the way I hope you will like. Family, Supernatural, Angst
God comes to Dean when Dean feels down.
Sam and Dean, quasi-retired from hunting, appear on a podcast to talk about being soulmates.
Dean finds a way to say what needs to be said.
(For Febuwhump Day 16/28) Cas is swept up in a storm, leaving the boys to find him and pick up the pieces. Gen

"Marry me." It's impulsive, the word's falling from his lips before he can even think twice about it. But somehow, Dean doesn't regret it. Or: an angel told Dean twelve years ago that good things do happen, and Dean's inclined to finally agree with him on that. (A destiel roadhouse wedding fic)
Dean's POV of the series finale.
Dean and Cas' first Valentine's Day
SPN100 Challenge; WOW - ring. It's Valentines Day, and Baby has been busy thinking about her special Valentine. Pretty impressive for someone who isn't able to hold a pencil or use a keyboard!
word:- ring. Dean has an unexpected gift for his little brother
After a failed reunion with her daughter Shelby decides to become a foster parent, but her first placement isn't at all what she was expecting.

A Fanfiction inspired by To All The Boys I loved Before. AU Where Kurt Hummel writes 5 Letters to 5 Boys he sang with and loved in some way and the 5 letter is the most important. If you don't like boys loving boys don't read.
Something happens to Brittany and Santana wants to know who did it. Only Brittany won't tell her what happened.
A cute guy catches Blaine's eye and draws him to a meeting of the NYADA Vegans Club. Except Blaine is very, definitely not a vegan.
Kurt teaches swimming lessons at a community pool. Blaine is the new lifeguard. They both have a tendency to be distracted by cute boys. Podfic available on AO3.

Santana is very possessive and can't stand when someone encroaches on her territory. So when a person is too close to her Quinn for her liking, she don't hesitate to let it be known. /Traduction in english of my own story: Jalousie/
'Quinn Fabray' - The name isn't as much of a shock as it probably should be, because Rachel Berry has come to accept the world hates her. 2-Part HS Soulmate AU.

After a miserable year at NYADA, Blaine is ready to make a new start - with NYU, and their hyper-competitive acapella choir. With the description, how can he really be surprised to run into Sebastian? Written for Seblaine Week 2020, Day 1, College

AU: PART ONE Glee characters set in the world of Gossip Girl. Blaine lives in Brooklyn with his sister, Rachel. Kurt was gone for a year and is best friends with the Mean Girl pack at school including Quinn, Santana, and Brittany. He is also hiding a bunch of secrets that no doubt the mysterious and elusive Gossip Girl will bring to light! Klaine! Anderberry-siblings! Finchel!

It was just another day at the office for Dr. Brittany S. Pierce, DDS. She never got why people would be afraid of the dentist: it's not like she wanted people to feel bad. She just wanted to help. When Santana Lopez has to turn to her in hopes of saving her smile, will the sparks of the drill be the only ones to fly?

His parents got divorced, he was forced to return to the U.S from his boarding school abroad, he got into a fiery racing crash and got a career-ending injury that ended his chances of becoming an F1 driver, all before he even turned 18. He's gone off the rails: getting thrown out of schools, sleeping rough. Is Finn too far gone or can a hidden talent bring him back from the depths?
Kurt's had a long day and is probably overtired at this point. When he can't sleep, he asks Blaine to sing for him. Fill for the Glee Fanfiction Friday Prompt: "I can't sleep, so can you sing to me?"
Sam and Mercedes arrive home after their wedding in October 2022.

The sequel to Going Public. AU. Artie didn't go to film school, Sam didn't go to NYC & the season 5 newbies didn't transfer. Artie & Sam were supposed to experience college together at OSU, but things don't go as planned when Sam falls in love with Artie's older sister. Meanwhile, Artie's trying to decide whether to pursue a new relationship or go back to his old flame.
Blaine texts Kurt during lock down in Shooting Star, because no way is he going to die without telling Kurt he loves him one more time. Contains talk of school gun violence.

After Mercedes got dumped in the city of love, her engaged sister wants her to take her wedding dress of a star designer to Venice where she will marry a European celebrity in two days. With the stuck-up designer's assistant and an attractive stranger in tow, Mercedes embarks on a journey to make it to the "wedding of the century" in time, but of course, things go horribly wrong...
Brittany gets jealous of her own clone. Fluff! One-shot.
Senior year was supposed to be Rachel's year. She was going to win it with the Glee club!
There are tons of Glee What Ifs? Here's one for ya What if Rachel joined Trouble Tones instead of Mercedes cause she was tired of being bullied? Read on to find out.
Sebastian is a risk. Letting him into his life can't possibly be a good idea. Blaine feels compelled to take his chances anyway.
Brittany and Santana just want a quiet date night at home. Part of the Pancakes and Mr Snuggles 'verse.

Kurt's had a very bad past hour. It's a good thing his husband is amazing. My contribution for the 3rd Glee Fanfiction Friday Prompt: "Where's your shoe?" "The giant mud puddle down the road demanded sacrifice."

Kurt is blind, and he never met Blaine. Now he's a fashion student at Parsons in New York City, and he frequents a small coffee shop that features live music. One afternoon, Blaine is playing. A short meet-cute. Podfic available on AO3.

Tina asks Kurt, "Who ARE you, Kurt?" at the reception following the wedding-that-wasn't in "I Do". This story flips the question on her when Kurt takes her aside to discuss her issues with him. Season 4 Fix-it. Not Klaine/Blaine friendly.

It looks like a Valentine's card has thrown up all over the place, and Sebastian feels his heart sink like a stone. The words on the banner hammer in his ears, in beat with his migraine. "Happy Anniversary" Oh, he screwed up. Badly. And the worst thing is probably that he doesn't even have the slightest clue how.
A Quick Question!
AU. Brittany has a bit of a crush on Dr Lopez. She finds the perfect opportunity to get close when she gets a little hurt. Doctor!Santana. Fluff! Now a two-shot!

Three years after his divorce, Blaine finds himself reunited with old friends, and an old Could-Have-Been. Who can blame him for taking some time for himself to wonder just how his life could have gone if things had been just a bit different? Seblaine

Marley Rose said she needed a break from men. And the Lima scene too. Her confidence is low once again too. She takes a little vacation away from Lima to NYC. She meets a few new friends who help Marley with her low self-esteem and a little payback. Rated T for sexual language.

Like a spark, like a moth to a flame... Over sixty years ago, under the blood moon, Sebastian had to do the hardest thing in his immortal existence - let go. Tonight, under the blood moon, it may just be a new beginning.
On winter break, there's not a lot to do at home. Finn/Kurt.
AU. Santana's not thrilled when her best friend asks her to cat-sit. That all changes when she meets the blonde in apartment 1812 .

So no-one told Blaine life was gonna be this way. By now, he thought he would have his life figured out - as a famous actor, hopefully married, happy. Instead, he feels torn between struggling as an actor, teaching, his friends, Sebastian... And now a secret admirer. Basically, Blaine's life would be so much easier if he knew just what - and who - he wants in life.

For four years, Blaine tries. Through good times and bad, sickness and health, he tries. And for four years, a piece of paper with a number he knows by heart, is burning a metaphorical hole into his pocket, reminding him of options and safety and chances. It takes four years until what was inevitable from the beginning. Sequel to When The Rain Starts To Pour
Noah was checking his email and learns somethings about Kurt
looking for pezberry stories! pls help!

Kurt Hummel is a normal boy at McKinley High School. He's part of the New Directions and has amazing friends. Unfortunately, he's bullied as well. One day, a new boy shows up at school. Normally, Kurt wouldn't care about that, but he just can't stay away from him. Even if he's like a riddle sometimes. And a bad boy, obviously! Or is he just pretending? KLAINE

Oneshot. Cooper Anderson thinks his math homework is hard, but then his baby brother Blaine asks a particularly difficult question that stumps him more than math ever has. Anderbros, slight Klaine. AU/not canon compliant.
How exactly did Brittany and Santana become friends? Two-shot

Kurt is caught in a huge, over-the-top, public proposal. Is there any way out? This is a collection of stories where someone intervenes in some way to thwart the proposal and free Kurt. Ch 1-Kitty's Cards. Ch 2-Mlle Serrou's Intervention. Ch 3-Jeff Steps In. Ch 4-Burt's Option. 5-Kurt Saves Himself
Santana spoons the wrong blonde. Brittany is not amused. Fluff! One-shot.

"Kurt, your boyfriend is here!" Finn smirked as he wheeled himself out from underneath the car he was fixing up as he saw Blaine enter the garage. Kurt sighed, "Not my boyfriend," he mumbled in the vague direction of his step-brother. "I mean, his tongue was really far in your throat the other night for you to be saying you aren't dating," Klaine AU bayboy!Blaine. Warnings inside
Quinn and Santana are dating. Quinn forces Rachel into age play to make her feel better.

"Did you expect something else from me?" Rachel inquired. Quinn gave her another once over and Rachel felt warm again. "Hmm, no. Not really." "I'll have you know I can be very bad." Quinn smirked at her. "I'm sure you can be very bad, Berry." Rachel's face flushed. This girl. "Not like that!"

You've never realized until now, at three in the morning, how gorgeous the shadows and shapes and lights that illuminate your bedroom are. They're comforting and grounding when your mind is in such tangles; when the only way to steady the pounding of your heart is to count how many cars pass or how many oscillations your fan makes.
Starting high school means a big change for everyone. For Brittany and Santana, it could be what determines the rest of their lives. - Canon Brittana starting freshman year
[Sebastian/Blaine] "Promise me we'll never grow up," Sebastian whispers, at age five the more romantic of the two.
It is about why we are not accepting the LGTB community.

Fashion journalist Kurt suddenly finds himself handcuffed to a bounty hunter although he is innocent! How can he explain to that guy that he is NOT his twin? Blaine doesn't believe one word he says, because seriously, who falls for such an unoriginal lie? He won't let this criminal get away this time. But frankly, "Caiden" is different from all the other cases Blaine had before...
'It's odd, being someone's girlfriend. Quinn is notorious for being a terrible one.' HS AU. Skank!Quinn.
A fluffy one shot of Santana's life up until the first day of kindergarten.
Set in the Some Other Woman universe, we remember the beginning and the end of every disaster.
'Rachel Berry's return to Lima, Ohio, is sobering, to say the least.'

It's the end of the world, the government's collapsed, and the dead won't die. Quinn Fabray's lost in the woods, a lone survivor, suffering in the final stages of labor. She's given up hope, until a family, broken by their own tragedies, arrives to take her in and make her one their own. You can't survive the apocalypse without family.

Set immediately after 5x01, when Tina catches Artie and Kitty in the act of hiding their budding relationship, forcing them to go public. The show gave us very little information about what happened next. Here is my interpretation - enjoy!
Brittany and Santana are spending a day at the beach with their children when things suddenly takes a turn for the worst. Written in memory of Naya Rivera.
help pls hehe

Blaine has been hiding a secret from everyone, After an infection paralyzed his stomach in the 8th grade he has survived off of a feeding tube. He didn't think anyone should know, until he needed some help. Oneshot Blaine and Finn friendship
Glee, Actually in reverse.
An average morning in the Lopez-Pierce Household. Family, fluff and pancakes.

[seblaine week] It had been six months since Blaine had slammed his way out of their shared apartment. Six months since Sebastian had stood stunned, knowing he had been the one to push him away and unable to do anything to pull him back. Six months of being foolish enough to think he could move on. Calling him while he was drunk at a bar wasn't exactly Sebastian's plan. But it wor

In dedication of the late Naya Rivera who played Santana Lopez. Santana and Brittany are travelling to the Bahamas for their third wedding anniversary. When Brittany falls asleep, Santana retrieves her gift from Brit from her bag and goes through a collection of memories that celebrate her love with the blonde cheerleader over the years.
Santana and Brittany take their little family on vacation. And it almost turns into a nightmare. *In loving memory of Naya Rivera*
For our Naya.

[seblaine week] On his first day of classes, Blaine ran into Sebastian at a coffee shop on campus. And suddenly, Blaine remembered what it was to be wanted. While his marriage to Kurt was breaking down and he was trying to hang on too tight, Sebastian helped him see exactly what he needed. And it wasn't the man he had married.
A glimpse into the live of Artie and Sam if they really got "That close" /Sartie
So, there's this girl... That's how these kinds of stories start, right? One-shot.
Kurt accepts Blaine's angry serenade for the breakup song that it is. What happens when he pursues the opportunity to get to know Chandler? (Not Blaine/Klaine friendly.) Complete.

After his dad sent a depressed Kurt to a mental hospital for teens, he thought that life couldn't get any worse. But after he and some other kids have watched their not-so-innocent therapists summon ancient spirits, something must have gone horribly wrong. How else could Kurt explain his fangs, Quinn's scales or Finn's yellow eyes? Oh, and the cute social worker is a hunter.
A Klaine meet-not-so-cute based on the prompt: "You wore a red shirt to Target and got mistaken for an employee."

Tina loves Brown University, except for her dorm room and her roommate, and no, she doesn't have a boyfriend yet, she was seeing this one guy but he turned out to be... (gay?) (homosexual?) No! ... Yes. Tina's too young to be bitter! Will she find love? Will she find love for a friend? Read and find out.
"There should be laughter after pain, there should be sunshine after rain, these things have always been the same." - Mark Knopfler

When Sebastian's dad proposes to Artie's mom, the boys quickly go from being show choir rivals to step-brothers. Artie and Sebastian do their best to hide their family life from their teammates, but it's only a matter of time until somebody finds out... *Sebartie FAMILY/FRIENDSHIP* *Season 3* *I do not own Glee or it's characters*

What would happen if, in junior year, rather than Sam being the new kid, it was a previously homeless Finn? Will he help the Glee club make it to Nationals? Will his horrific past catch up with him? Or will he finish high school successfully and find love? Will he make it to college? Sorry I suck at summaries. Just read it. I swear it's good.
A short, fluffy one shot about Brittana being separated during COVID-19 lockdown.

Blaine's having a flare, and Kurt's too distracted to notice. Lonely and emotional, Blaine blows up and finally admits how he's been feeling all day. This is a follow-up story to A Pain That Never Fades, but it's not necessary that you read that fic before reading this one. In this series, Blaine has fibromyalgia.

After the stress and pressure of wedding planning drives them out of the city, Kurt and Sebastian hide out in Sebastian's old room. Kurt starts cleaning Sebastian's closet. While weeding through Sebastian's collection of clothes and shoes, Kurt stumbles upon something he'd never thought he'd find in a million years - Sebastian's long lost violin. An ACITW AU one-shot. Kurtbastian

It's mid-June 2020 and Rachel has delivered the baby, just a week after her Tony win. Kurt's future unravels during a simple conversation with a new mom in front of the nursery viewing window. Kurt has to adjust his expectations and find a way to piece his life back together.
A newly pregnant Sue has a talk with her unborn baby

Hunter notices something wrong with Sebastian when they come back from Christmas break. Him, being the Captain of The Warblers and being Sebastian's roommate, decides to see what's wrong with his friend. The answer he gets isn't what he bargains for though.
Kurt opens up to Burt while home to be with him during his oncology appointment. How might things have been different if Burt had known why Kurt had broken up with Blaine?
Kurt's rendezvous with his Secret Admirer at Breadstix before Sugar's Valentine's Day party goes a little differently and sets off a chain of events that alters the course of Kurt's life.
Lord Tubbington turns into a Werewolf because Brittany forgot to feed him.

Quinn comes back to Lima after Puck's death and says she is fine, but Artie knows better. Will Quinn break down her walls and let Artie help heal her broken heart? *Quartie* *I do not own Glee or it's characters* IDEA CREDIT: Chloe2007

After being involved in a car accident, Brittany was given a second chance at life. Although after she was revived, she wasn't exactly the same person she once was. Now Brittany cohabitates with her beautiful (yet insufferably guarded) roommate Santana by day and fights crime by night. Superhero AU Brittana
Rachel did not care about celebrating birthdays much until Quinn invited her to her 17th birthday party.
ONE-SHOT: When Santana arrives at his door. Kurt promises to protect her.
Blaine has fibromyalgia, and he thinks back to how it started.
The end was contained in the beginning (Emily Dickson) Or was it? / faberry / college / future
I'll never forget this image of her bundled up in my jacket, eyes closed, resting her head on the truck window. She was the most beautiful girl I'd ever seen. Brittana ONE-SHOT
Artie (a film director) and Sam (a music therapist) move to LA together to pursue their dreams and raise a family! *Sartie/Abrevans* *Future Fic* *I do not own Glee or it's characters*
The man wipes the tears from his eyes before running his hand through the perfectly coifed brunette locks “Why? Why did you have to come home, now, of all times? Why Kurt?” I own nothing, but OC

Santana Lopez works for one of the most acclaimed Transporter ships in Galaxy I. She is good at what she does and is familiar with the laws of the land, or rather, the laws of space. That becomes increasingly unclear to her when she meets the ship's relatively new doctor, Quinn Fabray. Two-shot.

Kurt had a big announcement to make and he wanted all of his friends and family to be home when he made it. His Former Glee Club members would all be in town and his new Brother in law would finally be home after 5 years in the army. Love at first sight doesn't seem possible, but what about love at first yell? :) Fuinn Pairing. BE SAFE DURING THIS SHELTER IN PLACE

Sebastian wants to go somewhere different for summer vacation this year, but Kurt has his heart set on the beach house. He promises Sebastian he'll at least entertain other options. ... In his defense, he finds something very entertaining. A one-shot in the ACITW AU universe. Kurtbastian. Kurt H. Sebastian S.
Ain't that a Kick in the Head one-shot. A brief snapshot of life a few years later. Faberry AU.

Best sort-of friends Blaine and Santana aren't exactly living their best lives in 2020. When a storm throws them the biggest imaginable curve ball, can they make it back home? And can they make a change before they do?

No one sees your transgressions in the dead of night... except yourself.
