Kurt and Blaine hook up at the failed Schuster wedding and have to come to terms with what that means to them and how they can push away the memories that always seem to pull them back together. One-shot set after the wedding hook up and explores their relationship in that time period. A bit angsty...
Marley Rose thought she met the boy of her dreams, but what happens when his true colors start to show. (This story contains more than just the season four characters)

Rachel is shocked: She has been suspended from school because of Finn's photos. Kurt suffers the consequences of his affair with Blaine. Finn seems to break down to the commitment of his family business. Santana has to decide whether she comes out or whether she agrees to marry Sebastian. And why do Sam and Mercedes keep their friendship a secret? The final of High(School)Society!
ONE-SHOT: Kurt has a crush and the girls have to weasel it out of him. They're all surprised by his answer.

Quinn is a royal within the castle that wants to be free to see the world. Rachel, a thief who was an idiot and got caught by Quinn in her room, may be her only ticket out. One-shot. Originally posted on AO3
The love story between Quinn and Joe.
ONE-SHOT: Kurt knows his mother isn't coming back. But it didn't hit harder than right now.

Quinn has had a fear of thunderstorms since she was a little girl, a fear she's kept hidden all her life. Now she's a grown woman with a career and a great relationship - but when dark clouds gather once again over her New York City apartment, can she find the strength to somehow get past her fear?
What happens if the Rachel Berry that we all know is not who we think she is? Warning Character death. R&R
When the global health crisis hits New York City, Rachel finds herself reaching out to her birth mother and trying to reconnect in the midst of uncertain times. An NYC-AU.

There are a lot of things that a new dad has to learn. Like, when your girlfriend's complaining about her destroyed vagina after delivering your baby, it's not smart to pick up your guitar and start singing Johnny Cash's "Ring of Fire." Lesson learned, and now he needs to find a guitar repairman, someone who can fix a foot-sized hole.

Hiram and Rachel are both devastated when Leroy decides that, for everyone's safety, he needs to move out of the family home as he works on the front line during an outbreak of a deadly virus. Luckily, Leroy has a plan in mind to make things a little easier for his husband and daugter. A oneshot set in the same AU as 'We Are Family.'
'Quinn gets the impression she and Rachel are finally on the same page about what may or may not be happening between them. All she really knows is that it's colourful.' HS Canon Divergence.

The Jeffery, a cute, upscale bar is the perfect place for a first date. But, for Kurt Hummel, The Jeffery is the place where an adorable young bartender saves him from a series of disastrous first dates. Maybe he's just going out with the wrong person?

Rachel is devastated after Finn has broken her heart, but he is ready to make up for his mistakes and to fight for their love despite their class distinction. Kurt is still struggling with his sexuality but doesn't want to let Blaine go. And what's going on between Mercedes and Sam? Part two of the glamorous world of McKinley where all that glitters isn't necessarily gold...

Once Santana got settled into NY with her girlfriend Dani, things were supposed to be smooth sailing for the couple right? Santana enrolled into college again and Dani finally got her dream girl... Or maybe, she never had her in the first place. Sort of Dantana but also sort of Brittana. Warning: character violence and death. One-shot.
The actions of Sam's friends and his jealousy, caused Mercedes to run from him, but Sam hasn't given up. He knows exactly how to get her back.
Don't mess with the Evans clan.
Breaking up was the easy part. Now comes avoiding his ex, getting in the school of his dreams, surviving the last few months of high school and, just maybe, live a little. *Pretty Boys sequel

What if Kurt did not know how to whistle and really wanted to sing the song 'Whistle' by Flo Rida and had no idea what the lyrics implied? How will Blaine react when he finds out? Cuteness and fluffiness ensues.
"I promise, after this time, I'll never try again."

Rachel is scrolling through Tinder, mindlessly swiping right on people, when she gets a match with none other than Quinn Fabray herself. Who apparently lives in NYC now. And goes to Columbia University. And likes girls. And swiped right on Rachel.

Ever since Rachel got into McKinley Academy,the luxurious school for high society kids,she tried to stay a wallflower in disguise. As long as she was invisible,her snobbish schoolmates couldn't make her life a living hell.But then,she finds out a dark secret of Finn Hudson's family,the unofficial king and playboy of the school. She really hated him, she would never fall for him...
What happens when Rachel can't perform because the Mayor of New York City has closed down Broadway because of a viral outbreak? And how does Santana deal with her girlfriend's frustration?

Summary: Blaine Anderson is a typical teenager. Except he's not because he's hiding a huge secret. He's gay. But after reading a confession on the informal Dalton blog, he discovers that he's not the only closeted boy at Dalton. After a moment of courage, he emails him and ultimately starts up a friendship that will change life as he knows it. Loosely based on Love, Simon.
Who knew one slushy could reveal it all?
it's Rachel's first Christmas without Finn and she feels sad and alone. until a very special Christmas Angel shows up

The gleeks find out about Kurt and Blaine and are dragged into a new world they didn't know existed. The boys and Kurt's mom's friends try to teach the ND's how to handle their new lives and powers, and how to keep the secret.Easier said than done after mad scientists, ancient mermaid magic,mermaid hunters and selkies make their appearances. And they thought high school was hard...

At the same time each night, a girl named Rachel knocks on Quinn's door asking for help because she's lost. Quinn knew that this had to be an elaborate prank, a glitch in the matrix, or she was just going crazy. Or maybe the universe was trying to tell her something?

After a life changing incident, Kurt is stuck with a big secret and confronted with even bigger problems. Luckily, he is in this together with Blaine,his best friend and secret crush. However, Sebastian "Meerkat" Smythe seemed to fall for Blaine's charms as well. Who will finally get the boy? Can the boys keep their secret? And how do Kurt's mom and her friends fit into the story?
This is my Story for the 2020 Valentine's Day Song Prompt Challenge! Klaine, as seen through the eyes of a Cupid in Training.
Welcome to my collection of one-shot stories written for the Klaine Valentine's Challenge 2020. It's time for some Klaine love, love, love.
Rachel tries to gather the courage she needs to talk to the pretty blonde girl who comes into her coffee shop every morning.

Express Yourself Sequel: The members of the New Directions will be pushed to take sides in the most dramatic upset yet, old and new friends will stir up jealousy in his relationship, and the ghosts from his attack will come back to haunt him. All Blaine can do is hope that he really is on the right track.

Quinn and Rachel have been besties since they were little. Falling in love with your best friend is not the hard part. The hard part is always the classic decision. Whether to stay as friends or to tell the truth with the risk of losing all...
'The rain is coming, she knows. It's just waiting for something. Waiting on them, maybe. Kind of like Fate.' One-Shot Future AU.
All Rachel wants to do is help Kurt win the student body president election, but not before Shelby catches her in the act and causes an overdue confrontation between them to ensue. An S3 HS one-shot.

'If anyone were to ask Quinn Fabray just what she was thinking, she'd be unable to answer. She wasn't thinking, maybe, because even she can't bring herself to rationalise just what possesses her to kidnap someone else's children. God. She's pretty sure she's just committed a felony.' Multi-Chapter Future AU.
Set mid-season 6. Kurt and Finn have an honest conversation about Blaine.
Blaine is completely stunned about how Kurt always manages to look so perfect.

It was a widely-known fact that Quinn Fabray's goal in high school was to win prom queen. What Rachel did not expect was that she was going to be roped into campaigning and running for prom queen herself. As Quinn Fabray's date.

In a world where you get the name of your soulmate marked on the inside of your wrist at a young age, Blaine Anderson wants to find his soulmate. While Kurt Hummel simply wants to make it through high school without getting shoved into a locker. Soulmate!AU.
When New Directions sent someone to spy on their competition, the Dalton Academy Warblers, what they find is the last thing they'd expect. Contains characters from CP Coulter's Daltonverse.
Rachel allowed herself to feel the hurt that came with her realization that Broadway didn't want her, so she should probably start acting like she didn't want it, either.

Part 1 of In Every Lifetime Series inspired by this line from the proposal: "It's always felt like I was remembering you from something. As if, in every lifetime you and I have ever lived, we've chosen to come back and find each other and fall in love all over again. Over and over for all of eternity." Co-created with JayhawkWrites Kurt and Blaine have a choice to make...
Rachel hasn't been coping very well since Quinn died in the car accident last week...
Dave Karofsky hated Kurt Hummel. or, your local gay gal (me lol) tries to get into the head of a gay, internally homophobic male bully by using taylor swift lyrics
Written for the Glee Potluck Big Bang Dec. 26th prompt. Part of the Somewhere, Ohio verse! The continuation of the Hummel Anderson's California Thanksgiving visit!
Shelby's Christmas doesn't quite go the way she intended it to, and despite spending the morning heartbroken, she ends the day feeling like it's been the best of her life.

Santana hates being in the audience of anything because she wants to be backstage managing the show instead of just watching it. She hates it even more when it's a show that she used to run. One-shot in the "be my fire in the cold (and I'll be your mistletoe)" universe.
Christmas fluff! Kurt and Blaine have been best friends ever since kindergarten, but due to traditions, that could change this Christmas. Klaine. Kurt Hummel. Blaine Anderson.

Blaine got a little inspired by Kurt's Hallmark movie synopsis, and Kurt got a little inspired by Blaine's inspiration. This story follows Hallmark Christmas Movies, day one of the Glee Potluck Big Bang December Drabble Challenge.

Kurt and Blaine have been hiding their engagement for almost six months. But, they're ready tell Burt and Carole on Christmas Eve. Written for the 2019 Klaine Advent Challenge Companion piece to Never Saying Goodbye

Kurt's headed back to work from the bakery when he bumps into a very upset Blaine. He decides his time is better spent taking care of his sad husband than at work, so they go home to work out Blaine's problem. Written for the Glee Potluck Big Bang December Drabble

“I’ve shipped you two since the day you met and I’m not going to lose out on your gay romance. I’m doing this with or without you, I’d much rather have one of you helping from the shadows, but I’ll readjust my plans if I must. Are you going to give me reason to Anderson? Or will you stand with me and get your lover back into your arms forever?” I own nothing, talk of sex.

Dating is hard. What's the point of it? Being single is hard. Having kids is hard...being single, with kids while trying to date...peak difficulty level. Santana learned this the hard way and after so many years of trying to find her match, maybe it's time to give up. Or...maybe not. Pezberry. G!P Santana. AU.
When Blaine gets home, Kurt's sitting on the couch drinking beer. He's clearly angry about something... Written for the 2019 Klaine Advent Challenge

Quinn confesses her feelings to Rachel during their post graduation party... ...not understanding that Rachel returns her feelings. A passionate confrontation, making out, and a sobering conversation ensue.
HS One-Shot. 'Much to everyone's surprise, Quinn Fabray does not rejoin the Cheerios when junior year finally rolls around.' Trigger Warnings.

With their plans canceled and a cherished Christmas tradition persona non grata, Kurt and Blaine come up with a new tradition - writing and starring in their own Hallmark-style movie. Kurt H. Blaine A. Klaine

Dave kisses Kurt but from then on everything happens a little differently :) So it's the time of the year again for 24 stories till Christmas for my sister. She wanted a Kurtofsky and here it is :3 (Now with the proper chapter 2, I'm sorry for the mistake)

Hunter walks in on Sebastian and his cousin 'having sex'. When huntbastian fight EVERYONE will feel the pain. And everyone will know will be suffering from it. EVERYONE. There is also Niff, Klaine, and Brittana.

Kurt tries to watch a Hallmark Christmas movie before Blaine gets home. But, Blaine shows up in the middle of it, and they finish it together. Watching that movie leaves Blaine wondering, though...what would their Hallmark Movie be like? Written for the Glee Potluck Big Bang December Drabble
Josh is proud of his work at school, and he's excited to show Blaine and Kurt what he's done. Written for the 2019 Klaine Advent Challenge
Anxiety crops up while Blaine and Kurt watch their daughter Tracy attempt to land an Axel. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.
Here are my stories for the 2019 Klaine Advent Drabble Challenge. Merry Klainemas, everyone!

This story is part of the Klaine 2019 Advent, and the Glee Potluck Big Bang December Drabble! Kurt and Blaine get cast in a Christmas movie called Perfect for Christmas. Follow their adventures, both behind the scenes and in front of the camera!
Sometime life forced you to face your deepest regret, Puck is not used to this but he's not gonna cut it (bad summary but I swear the story's good)

When everything comes crashing down around her, Marley Rose knows only one way she can cope. Betrayed by the man she thought she loved, she slips back into an old habit. Thankfully, there's another man that's always been there for her and always will be. And maybe, just maybe - he can put things back together for her. AN: I don't own Glee or any of the characters.
At the end she faced the group of people who were supposed to be all accepting and got slapped with rejection.
The laments of a pianist who is never seen, and can't work out which song to play when someone calls a key out to him.

When Blaine is attacked for being different, he transfers to a new school where he meets a cadre of misfits called The New Directions, who seem very impressed with his singing and very curious about his past. Blaine just wanted to fit in but maybe he will find something better: his voice. [S2 canon-divergent]
It's Shelby's time of the month and she feels awful. Can Rachel convince her that it's okay to take some time out to look after herself or will Shelby just struggle on regardless?
7-Part HS AU. 'If anyone were to ask Rachel Berry how or when it happens, she probably wouldn't be able to say. The why is much, much easier. It's Quinn. There's really no other explanation needed.'

When Brittany wants something, her girlfriends have a hard time saying no. When she asks to put the Christmas decorations up on November 1st, does she get what she want? (Spoiler Alert: It's Brittany, her puppy dog eyes are lethal)
Santana and Brittany move into their family home. They begin to experience paranormal activity. Is their new house haunted? Halloween one-shot.
Quinn and Rachel get ready for the New Directions Halloween Party.

The Sadie Hawkins dance is coming up, and there's only one girl Ryder wants to go with. He just has a small problem...she's not going. Once he finds out why, Ryder sees it as an oppertunity to do something special for the girl he's crazy about. And it also gives them both a chance to prove how much they care about each other. AN: I don't own Glee or any of the characters
A series of one-shots depicting the Glee characters and time travel. Set in the Daltonverse, but not all one-shots will contain the characters. Time-Travel!AU
Rachel orbits Quinn like a moon, never leaving her side. Set in season 1, starting with 1x13 - Sectionals. Diverges from there.

Rachel is a lil heart-stealing thief, but she's also a sweatshirt-stealing one, and Quinn has no idea whether to curse her or kiss her senseless. (She damn well knows that it's the latter, but let her delusion herself a bit, yeah?) – Long-distance college Faberry fluff.
After being found in Mr. Schue's house, Finn's jacket is stolen a second time and taken back to where it belongs...
Rachel needs her Mom, not her mother. Can Shelby step up or will Rachel be left to fend for herself?
You know how Sue called Burt a bamboo? Well she’s right. This is the tragic love story of Kurt the Bamboo and Blaine Batterson.
When Blaine stays over at the Hummel-Hudson's, they all learn something new about their favourite curly-haired teenager.
Years after Shelby ups and disappears from Lima with Beth, a blonde girl shows up on Rachel and Quinn's doorstep, armed with a lot of questions, and very familiar cheekbones. Future AU in 2 Parts.
A HS one-shot set after S3E6 when Rachel asks Shelby to write her a letter of recommendation for NYADA. AU.

"I can't believe what you did to my body, I used to have abs!" - In which one sentence is totally incorrect and causes chaos and havoc and Faberry feelings to happen. Also known as drunk Rachel is kyoot and Finn is stoopid.
For the following ten sentence tumblr ask - "Hi, hi, can I have a jealous Sebastian over Kurt's friendship with Elliot? Please and thank you, darling" Kurt H. Sebastian S. Kurtbastian
*Complete* Sequel to 'The Girl Next Door'. Set 5 years later, the girls are living together in New York. Side of Faberry.

Quinn Fabray has grand plans for her pre-college summer vacation: a road trip. When Marley joins her as a last-minute addition, things change and develop in ways none of them had ever expected. Fabrose. Slight canon!AU. Now complete.
The New Directions come to Dalton to visit Kurt, but what happens when the Warblers mistake them for Kurt's bullies? Contains characters from CP Coulter's Daltonverse.

The day has finally come: Rachel and Quinn are getting married. But Rachel can't stop thinking about her first attempt at a wedding and if she was doomed from the start. Inspired by the song Lover by Taylor Swift
Sebastian just wants to be loved. Warnings: Mentions of gay relationships (not that this should really be a warning but, whatever) and cursing.

Sam Evans had a lot on his plate. Between his job, his siblings, his senior year and missing the girl he loved, it's no wonder he can't cope. My slight AU take on what could have been for Sam Evans in season 4. Mostly canon with some slight divergence. Rated T for infrequent use of language and mentions of the events of S4 ep18 Shooting Star.
All's fair in love and snow fights.
The life of an Ohio shopkeeper changes forever when he (literally) runs into one of the most famous superstars in the world… [a new collaboration with Daftydraw from 'Glad You Came']
*Complete* Santana's Junior year gets more exciting when the new girl moves in next door. Brittana story with a side of Faberry towards the end.

The New Directions have just won Nationals, and Mr. Schue has decided to reward them with a vacation. But what happens when their dream trip takes a wrong turn, with almost sinister implications? Can the New Directions survive even more cut-throat competition, this time against each other? Takes place around the end of season 3. Finchel, Klaine, Samcedes, Brittana, Tike ships.
Unique has already transitioned when she arrives at McKinley. What could life look like for her if she's not being plagued by transphobia?
A home is not made of bricks, but of love. The daily narration of Faberry.
A related one-shot to "Everything Changes," in which Rachel and her Aunt Kim teach Broadway superstar Shelby Corcoran how to use Instagram. Set in the EC AU.

[Sebastian/Blaine] After numerous invitations sent by owl, Blaine finally takes Sebastian up on his offer to visit the Romanian Dragon Sanctuary where he works. As a Care for Magical Creatures professor he thought he'd seen his share of fantastic beasts. Sebastian, however, is eager to prove him wrong.

Seblaine Week 2019 Day 1: Accidental Marriage Sebastian Smythe goes to a remote village on the other side of the planet to interview Blaine Anderson, #1 movie star in the world and UN Goodwill Ambassador. Blaine wasn't expecting him but was expecting his fiancée for a visit. What happens when the village inhabitants don't realize the difference?

When Mercedes finds out the gender of Kurt and Sebastian's baby, they just want to know - no frills. But when Rachel steps in and convinces Mercedes they should have a 'gender reveal party', it stirs up major angst with Sebastian ... who ends up revealing much more than the fact that he wants to set Rachel's hair on fire. Kurtbastian Kurt H. Sebastian S.
Everdale is under attack and Captain Quinn Fabray is at a lost on how to save her kingdom. The Queen has a plan, but it involves a trip to another realm and a very annoying, talkative young woman.
HS One-Shot. Rachel says the wrong - or right - name in a moment of panic, and it changes everything. Set around Senior Year Regionals.

Brittany is McKinley's resident rebel who doesn't see much point to high school and who is also kind of a math genius. Santana is Lima's golden child, the perfect, cold, terrifying, and unapproachable only child of public figure Dr. Lopez. Unfortunately for her, Brittany's about to get a crash course in the complete mystery that is Santana when she is assigned as her math tutor.

Will Schuester comes with his family home after a long Autumn day. To find a young boy sitting on his porch steps. The young boy's name is Aiden, and he claims to be Mr. Schue's son. But is he telling the truth about how himself? And if so- what is true and what are lies? *Changed title from the little musician*
When he looks at her, he feels a cacophony of emotions. Unfortunately for Finn, they just happen to be the emotions associated with heartbreak. /Finchel, set in season two.

"Rachel was the complete opposite. She was unpopular and almost invisible. People only saw her when they wanted to make fun of her. Quinn wasn't like those people...She always saw Rachel and it terrified her." These are the moments that led Quinn to completely fall in love with Rachel. Faberry.
How many times can I rewrite the Dalton staircase scene? Infinite times! This time, Kurt meets Sebastian instead of Blaine, and gets put on the spot right away…

Burt Hummel went to Dalton as a teen and was a Windsor conspirator himself. Only, he does not know that Kurt's friends are the sons of his high school friends. Set after the events of Hell Night. Based off of CP Coulter's Daltonverse
A Tumblr Prompt: one of the characters in the relationship comes out as asexual and the other is understanding and accepting.

Cooper's Broadway show has been nominated for numerous Tony Awards, and he insists that Blaine come as his plus-one. Blaine isn't sure why because Cooper is spending more time out of his seat than in it. Blaine isn't angry, not at all. How could he be angry when the seat filler assigned to his part of the room is not only gorgeous, but also funny and sassy? A Klaine AU meeting.
Rachel has something for Kurt that she thinks may help him. Set before Kurt transfers to Dalton Academy. Super short. Just popped into my head while watching the season 2 episode Furt.
Imogen Beckett makes mistakes just like any other teenager. She just hopes this one doesn't cost her, her first love.

A snippet of a Glee story I am doing. Deals with Quinn telling Rachel and the girls that she is pregnant. Faberry/Faberrittana friendship. Has Rachel, Quinn, Santana, and Brittany. This one-shot has been extended into an actual Glee story! It is called "Is It Worth Giving Up?"

After overhearing some bad news, Kurt leaves his parents in their hotel room and goes for a walk ... but he gets lost. Eventually he stumbles upon a stranger who points him in the right direction is a number of ways. (Inspired by the beginning of Beaches) Kurt H. Blaine A. Klaine. Kid!fic
In a way or another, Kurt and Blaine complete the famous psychological experiment that says can make any two people fall in love.

Sometimes in life you have your regrets but its a matter of choice of you choose to live your life or do something with it. A/N. Its my first time writing so please bear with me. Very AU. All errors are mine.
Quinn and Kurt are planning to start a new club, and that doesn't really sit well with the rest of the Glee Club, prompting various reactions. HS Canon-Divergence in 2 Parts.
Collection of Faberry ficlets based on the Femslash Feb prompts.

When NYADA junior Rachel Berry lands a coveted summer internship at a famous arts and entertainment magazine, she gets a little more than she bargained for after she starts working for her aloof and demanding new boss Shelby Corcoran. NYC AU in Three-Parts.

Quinn's always been a force to be reckoned with. So when Rachel takes a pregnant Quinn in, the takeover by way of video games shouldn't be all that surprising. The falling in love with her part should be alarming though. Probably.

Santana and Quinn are trying to make their long distance relationship work with one of them in New York and the other one in Yale, but they meet some bumps along the way. Santana might be trying too hard while Quinn has other things on her mind. How will they deal with their problems? Established Quinntana

Cody Hudson is the lead singer of New Directions. When he travels to New York for Nationals with the glee club, he meets Clayton Berry, who coincidentally looks just like him. Or is it a coincidence that they look exactly alike? And what happens when they find out WHY they look exactly alike? Mainly Finchel, with many other Gleeks appearing.
HS One-Shot. 'Rachel Berry is almost ashamed to admit it, but it probably all starts the first time she witnesses Quinn Fabray fall asleep.'

Life Continues for the Hummel Anderson Clan. The babies come home, Kurt continues to campaign for his father's House seat. We'll meet some new characters, and learn more about some old friends. Another year in Somewhere, Ohio!
Brittany was shocked. Did she hear Sam, her brother, correctly? Did he just say he was engaged? She hadn't even heard that Sam was seeing anyone. One-shot

The one where Rachel is contacted by Charlie, one of her daughter's friend's mothers, and is forced to deal with everything she left behind in Lima, including the ghosts she's been unable to forget. Faberry Future AU in 3 Parts.
Warning: Drugs, Major Character Death. Kurt and Puck talk about how Finn died.
'"Is this the moment?" Santana asks. "Is this when you realise you're in love with her?"' - 60 moments Rachel falls in love with Quinn.
"They hadn't seen each other since Regionals; hadn't touched since she hugged him before show circle." —- SamBrittany, post 4x22.

Santana and Sebastian hate each other. But something changes between them when they are forced together on a vacation with their families in Puerto Rico. Will they learn to get along? Or will something more happen? Warning: attempted suicide.
Puck and Blaine have the genius idea of putting together a Fight Club. Kurt disapproves. It goes about as well as expected. Set late Season 3. One shot. Furt-centric.

Years ago, Puck and Kurt had an arrangement, friends with benefits until one of them found a real relationship. Now, years later, both boys are finding it hard to leave their relationship in the past. Can they find their way back to each other? Or is it too late? One-shot! Puckurt! Blaine is OOC!

What would have happened if Santana went to Dalton for Uptown Girl? What of SHE was the one who met the new boy? Santana has a complicated, tiring home life, especially when her "nemesis", Sebastian Smythe moves in next door. Something goes down after Smooth Criminal, and it resets the course of their relationship forever. (Not as bad as it sounds, I promise!)
When a ghost-obsessed Tracy thinks she's discovered evidence of a haunting in their house, Kurt and Blaine have to deal with the consequences. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.

Santana has been living with Rachel and Kurt for a while and has taken an instant disliking for Brody the second that she lay her eyes on her, knowing that something's off with him. She won't rest until she find out what it is and make Rachel see that she could do so much better while getting dealing with possible feeling for the diva.

Everyone in the world is born with a timer on the wrist that counts down until you meet your true love and Quinn is celebrating her birthday as well as meeting the love of life at the same, at her parents' insistence. Who could her soulmate be? What is her soulmate like? Will she like Quinn or think that she's just some rich snob?

Blaine is sitting at a bar, ill-advisedly looking for Mr. Right ... and failing. But as he plans to leave, he sees an incredibly gorgeous man who captivates him. He sits back down and watches him, fantasizing about who he is, what he's doing, and why he's there. But before too long, Blaine discovers that this man is far from ordinary. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.

AU where Blaine is a freshman at college. One day in the library he notices the most beautiful man he has ever seen. He can't take his eyes away from him, but he's too shy to walk up and say hello. But even if he wasn't, there is no way someone like Blaine could catch the attention of someone like the beautiful man. Or?

Blaine has something huge planned for Christmas, something that has his stomach tied up in knots. So, inevitably, it doesn't go the way he plans. In fact, it almost tanks completely. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.
A Puckleberry 30 Drabbles

Blaine is trying to help Kurt 'heal' from his past break ups over Valentine's Day in an unusual way. But things go off the rails when Kurt decides not to heal from his relationships with an ex, but his relationship with one of his best friends. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.

While having a drink together at Callbacks, Kurt and Rachel spy a handsome man sitting alone at the bar who seems to be interested at someone at their table. They're just having a little trouble figuring out exactly who. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.

Blaine and Kurt are thinking about starting a family, so they decide to look into adoption. This is what happens in their two year adventure to finally start their family. This is a story I wrote for the Klaine Advent Challenge 2018.
A short one-shot of an alternate version of Sue's reaction to Quinn being slushied by the football team in S1.

When Rachel Berry heard the words "I don't want to be your boyfriend" fall from Finn Hudson's super soft very kissable lips, that terrible day in the hallway it made her heart break but once she got over the shock, vowed to figure out what the heck is going on with her soul mate, because yes, she has decided that's what he is, and she knows he knows that is a forgone conclusion!
Rachel's going to marry Finn. Until Quinn comes knocking, and then she isn't.
Kurt gets sick on a business trip, and everything he does just to get home makes it worse. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.
Or, how a Harry Potter marathon leads to a discussion about creativity, imagination, and love.

After scoring the winning field goal, Kurt heads to a party at Strando's. Kurt carefully avoids drinking any alcohol, but pops a rainbow of jello shots in quick succession, not realizing they were alcoholic. He wakes up in Dave's bed the next morning. What if Dave had the nerve to tell Kurt about his crush? What if Azimio had been cool with Dave being gay? Complete.

When Shelby Corcoran's former student gives her tickets to see the Broadway revival of "Funny Girl," she finds herself inexplicably drawn to the show's newest star and face to face with a part of her she's lost long ago. Set over the course of Rachel's opening week on Broadway. Seven-Parts. AU.
After Blaine volunteers Kurt to create a one-of-a-kind gingerbread showstopper at the last minute, Kurt whips up a special batch of cookies to show him how he feels. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.
Santana's still struggling to move on from Brittany. A little push from her past love might do the trick.

Blaine has been crushing on his co-worker Kurt for as long as he can remember. But without a sign that Kurt likes him back, he doesn't want to make a move. But one afternoon, in the middle of a Vogue design meeting, Blaine gets that sign. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.

Santana gasps and glares at her in mock insult, "As if I'd take you on a date to a carwash." Brittany shrugs, "Why else would you pick me up in a dirty truck?" Or: Now that Santana knows that this whole thing they've been doing since the summer was dating, she has the perfect plan to take Brittany out on their official first date where they both know that they're girlfriends.

Spider-Quinn AU - 'She rips open the door, expecting to see someone along the likes of Doc Ock, but instead is greeted with the sight of the same girl she had saved earlier, crushed under an overlarge suitcase. Guess the Universe really does have it out for her today, huh.'
The one where Kurt is a DoorDash driver, trying to earn money for college, when he ends up making an early morning delivery to a special customer. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.
When Kurt finds Blaine soothing their infant daughter in the middle of the night, he feels lousy that he has to tell him some unfortunate news. Klaine. Kurt H. Blaine A.

Quinn regrets a lot things in her life but her biggest regret is not telling Rachel how she truly so she thought that it was in the diva's best interest to keep her distance. She wasn't expecting to run into the Broadway starlet years later at Santana and Brittany's wedding or being confronted about it. Will Quinn admit her feelings or continue to regret her choices?
After being away on tour for months, Blaine misses Kurt. Klaine one-shot.

Rachel's in her second year at NYADA when she runs into a pregnant Quinn at a local cafe and like a magnet, she's drawn to her and wants to help her. For two years, she's taken care of the girl and the little girl that worm her way in her heart but is afraid of the feelings for the blonde woman and what they mean. Will she have courage to admit them or be forever friendzoned
You can't catch lightning, but you can be struck by it. Percy Jackson AU

One-shot set in the "Spellbound" verse. (It's best if you read the rest of the verse first.) With Blaine's big birthday approaching, he and Kurt have a serious discussion about their future. Blaine learns that things are complicated when thinking about sharing the rest of his life with a witch, especially when he realizes that the word "lifetime" has a different meaning for Kurt.
Kurt will grow old with Blaise. Forever is cut short at his 16th birthday however, when one letter changes everything. Will Kurt accept a future with Blaine, or will he run?

AU - Brittany Pierce moves to Lima to work at a family-owned manufacturer of ice cream, where she meets Santana Lopez. But things aren't what they seem, not when fear, image, secrets, tradition, and money are involved. Will Brittany be able to melt an icy heart? Note: Character Death!
If anyone has copies they can send me that would be great! I loved their stories but they have neem deleted

After Quinn threatened to expose her fling with Puck, Shelby decides to pack up and leave Lima again. But not before Rachel confronts her mother and demands for honesty. Two-Parts. Tag to S3E8 "Hold On To Sixteen"
AU HS. 'It's the third week of summer when Rachel Berry's vacation starts to look up.' 6-Part sequel/continuation to 'White Flag.'

Plot: AU Set in and after 1x13. Rachel discovers that Puck not Finn is the father of Quinn's baby. She decides to tell Finn without the knowledge of the Glee Club. What will happen when she tells him the truth? Previously Fuinn, now Finchel. Warning: Rated T for Language.
Years after the death of his mother, Luke Berry-Fabray finds a journal of letters written to him, detailing the highs and lows of Rachel and Quinn's journey into parenthood. 2-Part Future AU.

Just married, Blaine should be in absolute bliss. (Even if he got married at somebody else's wedding. In a barn.) But with Dalton's destruction, reality comes crashing in, and with it all the doubts and questions he maybe should have asked himself before saying "I do". A memorial is supposed to bring him closure. But once again, it's Sebastian who surprises him.
'If Quinn Fabray thinks the month of May of her junior year is a disaster, then the following June is a complete and utter disaster.' 3-Part Canon Divergence.
A series of short fics inspired by a prompt set from seasaltsketches on Instagram. (Rated T for future wiggle room.) Days 29-31: Pumpkin

Watching Amy and Rory fight in his TARDIS over a relationship which isn't even there, the Doctor is reminded of another love triangle, only instead of ignoring it he addresses it and he begins rethinking his thing about taking on humans as companions.

Fed up with the Doctor's inability to trust them and tell them what's going on, Yaz, Ryan, and Graham push too far. But when they find out what's going on, will they start thinking, perhaps ignorance is bliss?

While repairing the Tardis, the Doctor accidentally damages the translation matrix, which prompts Victoria and Jamie to become concerned about their ability to communicate with each other. Fluff and friendship. If you enjoy it, leave a review, and perhaps I'll write a follow-up. Please tell me what you think. All critique is welcome.

"In years to come I want to take out those pictures and re-remember all of those special and beautiful scenes. All this small moments that made me happy." - On one of your trips you find yourself explaining to the Master why photos are so important for humans. Strangely enough - he listens. (Reader/Simm!Master)
Ivo Iannone knows that he is the Doctor disguised as a human. But how can he accept his true identity, knowing all that the Doctor stood for? (Part 1 of 'A Tale of Humans and Time Lords')
falling, changing, the Doctor, and Rose.

The Coexistenceverse version of "Snakedance". The Mara is using Tegan as a pawn again and the Doctor and co are now at Manussa where the Mara will take revenge. Could Adric's newly discovered powers help the Mara be free to be in our universe?

The Doctor has steadfastly ignored his feelings for Rose. But one night, in a beautiful room with a magical swimming pool, he won't be able to deny them any longer. (Start of a new series, Starlit Invitations)
One night aboard the TARDIS, the Doctor remembers something. Something important. The Moment. Rose. She can see Rose again, if only her appearance. (Doctor/Rose)
A short original story about time travel. Inspired by titles like Doctor Who or Back to The Future.
Instead of sending the tenth Doctor out with a sniveling "I don't want to go" or his whole "I die and some new man goes walking off" instead the tenth Doctor gets a bit of dignity back at the end.

Glasgow, 2020. The Thirteenth Doctor and the fam are trying to get away from the cold, and when they get into a coffee shop they bump into someone they did not expect, the Doctor least of all. Or, What would happen if the Thirteenth Doctor bumped into Clara?
Instead of just giving a vague comment about the Cybermen to her friends when they give her Jack's warning, the Doctor tells them more. A lot more.
Episode Tag for Season 12, Episode 2: "Spyfall: Part Two." The Doctor records an overdue message for the Fam.

Following on from 'Anamnesis.' When the Doctor's latest travelling companion is abducted by persons unknown, they both get tangled in an attempted uprising by a group determined to destroy an alliance and start a civil war. The Doctor never walks away when people need help, but what will the cost be this time, and to who?

Tara Disarro has always been dying, but now she's running out of time to do some living first. Until she meets the doctor that is going to change the rest of her life. Warning for terminal illness and associated thoughts and emotions. First in the "Keeping Up With the Smiths" AU (all-human family AU); do not need to read the others.
A Dalek has a change of heart and adopts an abandoned cat.
When the Doctor and the Master start vanishing together all the time, Amy and Roka start to get suspicious. The secret they find out might not be what they had expected... at all.

A TARDIS navigation malfunction sends the Thirteenth Doctor —along with her companions Yaz, Ryan, and Graham— hurtling back towards an impact with Event One: the Big Bang. But there appears to be something more than expected waiting for them ... something beyond the beginning of time itself.
After the events of Fear Her, Rose corners The Doctor about his throw away comment about being a dad. Doctor/Patience and some mild Ten/Rose. Warning: Mentioned/Implied Child Death
What happens when the Doctor meets the mysterious Elizabeth Woods? Who is she? What's her connection to the Time Lord? Come and go on a journey to find out in... The Beginnings.
Rose Tyler has been set up on a blind date with a bloke she's having a lot of misgivings about, but when he arrives, she finds he isn't anything like she expected him to be.

Twelve returns to Rose's time to see her again. And he does, he sees her with his past self. And rather than risk timelines & paradoxes, he just watches and yearns for what he can't have. O/S. Twelve/Rose pairing.
I was 18, when we moved there and Amelia and Rory Williams became my neighbors.
On a rare day off from exploring the universe for the Doctor and her fam, they spend the day in Sheffield, playing party games. (Spoilers for "The Timeless Child", but not the kind you're expecting)

Still reeling from what he was forced to do to Donna, the Doctor finds himself answering a distress signal coming from Sheffield, England. When he arrives, he's surprised to see that there is no emergency: and that someone dear to him and his hearts was waiting there, someone who could not possibly be there. He knows that going onwards, things won't be the same. How could they be?

[Ten/Donna AU] John Smith is on a job, undercover as a fashion model while investigating the disappearance of his client's brother. His job would be miles easier if Donna Noble would leave him the hell alone!
Softly, lovingly, and with breathtaking pride, the Doctor walked her through their story. One star at a time.
The storm has arrived, but will the Doctor and Ryan make it through? The second story in the Transitions series. Follows the events of Army of Ghosts, Doomsday and The Runaway Bride.
Clara is the new teacher at Coal Hill Secondary School who immediately has an infatuation with the enigmatic history teacher everyone calls the Doctor.
Maybe no one knows who she is, but River couldn't not go to her parents last goodbye. Even if it is the worst kind of torture to pretend they weren't someone special.
Ten/Donna AU - they both work in the same place and are single parents, so shouldn't they be more friendly towards each other?

The evolution of the Doctor and Rose's relationship in tiny snippets. They have a deep and intense friendship that makes for a deep and intense romance. This was really an excuse for me to write little snippets of sweet WAFF and yearning, because the world is shitty and i need that right now. Rated Y for yearning. Doctor/Rose
Another alternate take to "Earthshock". First try at a drabble. The Doctor refuses the Cybermen's commands. Cybermen will be Cybermen. Inspired by SilverWolf7's story "What Should Have Been".
The Doctor needs a special part to build his timey-wimey detector and he can't find it anywhere near where he and Martha are living in 1969. Time to strike out across London via the Tube!

The Shalka Doctor and his companion David are drawn to a distant world after a strange warning of the future. But is the Time War really about to emerge in an alternate reality? And can the Doctor and David escape the flames alive?
One day every Earth year for the night 12 and River spent on Darillium, 24 years and a month with otters. COMPLETELY REMODELED.
It's Christmas and Clara is struggling with the loss of Danny. As usual, the Doctor is there to try to help. Mention of Danny/Clara but mostly post-Danny 12/Clara ship (just a little!)
AU to "The Five Doctors" set in the Coexistenceverse. A short one shot of the Second Doctor, the Brigadier, Jamie and their encounter in the Death Zone.

The TARDIS arrives on Coldstar, a vast freezer satellite, packed with supplies to feed a colony world. But there are cracks in the ice, and something scuttles under the floors. The Doctor, Rose and Peter need to figure out why Coldstar's tunnels are melting. But an even greater threat stirs within and nobody's vengeance is colder than an Ice Warrior's.
The Doctor and Clara have a picnic by the lake. Impossible promises are made. And kept.

The Doctor has the bright idea of dyeing his hair in the hopes of making a lasting impression, but when it goes horribly wrong, he's forced to confess to Clara the real reason behind his sudden change of appearance. Whouffaldi one shot.

This document was found in a destroyed underground UNIT base. No survivors were found in the base and nobody know what happened there. This is the strongest clue they found. It was leaked Was onto a small forum last month but was taken down, so I've re-uploaded it here. Everyone Must read! -ONESHOT-
The Doctor decides to experiment with something new for dinner. Just a bit of family domestic fluff inside the TARDIS.
"When one's in love with an ageless god who insists on the face of a twelve year old, one does one's best to hide the damage." One-shot.

A collection of one shot prompt fills written for Writer's Month 2020 in the Doctor Who fandom (see my profile for fills from other fandoms). #1 quarantine, #2 coffee shop AU, #3 history, #4 cooking, #5 myths, #6 loss, #7 dream, #8 fantasy.
The Thoughts Of A Soldier During The Final Moments Of His Life And The Time War.
Puzzled by his friend's happiness, Koschei asks Theta what happened and his friend answers by showing him a flower.

Theta Sigma (The Doctor) doesn't know how long it's been since he followed the telepathic call. But now, he has to do what no one else has done before - escape the Cloisters. One-shot, set during the Doctor's time at the Academy. Please read and review!
Eris has learned a few things about herself, but there's still questions she wants answered. With a brand new version of the Doctor on her side, will she come any closer to learning the truth?

Clara's request for The Doctor to teach her an alien language ends up being far more eventful than either of them realised; after an impromptu teaching session, they both end up learning about far more than just linguistics (Whouffaldi - set after Last Chritsmas)
A simple short one shot set in "Full Circle". Varsh pulls the Doctor aside to tell him about Adric.
A Doctor/Donna AU set in the rock band world where a bodyguard is urgently needed.
Every time Rory looked up at the night sky, he was reminded of how alone Earth was in this version of history.

{Memento 3} After being blinded by his disease, the Doctor must prepare to navigate his way through one of the most hostile regions of space without being able to see, all in the name of obtaining a cure for a murderous Rose Tyler. [Major Whump: Ten]
What happens after they leave Manhattan? Can River stay strong for both of them, or will she crumble and fall just like he had done?
On this day it always happens, every year. On this day, you return to that place where it all started, and where it all ended. You reflect on your life and everything that has happened.

Artemis "Arty" Hansen has always found strength in solitude. One day, on her walk home from work, she finds herself transported to another dimension where the Doctor is real. Being pulled from one end of his time line to the other, can she ever find peace again. Or will she find a new normal alongside the Doctor in his crazy adventures.

The Doctor, Adric, Nyssa and Tegan arrive at 2016 San Francisco to encounter humans with powers as well as a companion from a different incarnation who is need of his wife being rescued as she has undergone a terrifying transformation.
While in Stormcage, River receives a package from the Doctor. Little does she know that it was sent and delivered by the 13th incarnation. (River x Thirteen OS)

Rewritten; Reuploaded; Rewrite of "Silence in the Library"/"Forest of the Dead" featuring both the Fifth and the Tenth Doctor. AU; Follow up to "What Might've Been"; It's a chance encounter when two Doctors meet along with their respective companions at a library from the future, but they're not alone as they also got allies and enemies at that very library.

The Time Lords know their fate is in the Doctor's hands. They know he's the one to end the Time War. The problem is, they're not entirely sure how. They think its with the Hybrid, the legendary creature that was once thought to be half Dalek, half Time Lord. They're pretty sure the Hybrid is the woman who married the Doctor. Heaven Sent/Hell Bent "Run With You" re-write
Ten/Donna AU. Donna finds out that working in a tearoom can be just as thrilling at those coffee shops pretend they are.
Gallifrey lays in ruin around them, and the Doctor... can't quite think about it right now. Maybe some secrets really were supposed to never be shared.
The Doctor knows that he just can't deny Rose anything - especially when she smiles.

After witnessing a grim warning from the future, the Eighth Doctor and his friends decide to investigate a time anomaly on a nearby world called Kulvarra. Their investigations soon lead to an old friend of the Doctor's who has decided to help a familiar enemy. But can the Doctor be forgiven for his past mistakes?

They were living in difficult times. No one knew exactly what was going on, and they'd been going slightly mad due to isolation. Sometimes, you just need a reminder from the people you love that you're not alone.

They owed her nothing, but the Doctor and Rose still try and let Clara say goodbye to Danny. What they hadn't expected was to come across an old frenemy, or the army she created. But who was it really meant for, and why did she do it? A Run With You rewrite of Dark Water/Death in Heaven
The Master's companion is scared of spiders. How could he possibly abuse that knowledge? Part IV of The Planets.
The Doctor and the Mistress are far too alike. They spin in circles, one angering the other, angering the other.

The Doctor rescues Melody Pond from the streets of New York shortly after her first regeneration. He plans to take the little girl to be raised by her parents, but discovers that it's going to be more complicated than he thought.

Nardole led the evacuation. Bill became a walking, talking puddle. The Doctor almost died. The Master became Missy. But how did she survive? How did she escape? And why, after so long learning to be good, did he return to evil?

Rose has put the Doctor in a bit of a time-out. So when a little girl knocks on the TARDIS door, and she finds London covered in trees, she'll have to figure this out on her own. Or at least, that's what she thought before finding her partner from the future among the chaos. A rewrite of "Forest in the Night" one shot
It had been years since the Doctor read the last Harry Potter book. What does she think of JK Rowling now? (Prompt)

It's been thirty years since Beatrice and the Master last parted. Both have lived their own lives. But now it's time for one final meeting between the Master and the only human he ever cared for. This is a short story sequel to my Starcrossed series which should be read first and features the Jacobi War Master with Missy at the end. I don't own Doctor Who it belongs to the BBC.

As soon as you woke up, quickly realising with a daunting chill what was happening, you had tried your best to explain to your kidnappers what an enormous mistake they had made. Part 4 of The Master's Maniacal Misadventures.
A human and two Time Lords walk into a McDonalds. It's not a punchline to a joke, but just the odd reality Mickey Smith finds himself living one particular afternoon.

The Doctor decides to show Rose just how delicious infinity can get when you go to the right places. The universe is full of undreamttof delicacies. But maybe what will fulfill both their insatiable desire is closest to home.

Set after the TV story Inferno, the Candy Jar Books, Schizoid Earth and Mutally Assured Domination. The Brigadier has met the Dominators before he rememberes them well. The Doctor however cannot remember the Dominators. The Doctor does remember travelling to a parallel Earth. The Brigadier has also been there but he doesn't remember it or at least only vaguely.

They were the best of friends growing up on Gallifrey. But somewhere along the line they drifted apart. A look back at the relationship between the Time Lords known as The Doctor and The Master, starting when they were Theta Sigma of Lungbarrow and Koschei of Oakdown.
The 5th Doctor and Peri need to enter a baking competition in order to win enough prize money to get the TARDIS back.

They loved each other, they worked as a team. Life isn't always easy, sometimes the road gets hard. Together, they can work through any problem. But what happens when they're working, not together, but against each other?
The TARDIS brings the Doctor to place that he is very familiar with. He swings open the doors, to find his old UNIT labs. But, where is he, the younger him, why would the TARDIS bring him here.

Yaz sometimes fails to think about the consequences of her actions. It's not that she feels invincible, it's just that she sees a someone in trouble, and it's her responsibility to help. The Fam are trying to answer a distress call when Yaz is gravely wounded playing hero. The summary stinks, I know, but that's the gist. Very heavy on the angst. TW: blood, violence.
Sitting together on the roof of her parents' mansion, Rose and Mickey clear the air. They know where they stand with the other, but some things need to be said out loud.
An Austen AU for the Doctor and Donna because "It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife."
When Clara Oswald falls in love with a detective, the criminal organisation her father set up some thirty years ago starts to crumble.

With all the traveling throughout time and space that they do, sometimes The Doctor and Rose forget about the social environment of the early 21st century, especially things that will get rooted out in the coming decades. That doesn't mean they can't help a few members of humanity along.

It started small. The Master began to regularly ask whether you needed to eat something, either making stops at restaurants or ensuring the TARDIS kitchen was fully stocked. It was only when he sat you in front of your favourite film that you finally noticed the lengths the Master went to in order to care for you. Part 3 of The Master's Maniacal Misadventures.
Three brand new stories featuring the Second Doctor, Jamie McCrimmon and Zoe Heriot: The Town of Secrets, Timeless and The Abandoned Place...

Something is changing fixed events, something powerful. A little nudge here, another there. It's sent ripples through all of time and space, somehow causing the 456 to return to Earth a few years ahead of schedule. But how will things turn out now that Torchwood still have a fully functioning team, and Rose and co have somehow been pulled back into their home universe?

For centuries, it has been said that howling can be heard ringing out across the Scottish Highlands. Transported back to the 1870s, the arrival of the Doctor, Rose and Peter coincides with a royal visit on the night of a full moon. However, is there something more sinister than afoot than an assassination plot, and can the local legends of a werewolf really be true?

This is it! The event everyone has been waiting for - the Doctor and Yaz are finally getting married! After everything they have been through to get to this special day, they will have their happy ending/new beginning... right?

There's one thing we can all agree on, and that's this: Graham needs to finish a good meal. He has a nice sit down and such a great lunch that he doesn't even notice what the two elaborately dressed people are getting up to behind him. It's comedy. It's fun. It's the Graham gets to eat uninterrupted fic, that you didn't know you needed.

"Who is your greatest enemy?" "The Daleks." The words fell from her mouth before she could stop them and for a moment the room fell silent. The Fam all took clear obvious steps back as the Master whirled around to face her, his victorious grin giving way to clear offence. (AO3 Repost)
"Ask me. Go ahead. Ask me what you want to know." (Reposted from AO3)

"Oh hello! Hi? What is it?" Graham blinked, head turning at a male voice coming from his left and his frantic push through the crowds came to a stop as he looked at him, puzzled as to why he'd responded. The man was young looking, had dark hair that flopped over his face and looked as though he'd just stopped running his hands through it. Repost from AO3

When a scientist and a renowned author get kidnapped by sinister aliens, the Third Doctor, Liz Shaw and Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart must investigate. Their pursuit of the truth takes them to Antarctica, where a secret lurks under the ice... (Based on the unmade Doctor Who story by Jon Pertwee and Reed De Rouen)
The Doctor assumed his Meta-Crisis was just a human version of himself. Unsurprisingly, he was wrong.

"He said she." Eyebrow Doctor pointed over to Graham, looking puzzled that she would ask or be confused about that. At her continued confusion, Bowtie stepped forward and sat both his hands on her shoulders, beaming down at her. "That means Bill Potts, that the future us that these lovely folks travels with," he pointed to the Fam briefly, "is a she." AO3 Repost to here

"Right." Rory finally seemed to react, shaking his head a little as his hands flailed for effect, "right sorry. So I've gone to sleep, got woken up by the TARDIS going crazy and now we're in a future TARDIS with a future Doctor who's also a woman? I'm getting this right?" AO3 Reposted Here.
The Doctor goes bra shopping and meets a familiar face.
"I am your friend..." These are Missy's final thoughts during The Doctor Falls.

The Thirteenth Doctor runs into monsters and aliens familiar and new, and a face that she could never forget. Forming a ragtag group of sorts, alongside Sarah Jane Smith, she finds that not all of her past enemies are so bad after all.
Who might Liz Ten invite if Starship UK managed to end their journey?
They've known each other since the beginning of school and have been friends for just as long. It's the end of their third summer as a couple, but the first day of the rest of their lives.

When a body is found in the Undercity of New New York, DCI Sadie Pritchard is sent to investigate... (This tie-in to the 2006 TV story "New Earth" and the 2007 TV story "Gridlock" was written to celebrate the #NewNewYork watchalong)

After satellite 5 everything changes, because we decided to rewrite season 2 onwards after a random conversation about the timeless children which resulted in this little world we made. there will be torchwood, timelords, and maybe a zombie or two. OK i was lying about the zombie but i can't write a summary to save my life so give it a try p.s we created primordial beings

Grace Holloway is the director of the secret alien hospital for Area Fifty-One. The TARDIS sends the Doctor there, after she comes down with a mysterious illness. The Fam must learn to trust Grace as secrets to origins of the Doctor are unraveled.
The Doctor finds an item from his past selves and remembers. One-shot.
There are whispers all across the universe. The many faced god will come and he will save us.

When Graham and Ryan get lost in a mysterious foggy forest, Yaz and the Doctor bump into some familiar faces while trying to find them. Yaz/13 pre-slash. 10th, 11th, 13th Doctor cross-over. (There is so much bickering in this story).
Bonnie interrogates Clara; it takes a horrible turn for the worst for Clara. "AU" for S9 Ep8 Zygon Inversion; alternate scene. may have a ptsd choking/ breathlessness trigger?

A young girl wishes on a star. It brings her a strange man in a blue box who teaches her, in the midst of sadness and hurt, how to be kind. "All that pain and misery. And loneliness. And it just made him kind." – Amelia Pond

The Redgrove Doctor, having been separated from his team, is asked to fix a time anomaly in Earth's timeline. However, a dangerous scheme to alter history is soon unearthed and the Doctor needs all the help he can get to defeat the Daleks and their Time Lord ally...

Do you know what they say? They say that the Bard, the one and only William Shakespeare, was the first Doctor Who fanfiction writer. Do you know why? Well… Let's say he was inspired by a funny fellow with spiky hair and a very talkative ginger. The Doctor visits Shakespeare, again.
Missy is looking for the Doctor, but when she finds another person who is also looking for him, she decides to use her to find the Doctor again.
On his way to work, Rory Williams meets a strange man on the strangest morning of his life. So far.

When the Doctor notices a strange shadow in his office that isn't being cast by anything, he suspects it to be an old enemy. Can he and Bill save Earth from the Vashta Nerada? (This tie-in to the 2014 TV story "Listen" was written especially for the #FearIsASuperpower tweetalong)
Based on "No place", from Big Finish, here is a thought about how the Doctor and Donna decided their cover story to participate in the reality show Hunted Makeovers.

The Eleventh Doctor arrives at a mysterious house on Earth and finds that something strange is going on. Why can nobody remember the history of a commemorative statue? And what darker force is at work?

Amy, Rory, and River know that The Doctor traveled with people before them. They just didn't know the exact scope of how many, or how important some of them they were to him. One pink and yellow human in particular. Not for Doctor/River shippers. I repeat, not for Doctor/River shippers.
So who is left to defend the Earth? What happened to the disbanded UNIT?

Summoned to the distant future, the Doctor along with Rose and Peter discover a utopian society where all illnesses have been cured by an order of cat-nuns. Suspicious of their methods and determined to uncover the truth, he and his companions must risk the wrath of an old enemy as they discover the terrible cost concealed behind the success of the Sisters of Plenitude.
Snowed in with a frozen human to care for, the Master is left with only one course of action. Part III of The Planets.
Tegan, Nyssa, and Adric get bored on the TARDIS, and somehow start a prank war. The Doctor remains oblivious, somehow, to the chaos in his ship.
Donna Noble has been trying to find the Doctor for months after her failed wedding. She thinks she's finally found him, but this guy is not the skinny Brit in a trench coat that she knows.
Jamie McCrimmon finally sees the Doctor again, although, he's a bit different than he remembers... especially the accent.

The Doctor rarely travels alone. When he meets Rose, he already has a companion: Eris, a peculiar young woman that views the Doctor as a father figure and is most definitely no ordinary human. The trio make a great team, but something is coming for them. Something that at first, doesn't seem to matter. Who are Bad Wolf and the Enyo campaign? What is the universe planning for Eris?

The Seventh Doctor and June are called back to Earth by Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart after reports of disappearances in Little Hawkett. Where have the villagers been going? And what do the Zygons have to do with it all?

When DI Mark Halliday is sent to a rural English village to investigate reports of fizzing heaps of skin appearing, he finds himself in a world of monsters and soon learns that there is an invasion on the way... (This prequel to the 2015 TV story "The Zygon Invasion" was written to celebrate the #TruthOrConsequences watchalong)
this is what happened to rory and amy after the weeping angel sent them back to 1938
A story in which Doctor Who characters find themselves on Philip José Farmer's Riverworld.
The Doctor accompanies a nervous Clara to her dentist appointment. Should be easy, right? Not when the Doctor is around!
Set at the end of series 12, episode 10: "The Timeless Children". This is the story of how the Doctor escapes from the Judoon containment facility. Featuring River Song and the Thirteenth Doctor.
Missy has been left for dead but when the Time Lords give her a mission, she can't resist. A mysterious cult is planning something: will Missy succeed in her task?
When Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart captures an intriguing prisoner, he decides to interview him. But how can the prisoner be the Master? And what does the Master want?
12th Doctor and OC, Shade. What really distracted the Doctor between "Deep Breath" and "Into the Dalek. Sometimes a girl just wants to have a little fun and chaos.
Rose and The Doctor encounter a ghost from her past. Que overprotective Doctor mode.
Happiness comes in many forms, and sometimes it is as simple as a walk in the dark with a friend.
A rewrite of The Doctor's meeting with Ruth in "The Timeless Children", contains 13/Master fluff.
River wants a house now that she's out of prison, and the Doctor must embark on the dreaded task of personal finance. / Canon Compliant

The Twelfth Doctor has decided not to regenerate, that maybe he has lived long enough and it's time for his story to end. But a Universe without the Doctor scarcely bears thinking about. And luckily, the Master has a Plan. Sequel to Floor 507. Extensive spoilers for Twice Upon a Time. Fully Canon compliant! But with a twist... ;) Master/Clara ship. Doctor-Master friendship.
The Twelfth Doctor gives the only thing he has left to give to a pandemic stricken world - hope. Written for Quarantine Writing Challenge, Heroics
The Doctor has always been bad at domestics. One-shot. Written for Quarantine Writing Challenge, Comedy See authors note!
Written for the quarantine writing challenge. A reflection on Clara's relationship with her father.

AU Doctor Who. The Master and OC Kaetien. All it takes is a single act of kindness to become a hero. This is my entry into Moonshine's Quarantine Writing Competition. It's a prequel short story to The Kaetien Chronicles: The Secrets We Keep. Enjoy!

Any psychologist worth their salt would tell you it was a classic anxiety dream, fuelled by fear of rejection and abandonment. Clean, simple and easy to deconstruct. It was playing like a well-worn film. You barely needed to watch as you chased after him, your feet doing all the work of carrying you there.

Inspired and given permission by Marcus S. Lazarus's work The Age of Paradox, the Unbound Doctors go on their way after helping the Eleventh Doctor stop the Valeyard from destroying the multiverse. Here is a look at what happened to them afterwards.

Emma is six the first time she meets the Doctor and twenty six the first time the Doctor meets her and sweeps her off in the TARDIS. Along the way is friendship, adventure, healing, sarcasm and love. 10XOC Slowburn Canon Divergence. Part One of the Prolonged Promises series.

A time anomaly in an art gallery brings the Twelfth Doctor and Clara to London, where they discover a Weeping Angel. When Clara gets zapped back in time, the Doctor ventures into the past to try and save her from certain doom...
Nothing will stop Wilf from fulfilling his promise.
Jack is the only bloke who gets anything done around here.
The Doctor and her fam help another traveller in need.
Yaz goes for a run. The Doctor doesn't quite understand the concept.

The War Doctor has tracked a familiar object to the Lonely Lands, a deadly rift that no Time Lord has ever visited. But, right in the heart of the Time War, will he find what he is looking for? (This prequel to the 2005 TV story "Dalek" was made especially for the #TheMetaltron watchalong)
It's a mistake to think you know everything there is to know about someone.
The Doctor wants to surprise Clara for her birthday and brings in a host of familiar faces to help him do that
The one good thing about being in jail was that it gave her time to think without her life at stake. Post-Timeless Children.

"You know the sound the TARDIS makes? That wheezing, groaning. That sound brings hope wherever it goes." The scene in "The Parting of Ways" just before the Bad Wolf appears, with references to "The Day of the Doctor".
An extended scene from the beginning of "Rose" Season 1 ep 1 - oneshot scene to fluff up the beginning of the series a bit.
The Doctor and his friends are separated. An old and powerful enemy is now the ruler of the universe. When all seems lost, hope may come. But can four people save reality?
Sarah waits for the moment to say goodbye, this time it's forever, but one should never say that
Vince and Sally reflect on the death of Sarah Jane. A few Classic Who characters make cameos.
After the wonderful finale ending that was written by the great Russel T, I wanted to share what maybe did happen to the wonderful Sarah Jane.

The Master made no secret of thinking human functions were ridiculous – that you needed so many hours of sleep, routine meals, toilet breaks – a period was likely held in equal derision. Part 1 of The Master's Maniacal Misadventures.

She was a woman with endless power. He was a man who had endless suffering. Who could've predicted what would've happened when she decided to take it upon herself to end the Last Great Time War in his place? My take on a fan traveling to the Whoniverse. (Doctor/OC) Final chapter posted. Cross posted on AO3.
With her latest promotion Kate has found out about her father's early adventures.
Alone and with no means of transport, Asla finds herself on a quest to get back to the Doctor. Along the way, she'll encounter enemies old and new, as well as making some new friends...
Zoe's upset and tired of being compared to a robot and basically needs a hug.

This is my first attempt at a Doctor Who Fan-Fic. The adventure begins when the 10th doctor and his newest companion, Cassie lose control of the TARDIS and lands on a planet that even the Doctor has never seen. The Doctor finds himself faced with a decision when an old friend crosses his path. All characters, races and planets have been rattling around in my head for yrs. Enjoy !
The Doctor and Clara have that much needed heart to heart. Danny Pink is gone for good and where do they go from there? Follow up to "Dark Water" and "Death in Heaven". Twelve and Clara oneshot.
Nine/Rose one shot. Rose is still trying to deal with her dad's death when the TARDIS is attacked.

Rose is so close to finally being reunited with the Doctor again, but when the dimension cannon spits her out on a whole new planet and she runs into a whole new man, she finally understands what it means to be careful what you wish for. Everything in this fic is set between the events of S4E11 "Turn Left" and S4E12 "The Stolen Earth".

After hearing about the giant spiders terrorising Sheffield from an excited Doctor's texts, O travels up north to see them first-hand and ends up being invited to travel in the TARDIS. Or, how the Master met Ana Hawkins. A prequel to Daviron. Part II of The Planets.
There was a bang, then flash and suddenly Doctor, Master and Missy weren't alone anymore. How will they survive on a Mondasian colony ship with their past and future reincarnations?
The Doctor, trapped in his confession dial, escapes to his Tardis, only to be greeted with the one person he really needed to see
The Doctor and The Master are trapped together with nothing to do except finally just sit down and talk
The Doctor needs a hug. Like seriously. Yaz is there.
The Doctor doesn't believe anyone deserves to spend their birthday alone. Including Rovers on Mars.
When we're at our lowest is when we need our heroes the most

A man forced to commit genocide against his own kind to save countless others. As the Doctor and Clara are pursued relentlessly by the Judoon and the Shadow Proclamation, The Doctor is forced to face his own reflection and decide whether any penance will ever be enough. Will it ever be time to move on?

He was normally rubbish with people, but the Doctor knew Rose. And as she began talking about Jackie Tyler expecting, he knew in the spot between his hearts that she, for the first time in years, was lying to him. (Or, Just in case Doomsday didn't hurt enough. A mostly canon-compliant goodbye in which Rose is a liar and the Doctor isn't the last). Continued in "Chasing Tales"

Having saved the universe from Sutekh, the Ninth Doctor and Lauren begin their search for Rose Tyler. Their quest takes them from a spaceport in the far future to a castle on Earth in the present day. But something else is going on...

The Doctor and her companions find themselves in an experimental undersea base on early 21st Century Earth. At first it seems oddly empty. Then the bodies start turning up. Before long they are caught up in the threat posed to Humanity by a fanatical scientist and the human-hating Sea-Devil, General Tussq. The appearance of the enigmatic Major only complicates matters!

Holding that strange, kind man as he died was the end of something inside of Cassandra. That was the moment her fears found strength. Fear of dying alone in a room full of strangers, no one knowing her name... Cassandra's life going full circle.

The Doctor has two problems: 1. He's in love with Rose Tyler, 2. Their timelines keep intersecting out of order. Alternatively titled: the four times the Doctor and Rose kissed and he had to forget and the one time he didn't. Originally posted on AO3.
Yasmin isn't used to getting fussed over by the Doctor.

Professor Maria De Souza knows something. There's an alien skeleton and she thinks it talks to her. Unfortunately, she's right. When the Fourth Doctor and June arrive, things begin to get worse: an alien criminal plans to destroy humanity...
It's always them together in the end. That's all she wants.

Beatrice and the Master have finally confessed their feelings for each other. However, their troubles are far from over. Soon they will realize the consequences of their actions, good and bad. Whatever is to come they must face it together no matter where the path they have chosen will lead them. This is book two in my Starcrossed series. Book One is available on my profile page.
Arriving on Earth in 1996, the Eighth Doctor reunites with an old friend and discovers the Daleks are on Earth, along with Davros, their creator...

[Second in "The Littlest Timelord" series] The Doctor's death is looming on the horizon and Elise is growing every day. What the Doctor doesn't know is that he has 200 years to teach Elise all he knows. Amy, Rory, and River let Elise in on their secret, because River knows she will keep it. What will Elise do when he's gone?

PC Yasmin Khan is having trouble with the first case she has taken on since she lost her friend, the Doctor. But when she meets Rani Chandra, freelance journalist, the case takes a much darker turn than she had expected. Will Yaz be able to prove herself within the police force? And what will she discover that links her closer than expected to the journalist?

When Beatrice joined UNIT she expected to run into aliens. What she didn't expect was to meet a genius alien criminal and to become his friend perhaps even something more. This is a tale about The Master and the one human he truly cared for. This story features the original Roger Delgado Master. All canon Doctor Who characters and plots belong to the BBC.
When two old friends of the Doctor are kidnapped, multiple incarnations of the Doctor investigate...
A short one-shot depicting how the Doctor feels before and after leaving Rose Tyler with his Metacrisis.
Episode 7 of my DIY Series 14 with the 14th Doctor. In this episode, the Doctor meets famous horror author, Stephen King.
Behind the Scenes at latest events
I own Nothing AU/AR This one's fun. And yes, there's a very good reason I picked THAT for a cover image.
The Doctor gets a few more seconds to talk to Rose on the beach in Bad Wolf Bay. Slightly AU ending to Doomsday.

Planet Earth is entering isolation, but something is hunting the Doctor. A creature trapped for a billion years, dripping red in a plaster husk. And there's someone else in isolation, too. Someone wronged, a long, long time ago. Perhaps the Doctor's equal, and her opposite. Matter and Antimatter. The first and the last. The Alpha and the Omega.

In an effort to see what is going on with their peculiar student, two teachers in the East End of London get a bit more than they bargained for: her even more peculiar "grandfather"… or at least, that's what he calls himself. [2820 words; a young!One retelling(ish) of An Unearthly Child]

The Doctor and Anastasia arrive on the Earth colony of Laina to be quickly kidnapped and sent to work in the colony's mines. Why is the colony suddenly interested in mining ore for interstellar weapons? Why has the previously peaceful colony started brutalising its citizens? And what is causing miners to disappear by the dozen? What truly is the secret of Laina?...

What if there really could have been long reaching effects on his companion after her time inside the Dalek? He had pointed a gun at her, shouted at her, threatened her. She had been controlled by a Dalek in another life and he had to walk away. What can The Doctor do to save Clara from the Dalek inside? Set after The Witch's Familiar. Twelfth Doctor and Clara

Knowing his time is up, the Tenth Doctor is alone in his TARDIS when a mysterious woman arrives... (This prequel to 'The Eleventh Hour' is a special treat made in light of the recent coronavirus crisis)
What did happen after 12x10? SPOILERS! Just wrote this to cope with the cliffhanger.

The Doctor and her Fam are enjoying a day exploring an abandoned moon, when they come across a scorned native species who has a vendetta against humans, and begins hunting them. T for blood and violence. Hurt/comfort, Angst and some fluff. There's a reason the Doctor always stands between her companions and the dangers they face...

The Master's human decides she wants a holiday. Things don't go as planned; at least, not according to her plan. Written for Nicola's Birthday Writing Challenge using prompts #28 (I hear you calling me at night) and #53 (I won't let you go). Part I of The Planets.
Post Can You Hear Me? ONESHOT
